column2: Mukanda wa kibuti kia Yesu Klisto, muana wa Davidi, muana wa Abalahama.
Abalahama abutile Isaka; nu Isaka abutile Yakobo; nu Yakobo abutile Yuda nu bato bage;
nu Yuda na mukikulu wage Tama babutile Pelese nu Zela; nu Pelese abutile Heselona; nu Heselona abutile Lama;
nu Lama abutile Aminadaba; nu Aminadaba abutile Nasona; nu Nasona abutile Salamona;
Salamona na mukikulu wage Lahaba babutile Boaza; nu Boaza na Luta babutile Obede; nu Obede abutile Yese;
nu Yese abutile mukota Davidi.
Davidi nu wozo mukikulu wabezaga wa Uliya babutile Solomo;
Solomo abutile Lehabama; nu Lehabama abutile Abiya; nu Abiya abutile Asa;
nu Asa abutile Yehasafata; nu Yehasafata abutile Yolama; nu Yolama abutile Uziya;
nu Uziya abutile Yotama; nu Yotama abutile Ahaza; nu Ahaza abutile Hezikiya;
nu Hezikiya abutile Manase; nu Manase abutile Amona; nu Amona abutile Yosiya;
nu Yosiya abutile Yekonia nu bato bage, mu nkungu zibendile nabo ku bukobe ku Babulona.
Nu kusila kua kuenda kuabo ku bukobe ku Babulona, Yekonia abutile Salatiele; Salatiele abutile Zelubabela;
nu Zelubabela abutile Abihuda; nu Abihuda abutile Eleyakima; nu Eleyakima abutile Azo;
nu Azo abutile Sadoka; nu Sadoka abutile Akimi; nu Akimi abutile Eliyuda;
nu Eliyuda abutile Eleaza; nu Eleaza abutile Matana; nu Matana abutile Yakobo;
Yakobo abutile Yosefu iba wa Malia, uwabutile Yesu, ukumanua bune, Klisto.

Bubo bibuti binsania kutukila ku Abalahama aba ku Davidi bili ikumi na binazi; nu kutukila ku Davidi aba nu gabendile nabo ku bukobe ku kilongo kia Babulona bili bibuti ikumi na binazi; nu kutukila ku bukobe ku kilongo kia Babulona aba nu ku Klisto bili bibuti ikumi na binazi.
Kubutua kua Yesu Klisto kuabezaga bubo: Gabezaga nina Malia andua na Yosefu, babezaga tabemenyana, abede neiyimi ku magala ma Muuza Wasililila.
Nu Yosefu, iba wage, abezaga muntu weisanana nuwe ntamuitizie na nsoni, atundaga kumugila mu lumbisombiso.
Gabezaga esakengela bubo, mugenzi wa Mukota wamubaside mu ndozi, wamubuide bune, Yosefu, muana wa Davidi, gukue boba kutola mukikulu wobe Malia kubuno iyimi liage lili lia magala ma Muuza Wasililila.
Nuwe abute muana wamulume; wamuinike izina buno YESU; kubuno akonia bantu bage ku misako za buagi buabo.
Bubuno bunsania buabezaga buno lizindilile liatendagua na Mukota ku mulengania bune,
Unguililazi, kikumi kitemenyua na wamulume, kieke iyimi,
Nuwe abute muana wamulume,
Bamuinike izina buno, Emanuele,
Buisulilua bualio, Kalaga eli neisue.
Gayukile Yosefu ku tulo, akitile anga buamutendile mugenzi wa Mukota; nu atolile mukikulu wage,
nu abezaga ntemumenya aba gabutile muana wamulume: nu amuinikile izina buno, YESU.
Gabutilue Yesu mu Betelehema wa Yudaya mu bindi bia mukota Helode, Bantu ba Menge batukile kuntata kukutukaga kisongo kia busi babasile ku Yelusalema, babuzizie bune,
Kuni kueli wozo wabutilue Mukota Munene wa Bayuda? kubuno tua­monine ku lukenikeni luage kukubasaga kisongo kia busi, tuavua kumukumbamina.
Gongule mukota Helode ku kitondo kikino, mutima wage wakutukile, nu za bantu bansania babezaga nage mu Yelusalema.
Akundamanizie basankoga banene bansania nu basanzi ba bantu, ababuzizie bune, Kuni kukabutilua Klisto?
Bamubuide bune, Mu Betelehema wa Yudaya: kubuno anga buasanzilue na mulengania bune,
Uwe Betelehema, mu kisi kia Yuda,
Taguli mukeke munkatini mua bukota bua Yuda:
Kubuno muguli umukabutua Mukota Munene,
Wozo akaba mulangi wa bantu bane ba Isalele.
Nu mukota Helode amanine Bantu ba Menge ku lumbisombiso, ababuzizie bune, Nkungu nkizi nunse zimuamuene ku lukenikeni?
Abasingile ku Betelehema, abatendile bune, Endazi mutitibukizie musagu wa muana; nu gamuamumoneko, nti muavua kunsambalila, nunne lingo nti nende kumukumbamina.
Gabongule kuiyuki lia mukota, bendile; nu lulo lukenikeni, lubamonagakulo kuntata kuku­basaga kisongo kia busi luendile luabusio luabo, aba nu galuabasile ga kiziki kiabezaga muana.
Gabamonine ku lukenikeni, babo­gilebogile nunse.
Nu beingide mu numba nu bamonine ku muana nu nina Malia; bakomine mazu gansi, nu bamukumbamine; bakanuine bikagi biabo, bamukasile nkaso, mikotola nu aliga nu bulago.
Nu gabatondile Kalaga mu ndozi buno, Tamusubie ku Helode, basubizie ku kisi kiabo muengo nzila.
Nubo gabendile, mugenzi wa Mukota wabaside Yosefu mu ndozi, wamubuide bune, Yuka nu utole muana nu nina, nu utine ku Ezipeto, nu wikale kuko aba gankakubulilaga: kubuno Helode eku­londa kuita muana.
Nu ayukile nu atolile muana nu nina mu kindi, nu endile mu Ezipeto;
nu eikede kuko aba nu gakule Helode: bubo lizindilile liatendagua na Mukota ku mulengania, atendile bune, Namanine muana wane akumuke ku Ezipeto.

Gamenyine Helode buno Bantu ba Menge bamunyega nu ongilue nunse, asingile bantu, nu beitile bana bamulume bansania babezaga mu Betelehema, nu mu ndenge insania za muino, ba miaka ibili nu bango beki bana bato, kutukila ku busi buamusambalide Bantu ba Menge.
Buno lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania Yehemia bune,
Iyuki liungulue mu Lama, idilo nu kasina kanene,
Lahele akulilila bana bage;
Nuwe ntatundile kubibibua, kubuno bana bage tabeligo.
Gakule Helode, mugenzi wa Mukota wabaside Yosefu mu ndozi ku Ezipeto, amutendile bune,
Yuka nu tola muana nu nina, nu wende ku kisi kia Isalele: kubuno babo batundaga kuita muana bakua.
Nu ayukile nu atolile muana nu nina, nu babasile mu kisi kia Isalele.
Tondo gongule buno, Alukelao angata ku Yudaya mu kiziki kia isi Helode, akule boba kuenda kuko; nu gamutondile Kalaga mu ndozi, endile mu ndenge za Galela,
nu abasile nu eikeide mu muino wamanagua buno Nazaleta; bubo lizindilile liatendagua na balengania bune, Akamanua mu Nazaleta.
Mu bindi bibio Yoana Mubatizi abasile, asambalide bantu mu kalula ka Yudaya bune,
Iyaniazi; kubuno bukota bua meigulu buse buigi.
Kubuno wozo watendagua na mulengania Yesaya bune,
Iyuki lia muntu likulalukaga mu kalula bune,
Kungazi nzila za Mukota,
Isiazi matingilo mage.
Nuwe Yoana abezaga na nsulu za mioza za ngamia, nu mukoma wa kikoba mu kibunda kiage; nu idia liage liabezaga nzige nu buki bua mulubanda.
Nu bamuendeide bansania ba Yelusalema, nu ba Yudaya, nu bansania ba ndenge insania za buigi na Yadene;
nu babatizizibue nage mu luuzi lua Yadene, beigongaga misako za buagi buabo.
Aba gamonine ku baFalese beingi nu Basadoke bavule kubatizibua nage, ababuide bune, Inyue kikanga kia mpoma, nazi wamutendile buno, mutine bongoa bukavua?
Kolamazi biguma biatananina kuiyania:
nu tamukengele mubenyene bune, Tuli na tateisue Abalahama; kubuno nikumutenda bune, Kalaga anavuama kubasizia Abalahama bana mu makozi mamano.
Nu kano kaluma isaga liabikua gansi na miti: nu muti na muti utako­lama biguma bisoga nti wasesue, nu nti weisoa mu keiya.
Lebe­lebe nkumubatizia na mazi ku kabamba ka kuiyania: tondo we ukavua kumbusa kuane antinga, nsiatananina kueka bisalapata biage: wozo akamubatizia na Muuza Wasililila nu na keiya:
lueli luage luli mu kuboko kuage, nuwe akengia mulungu wage nunse, nuwe akakundamania mumpunge wage mu kigenge kiage, tondo akagisia mpepa mu keiya katakuzimaga.
Gatukile Yesu ku Galela, avule ku luuzi lua Yadene ku Yoana, buno abatizibue nage.
Tondo Yoana ananine, atendile bune, Nne nikuiyanina kubatizibua nobe, tondo wavua kundi?
Tondo Yesu amuakuide bune, Ziga tugu bubo: kubuno bubo buatutananina kuzindilizia kuisanana kunsania. Nu amuzigile.
Gamubati­zizie, kazanga kongo Yesu atukile mu mazi: nu kazanga kongo meigulu mamulimbukide, nu amonine ku Muuza wa Kalaga eku­kumba anga nkulimba, nu amugelede;
nu kazanga kongo, iyuki liatukile mu meigulu, liatendile bune, Wono eli Muana wane, u Ngoli zane, nakomana nage.
Tondo Yesu asondelezizibue na Muuza mu kalula buno alindi­kue na Liabo, u Satana.
Eiyombekile bindi makumi manazi, ntalia musi nu kindi, kusila kua bubo akule na nzala.
Nu muli­ndiki avule nu amutendile bune, Ndi uwe u Muana wa Kalaga, kakizia makozi mamano mabe kampampa.
Nuwe amuakuide bune, Buasanzilue, muntu ntanalama na kampampa tugu, umpanga neidagi linsania likutuka mu kanua ka Kalaga.
Nu wozo Liabo, u Satana, amusondelezizie ku muino wasuagibua nu amuemanizie gantata ga mutondo wa numba nnene za kukumbamina,
nu amubuide bune, Ndi uwe u Muana wa Kalaga, iyise gansi: kubuno buasanzilue bune,
Akakizie migenzi zage zikulange:
nu, Mu maboko mabo bakueke,
Unavua kukikitanua kugulu kuobe kuikozi.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Buasanzilue lingo bune, Ntulindike Mukota Kalaga wobe.
Nu lingo, wozo Liabo, u Satana, endile nage ku muiduko wasakama nunse, nu amulolesizie makota mansania ma kisi, nu malebo mamo;
nu amubuide bune, Bibino binsania nakukase, ndi wankumbamina.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Tuka Satana: kubuno buasanzilue bune, Kumbamina Mukota Kalaga wobe, nu nti wamukitila wenyene.
Nu Liabo, u Satana, amu­sigile: nu migenzi za Kalaga zavule, zamukitide.
Gongule Yesu musagu buno, Yoana akandua, endile ku Galela;
nu atukile ku Nazaleta, nu avule kuikala ku Kapenuma, uliko buigi na kiziba, mu miaga za Zebulona nu Nafatale:
bubo lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania Yesaya bune,
Kisi kia Zebulona nu kisi kia Nafatale,
Nzila za mu ntungo na kiziba, lisilia lia Yadene,
Galela za baBilongo,
Bantu babezaga mu kapilo bamonine ku kiengi kinene,
Nubo beikalaga mu kisi kia kilimelime kia lukuo.
Kiengi kiababaside.
Kutukila nkungu zezo Yesu alingile kusambala, nu kutenda bune, Iyaniazi; kubuno bukota bua meigulu buse buigi.
Nu gatabangaga mu ntungo mua kiziba kia Galela, amonine ku bantu babili ba muto neiselenzi, Simona wamanagua buno Petelo, nu muto wage Andele, beisaga kakila mu kiziba; kubuno babezaga bazubi.
Ababuide bune, Nyangazi, nu namubike buno mube bazubi ba bantu.
Nu kazanga kongo basigile tukila, nu bamuyangile.
Nu gabede esalombozia, amonine ku bango bantu babili ba muto neiselenzi, Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, nu muto wage Yoana, babezaga mu buato neisibo Zebedayo, balandaga tukila tuabo; nu abamanine.
Nu kazanga kongo basigile isibo na buato, nu bamuyangile.
Nu Yesu endile kunsania ku Galela, eigisagia mu numba zabo za musanganano, nu abasambalide musagu musoga wa bukota, nu onezie nsambo za nkita na nkita za bantu.

Nu lukumu luage luasambedue mu ndenge insania za Sulia; nu bamuvuilide na ba­sambi bansania, nu bansania bateikosagia na nsambo za nkita na nkita, nu babezaga na basumbu, nu babezaga na lungu, nu boma maboko; nu abonezie.
Nu misanganano za bantu beingi zamuyangile kutuka ku Galela, nu ku Dekapoli, nu ku Yelusalema, nu ku Yudaya nu ku lisilia lia Yadene.
Gamonine ku musanganano wa bantu, abakamine ku muiduko: nu geikede gansi, beigisibua bage bamuvuilide:
nu gali­mbuide kanua kage, abeigisizie bune,
Mbogimbogi ku babo beli bazambi mu muuza wabo: kubuno bukota bua meigulu buli buabo.
Mbogimbogi ku babo beli na kabebe: kubuno bakabobelezibua.
Mbogimbogi ku babo babota; kubuno bakapiena kisi.
Mbogimbogi ku babo bekukua na nzala nu mpusia za kuisanana: kubuno babo bakeikuta.
Mbogimbogi ku babo bekukua kiombo; kubuno babo baka­kuilua kiombo.
Mbogimbogi ku babo beli na mutima wasuaga; kubuno babo bakamona ku Kalaga.
Mbogimbogi ku basungi; kubuno bakamanua bana ba Kalaga.
Mbogimbogi ku babo bababazizibue ku kabamba ka kuisanana: kubuno bukota bua meigulu buli buabo.
Mbogimbogi kumuli inyue bakalingua, nu kubabazibua, nu kuekua buza ku mulondo na mulondo mubi ku kabamba kane.
Bogazibogazi nu mube na kielele: kubuno lukalilo lunene lueinyu lusoga luli muigulu: kubuno ububo bubababazagia balenga­nia balingaga kuba nti tamubutua.
Inyue muli munkange wa kisi; tondo ndi munkange taguli nse, unasuagibua na kikizi? Tagunasuaga lingo nunse, umpanga nti watebua kumbuga nu kunyantua na bantu.
Inyue muli kiengi kia kisi. Muino tagunabisama ndi wobakua gantata ga muiduko.
Aba bantu tabanagulumizia kasuku, nu kukabika kunsi kua luzi, tondo gantata ga kibikilo kia kasuku; nuko nti kakusania bansania beli mu numba.
Bubo kiengi kienyu kisane ku bantu, bamone ku makitilo meinyu masoga, nu nti baganune Soeinyue uli muigulu.
Tamukengele buno, navule kubigia mulembe aba bulengania: nsiavule kubibigia, tondo kubizindilizia.
Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Igulu nu kisi bikazimina tondo keisanzo kamozi kakeke ka masanzo ma mulembe takakazimina aba mansania makazindilizibua.

Muntu unsania ukakagulaga ikakizio limozi ku mamano nu kuigisia bango bantu bubo, akakegibua mu bukota bua meigulu: tondo ukamanzaga nu kuigisia bango bantu bubo, wozo akakutibua mu bukota bua meigulu.
Kubuno nkumubula nunse, ndi kuisa­nana kueinyu takuatinga kuisanana kua basanzi nu baFalese, nti tamukeingila mu bukota bua meigulu.
Mungule buatendagua ku bantu ba wakalazi bune, Ntuite muntu; ukeitaga muntu nti akaba na katati ku lusungio:

tondo nne nkumubula bune, Muntu unsania ukongelua mubuto wage akaba na katati ku lusungio; nu muntu unsania ukabula mubuto wage buno, kikongolo, akaba na katati mu luusu lua milondo; nu muntu unsania ukabulaga mubuto wage buno, Uwe u kioto, akaba na katati mu kiziba kia keiya.
Umpanga, ndi usakasana lukaso ku kayulo, nu ndi wakengela buno, uli na mulondo na mubuto wobe,
siga tanga lukaso ku kayulo, nu nti wenda ku mubuto wobe buno ugomie nage, nu nti wasubia kukasana lukaso luobe.
Sasia kugomania na wakusomba nkungu ziguli nage mu nzila; wozo wakusomba anavua kukubasia ku ngatu, nu ngatu nti akubasia ku bakoloboyo, nu nti wakandua.
Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Ntukatuka nunse kuko ndi ntusila nsombi zobe insania.
Mungule buatendagua bune, Ntuite meiga:
Tondo nne nkumubula bune, muntu unsania ukulola mukikulu na lutundo lua kumulimbia, nti asila kalazi kuita meiga mu mutima wage.
Nu ndi liso liobe liakuinia mutima, nti walitikia, nu nti walisa bulazi nobe: wanulumba wazimina kiganza kimozi, kuteli mubili wobe unsania kuingila mu kiziba kia keiya katanakuzinda.
Nu ndi kuboko kuobe kua seidume kuakuinia mutima, nti wakusesa, nu nti wakuisa bulazi nobe: wanulumba wazimina kiganza kimozi, kuteli mubili wobe unsania kuingila mu kiziba kia keiya katanakuzinda.
Buatendilue lingo bune, Muntu unsania ukatikagia mukikulu wage nti amukasa mukanda wakuita isonga:
Tondo nne nkumu­bula bune, Ndi wamulume atikia mukikulu wage, kuteli ku kabamba ka butazi, nti amubika muiti wa meiga nu unsania wasonga wozo watukibua nti eita meiga.
Lingo, mungule buatendagua ku bantu ba wakalazi buno, Ntulumbile kilumbilo kia buza tondo mukitile Mukota bilumbilo biobe binsania:
tondo nne nkumubula bune, Tamulumbile nunse; aba kuigulu, kubuno igulu lili kisumbi kietangatanga lia Kalaga;
aba ku kisi kubuno kisi ukibikilo kia magulu mage; aba nu ku Yelusalema, kubuno muino wozo uli wa Mukota Munene.
Aba ntulumbile kuitoe liobe, kubuno ntunavuama kugalukia luzuili lumozi kuluengia aba kuluinia.
Tondo kuitabizia kueinyu kube bune, E, nti, E, nu tobo nti, tobo; Iyuki liakutalika likutuka ku wozo mubi.
Mungule buatendagua bune, Liso, ku liso, nu linyo, ku linyo:
tondo nne nkumubula bune, Tamuluane na muntu mubi: tondo ndi muntu akulibula lugizi kuitama lia seidume, nti wamu­timbulila lingo lia seikazi.
Nuwe wakusongela, nu kutola nsulu zobe za kuntata, mukase ingo za kunsi.
Nuwe ukakuenzia lugendo lua mutandi umozi, ku magala mage, wende nage lugendo lua mitandi ibili.
Kasa wozo ukukusega, nu wozo ukukuambia ntumukase mugongo.
Mungule buatendagua bune, Tunda munyobe, nu somba wozo wakusomba:
tondo nne nkumubula bune, Tundazi babo bamu­somba, nu segelazi babo bekumubabazagia;
bubo muabe bana ba Soinyue uli muigulu: kubuno ekusanizia bantu babi nu bantu basoga kisongo kiage kia busi, nu ekulokezagia bantu beisanana nu bateisanana mbula.
Ndi mukutunda bakumutundaga, mukaba na lukalilo lukizi? Bandelelombe ndi tabakukitaga bubo?
Nu ndi mukusekela mibuto zeinyu tugu, nti unatinga bango bantu buni? Ndi baBilongo tabakukitaga nubo bubo?
Umpanga mube basililila, anga buasililila Soinyue uli muigulu.
Nkumutonda buno kuisanana kueinyu takube ku bantu buno, mumenyue nabo; ndi muakita bubo tamuli na lukalilo lusoga ku Soinyue uli muigulu.
Kungua ukukita bantu mponga, ntuide monze, anga bukukita bengelezi ku numba za musanganano nu mu nzila, buno baganunue na bantu. Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Babo bakasilue lukalilo luabo.
Tondo kungua ukukita bantu mponga, kuboko kuobe kua­seikazi takumenye bukukita kuboko kuobe kuaseidume;
bubo ndi wakita bantu mponga zibe ku lumbisombiso, nu Soinyue uku­mona mu lumbisombiso nti akukase lukalilo lusoga.

Nu ndi ukusega Kalaga, ntube anga bengelezi; kubuno babo bekuelama kusega Kalaga nti bemana mu numba za musanganano nu mu ndenge za nzila buno bamonekeko na bantu. Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Babo bakasilue lukalilo luabo.

Tondo, ndi ukusega ku Kalaga, nti wingila mu numba zobe nu nti wasega ku lumbisombiso, nu nti wigala luibi, nu nti wasega Soinyue uli mu lumbisombiso, nu Soinyue ukumona mu lumbisombiso; akukase lukalilo lusoga.
Tondo, ndi mukusega ku Kalaga, tamulalukela­luke anga bukukitaga baBilongo; babo bakukengelaga bune, Bamenyue ku kutendatenda kuabo.
Umpanga tamube anga babo; kubuno Soinyue eizi bimukuiyanina kungua tamumusega.
Segazi ku Kalaga anga bubuno; Tateisue uli muigulu izina liobe liganunue.
Bukota buobe buvue, kusombola kuobe kukitue ku kisi anga bukukukitua muigulu.
Tukase lelo idia lietu.
Tusigilile misako za buagi bueitu anga butukusigililaga bekutua­gilaga,
aba ntutuenzie ku malindiko, tondo tonie ku wozo mubi, kubuno uli na bukota, nu magala, nu lutanuno, aba ku nkiko zitana­kuzinda.
Kubuno ndi mukusigilila bantu misako za buagi buabo, nti Soinyue nuwe uli muigulu amusigilile misako za buagi bueinyu.
Tondo ndi tamukusigilila bantu misako za buagi buabo, nu Soinyue nuwe ntakamusigilila misako za buagi bueinyu.
Lingo ndi tamulia, tamube anga bengelezi bekukandaga malanga; buno bantu babamenye buno batakulia. Lebelebe, nku­mubula bune, Bakasilue lukalilo luabo.
Tondo uwe ndi ntu­kulia, ibongie muambo kuitoe, nu nti woga ku meiso;
tondo ndi ntukulia, ntumenyue na bantu; tondo Soinyue ukumona mu lumbisombiso akukase lukalilo lusoga.
Tamuibikile bikagi ku kisi, kuli kagembe nu nkisa kubibigia, gena gakuita beibi buno beibe;
tondo ibikilazi bikagi bienyu muigulu, kuteli kagembe nu nkisa kubibigia, nu lingo gatanavuama kuita beibi buno beibe;
kubuno gago geli kikagi kiobe, ugago gakaba mutima wobe.
Kasuku ka mubili keli liso: tondo ndi liso liobe lili isoga, mubili wobe unsania nti uli na kiengi.
Tondo ndi liso liobe lili ibi, mubili wobe unsania nti uli na kapilo. Ndi kikio kiengi kili muguli kise kapilo; nti keli kapilo nunse.
Takuli muntu unavuama kukambila bakota babili: embe nti asombe umozi, nu nti atunde ungo; embe anze umozi, nu abenge ungo. Tamunavuama kukambila Kalaga nu bikulo.
Kubuno nkumubula bune, Tamulemanine mu kalamo keinyu, buno tualie kikizi? aba tuanue kikizi? aba ku mubili weinyu, buno tuavuale kikizi? Ndi kalamo takatinga idia, nu ndi mubili tawatinga nsulu?
Lolazi ku tuzoni tua mu mpelela, tatukuyika aba tatukutubula mbuto, aba tatukukundamania mu bigenge, tondo Soinyue wa muigulu ekutulisagia. Inyue tamuatinga tuzoni ku busoga?
Nazi wa kumuli unalemanina kuitalikila ingo nkiko mu kalamo kage?
Buni bumukulemanina nsulu? Kengelazi lukita lua maluba ma mu masoa, lukita lumakuasa; tamakukita mulimo, aba tama­kulukaga;
tondo nkumubula bune, aba Solomo mu lutanuno luage lunsania ntavualikizibue anga busoga bua limozi lia mamo?
Tondo ndi Kalaga ekuvualikia bisugu bia masoa, biligo lelo, nu lubi bikutebua mu ngulumina za keiya; ndi ntakamuvualikia inyue beli basosu mu bukatizio bueinyu.
Tamulemanine nu tamu­tende bune, Tualie kikizi? aba, Tuanue kikizi? aba, Tuavuale kikizi?
Kubuno baBilongo bekulondaga bibino binsania; tondo Soinyue wa muigulu eizi binsania bimukuiyanina.
Tondo londazi tanga bukota bua Kalaga, nu kuisanana kuage; nu muatalikilue binsania.
Umpanga tamulemanine bia lubi, kubuno busi bua lubi buidemanine bubuenyene. Bubi buabo buasuage kubo.
Tamusungie, buno munavua kusungibua.
Kubuno lusungio lulo lumukusungia, ululo lumukasungibua; nu kulindika kumukulindika, ukuko kumukalindikua.
Nuwe, buni bukulola kikolokolo kili mu liso lia munyobe tondo ntukumona ku lubabu luli mu liso liobe?
Buni bunavuama kutenda ku munyobe bune, Munane, vua tanga nkutikie kikolokolo kili mu liso liobe, nuwe uli na lubabu lunene mu liso liobe?
Uwe muengelezi, tikia tanga lubabu luli mu liso liobe; nti ubunavuama kutikia kikolokolo kili mu liso lia munyobe.
Tamukase mboa kikio kiasuaga, aba tamuise busanga bueinyu bua bukunza bubibu gakutinga ngulube, zinavua kubunyanta na magulu mazo, nu gazabunyante nti zabuata.
Segazi, nu nti muakasue; londazi, nu nti muamone; koko­monazi, nu nti muigulilue.
Kubuno unsania ukusega, nti akasue; nuwe ukulonda, nti amone; nuwe ukukokomona, nti igulilue.
Nazi wa kumuli, unasegua na muana wage kampampa, nu nti amukasa ikozi?
Aba ndi ekumusega kiena ndi nti amukase nzoka?
Kubuno ndi inyue, bantu babi, muizi kukasa bana beinyu bisoga, embe Soinyue lino uli muigulu ndi ntanamenya kubakasa bisoga babo bakumusega?
Umpanga bubo bumuku­tunda bango bantu kumukitila, ububo nuinyue bumubakitila; kubuno bubo u mulembe nu bulengania.
Ingilazi ku muingilo wabumbutana: kubuno kuli ungo muingilo wa tanuka, nzila zago zenda ku kuzimina, nu beingi bekuingilaga mugo.
Kubuno wozo muingilo uli wabumbutana, nu kuzinda kua nzila zago kuli kalamo, nu bekukamona tabeli beingi.
Nikumutonda bune, Kukavua balengania ba buza beingi, bantu bakavua ku lukita lua nsulu za mikoko, tondo munda muabo muli anga mboa nkali za lubanda.
Mukabamenya ku biguma biabo. Ndi bantu bekukola biguma ku mikele? Aba figi ku binke­lenkele?
Bubo muti unsania musoga ukukolama biguma bisoga; nu muti mubi ukukolama biguma bibi.
Tondo muti musoga tagunakolama biguma bibi; aba muti mubi kukolama biguma bisoga.
Muti unsania utakolama biguma bisoga nti wasesue, nu nti weisoe mu keiya.
Bubo mukabamenya ku biguma biabo.
Ta na muntu na muntu ukumbula buno, Mukota, Mukota, ukengila mu bukota bua meigulu, tugu wozo ukukita kusombola kua Tatane uli muigulu.
Beingi bakambula ku busi bubo buno, Mukota, Mukota, ndi tatualenganizie muizina liobe? nu ndi tatua­bingaga basumbu kuizina liobe, nu ndi tatuakitaga migeleko mingi kuizina liobe?
Nu nkababula bune, Nsiamumenyine nunse: tukazi, bakiti ba bubi.
Muntu unsania ukunguaga ku malagi mane mamano, nu kumanza, akalingimanibua na muntu wa menge, wobakile numba zage ga luanda;
mbula zitikide, muiyalo wavule, nu kisoa kitile, nu kidibuide ku zezo numba; nu tazaguide: kubuno mango mazo mabezaga ga luanda.
Nu muntu unsania ukungua ku mamano malagi mane nu ntakumanza, akalingimanibua na kiko­ngolo, kiobakile numba zage ga misege:
mbula zitikide, muiyalo wavule, kisoa kitile, nu kidibuide ku zezo numba, nu zaguide; nu kugua kuazo kuabede na kilumo kinene.
Nu gasilile Yesu kuigisia bitondo bibio musanganano wanga­mine na meigisia mage;
kubuno abegisizie anga uli na buangato, nu nteigisizie anga basanzi babo.
Nu gagelile muiduko, misanganano minene zamuyangile.
Nu muiya bibali amuvuilide, nu amukumbamine, amubuide bune, Mukota, ndi watunda, unavuama kunengia.
Yesu alambi­zie kuboko kuage, etubizie kueli, amubuide bune, Nkutunda, wenge. Nu kazanga kongo bibali biage bionine.
Yesu amubuide bune, Ntubule muntu kitondo kikino; tondo enda, widolesie ku sankoga, ukasane lukaso anga buakakizizie Mose, lube bulongeki ku beli.
Geingide mu muino wa Kapenuma, mukota wa bakoloboyo avule kuage, nu amusegile bune,
Mukota, mukambi wane eiyami­kibua mu numba na lusambo lua kumia maboko, akubabalua nunse.
Yesu amubuide bune, Nkuvua kumonia.
Mukota wa bakolo­boyo amuakuide bune, Mukota, nne tabunatananina uwe kuingila mu numba zane; tondo tenda neiyuki tugu nu mukambi wane nti onibua.
Kubuno aba nunne nangatua, nu nangata bakoloboyo; nu ndi nabula umozi bune, Enda nti enda; nu ungo buno, Vua, nti avua; nu ku mukambi wane buno, Kita bubo, nti abukita.
Gongule Yesu kububo, angamine, nu abuide babo bamuyangaga bune, Lebelebe nkumubula buno nsimonaga lingo ku ungo uli na magala mu bukatizio anga wono mu bikanga bia Isalele.
Nu nkumubula buno, beingi bakatuka kukubasaga kisongo kia busi nu ku kutukaga kisongo kia busi, nu bekeikala na Abalahama, nu Isaka, nu Yakobo, mu bukota bua meigulu:
tondo bana ba bukota bakeisua mu kapilo ka kumbuga; kukaba kulila nu kubuga meinyo.
Yesu abuide mukota wa bakoloboyo bune, Enda, anga buwakatizagia bube. Mukambi wage onizibue nkungu zezo.
Nu gabasile Yesu ku numba za Petelo, amonine ku ninabiala wa Petelo eli neisusila.
Yesu eitubizie kuikoko liage, nu isusila liasilile; nuwe azanzukile nu amukitide.
Gabuabede buse mui­golo, bamulusizizie beli na basumbu beingi; nu embizie babo basumbu neiyuki liage, nu onizie bansania babezaga basambi:
bu bo lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania Yesaya bune, We wenyene atolile busosu bueitu, nu ekile nsambo zeitu.
Nu Yesu gamonine ku musanganano munene wamutimbi­kania, akakizizie bune, Tusokazi lisilia.
Musanzi umozi amu­vuilide, amubuide bune, Musozi, nakuyange kunsania kuwendage.
Yesu amubuide bune, Mikala zili na matengu, nu tuzoni tua mpelela tuli na bizumba; tondo Muana wa muntu nteli na kiziki kia kukukika itoe liage.
Ungo muigisibua abuide Yesu bune, Mukota, nkase buangato nende kuisa kitumba kia tatane.
Tondo Yesu amubuide bune, Nyange; siga bakuzi beisane buabo buabo.
Nu gakimine mu buato, beigisibua bage bamuyangile.
Nu kisoa kinene kiabede mu kitatenge, bimpumi binene bia mazi bieidi­buide ku buato: tondo Yesu abezaga eiyombeka ku tulo.
Beigisibua bage bamuvuilide, nu bamuyukizie, bamubuide bune, Mukota, tonie; tuakua.
Ababuide bune, Inyue basosu mu bukatizio bueinyu, kikizi kimukukua boba? Su ayukile, nu azugide kisoa nu mazi ma kitatenge nu kuolile nunse.
Bantu bangamine nu batendile bune, Wono eli muntu mukizi? aba kisoa nu kitatenge nti bikumuanza?
Nu gabasile lisilia ku kilongo kia Galasa, bantu babili babezaga na basumbu, bakulumanine nage batukaga ku kiziki kia nsinda, babezaga bakali nunse, nu takuli muntu watingaga mu zezo nzila.
Nu balalukile neiyuki inene batendile bune, Buni butuli nobe Uwe, Yesu Muana wa Kalaga, Ndi wavule gano buno ulinge kutusungia nu lusungio lueitu taluika?
Nu muimba muingi wa ngu­lube wabezaga kulazi waliaga.
Nu basumbu bamusegile, bamu­tendile bune, Ndi watutikia, nti watuingizia mu muimba wa ngu­lube.
Nu ababuide bune, Endazi. Nu batukile, nu bengide mu ngulube: nu muimba unsania wa ngulube wakumbile mu mpembue, nu wizisile mu kitatenge, nu wakule mu mazi.
Balangi bazo batinine, bendile ku muino, basambeide bunsania, nu bitondo bia basumbu.
Bantu bansania ba mu muino bendile kukulumania Yesu: nu gabamumueneko, bamubuide bune, Tuka mu miaga zeitu.
Nu Yesu eingide mu buato, asokile lisilia lia kitatenge, abasile mu muino wage.
Nu bavule na muntu wabezaga na lusambo lua kugilimina, eiyombeka ga mugu: nu Yesu amenyine bukatizio buabo, amubuide bune, Muana wane, ba na mbogimbogi; misako za buagi buobe zasigililua.
Nu bango basanzi bakengeide bune, Muntu wono ekulinga Kalaga.
Yesu amenyine bubakengalaga, atendile bune, Kubuno mukukengela makengelo mabi mu mitima zeinyu?
Buni buli busoga, kutenda bune, Misako za buagi buobe zasigililue; aba kutenda bune, Emanuka, wende?

Tondo buno mumenye bune, Muana wa muntu eli na buangato geikikili ga kisi kusigilila misako za buagi, (nu abuide wozo wabezaga na lusambo lua kugilimina bune), Emanuka, nu weke mugu wobe, nu wende kuobe ku numba.
Nu azanzukile, nu endile kuage ku numba.
Tondo gamonine bantu ku bubo, bakule boba, nu baganuine Kalaga, uwakasile bantu buangato bubo.
Nu gatukile Yesu gago, amonine ku muntu, wamanagua Matayo, abezaga eikile ku mulimo wa kuligia idigo nu amubuide bune, Nyange. Nuwe azanzukile, nu amuyangile.
Nu gabezaga eiseikala mu numba kulia idia, bandelelombe beingi nu bagi bavule beikede na Yesu nu beigisibua bage.
Nu gamonine baFalese ku bubo, babuide beigisibua bage bune, Kubuni Musozi weinyu ekulia na bandelelombe nu bagi?
Tondo gongule Yesu ku bubo, ababuide bune, Beli babibu tabaneiyanina musakizi, tondo basambi.
Endazi muiyigisie buisulilua bua bubo, Nkutunda kiombo, nsikutunda kisansa: kubuno nsiavule kumana beisanana, tondo bagi.
Mu nkungu zezo beigisibua ba Yoana bavule kueli, bamubuide bune, Isue nu baFalese tukugilaga mambizi meingi, tondo buni butekugilaga beigisibua bobe?
Yesu ababuide bune, Bana ba musongi ndi banavuama kulila, mu nkungu zibeli na musongi? Tondo bindi bikatukibua musongi, ugabakagila.
Takuli muntu unalanda kibe kia nsulu za mubalabala ku nsulu za mukungio; kubuno zezo za mubalabala nti zata zezo nsulu za mukungio; nu itengu nti liaba inene nunse.

Aba bantu taba­kongolaga maku meituba mu tutembe tukulu: ndi bamongola mu tuto tutembe nti tuabuga, nu maku meituba nti makubuka, nu tutembe nti tuabiga; tondo bantu bakongolaga maku meituba mu tutembe tuto, nu bibili bikale bisoga.
Gabezaga Yesu esabatenda bitondo bibino, Mukota umozi avule kueli, nu amukumbamine, nu amubuide bune, Muana wane wa mukazi alekana kalazi: tondo vua ubike kuboko kuobe gantata gage, nu alame.
Nu Yesu azanzukile, nu amuyangile na beigisi­bua bage.
Nu mukikulu, wabezaga na lusambo lua kubasa mikila miaka ikumi neibili, avule kumbusa kuage nu etubizie ku mupimpo wa nsulu zage:
wozo mukikulu akengede bune, Ndi neitubia ku nsulu zage, nti nonibue.
Tondo Yesu atimbukile, nu amumonineko, nu amubuide bune, Muana wane, lindia mutima wobe, bukatizio buobe buakonia. Nu wozo mukikulu onizibue mu zezo nkungu.
Nu geingide Yesu mu numba za wozo mukota, nu amonine ku beidi ba mionze, nu ku musanganano munene waki­taga kazege,
nuwe atendile bune, Tukazi: muana ntakua, tondo eiyombeka tugu. Bamusekile.
Nu gatikizibue musanganano, eingide, nu akatile muana ga kuboko kuage, nu muana azanzukile.
Nu musagu wozo wakukeine mu kikio kilongo kinsania.
Nu gabezaga Yesu esatinga kuko, biuku bibili biamuyangile bialalukile neiyuki inene, biatendile bune, Muana wa Davidi, tukue kiombo,
Nu geingide mu numba, bibio biuku biamuyangile: nu Yesu ababuide bune, Ndi mukukatizia buno ninakita bubo? Bamubuide bune, E, Mukota.
Nu eitubizie ku meiso mabo, atendile bune, ku bukatizio bueinyu ukinsa bubo buaba.
Nu meiso mabo mazibukile. Yesu abalagile bune, Tamutende bubuno ku ungo muntu.
Tondo gabatukile gago basambede musagu wage mu kikio kilongo kinsania.
Nu gabatukile, bamuvuilide na muntu kaluma wabezaga na musumbu.
Nu gatukizibue musumbu, kaluma katendile: nu musanganano wangamine, batendile bune, Tatumonaga ku bubuno lingo mu kisi kia baIsalele.
Tondo baFalese batendile bune, Wono akuimbia basumbu ku magala ma mukota wa basumbu.

Nu Yesu atabangile kunsania mu mino minene nu mikeke, nu eigisagia mu numba ningi zabo za musanganano, nu abasambalide musagu musoga wa bukota, nu onizie nsambo insania za nkita na nkita, nu bagongole ba nkita na nkita.
Tondo gamonine ku musanganano munene agukuilide kiombo, kubuno wabezaga na kabebe nu wabalangene, anga mikoko ziteli na mulangi.
Nu abuide beigisibua bage bune, Lebelebe matubulo meli meingi, tondo bakambi tabeli beingi.
Segazi Mukota wa matubulo, buno asinge bakambi mu matubulo mage.
Nu amanine beigisibua bage ikumi na babili, abakasile buangato kutikia basumbu ba nsese, nu konia nsambo insania za nkita na nkita, nu bagongole ba nkita na nkita.
Meina ma basingua ikumi na babili umamano: Wakulinga, Simona, bamuinikile buno, Petelo, nu muto wage Andele; nu Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, nu Yoana muto wage;
Filipo, nu Batolomayo; Toma, nu Matayo wabezaga mundelelombe; nu Yakobo muana wa Alufayo, nu Tadayo;
nu Simona mu Kana­nayo; nu Yudasa Isakaliote, wozo wamugabuide.
Babano ikumi na babili Yesu abasingile nu abakakizizie bune, Tamuende ku baBilongo, tamuingile mu muino wa kilongo kia baSamalia:
tondo endazi ku mikoko zazimine za numba za Isalele.
Nu gamukuenda sambalazi buno, Bukota bua meigulu buse buigi.
Oniazi basambi, yukiazi bakuzi, engiazi beli na bibali, tikiazi basumbu: muakasilue buliabulia nuinyue kasanazi buliabulia.
Tamueke olo aba feza, aba nsubi mu nsago zeinyu;
aba kangonze ka lugendo, aba makoti mabili; aba bisalapata, aba musumbo: kubuno mukambi atananina neidia liage.
Ndi muabasa mu muino munene nu muino mukeke, londazi bantu batananina; beli mumo, ikalazi mumo aba gamukatukamo.
Tondo ndi museingila mu numba, nti sambi­ziazi beiya zezo numba.
Tondo ndi beiya numba batananina, bubobelelo bueinyu bube ku beli: tondo ndi beiya numba tabata­nanina, bubobelelo bueinyu busubie kumuli.
Tondo ndi muntu ntamusambizia, aba ndi ntakungua ku bumukutenda, nti muabasa mu zezo numba aba mu wozo muino, nu nti muatitula mukungu wa mu masindi meinyu.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Lusungio lua wozo muino lukatinga lua Sodomo nu Gomola mu busi bua lusungio.
Unguililazi, nkumusinga anga mikoko zili munkatini mua mboa za mu lubanda: umpanga mube na menge anga ma nzoka, nu anga tuzoni tua nkulimba tutekuitanaga.
Tondo idangazi na bantu: bakamugabula ku nusu za milondo, nu bakamususula ku numba zabo za musanganano;
nuinyue mukeikibua ku ngatu nu ku bakota banene ku kabamba kane, kuba balongeki kubeli nu ku baBilongo.
Tondo gabakamugabula, tamulemanine buno, buni butuatende? kubuno mu nkungu zezo muabulue bumutenda.
Kubuno ta inyue ubakatenda, tondo Muuza wa Soinyue ukatenda mu muli.
Mubuto wa muntu akagabula mubuto wage buno akue, nu isi wa muana akagabula muana wage buno akue, nu bana bakabinga bababuta, nu bakabagabula buno bakue.
Nu muka­sombua na bantu bansania ku kambaba keizina liane: tondo wozo widindika aba nu kuzinda, nti ukonibua.
Aba gabakasungibua mu muino wono, tininazi mu ungo: lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Tamukazindilizia nunse mino insania za balsalele aba gakavuila Muana wa muntu.
Muigisibua ntegezie na musozi wage, aba mukambi ntegezie na mukota wage.
Buasuagia muigisibua abe anga musozi wage, nu mukambi anga mukota wage. Ndi bamanine nyene numba bune, Mukota wa basumbu babi, tondo buni bukamanua bantu ba mu numba zage?
Umpanga tamubakue boba; kubuno takuli kiabisilue, kitakabisulua; nu takuli kiakukidue, kitakokulua.
1 Impanga bunkumubula mu kapilo, bubulazi mu kiengi; nu bumu­kungua mu kutuzi, busambalazi gantata mutondo wa numba.
Tamukue babo bekuita mubili boba, tondo tabanamenya kuita muntu wenyene; tondo kuazi wozo boba uli na magala kuzimizia muntu wenyene nu mubili mu kiziba kia keiya.
Ndi tuzoni tubili tukeke tatunakunzua ku sengi? Nu kamozi takanakoloka gansi ndi Soinyue ntamenya:
tondo nzuili insania za ku matoe meinyu zaganzilue.
Tamukue boba: bukunza bueinyu buli bubibu kutinga tuzoni tuingi.
Umpanga muntu unsania ukani­tabizagia ku bantu, nunne nkamuitabizia ku Tatane uli muigulu.
Tondo muntu unsania ukantunaga ku bantu, nunne nkamutuna lingo ku Tatane uli muigulu.
Tamukengele buno navule kulusia bubobelelo ku kisi: nsia­vule kulusia bubobelelo, tondo bupanga.
Kubuno navule kuanzukania muntu neisi, nu mukinga na nina, nu mukamuana na ninabiala:
nu babo ba numba za muntu ubakaba beiti bage.
Wozo welama isi nu nina kuntinga ntantananina, wozo welama muana wage wa wamulume aba muana wage wa mukazi kuntinga ntantananina.
Nuwe uteka muti wage wa magu, nu kunyanga, ntantananina.
Muntu ukulanga kalamo kage nti akazimizia; nu wazimizia kalamo kage ku kabamba kane nti ukakamona.
Nu wozo wamusekela nti ansekela, wozo wansekela nti asekela wozo wansingile.
Wozo wasekela mulengania, buno eli mule­ngania; akakasua lukalilo lusoga ku kabamba ka mulengania: nuwe wasekela wisanana buno eisanana, akakasua lukalilo lusoga ku kabamba ka wisanana.
Nuwe unsania ukakasaga umozi wa ku babano bakeke kituma kia mazi makuasa tugu buno eli muigisibua, lebelebe nkumubula bune, Ntakaziminua na lukalilo luage lusoga nunse.
Nu gasilile Yesu kukakizia beigisibua bage ikumi na babili, nuwe atukileko kuigisia nu kusambala mu mino zabo.
Nu gabezaga Yoana mu kikando ongule ku misagu za buakitaga Klisto asingile beigisibua bage babili bamubuzie bune,
Ndi uwe u wozo wavue, aba ndi tukike ungo?
Yesu abakuide bune, Endazi musambalile Yoana bumungua kubo nu bumuamona kubo:
biuku bise biamona, bitunga bise biatabanga, beiya bibali bengibua, bimbula matuzi bise biungua, bakuzi bayukibua, nu bazambi basambalilua musagu musoga.
Nu mbogimbogi ku wozo uta­kuina mutima nanne.
Nu gabendile, Yesu alingile kubula musanganano bitondo bia Yoana, ababuide bune, Muendaga kulonda kikizi mu kalula? Kulola lusolu lukutengatenga na lumpumpu?
Kikizi kimuendaga kulola? ndi muntu wavuala nsulu zabota? Unguililazi, babo bavuala nsulu zabota beli mu numba za bakota.
Tondo muendile kulola kikizi? Ndi mule­ngania? E, nkumubula bune, Wozo watinga mulengania,
Wozo uwasanzilue bune,
Unguililazi, nalinga kusinga mugenzi wane,
Kukunga nzila zobe.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Takumonekaga muntu munene wabutua na bakikulu, watinga Yoana Mubatizi, tondo wozo uli mukeke mu bukota bua meigulu amutinga.
Kutukila ku bindi bia Yoana Mubatizi aba nu kano kaluma bukota bua meigulu buku­luaninua bita, nubo baluani ba bita ubekubutola.
Kubuno balengania bansania nu mulembe balenganizie aba nu ku Yoana.
Nu ndi mukutunda kubumenyinina, wono u Eliya, wavue.
Wozo uli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Tondo nkalingimania kibuti kino na kikizi? Kili anga bana beikile kuisoko, bekubula banyabo,
nu bekutenda bune, Tuamuidide mpengu, nu tamuaminine; tuamulilide na kasina, nu tamuigombile ga makuba.
Kubuno Yoana avule nu ntalile nu ntanune, nu batendile bune, Eli na musumbu.
Muana wa muntu avule, ekulia nu ekunua, nu bekutenda bune, Muntu kiliagundu nu munuzi wa maku, nu muida wa bandelelombe nu bagi! Nu menge maku­bingibua ku misako zamo.
Nu alingile kuzugila zezo mino nu akitile migeleko mingi muzo, nubo tabeiyanizie.
Kabebe ku Kolazina! kabebe ku Betesaida! songo migeleko mingi zakitilue kumuli, uzakitilue mu Tula nu Sidona, songo beyanizie kalazi banekeide mu nsulu za nsago nu mu luito.
Tondo nkumubula bune, Lusungio lua Tula nu Sidona lukaba neibineibi ku busi bua lusungio kutinga lusungio lueinyu.
Nu uwe Kapenuma, ndi ukabakamibua aba kuigulu? Ukake­gibua ku Kiziki kia Bakuzi: songo migeleko zakitilue kumuli, uzakitilue mu Sodomo songo wono muino ukili aba nu lelo.
Tondo nkumubula bune, Lusungio lua Sodomo lukaba neibineibi ku busi bua lusungio kutinga lusungio lueinyu.
Mu nkungu zezo Yesu akuide buno, nakusima Tatane, Mukota wa meigulu nu kisi, kubuno wabisile malagi mano ku beli na menge nu bumenyinino, nu wamamenesia ku bana;
bubo, Tatane, kubuno bubo buabezaga buakutananina.
Tatane ankasile binsania: takuli wizi Muana, tugu Isi; takuli wizi Isi tugu Muana, nu unsania Muana ekutunda kumulolesia.
Vuazi kundi, bansania bakutua na mikambo, nu bakutua na mizigo, nunne namu­muzie.
Muiyambike kisanga kiane kia mukambo, nu muiyigisie kundi kubuno nne nabota, nu nili bubobelelo mu mutima: nuinyue mumunue mubenyene.
Kisanga kiane kia mukambo kiatamba, nu muzigo wane uli mugu.
Mu nkungu zezo Yesu atingile busi bua Sabato mu masoa ma mabela; nu beigisibua bakule na nzala balingile kukala mabela nu bamalile.
Tondo baFalese, gababamonineko, bamu­buide bune, Lola, beigisibua bobe bekukita butakulungana ku mulembe ku busi bua Sabato.
Tondo ababuide bune, Ndi tamuasomine buakitile Davidi, gakuaga na nzala, we nu banyage?
Bubo buengide mu numba za Kalaga, alile kampampa ka kayulo, katakulungana kulia ku mulembe, aba nu bango babezaga nage, tugu basankoga bobenyene?
Ndi tamuasomine mu mulembe buno, mu busi bua Sabato basankoga aba mu numba nnene zaku­kumbamina babigizie busi bua Sabato nu tababede na katati.
Tondo nkumubula bune, Umozi munene watinga numba nnene za kukumbamina, eli gano.
Songo muizi buisulilua bua malagi mamano, nkutunda kiombo, nsikutunda kisansa, songo tamunaba­sungizie beteli na katati.
Kubuno Muana wa muntu eli Mukota wa busi bua Sabato.
Atukile gago, nu eingide mu numba za musanganano wabo:
nu muabezaga muntu woma kuboko. Nu babuzizie Yesu bune, Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe konia muntu ku busi bua Sabato? buno bamusongele.
Nu ababuide bune, Nazi muntu wa mumuli uli na mukoko umozi, ndi wakoloka busi bua sabato mu muzinga, utanavuama kugukata nu kugutikia?
Bukunza bua muntu buatinga bua mukoko mambizi manga! buakulungana ku mulembe kukita busoga busi bua Sabato.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Lambia kuboko kuobe, nu akulambizie, nu kuabeide kugimagima anga kuko kungo.
Tondo baFalese batukile, nu bamukitide luango buno bamuite.
Nu gamenyine Yesu bubo, atukile kuko: nu beingi bamuya­ngile; nu abonizie bansania,
nu abakakizizie buno, tabasambale musagu wage:
bubo lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania Yesaya bune,
Unguililazi, mukambi wane unasombuede;
Ngoli zane zinatananinua nazo nnenyene:
Nabike Muuza wane gantata gage;
Nuwe akasambalila baBilongo lusungio.
Ntakaluana, aba ntakalaluka;
Aba muntu ntakongua kuiyuki liage mu nzila.
Lusolu luenyantilue ntakalunyanta,
Aba nsulu zikususa ntakazizimia,
Aba nu gakalusia lusungio luage lukakinda.
Nu izina liage baBilongo bakalilemanina.
Bavule kueli na wabezaga na musumbu, abezaga kiuku nu kaluma: amonezie, bubo wozo kiuku u kaluma atendile nu amonine.
Nu musanganano unsania wangamine, watendile bune, Ndi wono ta muana wa Davidi?
Tondo gongule baFalese kuiyuki lilino, batendile bune, Muntu wono ntekutikia basumbu tugu mu magala ma Belezebula, mukota wa basumbu.
Tondo Yesu amenyine bubakengelaga, ababuide bune, Bukota bunsania bukuide­kanukia bukakua; nu muino unsania nu numba insania zikuide­kanukia, nti zikakua:
nu ndi Satana ekutikia Satana, nti ekuide­kanukia; bukota buage bunasimba buni?
Nu ndi nkutikia basumbu mu magala ma Belezebula, nti bana beinyu bakabatikia mu magala ma nazi? Kubuno ubabo bakaba ngatu zeinyu.
Tondo ndi nne nkutikia basumbu mu Muuza wa Kalaga, kasi bukota bua Kalaga buse kumuli.
Nazi muntu unavuama kuingila mu numba za wozo uli na magala, nu kubigia bikulo biage, ndi ntalinga kukanda wozo uli na magala? nu kusila nti abigie numba zage.
Ndi muntu nteli nanne bumozi nti akuntuna; nu wozo utakukunda­mania nanne nti akubalangania.
Ku bubuno nkumubula bune, Misako insania za buagi nu bilingano binsania bikasigililua, tondo babo bakalingaga Muuza Wasilililatabakasigililua.
Muntu unsania ukatendaga bubi ku Muana wa muntu, akasigililua; tondo muntu unsania ukatendaga bubi ku Muuza Wasililila, ntakasigililua, mu nkiko zeno, aba mu nkiko zikavua.
Mukubula buno muti uli musoga, nu biguma biago bisoga, aba mukubula buno muti uli mubi nu biguma biago bibi; kubuno muti ukumenyua ku biguma biago.
Inyue kikanga kia mpoma, mukubezaga babi munatenda busoga bukizi? Kubuno bukuke­ngela mutima nti ubukutenda kanua.
Muntu musoga ekukanuna bikulo bisoga mu kikagi kiage kisoga: nu muntu mubi ekukanuna bikulo bibi mu kikagi kiage kibi.
Nu nkumubula bune, Iyuki neiyuki likutenda bantu buliabulia bakasungibua kulio busi bua lusungio.
Kubuno ku moki mobe ukabingibua nu ku moki mobe ukasungibua.
Nu bamozi ba basanzi nu baFalese bamuakuide bune, Musozi, tukutunda watukitila kalolesio.
Tondo abakuide bune, Kibuti kibi nu kia butazi kikutunda kalolesio; tamukamona ku kango kalolesio gantata ga kalolesio ka mulengania Yona:
kubuno bubo buabezaga Yona munda za kiena kinene; bindi bisatu musi nu kindi bubo Muana wa muntu akeikala mu kisi, bindi bisatu musi nu kindi.
Bantu ba Ninewe bakemana mu kindi kia lusungio gamozi na bantu ba kibuti kikino, nubo bakakisungia: kubuno beiyanizie kukusambala kua Yona; nu gano geli watinga Yona.

Mu busi bua lusungio, mukikulu eli mukota wa kunsi akei­mana gamozi na bantu ba kibuti kikio, nuwe akakisungia; kubuno we atukile kunsi kua kisi buno amone ku menge ma Solomo; nu gano geli watinga Solomo.
Gatukile musumbu wa nsese mu muntu, endile ku kiziki kitabezaga mazi, alondaga gomunua, ntagamonine.
Lingo, we atendile bune, Nasubie mu numba zane zinatukaga muzo; gavue, amonine mu numba tamukampa, zayagilua, zakungua.
Lingo akavua na bango basumbu mutuba kamo bamutinga bubi, nu bekuingila nu bekuikala mumo: nu muntu wozo lukita luage luzinda nti luaba lubi kutinga lutangi, ububo bukaba kibuti kikio kibi.
Gabezaga ekutenda na musanganano, nina nu mibuto zage bemene kumbuga, batundaga kutenda nage.
Nu muntu umozi amubuide bune, Nyoko nu mibuto zobe bemana kumbuga, beku­tunda kutenda nobe.
Tondo akuide wozo wamukengelezagia buno nazi mane? nu banazi mibuto zane?
Alambizie kuboko kuage ku beigisibua bage, atendile bune, Lolazi, mane nu mibuto zane!
Kubuno muntu unsania ukukita kusombola kua Tatane uli muigulu, we nti umuto wane nu mubitu wane nti umane.
Mu busi bubo Yesu atukile mu numba, eikede ku mutili wa kitatenge.
Musanganano munene wamuvuilide, kububo eingide mu buato, eikeide; nu musanganano unsania wemene ku mutili.
Nu abatendile bitondo bingi mu misumo bune, Unguili­lazi, muyiki endile kuyika mbuto;
nu gayikaga, mbuto imozi zakolokile mu ntungo mua nzila, nu tuzoni tuavule tuazilile:
ingo zakolokile gantata ga luanda, takuabezaga bisogo bingi: nu kazanga kongo zasile kubuno takuabezaga bisogo bingi:
nu gasanukile musi, zagulumine; kubuno tazabezaga na mizi, nu zomine.
Ingo zakolokede mu mikele; nu mikele zasile nu zazilimbanizie:
nu ingo zakolokile ga bisogo bisoga, nu zakolamine biguma bingi, imozi lukama, ingo makumi mutuba, nu ingo makumi masatu.
Wozo uli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Nu beigisibua bage bamuvuilide, bamubuide bune, Buni bukubeisa misumo?
Yesu abakuide bune, Inyue umuakasilue menge ma kumenya tukungu tua bukota bua meigulu, tondo babo tabamakasilue.
Kububuno muntu unsania uli na kena, baka­mukasa kango, nu akaba na bingi: tondo muntu unsania uteli na kena, akanyagua kako keli nako.
Ku bubo ukunkubeisila misu­mo; kubuno bekumona tondo tabekumona, nu bekungua tondo tabekungua, aba tabekumenyinina.
Nubo bazindilizie meigisia ma mulengania Yesaya ekubabula bune, Kungua mungue, tondo tamuamenyinine; nu kumona muamone, nu tamukutitika;
Kubuno mitima za bantu babano zabezaga mibibu,
Nu matuzi mabo tamakunguaga,
Nu basila kuziba meiso;
Buno banavua kutitika,
Nu kungua na matuzi,
Nu kumenyinina mu mitima zabo, Nu kugaluka lingo,
Nu ninabonia.
Tondo meiso meinyu meli na mbogimbogi, kubuno mekumona; matuzi meinyu meli na mbogimbogi lingo, kubuno mekungua.

Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Balengania beingi nu bantu beisanana batundile kumona ku binsania bimukumona kubio, tondo tababi­monineko; nu batundile kungua ku binsania bimukungua kubio, tondo tababiunguleko.
Umpanga unguililazi ku musumo wa muyiki wa mbuto.
Muntu unsania ukungua kuidagi lia bukota, kuteli kulimenyinina, ububo wozo mubi ekuvua, nu ekunyaga mbuto zayikua mu mutima wage. Wono uwayikilue mu ntungo mua nzila.
Nuwe wayikilue ga luanda, uwozo ukungua kuidagi nu kazanga kongo ekulitunda na mbogimbogi;
tondo nteli na muizi munda muage, ekusigala nkungu nkeke; nu gakuvua kabebe aba lubabazio ku kabamba keidagi, kazanga kongo ekuikuka.
Nuwe wayikilue mu mikele, uwozo ukungua kuidagi; tondo tubebe tua kisi nu buengelezi bua bikulo, bukulimbania idagi, we ntako­lame.
Nuwe wayikilue mu bisogo bisoga uwozo ukungua kui­dagi nu kulimenyinina; uwozo wakolama biguma; umozi lukama, ungo makumi mutuba, ungo makumi masatu.
Abeisile ungo musumo bune, Bukota bua meigulu bualingi­mana na muntu wayikile mbuto nsoga muisoa liage:
tondo gabezaga bantu beiyombeka ku tulo, wamusomba avule, kuyika mbuto mbi munkatini mua mbuto nsoga, nu endile.
Tondo gasile mbuto nsoga zakolamine, nsamba za tunkukuzungu zamone­kile nuzo kuzo.
Nu bakambi ba nyene isoa bavule, bamubuzizie bune, Mukota, ndi ntuayikile mbuto nsoga muisoa liobe? Kuni kuatukila tunkukuzungu?
Akuide bune, wansomba uwakitile bubo. Bakambi bage bamubuide bune, Ndi ukutunda tuende kuyula tunkukuzungu?
Ababuide bune, Kilo; kubuno ndi muayula tunkukuzungu, nti muayula mumpunge.
Bisigazi biasile gamozi aba mu nkungu za kutubula: nkabula batubuzi buno, Lingazi kukungika tunkukuzungu nu kutukanda bibombo bibombo kutukagisibua; tondo kundamaniazi mumpunge mu kigenge kiane.
Abeisile ungo musumo bune, Bukota bua meigulu bualingi­mana na kambuto ka lua bunyonyo, muntu akakatile, nu akayikile muage muisoa:
keli kakeke ku mbuto insania; tondo gabuku­kula, bukutinga mbuto insania, nu nti zaba muti munene, nu mu ntabi zazo tuzoni tua mu mpelela nti tukuvua kukata.
Abeisile ungo musumo bune, Bukota bua meigulu bualingi­mana na mugago, wisile mukikulu mu bianzi bisatu bia bugali, nu bunsania buagagile nunse.
Nu Yesu atendile na musanganano binsania mu misumo, ntanabuatendile buatatendile ku musumo:
bubo lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania bune,
Nkatenda ku misumo;
Nkatenda biabezaga biabisua kutukila kulinga kua kisi.
Nu Yesu asigile musanganano, nu eingide mu numba; beigisibua bage bamuvuilide, nu bamubuide bune, Tuisulile musumo wa tunkukuzungu tuabezaga muisoa.
Nu abakuide bune, Ukuyi­kaga mbuto nsoga eli Muana wa muntu;
Nu isoa lili bantu ba kisi; mbuto nsoga zili bana ba bukota; tunkukuzungu tuli bana ba wozo mubi;
nu musombi eli Liabo, u Satana; busi bua kutubula buli kuzinda kua nkiko, batubuzi beli migenzi za Kalaga,
Umpa­nga bantu bakakundamania tunkukuzungu nu kutuisa ga keiya, nu bubo ubukaba ku kuzinda kua nkiko.
Muana wa muntu akasinga migenzi zage, bakasombola mu bukota buage binsania bikuagia bango, nu bakiti babi.
Nu bakeisua mu kiziba kia keiya, uku­kaba idilo nu kubuga meinyo.
Mu busi bubo bantu basoga bakasana anga kisongo kia busi mu bukota bueIsibo. Wozo uli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na kikagi kiabisilue muisoa; muntu akimonine, nuwe akibisile lingo; nu ku mbogimbogi zage, endile, nu akunzisizie biage binsania, nu akunzile lilio isoa.
Lingo, bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na muntu mukunzia, walondaga ikozi isoga lia bukunza bubibu;
nu gamonine ikozi lia pelele lia bukunza bubibu, endile nu akunzizie biage binsania, nu alikunzile.
Lingo, bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na kakila kisagua mu kitatenge, kakundamanizie biena bia nkita na nkita:
geiyalile kakila bundo, bakabulutile ku muse; beikeide, bakundamanizie hiabezaga bisoga mu mato, nu bisile biabezaga bibi.
Nu ububo ubukaba mu kuzinda kua nkiko; migenzi zikavua, bakatikia bagi abezaga munkatini mua bantu beisanana,
nu bakeisua mu kiziba kia keiya, ukukaba idilo nu kubuga meinyo.
Ndi muamenyinina bunsania? Bamuakuide bune, E.
Nu ababuide bune, Musanzi unsania uli muigisibua mu bukota bua meigulu alingimana na muntu muiya numba ukutikia bikulo bitangi nu bizinda muisuku liage.
Nu gasilile Yesu misumo zeno, atukile.
Nu gabasile mu kilongo kia kuabo abeigisizie mu numba zabo za musanganano, nu bangamine nu batendile bune, Kuni kuasanga muntu wono menge mamano, nu migeleko zeno?
Ndi wono ta umuana wa mukulumizi wa mbabu? ndi nina ta uwozo ukumanua buno Malia? nu ndi bato bage ta u Yakobo, nu Yosefu, nu Simona, nu Yuda?
Nu babitu bage, bansania tabeli kueitu? Umpanga kuni kuasangila wono bubuno bunsania?
Nu beinine mitima nage. Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Mulengania ntakubengua ku ungo, umpanga kuabo, nu mu numba zage.
Nu ntakitile migeleko kuko, kubuno tabakatizizie.
Mu nkiko zezo mukota Helode ongule ku musagu wa Yesu,
nu abuide bakambi bage bune, Wono eli Yoana Mubatizi; ayuka ku bakuzi; nu kububuno ekukita migeleko zeno.
Kubuno Helode akatile Yoana, amukandile, nu amubikile mu kikando ku kabamba ka Helodia, mukikulu wa muto wage Filipo.
Kubuno Yoana amubuide bune, Ku mulembe tabuakulungana kuguli kuikala nage.
Nu Helode atundile kumuita, tondo akule musanganano boba, kubuno akengede buno abezaga mulengania.
Tondo ga­bede busi bunene bua kubutua kua Helode buika, mukinga wa Helodia aminine munkantini mua bantu, nu atananizizie Helode.
Nu Helode alumbide bune, Kinsania kiwansegage nakukasekio.
Nu mukinga aninue na nina, atendile Helode bune, Nkase itoe lia Yoana Mubatizi ga kianzi.
Nu mukota abede na kabebe; tondo ku kabamba ka kulumbila kuage, nu ku kabamba ka babo baliaga nabo, nu akakizizie buno akaselio;
nu asingile muntu buno asese itoe lia Yoana mu kikando.
Itoe liage lialusizibue ga kianzi, nu alikasile ku wozo mukinga nu aliekile ku nina.
Nu beigisibua bage bavule nu beikile kitumba kiage nu bakiyikile; nu bendile kundula Yesu.
Gongule Yesu ku mundulo wa Yoana, atukile mu buato, endile mu kalula, kutabezaga bantu; nu gongule musanganano bubuno, batukile ku mino zabo, bamuyangile na magulu.
Nu gatukile Yesu mu buato, amonine ku musanganano munene, agukuilide kiombo, nu onezie basambi babo.
Nu gabuabede buse muigolo, beigisibua bage bamuvuilide, nu batendile bune, Kiziki kino kili kalula, nu busi buse buida; singa musanganano, buno bende kulonda idia mu mino.
Tondo Yesu ababuide bune, Taba­nenda, bakasazi idia.
Bamubuide bune, Tuli na tumpampa tutano nu biena bibili tugu.
Nu Yesu atendile bune, Vuazi nabio kundi.
Nu abuide musanganano buno, Ikalazi ga bisugu; nu akatile tumpampa tutano nu biena bibili; nu agalamine kuigulu, abisegede nu abibunguide nu abikasile beigisibua nu beigisibua babikasile musanganano.
Nu bansania balile, nu bembukile: nu basongezie mbobu zasigalaga zizazizie nzi ikumi neibili.
Nu babo bansania baliaga babezaga bamulume bakuka tununu tutano, tabaganzile bakikulu nu bana.
Nu kazanga kongo asingile beigisibua bage buno bakimine mu buato, buno balinge kusoka ku lisilia, nuwe asigede ekulagana na musanganano.
Nu gasilile kulagana na musanganano, abakamine ku muiduko buno asege, nu gabuabede buse muigolo abezaga kuko wenyene.
Tondo buato buabezaga buse munkatini mua kita­tenge, nu buagingilegingile nunse na bimpumi kubuno kisoa kiabe­zaga kinene.
Gabasile nkungu za mulangi wa banazi mu kindi Yesu avule kubeli endaga gantata ga kitatenge.
Nu gamonine beigisibua bage ekuenda gantata ga kitatenge bakule boba, batendile bune, Kili kilimelime; nu balalukile kubuno bakuaga boba.
Tondo kazanga kongo Yesu ababuide bune, Kokomeziazi mitima zeinyu; nne wono; tamunakua boba.
Nu Petelo amuakuide bune, Mukota ndi uwe wozo nkakizie nunne buno nivue gantata ga mazi.
We amubuide bune, Vua kundi, Petelo atukile mu buato, endile gantata ga mazi, endile ku Yesu.
Tondo gamonine ku kisoa akule boba, alingile kukoka mu mazi, alalukile bune, Mukota nonie.
Yesu alambizie kuboko kuage, amuzanzuide, amubuide bune, Uwe musosu mu bukatizio, buni butakukatizia?
Nu gaba­kimine mu buato, kisoa kiabotile.
Nu babo babezaga mu buato bamukumbamine, batendile bune, Lebelebe, uwe uli Muana wa Kalaga.
Nu gabasokile, babasile ku kisi kia Genesaleta.
Nu gabamumenyine babo bantu ba kiziki kikio, basingile migenzi ku ndenge za kisi kikio, nu bamuvuilide na basambi bansania;
bamusegile buangato bua kuitubia ku mumpimbo wa nsulu zage: nu bansania beitubizie bonezibue.
Nu baFalese nu basanzi batukile ku Yelusalema bavule ku Yesu, bamutendile bune,
Buni bukubigia beigisibua bobe bumba bua bakulu? kubuno bekulia taboga ku maboko.
Nu abakuide bune, Kubuni nuinyue mukubigia kukakizia kua Kalaga ku kabamba ka nkita zeinyu?
Kubuno Kalaga atendile bune, Anza so nu nyoko: nu wozo wasuilila isi aba nina nti akakua,
Tondo inyue mukutenda bune, Muntu unsania ukutenda kuisi aba ku nina bune, Lukaso lunabezaga nalo kukukasa nalukasile Kalaga;
nuwe ntakuanza isi aba nina. Inyue mukubigia idagi lia Kalaga ku kabamba ka nkita zeinyu.
Inyue bengelezi, lebelebe, Yesaya amulenganizizie busoga bune,
Bantu babano bekunanza na milomo zabo,
Tondo mitima zabo zili bulazi nanne.
Tondo bekunkumbamina buliabulia,
Bekuigisia meigisia ma malagi ma bantu.
Amanine musanganano abakuide bune, Unguililazi, nu mumenyi­nine:
Takikulia muntu mu kanua ukikumubigia; tondo kiku­tuka mu kanua kage, ukikumubigia.
Nu beigisibua bamue­ndeide bamubuide bune, Ndi ntuizi buno baFalese beinine mitima gabongule moki mamo?
Tondo abakuide bune, Bakatikia muti unsania utayikilue na Tatane uli muigulu.
Basigazi: babo u basondelezia ba biuku. Ndi kiuku kikusondelezia kingo, nti bako­loke bebabili mu muzinga.
Petelo amuakuide bune, Tuisulile wono musumo.
Yesu ababuzizie bune, Ndi inyue tamuba na menge aba nu kano kaluma?
Tamukumenya bune, Kikuingila mu kanua kikutinga munda, nu kikuisua mu mambue?
Tondo bikutuka mu kanua ubikutuka mu mutima; nubio ubikubigia muntu.
Kubuno mu mutima umukutukaga makengelo mabi; buiti, kuita meiga, butazi, buibi, bulongeki bua buza, nu bilingano:
ubibio bikubigia muntu; tondo kulia ntoga ku maboko takuku­bigia muntu.
Nu Yesu atukile kuko, nu endile mu ndenge za Tula nu Sidona.
Nu mukikulu wa mu Kanana atukile mu lulenge lulo, alalukile neiyuki inene bune, Mukota, muana wa Davidi, nkue kiombo; mukinga wane ekubabazibua na musumbu.
Tondo Yesu nta­kuide iyuki; beigisibua bage bavule kueli, bamusegile bune, Mutikie kubuno ekulila kumbusa kueitu.
Abakuide bune, Nasingilue tugu ku mikoko zazimine za numba za Isalele.
Tondo mukikulu avule kumukumbamina bune, Mukota nkasie.
Amuakuide bune, Tabusoga kuisa idia lia bana ku mboa.
Tondo mukikulu amubuide bune, E, Mukota: tondo mboa nuzo zikuliaga mbobu zikukolokaga kunsi kua meza za bakota bazo.
Yesu amuakuide bune, Uwe mukikulu, uli na magala mu bukatizio. Ukukitilua bubo bukutunda. Nu mukinga wage onezibue mu nkungu zezo.
Nu Yesu atukile kuko, nu endile buigi na kitatenge kia Galela, nu abakamine ku muiduko, nu eikedeko.
Misanganano zavule kueli, bitunga, nu biuku, nu tuluma, nu baketuka makua, nu ba ingo nsambo, nu bababikile ku magulu mage, nu abonezie:
nu lingo bantu bangamine, gabamonine ku tuluma tuse tuatenda, nu babeleka bese bemana, nu bitunga bise biatabanga, nu biuku bise biamona: nu baganuine Kalaga wa Isalele.
Yesu amanine beigisibua bage, nu ababuide bune, Nkukuila musanganano kiombo, kubuno beikede nanne bindi bisatu, tabeli neidia; nsikutunda kubasinga na nzala buno banavua kukutua mu nzila.
Nu beigisibua bage bamubuide bune, Kikino kiziki kili kalula, kuni kutuamonene idia liakuikutia bantu begezie gagano?
Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Tumpampa tunga tumuli nato? batendile bune, Tuli na mutuba kamo tugu nu tuabiena tumozi tukeke.
Abuide musanganano bune, Ikalazi gansi;
nu akatile tumpampa mutuba kamo nu biena; nu asegile, nu abi­bunguide, nu akasile ku beigisibua, nu beigisibua babikasile musa­nganano.
Nu babo bansania balile, nu beikutile: nu basongezie mbobu zasigalaga zizazizie nzi mutuba kamo.
Bantu bansania baliaga babezaga bamulume bakuka tununu tunazi, tabaganzile bakikulu nu bana.
Alagene na misanganano, nu engide mu buato, nu abasile mu ndenge za Magadana.
Nu baFalese nu baSadoke bavule kumulindika, nu bamu­buide bune, Tulolesie mugeleko ukutuka kuigulu. Aba­kuide bune,
Kungua buse muigolo mukutendaga buno, kuakie buange lubi; kubuno igulu liakangukilua.
Nu mu nindunindu mukutendaga buno, Lelo kuete kisoa: kubuno igulu liakisimana nu lieina bumpi. Inyue bengelezi, mukumenyinina igulu; tondo tamukumenyinina tulolesio tua nkiko.
Inyue ba kibuti kibi nu kia butazi mukutunda kalolesio; tamukalolesibua kango kalolesio, umpanga ka Yona. Nu abasigile, nu endile.
Nu beigisibua bendile lisilia lia kitatenge, beibilide kueka tumpampa tua kulia.
Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Idangazi na mugago wa baFalese nu baSadoke.
Bakengelezanizie buabo buabo bune, Tatuavule na tumpampa.
Nu gamenyine Yesu bubakengelaga, atendile bune, Inyue basosu mu bukatizio, buni bumukukengelezania, buno tamuavule na tumpampa?
Inyue tamukumenyinina aba ndi tamukukengela ku tumpampa tutano nu bantu babezaga bakuka tununu tutano, nu nzi inga zimuasongezie?
Inyue ndi tamukukengela tumpampa mutuba kamo nu bantu babezaga bakuka tununu tunazi, nu nzi inga zimuasongezie?
Ndi muizi tugu buno namubulaga tumpampa? Tondo namubulaga tugu buno muidange na mugago wa baFalese nu baSadoke.
Ububo, bamenyine bune, Ntatubuide ku mugago wa tumpampa, tondo atubuide tugu ku meigisia ma baFalese nu baSadoke.
Gavule Yesu mu ndenge za Kaisalia Filipo, abuzizie beigisibua bage bune, Bantu bekubula Muana wa muntu buno eli nazi?
Batendile buno bango bekutenda bune, Eli Yoana Mubatizi; bango bune, Eli Eliya; bango bune, Eli Yehemia, embe ungo mulengania.
Ababuide bune, Tondo inyue mukutenda buno nili nazi?
Nu Simona Petelo amuakuide bune, Uwe U Klisto, Muana wa Kalaga uli Mulami.
Yesu abakuide bune, Simona Muana wa Yona: uli na mbogimbogi; ta menge ma bantu umakumenesia bubo, tugu, Tatane uli muigulu.
Nunne, nkukubula bune, Nakuinika Petelo,
Nkakukasa mitandilua za bukota bua meigulu; nu kinsania kiwakandage ga kisi, nti kiakandue nukio muigulu; nu kinsania kiwakandulage ga kisi, nti kiakandulue nukio muigulu.
Kububuno, Yesu akakizizie beigisibua bage bubibu buno, Tabasambalile muntu buno we u Klisto.

Kutukila nkungu zezo Yesu alingile kulolesia beigisibua bage buno, atunganana kuenda ku Yelusalema, nu kubabazibua na bakulu nu na basankoga banene nu basanzi, nu kuitua, nu kuyukibua kusila kua bindi bisatu.
Nu Petelo amulutile, nu amuzugide bune, Mukota, Kalaga akukue kiombo, nu ntuabe bubo.
Yesu agalu­kile, abuide Petelo bune, Enda kumbusa kuane, Satana; ukuninia mutima, kubuno makengelo mobe tameli ma Kalaga, meli ma bantu.
Yesu abuide beigisibua bage bune, Ndi muntu atunda kunyanga, nti eituna, nu eke muti wage wa magu, nu anyange.
Kubuno muntu unsania ukutunda konia kalamo kage akakazimizia: nu unsania ukakazimizia ku kabamba kane, ukakamona.
Mutali mukizi wa muntu ndi angata kisi kinsania, nu kugabula kalamo kage? Aba muntu anagulania kikizi na kalamo kage?
Kubuno Muana wa muntu akavua mu lutanuno lueIsi na migenzi zage; busi bubo akaliga muntu na muntu anga buakitaga.
Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Bamozi bemana gano; tabakakua aba nu gabaka­mona ku Muana wa muntu ekuvua mu bukota buage.
Nu gatingile bindi mutuba Yesu atolile Petelo, nu Yakobo, nu muto wage Yoana, nu abakamine nabo ku muiduko mulazi bobenyene:
nu kilungi kiage kiabagalukide; nu malanga mage masanine anga kisongo kia busi, nu nsulu zage zabede zenga anga kiengi.
Nu babasidue na Mose nu Eliya besatenda nage.
Nu Petelo akuide Yesu bune, Mukota buli busoga ndi tuikala gano: ndi watunda, nobake nusu isatu; lumozi luobe, nu lumozi lua Mose, nu lumozi lua Eliya.
Gabezaga esatenda, kimpa kia kiengi kiabakukide; iyuki liatukile mu kimpa bune, Wono eli Muana wane, u Ngoli zane, nakomana nage; munguililazi.
Nu gongule beigisibua bage kuiyuki lilino, bakomine malanga gansi, nu bakule boba.
Nu Yesu avule, etubizie kubeli, abatendile bune, Yukazi, tamunakua boba.
Nu gabalambuide meiso, tabamonine kungo, umpanga Yesu.
Nu gababezaga basagela muiduko, Yesu abakakizizie bune, Tamubule ungo muntu bumuamona kubo, aba gakayuka Muana wa muntu ku bakuzi.
Nu beigisibua bage bamubuzizie bune, Kubuni basanzi bakutenda bune, Buatunganana Eliya kulinga kuvua tanga?
Nuwe abakuide bune, Lebelebe, Eliya akavua kukunga binsania;
tondo nkumubula bune, Eliya avule kalazi, tabamu­menyine, tondo bamukitile anga bubatundaga. Ububo Muana wa muntu ababazibue nabo.
Beigisibua bamenyine bune, Ekuba­sambalila musagu wa Yoana Mubatizi.
Nu gababasile ku musanganano, muntu umozi avule kueli, amukomine mazu, nu atendile bune,
Mukota, kuila muana wane wamulume kiombo, eli na lusambo lua lungu, ekubabazibua nunse; mambizi meingi ekuitumba ga keiya nu mu mazi.
Namuekile ku beigisibua bobe, tabavuamine kumonia.
Nu abakuide bune, Inyue kibuti kikio kia busombi nu kiteli na bukatizio, ndi nkeikalaga neinyu kankanka? gani gankakutilua? Vuazi nage kundi.
Nu Yesu amuzugide, nu wozo musumbu atukile mu muana: mu nkungu zezo muana onine.
Nu beigisibua bavule ku Yesu bobenyene, nu bamubuzizie bune, Kubuni isue tatuavuamine kumutikia?

Nu ababuide bune, Ku kabamba ka busosu bueinyu mu bukatizio: lebelebe, nkumubula, bune, Songo muli na bukatizio anga mbuto za bunyonyo, munabula muiduko bune, Tuka kuko, nu utingile kukuno, nu ukatinga; takuli kitakamukulunganina.
Tondo bubuno tabunamoneka tugu kute kukusega nu kugila.
Nu gababezaga mu Galela, Yesu abatendile bune, Bakagabula Muana wa muntu mu maboko ma bantu;
nu kuitua, nu kuyu­kibua kusila kua bindi bisatu. Nu abede na kabebe nunse.
Nu gababasile mu Kapenuma baligia ba idigo bavule ku Petelo bamubuzizie bune, Musozi weinyu ntakuliga idigo kubuni?
Atendile bune, E, nkuliga. Nu ingide mu numba, Yesu alingile kumubuzia bune, Simona, ukukengela buni? ndi bakota ba kisi bekuligia bana babo aba ndi bageni?
Nu akuide, Bageni tugu. Yesu ababuide bune, Bubo bana bakandulua.
Tondo tunavua kubeinia mitima, enda ku kiziba, nu isa kakila mukio, nu tola kiena kialinge kuvua; gawasule mu kanua kakio, nti wamone shekela
Mu nkungu zezo beigisibua bavule ku Yesu, bamubuzizie bune, Nazi uli munene mu bukota bua meigulu?
Yesu amanine muana muto, nu amubikile munkatini muabo,
nu atendile bune, Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Ndi tamuagaluka, nu kuba anga bana bato, tamukeingila mu bukota bua meigulu.
Muntu unsania wibotia anga wono muana muto, ukaba munene mu bukota bua meigulu.
Unsania wasekela muana muto anga wono muizina liane nti ansekela:
tondo ukeinagia umozi wa ku babano bana bato bekunkatizagia mutima, buatananina akandue ikozi lia kugoga muikosi liage, nu kuisua muiziba lia kitatenge.
Kabebe ku kisi ku kabamba ka kuinania mitima! Lebelebe, kuinania mitima kuatunganana kuvua, kabebe ku wozo ukuinia ungo mutima.

Ndi kuboko kuobe aba kugulu kuobe kuakuinia mutima, nti wakusesa, nu nti wakuisa bulazi nobe; gunulumba wingila kitunga mu kalamo, kuteli kuingila mu keiya katanakuzima na maboko mabili nu magulu mabili.
Ndi liso liobe liakuinia mu­tima, nti walitikia, nu nti walisa bulazi nobe; gunulumba wingila mu kalamo na liso limozi, kuteli kutumbua mu kiziba kia keiya na meiso mabili.
Tamubenge muana muto umozi wa ku babano, kubuno nkumubula bune, Muigulu bindi binsania migenzi zabo zikulolaga ku meiso ma Tatane uli muigulu.
(Kubuno Muana wa muntu avule konia kikio kiazimine.)
Mukukengela buni? Ndi muntu eli na lukama lua mikoko, nu umozi wazimina, ndi ntana­siga zizingo makumi mubula nu mubula, nu kuenda mu muiduko kulonda wozo wazimine?
Nu gagumonine, lebelebe nkumubula bune, Agubogedebogede, kutinga zezo makumi mubula nu mubula zitazimine.
Ububo Soinyue uli muigulu ntakutunda muana umozi wa ku babano bana bato kuzimina.
Ndi mubuto wobe akuagila, enda, umulolesie buakuagila inyue babili: ndi akunguilila, nti waluta mubuto wobe.
Ndi anana nti wenda na muntu umozi aba bantu babili ububo bulongeki buasuage ku balongeki babili aba basatu.
Nu ndi abanana, nti walondola mulondo wozo ku ekelezia; nu ndi anana ku ekelezia, nti abe kuguli anga wa Bilongo nu anga Mundelelombe.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Kinsania kimuakandage ku kisi, nti kiakandue nukio muigulu, nu kinsania kimuakandulage ku kisi, nti kiakandulue nukio muigulu.
Nkumubula lingo bune, Ndi babili beita­bizania ku luango lumozi, nti basega, nu Tatane uli muigulu abakitile anga bubasegaga.
Ndi babili aba basatu bakundamana kuizina liane, nunne nti nili munkatini muabo.
Nu Petelo avule nu amubuzizie bune, Mukota, ndi mubuto wane anagila nti namusigilila mambizi manga? Ndi mambizi mutuba kamo?
Yesu amubuide bune, Nsikukubula tugu mambizi mutuba kamo; tondo Makumi mutuba kamo mambizi mutuba kamo.
Ububo bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na mukota umozi watundaga kuganza biage biabezaga na bakambi bage.
Nu galingile kuganza biage, bavule na umozi abezaga na nsombi za talanta tununu ikumi.
Nuwe ntabezaga na kena ka kuliga nsombi zage, nu mukota wage atendile bune, Bamukunzie na mukazi wage nu bana bage nu biage binsania bubo ubualige nsombi zage.
Mukambi aguede gansi amukumbamine, nu amubuzizie bune, Mukota nkuile kiombo, nkakuligaga nsombi insania.
Nu Mukota wage amukuilide kiombo, amulekede, nu amusigilide na nsombi.
Tondo mukambi atukile mu numba, akulumene nuwe na mukambi wage wabezaga na nsombi za ndenalise
Mukambi wage aguide gansi, amulakide bune, Nkuile kiombo, nkakuligaga nsombi zobe.
Tondo we ananine, endile kumubika mu kikando, aba nu gakaliga nsombi.
Gamonine bango bakambi banyage ku bubo mitima zabo zinine, bavule kusolela mukota wabo bunsania buakitaga.
Mukota wage amumanine, amubuide bune, Uwe mukambi mubi, nakusigilide nsombi insania, kubuno wanda­kide:
ndi ntunavuama kukuila munyobe kiombo anga bunaku­kuilide kiombo?
Nu mukota wage ongilue, amubikile mu maboko ma basungia aba nu gakaliga nsombi insania.
Ububo buamukite Tatane uli muigulu, ndi umozi wa kumuli ntakusigilila mubuto wage mu mitima zeinyu.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubo, atukile ku Galela, abasile mu miaga za Yudaya lisilia lia Yadene;
nu misanganano mingi zamuyangile; nu abonizie.
Nu baFalese bavule kumulindika, nu bamubuzizie bune, Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe muntu kutikia mukikulu wage ku musako na musako?
Nuwe abakuide bune, Ndi inyue tamuasomine tugu buno, Mu kulinga Mubumbi abumbile wamulume nu mukikulu,
nu atendile bune, Kububo wamulume akasiga isi nu nina, nu akalandana na mukikulu wage; nu bobabili bakaba mubili umozi?
Nu tabeli babili lingo, tondo beseli mubili umozi. Kubuno kiakulumanizie Kalaga, muntu ntanakilekanukia.
Bamubuzizie bune, Kubuni Mose akakizizie buno nti wamukasa mukanda wa kuita isonga, nu nti wamutikia?
Nu ababuide bune, Ku ka­bamba ka bubibu bua mitima zeinyu, Mose amuitabizizie kutikia bakikulu beinyu: tondo mu kulinga tabuabezaga bubo.
Aba­buide lingo bune, Tondo nkumubula buno wozo watikia mukikulu wage kute ku butazi nu kusonga ungo, nti eita meiga, nu wasonga lingo wozo watikibua, nti eita meiga.
Beigisibua bage bamu­buide bune, Ndi bitondo bia wamulume nu mukikulu bili bubo, kasi ta busoga kusonga.
Tondo ababuide bune, Bantu bansania tabanavuama kukatizia bubuno, tondo babo babukasilue.
Kubu­no kuli babutilue mintembele, nu kuli bango bakubukitua na bantu, nu bango bakuibikabo ku kabamba ka bukota bua meigulu. Uku­tunda kukita bubo nti abukita.
Nu bamuvuilide na bana bato, buno ababike maboko, nu kubasegela: nu beigisibua bage babazugide.
Tondo Yesu atendile bune, Sigazi bana bato bavue kundi, tamunabazugila: kubuno, beli anga babano bukota bua meigulu buli buabo.
Nu ababikile maboko, nu atukile kuko.
Nu muntu umozi amuvuilide, amubuide bune, Musozi, musa­ko musoga mukizi unikita buno, nibe na kalamo katanakuzinda?
Nu amutendile bune, Buni bukumbuzia buli busoga? Kuli tugu umozi u musoga: tondo ndi ukutunda kuingila mu kalamo; anza makakizio.
Abuzizie Yesu bune, Ikakizio ikizi? Yesu amu­tendile bune, Ntuite muntu, Ntuite meiga, Ntuibe, Ntueke munyobe buza.
Wanze So nu nyoko; nu utunde munyobe anga buwi­tunda uwenyene.
Wozo musikila amubuide bune, Nanzile mamo mansania kalazi; kikizi lingo kinikita?
Yesu amubuide bune, Ndi watunda kusililila, enda, ukunzie binsania biguli nabio, ubikase bazambi, bubo ukaba neisuku muigulu: nu uvue, unyange.
Tondo gongule wozo musikila ku bubo, endile na kabebe; kubuno abezaga na bikulo bingi.
Yesu abuide beigisibua bage bune, Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Kuingila kua mugumi mu bukota bua meigulu kuli kubibu.
Nkumubula lingo bune, Buli neibineibi ngamia kuingila muitengu lia nsinge, ku mugumi kuingila mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu gongule beigisibua bage ku bubuno, bangamine nunse, bamubuzizie bune, Nazi ukonibua?
Nu Yesu abalolile, abatendile bune, Bubuno tabunakulungana ku bantu; tondo bunakulungana ku Kalaga.
Bubo Petelo amuakuide bune, Unguilila, tuasigile bietu binsania nu tuakuyangile, kikizi kitukamona?

Nu Yesu aba­buide bune, Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Mu nkiko za kugaluka kua binsania gakeikala Muana wa muntu ga kisumbi kiage kia lutanuno, nuinyue lingo banyangaga mukeikala ga bisumbi ikumi na bibili, nu mukasungia bikanga ikumi nu bibili bia balsalele.

Muntu unsania wasigile numba zage, aba bato bage, aba babitu bage, aba isi, aba nina, aba bana bage, aba masoa mage, ku kabamba keizina liane, nu akatalikilua mambizi lukama, nu akapiena kalamo katanakuzinda.
Tondo beingi balingaga bakaba bazinda; nu beingi bazindaga bakaba batangi.
Bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na nyene isoa wendile nindunindu kulonda bakambi bakumukambila muisoa liage lia biguma.
Nu gagomezie nabo buno abalige falanga mutuba kamo ku muntu na muntu ku busi bumozi, abasingile muisoa liage.
Nu gatingile nkungu isatu, endile, nu amonine ku bango bemana tugu geisoko;
nu ababuide bune, Endazi muisoa liane namukase anga buakulungana. Nu bendile.
Gatingile nkungu mutuba, nu nkungu mubula, endile lingo akitile bubo.
Nu gatingile nkungu ikumi neimozi, endile, nu amonine ku bango bemana; ababuzizie bune, Kubuni inyue muemana tugu nkungu insania?
Bamubuide bune, Takuli muntu ukutukasa mukambo. Nu ababuide bune, Endazi muisoa liane.
Nu gabuabede buse mui­golo, nyene isoa abuide mulangi wa biage bune, Mana bakambi, ubakase lukalilo luabo, nti walingila ku bazinda nu kusila ku batangi.
Nu gavule babo ba ku nkungu ikumi neimozi bakasilue falanga mutuba kamo.
Nu gavule babo batangi, bakengede buno, Isue tukutalikilua ingo falanga; tondo nubo bakasilue falanga mutuba kamo.
Nu gabakasilue lukalilo luabo, babulilide nyene isoa bune,
Babano bazinda bakitile mukambo nkungu imozi tugu, nu walingimania neisue, nuisue tuakitile mukambo busi bunsania, nu tuababazibua na musi.
Tondo akuide umozi wa kubabo bune, Kilemba kiane, nsiakuagila; kubuno tuagomezie nobe ku falanga mutuba kamo tugu.
Kata zozobe, nu wiyendele; nku­tunda kukasa wozo ungo muzinda anga uwe.
Ndi nsinamenya kukita na biane anga bunkutunda? Ndi liso liobe lili ibi kubuno nne nili musoga?
Bubo bazinda bakaba batangi, nu batangi bakaba bazinda.
Nu Yesu gendaga ku Yelusalema na beigisibua bage ikumi nu babili bobenyene, nu gababede bese mu nzila, nu ababuide bune,
Unguililazi, tukuenda ku Yelusalema; nu Muana wa muntu agabulue ku basankoga banene nu basanzi; nubo bamusungie buno akue,
nu bamugabule ku baBilongo buno bamuililike, nu bamuli­bule, nu bamutake; nu ayukibue kusila kua bindi bisatu.
Nu nina wa bana ba Zebedayo avule na bana bage ku Yesu, amukumbamine, amusegile lusego lumozi.
Nu amubuide bune, Ukutunda kikizi? Amutendile bune, Laga bana bane babili beikale mu bukota bobe, umozi kuseidume nungo kuseikazi.
Tondo akuide bune, Tamukumenya kimukusega. Ndi munavuama kunua ku kituma kinkunua kukio? Bamutendile bune, Tunavuama.

Ababuide bune, Lebelebe, Muanue ku kituma kinanue kukio: tondo kuikala ku kuboko kuane kua seidume, nu kuboko kuane kua seikazi, nsinavuama kumukasa; tondo kuikala kuko kuli ku bantu balongekedue na Tatane.
Nu gongule beigisibua ikumi ku bubo, bongedue zezo mibuto zabo ibili.
Tondo Yesu abama­nine, ababuide bune, Muizi buno bakota ba baBilongo bekubangata, nu bakota babo bakubakitia.
Tondo bubo tabube kumuli; tondo wozo ukutunda kuba munene kumuli abe mukambi wa banyage,
nuwe ukutunda kuba mutangi kumuli abe mukambi wa banyage:
kubuno Muana wa muntu ntavule kukambilua, nu kukasana kalamo kage ku bukuluzi bua beingi.
Nu gabatukile ku Yeliko, musanganano munene wamuyangile.
Nu bamulume babili biuku babezaga mu ntungo za nzila, gabongule buno, Yesu ukutinga, balalukile bune, Mukota, muana wa Davidi, tukuile kiombo.
Nu bantu babazugide bune, Ikalazi kibibi; nu balalukile bune, Mukota muana wa Davidi tukuile kiombo.
Nu Yesu emanine, nu abamanine, nu ababuzizie bune, Mukutunda nimukitile kikizi P
Bamubuide bune, Muko­ta, tukutunda meiso meitu mazibulue.
Nu Yesu abakuilide kiombo, nu etubizie ku meiso mabo; nu kazanga kongo, bamonine nu bamuyangile.
Nu gababasile buigi na Yelusalema, nu kubasa ku Betepage, ku muiduko wa Oleve, Yesu asingile beigisibua bage babili,
nu ababuide bune, Endazi ku muino uli luabusio lueinyu, nu kazanga kongo muamone ku mpunda zasuikua, nu muana wazo: nti muazisula, nu nti muanvuila nazo.
Ndi muntu amubuzia, nti muabula bune, Mukota ekuiyaninazo: nu kazanga kongo nti asingazo.
Bubuno bunsania buabezaga buno lizindilile liatenda­gua na mulengania bune,
Bulazi mukinga wa Siona bune, Mukota wobe akuvua kuguli,
Wabota nu ekuenda gantata ga mpunda.
Nu beigisibua bendile, nu bakitile anga buababulaga Yesu,
nu bavule na mpunda, nu muana wazo, nu babikile nsulu zabo gantata gazo; nu eikede gantata gazo.
Nu bantu beingi ba misanganano banzile nsulu zabo mu nzila; nu bango basesile ntabi za miti, nu bazanzile mu nzila.
Nu musanganano wendaga luabusio luage, nu babo bamuyangaga, balalukile bubibu bune, Hosana ku muana wa Davidi; Mbogimbogi ku wozo ukuvua muizina lia Mukota; Hosana mu meigulu.
Nu gabasile ku Yelusalema, bantu bansania ba mu muino bangamine, babuzanizie bune, Wono eli nazi?
Bantu ba misanganano batendile bune, Wono eli mule­ngania, Yesu, wa ku Nazaleta wa Galela.

Nu Yesu engide mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga, nu alingile kuimbia babo bansania bakunzagia nu babo bakunzaga mu numba zezo, nu eidukizie meza ma bagulania ba falanga, nu bisumbi bia bakunzia ba nkulimba;
nu ababuide bune, Buasanzilue
Biuku nu bitunga bamuvuilide ku numba nene zakukumbamina, nu abonizie.
Tondo gamonine basankoga banene nu basanzi ku bubo buakitile buakuangamia, nu bana balalukile lingo mu zezo numba nene za kukumbamina bune, Hosana ku muana wa Davidi; bongilue.
Nu bamubuzizie bune, Ndi wungua ku bubo bukutenda babo bana? Yesu ababuide bune, E, ndi tamuasomine buno, mu tunua tua bana bato nu tunua tua bekibamoma, umukuzindilila lutanuno.
Nu abasigile, nu endile ku Betania, nu eikede kuko.
Gabezaga esasubia ku muino nindunindu, akule na nzala.

Nu amonine ku muti wa figi mu ntungo mua nzila, awendede, nu ntamonine kampa kugo, tugu nsamba; nu abuide muti bune, Ntuka­kolama biguma lingo tanga kutukila kano kaluma aba nu ku nkiko zitanakuzinda. Nu kazango kongo wozo muti womine.
Nu gamonine beigisibua bage ku bubo, bangamine nu batendile bune, Buni buoma muti wa figi mu kazanga kongo?

N u Yesu abakuide bune, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Ndi muaba na bukatizio buteli na kangonongono, mukakita tabubuno buakitua wono muti wa figi tugu; tondo mukabula muiduko bune, Tutumuka, nu wiyise mu kitatenge, nu nti buaba.
Nu binsania, bimukasegaga mu mase­go, ndi muakatizia, mukabikasua.

Nu geingide Yesu mu numba zakukumbamina, basankoga banene nu bakulu ba bantu bamuvuilide gabezaga eseigisia, nu bamubuzizie bune, Buangato bukizi bukukitila ku bubuno? nu nazi wakukasile buangato bubuno?
Nu abakuide bune, Nunne nkumubuzia bumozi, ndi muanakulabo, nti namubula nunne buanga­to bunkukitila ku bubo.
Bubatizio bua Yoana, buatukile kuni, muigulu aba ku bantu? Babuzanizie buabo buabo, ndi tuamutenda bubo, buatukile muigulu; nti ekututenda buno, kubuni tamuamu­katizizie?
Tondo ndi tukutenda buno, ku bantu; nu tukukua musanganano boba; kubuno bantu bansania bekukatizia Yoana buno, eli mulengania.
Nu bakuide Yesu bune, Tatuizi. Nu ababuide bune, Nunne lingo nsikumubula ku buangato bunkukitila ku bubuno.
Tondo buni bumukukengela? muntu umozi abezaga na bana babili; avule ku mutangi, abuide bune, Muana wane wamulume, enda ukite mukambo muisoa lia biguma.
Amuakuide bune, Nsikuziga; tondo kumbusa eibezizie, endile.
Isibo endede wozo ungo wa babili nu amutendile bubo lingo. Nuwe amuakuide bune, Nkuenda Tatane: tondo ntendile.

Kubabo babili, muana mukizi wakitile buatendile Isibo? Bamu­buide bune, Wozo mutangi. Yesu ababuide bune, Lebelebe nkumbula bune, Bandelelombe nu bakikulu bitazi bakalinga kuingila mu bukota bua Kalaga kumuli.
Yoana avule kueinyu mu buisanana, nu tamuamukatizizie; tondo bandelelombe nu bakikulu bitazi bamukatizizie: nu gamuamonine, tamuibezizie buno mumu­katizie.

Unguililazi ku ungo musumo: Kuabezaga muntu nyene numba, ayikile mizigi za biguma muisoa liage, alikulumanizie na mukolo, nu ombile muzinga wa kukambutula biguma, nu obakile numba ndazi, nu alisigile ku bakambi, nu endile mu kingo kisi.
Nu gabede nkungu za biguma biseli buigi na kuela, asingile bakobe bage ku bakambi, kutola biguma biage.
Tondo bakambi bakatile bakobe bage, nu balibuide umozi, beitile ungo, balibuide ungo makozi.
Nu asingile lingo bango bakobe bage, batinga batangi ku buingi; bakambi babakitile anga bubakitile babango.
Ububo abasingide muana wage, atendile bune, Embe bananza muana wane.
Tondo bakambi, gabamonine ku muana, babuza­nizie bune, Wozo eli mupieni; vuazi tumuitazi, nu tupiene bupieni buage.
Nu bamukatile, nu bamutukizie muisoa, nu bamuitile.
Gakavua nyene isoa akakita babo bakambi buni?
Nubo bamubuide bune, Akeita babo bakambi babi; nu akakasa isoa liage ku bango bakambi, bakamukasaga biguma ndi biela.
Yesu ababuzizie bune, Ndi inyue tamuasomine mu masanzo bune,
Ikozi liasombilue na bobaki,
Uliabede ikozi inene lia kapindapinda;
Bubo ubuatukile ku Mukota,
Nubo bukutuganiagania?
Kubuno nkumubula bune, Bukota bua Kalaga bukatukibua kumuli, nu bukakasua kingo kilongo kikakolamaga biguma.
Nuwe wagua geikozi lilio nti abeleka; tondo unsania wakolokelua nalio, nti liamubungula.
Nu gongule basankoga banene nu baFalese ku misumo zage, bamenyine bune, Akubatenda.
Nu balondaga kumukata tondo bakule musanganano boba, kubuno bamumenyaga buno, eli mulengania.
Nu Yesu abakuide nu abeisile lingo misumo, atendile bune,
Bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na mukota umozi wakitile idia lia kisagulo kia muana wage,
nu asingile bakambi bage kumana balagene nabo ku kisagulo: nu basombile kuvua.
