Asingile lingo bango bakambi ababuide bune, Bulazi bantu bana­laganaga nabo bune, Idia liagoa, ngombe zane nu biana biane bia ngombe bianona biasesilue, binsania bise kayikayika: vuazi ku kisagulo.
Tondo nubo babengile buatendaga, beiyendede, umozi kuisoa liage, nungo kukunzia biage;
nu bango bakatile bakambi ba mukota, babakitile musumbia, nu babetile.
Mukota abonge­due; nu asingile bakoloboyo bage, buno bete babo beitani, nu bagisie muino wabo.
Bubo, abuide bakambi bage bune, Idia lia kisagulo liagoa, tondo bantu banalaganaga nabo tabatananina.
Endazi ku makano ma nzila, manazi bamuamonageko ku kisagulo.
Nu bakambi bage bendile mu nzila, nu bakundamanizie bantu bansania babamonine kubo, babi nu basoga: mu numba za kisagulo muabezaga muiyala na bageni.
Tondo gengide mukota ku ku­lola bageni, amonine ku wamulume uteli na nsulu zasuaga ku kisa­gulo:
nu Mukota amubuzizie bune, Kilemba kiane, kubuni wengide, nu ntuli na nsulu zasuaga ku kisagulo? Wozo muntu eikede kibibi.
Nu Mukota abuide bakambi bage bune, Muka­ndazi ku maboko nu ku magulu, nu nti muamuisa mu kapilo kumbu­ga; ukukaba kulila nu kubuga meinyo.
Kubuno bantu beingi bekumanua tondo bakeke ubekusombolua.
Ububo baFalese bendile kukala luango luabo buno bubana­mukandika bitondo.

Bamusingide beigisibua babo, nu bantu ba Helode, bamubuide bune, Musozi tuizi buno, uli bulili, nu ukuigisia bantu meigisia ma Kalaga mu bulili, nu ntukulonda bunene bua muntu wampa: kubuno ntukulola ku kilungi kia bantu.
Buni bukukengela? Tubule tugu. Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe kuliga Kaisa idigo, aba kutaliga?
Tondo Yesu amenyine makengelo mabo mabi, nu ababuzizie bune, Inyue bengelezi, buni bumukundindika?
Ndololesiazi falanga zeidigo? Nu bavule na falanga zeidigo.
Nu ababuide bune, Kikino kisusania nu mamano masanzo bili bia nazi?
Bamubuide bune, Bia Kaisa. Nu ababuide bune, Kasazi Kaisa bili bia Kaisa; nu kasazi Kalaga bili bia Kalaga.
Nu gabongule ku bubo, bangamine, nu bamusigile.
Mu busi bubo Basadoke babo bekutendaga buno, takuli iyukilo, bamuvuilide, nu bamubuzizie bune,
Musozi, Mose atendile bune, Ndi wamulume akua, nu ntasiga bana nti muto wage ayana mukazi, nti abutila iselenzi bana.
Mutuli muabezaga mibuto mutuba kamo bandemozi; nu mutangi asongile mukikulu nu akule, nu ntabutile bana, nu asigide muto wage mukikulu wage;
nu wababili abezaga nuwe bubo, nu wabasatu lingo, aba nu ku wa mutuba kamo.
Nu gakule babo bansania, mukikulu nuwe akule.
Muiyukilo nti akaba mukikulu wanazi mu babo mutuba kamo? Kubuno nawe nawamusongile.
Tondo Yesu abakuide bune, Mukuibaga, kubuno tamukumenyininaga masanzo, aba magala ma Kalaga.
Kubuno muiyukilo takukasongua aba nu takukasonga­nua, tondo babe anga migenzi za muigulu.
Kubuno kuyuka kua bakuzi ku lukuo, ndi tamuasomine buamubulaga Kalaga bune,
Nne nili Kalaga wa Abalahama, nu Kalaga wa Isaka, nu Kalaga wa Yakobo? Kalaga nteli Kalaga wa bakuzi, tondo wa balami.
Nu gongule musanganano ku bubo bangamine na meigisia mage.
Tondo gongule baFalese buno, baSadoke tabamenyine bungo bubakula Yesu, bakundamene.
Nu umozi wa ku beli abezaga ngatu za mulembe, amubuzizie buno amulindike.
Musozi, kukakizia kukizi kuatinga kunene mu mulembe?
Yesu amu­buide bune, Tunda Mukota Kalaga wobe mu mutima wobe unsania, nu mu kalamo kobe kansania, nu mu menge mobe mansania.
Kubuno kukuno ukukakizia kutangi nu kunene.
Nu kuebili kuli bubo, utunde munyobe anga buwitunda uwenyene.
Ku­buno mu mamano makakizio mabili umuli mulembe unsania, nu bulengania.
Gabezaga baFalese bakundamana, Yesu ababuzizie ibuzio bune,
Buni bumukukengela ku Klisto? eli muana wa nazi? Bamubuide bune, Eli muana wa Davidi.
Kubuno Davidi wenyene atendile mu magala ma Muuza Wasililila, amumanine Mukota, atendile bune,
Mukota atendile ku Mukota wane, Ikala ku kuboko kuane kua seidume, aba nu ganangate beiti bobe.
Ndi Davidi amumanaga bune, Mukota, kubuni eli muana wage?
Nu takuli wamuakuide, aba kutukila busi bubo takuli wamubu­zizie ingo mbuzio.
Nu Yesu abuide misanganano nu beigisibua bage bune,
Basanzi nu baFalese bakuikalaga mu kisumbi kia Mose:
kitazi bunsania bubekumubula: tondo tamukite anga bubakukita. Kubuno bekutenda nu tabekukita.
Lebelebe, bekukanda mizigo mizitu, zitanavuama kuekua, nu bekuzibika ga bituli bia bantu; tondo tabekutunda kuzisigelezia na minue zabo.
Bakukita misako zabo insania buno bamenyue na bantu. Basanzile masanzo manene ma mukanda wa Kalaga ku bituli bia makoti mabo, nu bekulundia mipimbo za nsulu zabo.
Nu bakuelama kiziki kitangi mu bisa­gulo, nu bisumbi bitangi mu numba za musanganano,
nu beku­tunda kusekelua mu biziki bia isoko, nu kumanua na bantu buno, Labi.
Tondo inyue tamumanue buno Labi: kubuno muli na musozi umozi tugu, nu inyue bansania muabutua.
Nu tamu­mane muntu ga kisi buno soinyue, kubuno muli na Soinyue umozi tugu uli muigulu.
Nu tamumanue buno, basondelezia; kubuno muli na musondelezia weinyu umozi tugu, U Klisto.
Tondo wozo uli munene kumuli akaba mukambi wa banyage.
Nu unsania wisakika nti akasigulizibua, nu weisigulizia nti akasakikua.
Kabebe kanene kumuli basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! kubuno mukukandila bantu bukota bua meigulu: inyue tamu­kuingila mubo, nu tamukuziga bantu kuiyingilila mubo.
Kabebe kanene kumuli basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! kubuno mukunyaga numba za misigala, nu kuengelela gamukusega isego idazi. Ku bubo mukasungibua nunse.

Kabebe kanene kumuli, basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! mukutimba kitatenge nu kisi kulonda muntu umozi buno abe muigi­sibua weinyu; kungua akatizia meigisia meinyu nti amutinge ku bubi mambizi mabili muana wa kiziba kia keiya kumutinga.
Kabebe kanene kumuli, basondelezia, muli biuku, mukubulaga buno, Ndi muntu alumbila ku numba nene za kukumbamina nti takena: tondo ndi alumbila ku olo za mu numba za kukumbamina, nti akandua.
Inyue biuku nu bikongolo: kikizi kiatinga kinene olo, aba numba nene za kukumbamina zasuagizie zezo olo?
Mukubulaga lingo buho, Ndi muntu alumbila ku kayulo nti takena; tondo ndi alumbila ku kisansa kia kayulo, nti akandua.
Inyue biuku: kikizi kiatinga kinene, kisansa aba kayulo kasuagizie kikio kisansa?
W ozo ukulumbila ku kayulo nti akulumbila kuko nu binsania bili gako.
Nuwe ukulumbila ku numba za kukumba­mina, nti akuzilumbila, nu ku wozo uli muzo.
Nu wozo uku­lumbila muigulu akulumbila ku kisumbi kia Kalaga, nu akulumbila ku wozo wikile gakio.

Kabebe kanene kumuli, basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! mukukasana kindi kiekumi kia nsiogo, nu kinzani, nu lusolo, nu mukusiga misako minene za mulembe, buisanana, nu kiombo, nu bukatizio; tondo zezo uzatananina kukitua, nu zezo zengo tamuzi­sige.
Inyue basondelezia, muli biuku! mukusuila iyendu, nu mukumena nzogu.
Kabebe kanene kumuli, basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! kubuno mukusuga kituma nu lupepe gantata, tondo munda muiyala na nsese, nu buengelezi.
Uwe muFalese kiuku, linga kusuga munda mua kituma nu lupepe, ububo gantata genge.
Kabebe kanene kumuli, basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! kubuno mualingimana na nsinda zasingulua na mpemba, gantata zikumoneka nsoga, tondo munda muizile makua ma bantu, nu nsese insania.
Ububo inyue mukumonekako na bantu buno muli beisanana, tondo munda mueinyu muizile na buengelezi, nu mibi.
Kabebe kanene kumuli, basanzi nu baFalese, bengelezi! kubuno mukobaka nsinda za balengania, nu mukulebia nsinda za beisanana,
nu mukutenda buno, songo tuabezaga mu nkiko za batateisue, tatunagomanizie nabo ku mikila za balengania.
Mukuidongekela buno muli bana bababo beitaga balengania.
Izaziazi kilindiko kia basoinyue.
Inyue nzoka, kikanga kia mpoma, buni bumukatina lusungio lua kiziba kia keiya?

Ububo unguililazi; namusingila balengania, nu bantu ba menge, nu basanzi: mukuita bamozi nu mukutaka bango ku muti wa magu; nu bango bamozi mukubalibula mu numba za musanganano, nu mukubasungia mu muino na muino:
ububo mikila zeisanana zikumukubukila mu kisi, kutukila mikila za Abele wozo wisanana aba nu ku mikila za Zakalia, muana wa Balakia, umuitile gasamba kayulo nu numba zasuagibua.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, pitondo binsania bika­vua ku kikino kibuti.

Yelusalema, Yelusalema, ukuitaga balengania, nu walibulaga banakusingide makozi! mambizi manga natundile kukundamania bana bobe, anga bukugubatilaga nkoko zagubatila bana bazo mu biupi, tondo ntuabuzigile!
Numba zeinyu zasigala buasi.
Kubuno nkumubula buno, Tamukamonako lingo, kutukila kano kaluma aba nu gamukaba muse muatenda bune, Mbogimbogi ku wozo ukuvua muizina lia Mukota.
Nu Yesu atukile mu numba za kukumbamina, nu endile mu nzila; beigisibua bage bamuvuilide kumulolesia numba insania za kukumbamina.
Tondo ababuide bune, Ndi tamu­kumona ku binsania bibino? Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Tabaka­siga ikozi limozi gantata ga lingo, litakabungulua.
Nu geikede ga muiduko wa Oleve, beigisibua bamuvuilide kulumbisombiso, bamubuzizie bune, Tubule, buni bukaba bitondo bibino? nu kalolesio kakizi kakamonekako kukuvua kobe, nu kuzinda kua nkiko?
Yesu abakuide bune, Idangazi muntu ntamuengelele.
Ku­buno beingi bakavua muizina liane, bakatenda bune, Nne nili Klisto; nu bakengelela bantu beingi.
Mukongua ku bita, nu misagu za bita; tamuzangezange; kubuno bitondo bibio biatunganana kuvua; tondo kuzinda takuika,
Kilongo kikaluana na kingo kilongo, nu bukota bukaluana na bungo bukota, kukaba munganda nu tulingini ku lulenge na lulenge.
Tondo binsania bibino bili bia kulinga kua lubabazio.
Bakamugabula buno mubabazibue, nu bamuite: nuinyue mukasombua na baBilongo bansania ku kabamba keizina liane.
Nu beingi bakikuka, nu bakagabulana, nu bakasombana.
Nu balengania beingi ba buza bakavua, nu bakengelela beingi.
Nu kukuitila kua mibi lutundo lua beingi lukatamba.
Tondo wozo widindika aba nu kukuzinda, nti ukonibua.
Nu musagu musoga wa bukota ukasambalua ku bansania ba kisi kinsania, kuba bulongeki bua baBilongo bansania; nu nti kuzinda kukavua.
Umpanga gamukamona lusombo lua kubiga, lulo luatendagua na mulengania Danyele, luemana mu kiziki kiasuagibua (wozo ukusomaga bubuno amenyininebo),
babo beli mu Yudaya batine ku muiduko:
nu wozo ukasangua gantata numba ntagele kutikia bili mu numba zage:
nu wozo ukasangua muisoa ntasu­banie kutola nsulu zage.
Kabebe kanene ku beimisu nu beku­momia mu busi bubo!
Nu musege buno, kutina kueinyu takube mu bindi bia mpego, aba mu busi bua sabato:
kubuno kukavua lubabazio lunene, lutebezaga lingo kutukila ku kulinga kua kisi aba nu kano kaluma, aba talukaba lingo.
Nu songo bindi bibio tabiakegizibue, takunonine muntu wampa; tondo ku kabamba ka basombolua ukiansile bindi bibio biakegibuako.
Ndi muntu amubula buno, Lolazi, Klisto eli gano, aba kuko; tamumukatizie.
Kubuno kukavua bango baKlisto ba buza, nu balengania ba buza, nu bakalolesia migeleko minene nu maganogano; nu kuenge­lela, nu bakageleka kuengelela basombolua, tondo tabukakulungana.
Unguililazi, nasila kumutonda.
Ndi bamubula bune, Ungui­lilazi, eli mu kalula; tamuendeko; aba bune, Eli mu tuzumba tua bisama; tamukatizie.
Anga bukukelimaga mukenzi wa nkuba kuntata, nu kumone­kako kunsi; ububo bukaba kuvua kua Muana wa muntu.
Gago geli kitumba, nti ugakundamanine ndiu.
Nu kazanga kongo gakasila lubabazio lua bindi bibio kisongo kia busi kikaba kapilo, nu muezi tagukasana, nu nkeninkeni zikako­loka muigulu, nu magala ma meigulu makatengatenga:
nu kakengelezio ka Muana wa muntu kakamoneka muigulu: nu babi­longo bansania ba kisi bakalila, nu bakamona ku Muana wa muntu ekuvua mu bimpa bigulu mu magala mage nu lutanuno luage lunene.
Nu akasinga migenzi zage, neiyuki inene lia monze, nu baka­kundamania basombolua bage ku ndenge inazi, kutukila kuzinda kueigulu aba nu kuko kungo.
Muiyigisie musumo wa muti wa figi: gakutitulaga ntabi, nu nti zise zalinga kuasa ingo nsamba, nti muamenya buno nkungu za nzogo zise buigi;
bubo nuinyue lingo, gamukamona ku bubuno bunsania, mumenye buno, eseli buigi, nu nti eseimine ku nibi.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Bantu ba kibuti kikio takikatinga, aba nu gakasila bubo bunsania.
Igulu nu kisi bikatinga, tondo malagi mane tamakatinga nunse.
Tondo ku busi bubo aba nkungu zezo, takuli muntu umozi wizi aba migenzi za muigulu tazizi, aba Muana ndi nteli gamozi neIsi.
Nu anga buabezaga mu bindi bia Noa, ubukaba kuvua kua Muana wa muntu.
Mu bindi bibio, bitalokaga mbula, bantu baliaga, nu banuaga, nu basongaga, nu basonganaga, aba nu geingide Noa mu buato bunene,
taba­menyinine aba nu gavule muiyalo, bakule na mazi, ubukaba kuvua kua Muana wa muntu.
Mu kindi kikio, bamulume babili bakaba muisoa; umozi akatolua, nu ungo akasigala:
bakikulu babili basangua bakututa mu kilunga, umozi akatolua, nu ungo akasigala.
Kesiazi ntende: kubuno tamuizi busi buavue Mukota weinyu.
Tondo menyazi buno; songo nyene numba anamenyaga nkungu zavue muibi, anakesezie ntende, nu ntanale­kelede numba zage kusambulua.
Bubo nuinyue mube kayi­kayika; kubuno Muana wa muntu akavua mu nkungu zimutaku­kengela.
Nazi mukambi mukatizia nu uli na menge, ndi mukota wage amubikile muangati wa numba zage, buno abeganie idia mu nkungu zasuaga?
Mbogimbogi ku wozo mukambi, mu kusubania kua mukota wage akamusanga ekukita bubo.
Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Akamubika muangati wa biage binsania.
Tondo songo wozo mukambi mubi akengede mu mutima wage bune, mukota wane eizizia;
nu kulinga kulibula banyage, nu kulia nu kunua na banuzi;
mukota wa wozo mukambi akavua mu busi buataku­kengela, nu nkungu zatakumenya,
nuwe akamusesa bindi bibili, nu kumubika na bengelezi: nu kukaba idilo nu kubuga meinyo.
Ububo bukota bua meigulu bualingimana na bikumi ikumi bitemenya bamulume, bakatile tusuku tuabo, bendile kuku­lumania musongi.
Nu batano ku babo babezaga bikongolo nu bango batano babezaga na menge.
Babo bikongolo, gabakatile tusuku tuabo, tondo tabendile na makiti:
Tondo babo babezaga na menge bendile na tusuku, nu na makiti mu bituma biabo.
Musongi eizizizie, nu bazenzelaga nu beiyombekile.
Tondo munkatini mua kindi, mualalukilue buno, Wono u musongi, vuazi mumukulumanie.
Babo bansania bayukile, nu bakungile tusuku tuabo.
Babo bikongolo babuide babo babezaga na menge bune, Tukasazi ku makiti kubuno tusuku tueitu tukuzimazima, tatuli na makiti.
Tondo babo babezaga na menge bakuide bune, Makiti tamakuka kutuli nu kumuli: endazi ku bakunzia muikunzile meinyu.
Nu gabendile kukunza makiti musongi avule; babezaga kayika­yika beingide nage mu kisagulo; nu luibi luigedue.
Nu bo­bango batano bavule batendile bune, Mukota, Mukota, tuigulile.
Tondo abakuide buno, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Nsimuizi.
Kesiazi ntende, kubuno tamuizi kindi aba nkungu.
Kubuno bualingimana na muntu, wendile ku kingo kisi, nu amanine bakambi bage, nu abakasile biage.
Akasile umozi talanta
Kazanga kongo wozo wakasilue talanta itano, amonine mutali weingo talanta itano.
Bubo wabezaga na talanta ibili amonine mutali weingo talanta ibili.
Tondo wabezaga na talanta imozi endile, nu ombile itengu mu bilongo, abisile talanta za mukota wage.
Gasilile bindi bingi, mukota wa babo bakambi avule, aganzile nabo biage.
Nu wozo wakasilue talanta itano avule, atolile ingo talanta itano, atendile bune, Mukota, wankasile talanta itano, Iola namona mutali weingo itano.
Mukota wage amubuide bune, Wakita busoga, uwe mukambi musoga nu mukatizia: wakatizizie ku bitebingi, nkakubika muangati wa bingi; ingila mu mbogimbogi za mukota wobe.
Nu wozo ungo wakasilue talanta ibili avule, nu atendile bune, Mukota wankasile talanta ibili lola namona mutali weingo ibili.
Mukota wage amubuide bune, Wakita busoga, uwe mukambi muso­ga nu mukatizia, wakatizizie ku bitebingi, nkakubika muangati wa bingi, ingila mu mbogimbogi za mukota wobe.
Nu wozo waka­silue talanta imozi avule, atendile bune, Mukota, namenyine buno uli muntu mukali, ukutubulaga biutayikile, nu ukukundamanagia biutabalanganizie;
nu nakule boba, nu nendile kubisa talanta zobe mu bilongo: lola, zeno u talanta zobe.
Tondo mukota wage amuakuide bune, Uli mukambi mubi nu musosu, wizi buno nkutubulaga bintayikile, nu nkukundamanagia bintabalanganizie;
songo wabikile bikulo biane ku babo beli neisuku lia kulanga bikulo, nu gakusubia kuane, ninakasilue zane na mutali.
Munyagazi talanta, nu mukasezo ku wozo uli na talanta ikumi.
Kubuno wozo uli na kena akakasua, nu kutalikilua; tondo uteli na kena aba kako keli nako akakanyagua.
Nu mukambi mubi muisazi mu kapilo kumbuga; ukukaba idilo nu kubuga meinyo.
Tondo gakavua Muana wa muntu mu lutanuno luage nu na migenzi insania, bubo akikala ga kisumbi kia lutanuno luage:
nu baBilongo bansania bakakundamana kueli akalongania anga buku­longanagia mulangi mikoko nu mpene;
nu akabika mikoko ku kuboko kua seidume, nu mpene ku kuboko kua seikazi.
Bubo, Mukota akabula beli ku kuboko kua seidume bune, Vuazi, Inyue, basuagizibue na Tatane, mupiene bukota bubamulongekede kutukila ku kulinga kua kisi:
kubuno nabezaga na nzala, muankasile idia; nabezaga na mpusia, muankasile mazi; nabezaga mugeni muanse­keide;
nabezaga na buela, muamvualikizie; nabezaga musambi, muavule kundola; nabezaga mu kikando, muambuilide.
Nu beisanana bakamuakula bune, Mukota, busi bukizi butuakumueneko uli na nzala, nu kinga tuakukasa idia? Nu mpusia, kinga tuakukasa mazi?
Nu busi bukizi butuakumueneko uli mugeni, kinga tuakusekela? Nu buela, kinga tuakuvualikia?
Busi bukizi butuakumueneko uli musambi, aba mu kikando, kinga tuakuvuila?
Nu Mukota akabakula bune, Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Bunsania bumuakitide umozi wa ku zeno mibuto zane mikeke, muankitide.
Nu abuide lingo babo beli ku kuboko kua seikazi bune, Ntukilazi, muasuilidue, muingile mu keiya katanakuzinda kakongezezibue Satana nu migenzi zage:
kubuno nabezaga na nzala, tamuanka­sile idia; nabezaga na mpusia tamuankasile mazi;
nabezaga mugeni, tamuansekeide; nabezaga na buela, tamuanvualikizie; nabezaga musambi, nu mu kikando, tamuavule kundola.
Nubo lingo bakamuakula bune, Mukota, busi bukizi butuakumueneko uli na nzala, nu mpusia, nu mugeni, nu buela, nu lusambo, nu mu kikando, nu tatuakukungile?
Nuwe akababula buno, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Kubuno tamuakitide umozi wa ku zeno mibuto zane mikeke, tamuankitide.
Nu bantu babano bakenda mu lubabazio lutanakuzinda: tondo beisanana bakenda mu kalamo katanakuzinda.
Nu gasilile Yesu kutenda bubo, abuide beigisibua bage bune,
Muizi buno, kusila kua bindi bibili kuabe kisagulo kiesuluko, nu Muana wa muntu agabulue buno atakue ku muti wa magu.
Mu nkungu zezo basankoga banene, nu bakulu ba bantu, bakundameine mu lusu lua sankoga munene, wamanagua Kayafa;
bakalile luango buno, bakate Yesu mu lumbisombiso, nu bamuite.
Tondo batendile bune, Ta mu kisagulo, mu musanga­nano munakivua kuba kazege.
Nu gabezaga Yesu mu Betania, mu numba za Simona muiya bibali,
mukikulu umozi amuvuilide na kabongelo ka alabasata?
Tondo gamonine beigisibua ku bubo, bongilue, batendile bune, Kuzimizia kuno kuli kubuni?
Ganakunzilue bulago bubuno, bunamonine bikulo bingi, binakasilue bazambi.
Tondo gamenyine Yesu makengelo mabo, abakuide bune, Buni bumukuzangiazangia wono mukikulu?
Kubuno mukubezaga na bazambi bindi binsania, tondo tamuli nanne bindi binsania.
Ambongia bulago ku mubili wane, ankitide bubo kulongeka kuyikua kuane.
Lebelebe, nkumubula bune, Kunsania kukasambalua musagu musoga wono mu kisi kinsania, bakasambala lingo buakitile mukikulu wono, bukaba kabali kage.
Kububo umozi wa beigisibua ikumi na babili, izina liage Yudasa Isakaliote, endile ku basankoga banene,
nu abatendile bune, Mukutunda kunkasa kikizi, ganamugabulilawe? nu bamu­lindikide bindi makumi masatu bia feza, bamukasilebio.
Kutu­kila ku nkungu zezo alondile kubagabulilawe.
Gabede busi butangi bua tumpampa tutagaga beigisibua bavuilide Yesu, bamubuzizie bune, Kuni kukutunda tulongeke kiziki kia kutulila kisagulo kiesuluko?
Nu atendile bune, Endazi ku muino nu muakulumane na wamulume, nu mubulazi bune, Musozi atenda bune, Nkungu zane zise buigi, nikite isuluko mu numba zobe na beigisibua bane.
Nu beigisibua bakitile anga buaba­tendaga Yesu; nu balongekile kisagulo kiesuluko.
Gabuabeide buse muigolo abezaga na beigisibua bage ikumi na babili aliaga nabo;
nu gabaliaga, ababuide bune, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Umozi wa kumuli uwangabule.
Babede na kabebe nunse, nu nawe nawe nawamubuzizie bune, Mukota ndi nne?
Nu abakuide bune, Wozo unakatile nage maboko kiandi­ndi mu lupepe, uwangabule.
Muana wa muntu ekuenda, anga buasanzidue; tondo kabebe ku muntu wozo ukugabula Muana wa muntu! bunabeide busoga songo muntu wono ntabutilue.
Nu Yudasa, wamugabuide amubuzizie bune, Labi, ndi nne? Yesu amuakuide bune, Uwe ukutenda.
Nu gababeide bese balia, Yesu akatile kampampa, nu asegile nu akabunguide; nu akasile ku beigisibua bage, nu atendile bune, Tolazi, nu liazi; kakano keli mubili wane.
Nu atolile kituma, nu asegile, nu abakasilekio, abatendile bune, Inyue bansania nuazi:
kubuno kikino kili mikila zane zeidagano, zakubuka ku kabamba ka beingi, kuisigililo lia misako za buagi.
Tondo nkumubula bune, Nsikanua lingo biguma bibino bia mizigi, aba nu ku busi bunkanua lingo neinyue mu bukota bua Tatane.
Nu gabasilile kuimba luimbo, bendile ku muiduko wa Oleve.
Yesu ababuide bune, Inyue bansania muine mitima nanne mu kindi kikino: kubuno buasanzilue bune, Nkalibula mulangi, nu kibombo kia mikoko kikabalangana.
Tondo ganabe nayuka, nalinge kumutanga kuenda ku Galela.
Petelo amuakuide bune, Ndi bansania beina mitima nobe, tondo nne nsine mutima nunse.
Yesu amubuide bune, Lebelebe nkukubula bune, Mu kindi kikino gabe mulume wa nkoko ntebika, wantune mambizi masatu.
Petelo amubuide bune, Busoga kukua nobe, ndi nsiakutuna. Beigisibua bansania beitabizizie lingo bubo.
Nu Yesu avule nabo muisoa liamanagua Getesemane, nu abuide beigisibua bage bune, Ikalazi gano, nende kusega kuko.
Nu endile na Petelo nu bana babili ba Zebedayo, nu alingile kuba na kabebe nu akonkeidue.
Nu ababuide bune, Nnenyene nili na kabebe kanene, aba nu ku lukuo: sigalazi gano, kesiazi ntende nanne.
Nu gabede esalombozia, aguide bukukama, nu asegile bune, Tatane ndi bunakulunganana kituma kikino kintingile; tondo tabunkutunda kusombola, umpanga bukutunda kusombola.
A vule ku beigisibua nu abasangile beiyombeka ku tulo, nu atendile Petelo bune, Ndi tamunavuama kukesia ntende nanne nkungu imozi?
Kesiazi ntende nu segazi, buno munavua kuingila mu malindiko; mutima ukutunda bubo, tondo mubili watamba.
Endile lingo, nu asegile, atendile bune, Tatane, ndi tabunakulungana buno kituma kikino kintinge nsiakinua, kasi kusombola kuobe kukitue.
Yesu avule lingo abasangile beiyombeka ku tulo, kubuno bazenzelaga.
Yesu abasigile lingo, nu endile kusega limbizi lia masatu, atendile bubo lingo.
Nu avule ku beigisibua bage, nu ababuide bune, Iyombe­kazi lino, nu umunuazi: kubuno nkungu zise buigi, nu Muana wa muntu agabulue mu maboko ma bagi.
Zanzukazi, tuendazi: wozo ukungabula ese buigi.
Nu gabezaga esatenda bubo, Yudasa, umozi wa babo ikumi nu babili, avule na musanganano munene wa bantu babezaga na ma­panga nu nkoma, batukaga ku basankoga banene nu bakulu ba bantu.
Nu wozo mugabuzi wamugabulaga abakasile kakengelesio bune, Unamumage ku busundo, nti umuakate.
Nu kazanga kongo abasile ku Yesu, nu amusekede bune, Samba, Rabi; nu amumumine.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Muida wane, kita buwavuilaga tugu. Nu bavule nu bakatile Yesu na maboko.
Nu ungo wabezaga na Yesu alambizie kuboko, nu abasizie bupanga buage mu musagi, nu abangile mukobe wa sankoga munene, nu amusesile kutuzi.
Yesu amubuide bune, Ingizia bupanga buobe mu musagi: kubuno bansania bekukata bupanga bekeitua na bupanga.
Ndi ukukengela tugu buno, nsinavuama kusega ku Tatane buno ansingile bibombo ikumi na bibili bia migenzi?
Umpanga buni bukazi­ndilizibua masanzo, kubuno ububo, buatunganana kuba?
Mu nkungu zezo Yesu abuzizie musanganano bune, Buni bumuavua na mapanga nu nkoma kunkata anga bekukata munyagi? Nikalaga busi na busi mu numba za kukumbamina neigisagia bantu, nu tamuan­katile.
Tondo bunsania buabede buno, masanzo ma balengania mazindilile. Nu beigisibua bage bansania bamusigile, nu batinine.
Nu babo bakatile Yesu bendile nage ku numba za Kayafa sankoga munene, ukuabezaga kukundamanina basanzi nu bakulu.
Tondo Petelo amuyangile bulazi, aba nu ku lusu lua sankoga munene, nu eingide, nu eikede na bakambi, kulindila buabe.
Basankoga banene nu bakazi ba luango bansania balondaga bubana­kandika Yesu, buno bamuite;
nu bakandiki beingi bavule, tondo tabuakulungene. Tondo bango babili bavule,
nu batendile bune, Muntu wono atendile buno, anavuama kusambula numba nene za kukumbamina Kalaga, nu kuzobaka lingo mu bindi bisatu.
Nu sankoga munene emanukile, nu amutendile bune, Uwe ndi ntuakule? ndi ntukungua tugu ku bitondo bibakukulongekela?
Tondo Yesu eikede kibibi. Nu sankoga munene amubuide bune, Nkukulumbizia ku Kalaga uli Mulami, tubule ndi uwe u Klisto, Muana wa Kalaga.
Yesu amubuide bune, Bubo buwa­tenda; tondo nkukubula buno, mu nkungu zezo mukamona Muana wa muntu eikala ku kuboko kua seidume kua Magala, nu ekuvua mu bimpa bigulu.
Nu sankoga munene iyatide nsulu zage, atendile bune, Alinga Kalaga, kubuni lingo kutukulindila bango balongeki? Mungua bualinga Kalaga:
buni bumukukengela? Bamuakuide bune, Atunganana kukua.
Nu bamusulide matazi ku meiso nu bamusindikile; nu bango bamulibuide ngizi,
batendile bune, Ndi uwe U Klisto, menya nazi wakulibula?
Nu Petelo abezaga ikala mu lusu: nu mukikulu mukambi amuvuilide, amubuide bune, Uwe nuwe wabezaga na Yesu wa Galela.
Tondo atunine ku bansania bune, Nsizi bukutenda.
Nu gendile ku kabelabela, ungo mukikulu amumonineko, nu abuide babezaga nage bune, Muntu wono abezaga na Yesu wa Nazaleta.
Nu atunine lingo, nu alumbide bune, Nsizi muntu wozo.
Nu gatingile nkungu nkeke, babezaga bemana buigi bavule, bamubuide bune, Petelo, lebelebe uwe uli umozi wa babo, kubuno kutenda kuobe ukukukumenesia.
Nu alingile kuisuilila nu kulumbila, nsizi muntu wozo, nu kazanga kongo mulume wa nkoko abikile.
Nu Petelo akengeide idagi liamubulaga Yesu bune, Gabe mulume wa nkoko ntebika, wantune mambizi masatu. Nu atukile, nu alilile nunse.
Gabuabede buse nindunindu basankoga banene nu bakulu ba bantu bamukalide luango buno, beite Yesu.
Nu bamukandile, nu bendile nage, nu bamugabuide ku Pilato wozo wabezaga mukota.
Nu Yudasa wamugabuide gamonine esasungibua, eibezizie nu asubizizie basankoga nu bakulu bibio bindi makumi masatu bia feza.
Atendile bune, Nagile kubuno nagabuide mikila zeisanana na buagi. Batendile buno, takitondo kietu! kili kitondo kiobe uwenye­ne.
Esile bibio bindi bia feza gansi mu kiziki kiasuagibua, nu endile kuikama.
Nu basankoga banene bakatile bindi bia feza, batendile bune, Tabuakulungana ku mulembe kubika feza zino mu kikagi, kubuno zili bukunza bua mikila.
Nu bakalile luango luabo, nu bakunzile kiziki kiabezaga ga mubumbi wa nyungu, buno kibe kiziki kia nsinda za bageni.
Kububo bekumana kiziki kikio bune, Kiziki kia mikila, aba nu kano kaluma.
Buno lizindilile liatendagua na mulengania Yehemia bune, Bakitile bindi makumi masatu bia feza, bubo buli bukunza bua wozo wakunzilue, anga bubakitile bukunza bua bana ba Isalele;
nu bazikasene ku kiziki kia mubumbi wa nyungu, anga buankakizizie Mukota.
Yesu emanine ku mukota Pilato: nu wozo mukota amubuzizie bune, Ndi uwe U Mukota wa baYuda? Yesu amuakuide bune, Bubo buwatenda.
Nu gasongedue na basankoga banene nu bakulu, ntatendile buampa.
Ububo Pilato amubuzizie bune, Ndi ntukungua ku bitondo bingi bibakukulongekela?
Nu ntamuakuide buampa; kububo mukota angamine.
Na busi na busi buakitaga kisagulo mukota abakandulilaga mukandua umozi, ubatunda.
Nu babezaga na mukandua umozi munene, amanagua buno, Balaba.
Nu gabakundamene, Pilato ababuzizie bune, Mukutunda namukandulila nazi? Balaba, aba Yesu ukumanua buno, Klisto?
Kubuno amenyine buno, babo bakumugabula tugu ku kabamba ka lugi.
Nu gabezaga eikala ga kisumbi kia lusungio, mukikulu wage amusingide mugenzi bune, Ntuingile mu kitondo kia muntu wono wisanana; lelo nabezaga nababazibua mu ndozi ku kabamba kage.
Basankoga banene nu bakulu babulile misanganano buno, basege Balaba, nu kuita Yesu.
Tondo mukota ababuzizie bune, Beli babili, mukutunda namukandulila nazi? Nubo bakuide bune, Balaba.
Pilato ababuzizie bune, Nkite Yesu ukumanua Klisto buni? Bansania beitabizizie bune, Atakue.
Ababuzizie bune, Bubi bukizi buakitile? Balalukile bubibu bune, Atakue.

Gamenyine Pilato buno, bubo buatendaga tabuabasuagila, tondo kazege keitide, atolile mazi, nu ogile ku maboko nu musanganano wamonaga, atendile bune, Nsili na katati ka mikila zeno za muntu wono wisanana, mukite anga bumukutunda.
Nu bantu bansania bamuakuide bune, Mikila zage zikabezaga gantata geitu nu gantata ga bana beitu.
Kububo, bakanduide Balaba; tondo alibuide Yesu, amugabuide buno atakue.
Nu bakoloboyo ba mukota bendile na Yesu ku Palabolia
Nu bamutikizie nsulu, nu bamuvualikizie nsulu zakisimana.
Nu bakitile nkumbu za bukota za mikele nu bamubikilezo kuitoe, nu babikile musumbo mu kuboko kuage kua seidume; nu bamukomene mazu nu bamuililikile bune, Samba Mukota wa baYuda.
Nu bamusuilile matazi, nu bakatile musumbo nu bamulibulaga nago kuitoe.
Nu gabasilile kumuililika, bamutikizie nsulu zakisimana, nu bamuvualikizie nsulu zage, nu bendile nage buno bamutake.
Nu gabatukile, basangile muntu wa kisi kia Kulene, izina liage Simona: bamuekezie muti wa magu wa Yesu, ku magala mabo.
Nu gababasile ku kiziki izina liakio Gologota, buisulilua buno, nkungu miliba.
Nu bamukasile maku masambikua na bili lubaba anga nsangu buno amanue: gasondile, asombile kumanua.
Nu gabasilile kumutaka, babeganizie nsulu zage, bazesile ku mbale;
nu beikalile kumulanga.
Nu babikile geitoe liage masongelo mage masanzilue buno, WONO YESU MUKOTA MUNENE WA BAYUDA.
Nu kuabezaga beibi babili batakilue nage, umozi ku kuboko kuage kua seidume, nu ungo ku kuboko kuage kua seikazi.
Batingaga mu nzila bamulingile nu batengezietengezie matoe mabo,
nu batendile bune, Uwe musambuzi wa numba za kuku­mbamina, nu kuzobaka mu bindi bisatu, iyonie lino uwenyene! ndi uwe u Muana wa Kalaga, kasi igezie ku muti wa magu.
Basa­nkoga banene nu basanzi nu bakulu bamuililikile lingo, batendile bune,
Onezie bango, tondo ntanavuama kuiyonia wenyene. We eli Mukota wa Isalele; kasi igezie ku muti wa magu, nuisue tuamukatizie.
Akatizizie Kalaga; kasi Kalaga amonie kano kaluma, ndi ekumutunda; kubuno atendile bune, Nili Muana wa Kalaga.
Nu babo beibi batakilue nage bamutendile nubo bubo lingo.
Kutukila nkungu mutuba kuabede kapilo ga kisi kinsania nu kuika ku nkungu mubula.
Nu mu nkungu mubula, Yesu alalu­kile neiyuki inene atendile, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani? buisulilua, Kalaga wane, Kalaga wane, buni buwamenkela?
Bango babe­zaga bemana, gabongule ku bubo, batendile bune, Wono ekumana Eliya.
Nu kazanga kongo ungo eitumine lubilo, akatile luata, nu aluiyazizie na maku mabezaga makali, nu abikilemo ku musumbo nu amunusizie.
Bango batendile bune, Siga tanga, tumone ndi Eliya ekuvua kumonia.
Yesu alalukile neiyuki inene lingo, nu eidekanizie.
Nu nsulu zabezaga zakingua mu numba nene za kukumbamina zatikile bibe bibili kutukila kuigulu nu gansi, nu kisi kiatengiletengile nu makozi matikile;
nu nsinda zalimbukile; nu bitumba bingi bia basuagibua, babezaga bakua bayukile;
nubo gabatukile mu nsinda, kusila kua kuyuka kuage, beingide mu muino wasuagibua nu beingi babamonineko.
Mukota wa bakoloboyo lukama, nu babezaga nage kulanga Yesu, gabamonine kisi kise kiatengatenga nu binsania biakitilue, bakule boba nunse, batendile bune, Lebelebe, wono abezaga Muana wa Kalaga.
Nu bakikulu beingi babezaga gago balolelaga kulazikulazi, nubo babezaga ba ku Galela, ubabo bayangaga Yesu, nu kumukitila:
mu babo muabezaga Malia Magadala, nu Malia nina wa Yakobo nu Yose, nu nina wa bana ba Zebedayo.
Nu gabuabede buse muigolo, muntu umozi mugumi wa ku Alimataya avule, izina liage Yosefu, wozo wabezaga muigisibua wa Yesu:
nu muntu wono endile ku Pilato, asegile kitumba kia Yesu. Kububo Pilato akakizizie buno, bamukasekio.
Yosefu akatile kitumba, akivualikizie nsulu zenga zabota,
nu akibikile mu nsinda zage nto, zabezaga muikozi: nu akumbizie ikozi inene, alibikile ku muingilo wa nsinda, nu endile.
Nu Malia Magadala abezaga kuko nu ungo Malia, beikalaga buigi na nsinda.
Gatingile busi bua kulongeka, babo basankoga banene nu baFalese bakundamene ku Pilato,
batendile bune, Mukota, tukituakengela iyuki lia wozo muengelezi gabezaga ekili na kalamo, atendile bune, Nayuke lingo kusila kua bindi bisatu.

Kakizia buno, nsinda zilangue aba nu kusila kua bindi bisatu, kubuno beigisibua bage banavua kuiba kitumba kiage, nu kubula bantu buno ayuka ku bakuzi; ndi bakita bubo, buengelezi bubo buzinda buna­tinga butangi.
Pilato ababuide bune, Inyue muli na balangi, endazi muzilange anga bumuizi.
Beiyendede balangile nsinda busoga, babikile kamenyikilo ku lilio ikozi, balangi babezaga nabo.
Mukusila kua busi bua sabato, nindunindu mu busi butangi buizinga, Malia Magadala nu ungo Malia bendile kulola ku nsinda.
Nu kisi kiatengiletengile bubibu; kubuno mugenzi wa Mukota agelile kutuka muigulu, nu avule, nu atukizie ikozi, nu eikede galio.
Kilungi kietaga mikenzi, nu nsulu zage zabezaga zenga nunse.
Nu balangi bakule boba, nu bagilimine, babede anga bakua.
Nu mugenzi akuide bakikulu bune, Tamunakua boba; kubuno nizi buno, mukulonda Yesu, wozo watakilue ku muti wa magu.
Nteli gano; ayukile anga buatendile. Vuazi, mulole gabezaga Mukota.
Nu sasiazi, nu mubule beigisibua bage bune, Ayukibua ku bakuzi; alinga kumutanga ku Galela; kuko ukumua­mumoneko; bubo ubunamubula.
Basasizie kutuka ku nsinda na boba nu mbogimbogi nnene, nu basasizie kukengelesia beigisibua bage.
Nu Yesu akulumanine nabo, abasambizizie. Nu bamu­kundile, nu bamukatile ku masindi, nu bamukumbamine.
Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Tamunakua boba; endazi, mubule mibuto zane buno, bende ku Galela, kuko ukubamoneko.
Gabezaga basenda, balangi bamozi bendile mu muino, nu babulile basankoga banene bunsania buabedeko.
Nu gaba­kundamene na bakulu, nu bakalile luango, bakasile bakoloboyo falanga ningi.
Bababuide bune, Mutende bune, Gatuabezaga tuiyombeka tulo, beigisibua bavule mu kindi, bamuibile.
Nu ndi mukota ongua ku bubo, nu nti tuatende nage, teinyue ubabu­kitile.
Bakoloboyo bakatile falanga, nu bakitile anga bubaba­tendile; nu basambede musagu wono ku baYuda aba nu kano kaluma.
Beigisibua ikumi nu umozi bendile ku Galela, ku muiduko wababulile Yesu.
Nu bamumueneko kuko, nu bamukumba­mine; tondo bango bendezie miango.
Nu Yesu abavuilide, ababuide bune, Nakasua buangato bunsania bua muigulu nu bua ga kisi.
Kububo endazi mubike babilongo bansania kuba beigisi­bua, kubatizia muizina lia Tata, nu lia Muana, nu lia Muuza Wasili­lila.
Nu kubegisia kukatizia bunsania bunamukakizizie: nu unguililazi, nabe neinyu bindi binsania, aba kuzinda kua nkiko.
Kulinga kua musagu musoga wa Yesu Klisto, Muana wa Kalaga.
Anga buasanzilue ku mulengania Yesaya, bune,
Unguililazi, nalinga kusinga mugenzi wane,
Ukakunga nzila zo be;
Iyuki lia muntu likulaluka mu kalula buno;
Kungazi nzila za Mukota,
Isiazi matingilo mage.
Yoana avule, nu abatizizie mu kalula nu kusambala bubatizio bua kuiyania bualusizie isigililo lia misako za buagi.
Nu bantu bansania ba mu kisi kia Yudaya bamuendede nu bantu bansania ba ku Yelusalema; nu babatizizibue mu luzi lua Yadene, nu beigongile misako za buagi buabo.
Nu Yoana abezaga avuala nsulu za mioza za ngamia, nu abezaga na mukoma wa kikoba mu kibunda, nu aliaga nzige nu buki bua mu lubanda.
Nu abasambalilaga bune, Ukavua kumbusa kuane antinga, kubuno nsiatananina kuku­mbama nu kukandula mizigi za bisalapata biage.
Namubatizizie na mazi; tondo we amubatizie na Muuza Wasililila.
Nu busi bubo, Yesu atukile ku Nazaleta wa Galela, nu abatizi­zibue na Yoana mu Yadene.
Nu kazanga kongo gabede esatuka mu luzi, nu amonine igulu liakandulua, nu Muuza agelile anga nkulimba gantata gage:
nu iyuki liatukile mu meigulu liatendile bune, Uwe uli Muana wane, Ngoli zane, nakomana nobe.
Nu kazanga kongo Muuza amusindikile mu kalula.
Nu abezaga mu kalula bindi makumi manazi nu alindikilue na Satana; nu abezaga ku nyama nkali; nu migenzi bamukitilaga.
Kusila kua kukandua kua Yoana, Yesu endile ku Galela, kusambala musagu musoga wa Kalaga,
nu atendile bune, Nkungu zakuka, nu bukota bua Kalaga buse buigi; iyaniazi, nu katiziazi musagu musoga.
Nu atingile mu ntungo mua kiziba kia Galela, amonine ku Simona nu Andele muto wa Simona babezaga bekuisa tukila mu kiziba; kubuno babezaga bazubi.
Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Nyangazi, nu namubike buno mube bazubi ba bantu.
Kazanga kongo basigile tukila, nu bamuyangile.
Nu gabede esalombozia, amonine ku Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, nu Yoana muto wage, nubo babezaga mu buato balandaga tukila tuabo.
Nu kazanga kongo, abamanine: nu basigile isibo Zebedayo mu buato, na bakiti babo, nu bamuyangile.
Nu bendile ku Kapenuma; nu kazanga kongo ku busi bua sabato, eingide mu numba za musanganano nu eigisizie.
Bangamine na meigisia mage: kubuno abegisizie anga uli na buangato, nu nteigisizie anga basanzi.
Nu kazanga kongo kuabezaga muntu wabezaga na basumbu ba nsese mu musanganano wabo, alalukile neiyuki inene,
atendile bune, Tuli nobe buni Yesu wa Nazaleta? ndi wavule buno utubigie? Nizi buno uli Wasililila wa Kalaga.
Nu Yesu amuzugide, atendile bune, Ikala kibibi, nu tuka mu muntu wono.
Nu wozo musumbu wa nsese amugusizie nu alilile neiyuki ibibu, nu atukile mu wozo muntu.
Nu bansania bangamine nunse, nu babuzanizie bune, Buni bubo? mese mango meigisia! kubuno akukakizia basumbu ba nsese na buangato, nubo bekumuanza.
Nu kazanga kongo lukumu luage luakukile mu kisi kinsania kia Galela.
Nu kazanga kongo, gabatukile mu numba za musanganano, beingide mu numba za Simona nu Andele, na Yakobo nu Yoana.
Nu ninabiala wa Petelo abezaga neisusila; nu bamusambalide musagu wage:
nu endile kueli nu amukatile geikoko nu amue­manukizie, kazanga kongo isusila liasilile, nu abakitide.
Nu muigolo, geidile busi, bamuvuilide na bantu bansania babezaga na nsambo, nu babezaga na basumbu.
Nu bantu bansania ba mu muino bamukonganine ku luibi.
Nuwe onezie bantu beingi babezaga na nsambo za nkita ningi, nu atikizie basumbu beingi; nu ntazigile basumbu batenda, kubuno babezaga bemuizi.
Nu mu nindunindu, ku mukelo nunse, ayukile nu endile ku kalula, nu asegile kuko.
Simona nu babo babezaga nage bamuyangile.
Nubo gabamusangile bamubuide bune, Bantu bansania bakukulonda.
Nu abatendile bune, Tuendazi kuingo mino zili buigi, buno nisambale kuko; kubuno bubo ubunavuilide.
Nu eingide mu numba ningi za musanganano mu kisi kinsania kia Galela, abasambalilaga nu atikizie basumbu.
Nu muntu umozi muiya bibali amuvuilide, nu amukomene mazu, nu amusegile bune, Ndi watunda, unavuama kunengia.
Yesu amukuilide kiombo, alambizie kuboko kuage, nu eitubizie kueli, nu amubuide bune, Natunda; enga.
Nu kazanga kongo bibali biatukile kueli, nu engile.
Nu amukakizizie bubibu, nu kazanga kongo amusingile kumbuga,
nu amutendile bune, Unguilila, ntutende ungo muntu: tondo enda tugu widolesie ku sankoga, nu ukasane ku kabamba ka kuengibua kuobe anga buakaki­zizie Mose, kuba bulongeki kubeli.

Tondo we atukile, nu alingile kusambala bubibu, nu kukukia lilio idagi kunsania, nu Yesu ntavua­mine kubasa lingo mu mino zezo na mugulu, tondo abezaga ku kiziki kia kalula: nu bantu bamuvuilide nu batukaga ku biziki binsania.
Nu abasile ku Kapenuma kusila kua bindi bimozi, nu bongule buno eli mu numba.
Nu kazanga kongo beingi bakunda­mene, nu ku luibi takuakukawa lingo: nu abasambalide idagi.
Nu bamuvuilide na muntu wabezaga na lusambo lua kugilimina ekua na bantu banazi.
Nu tabavuamaga kuika kueli kubuno kuabezaga musanganano, nu babotuede gantata numba gago gabe­zaga: nu gabasilile kubotola, bagezezie mugu wa wono wakuaga na lungu.
Nu Yesu gamonine ku bukatizio buabo atendile wakuaga na lungu bune, Muana wane, misako za buagi buobe zasigililua.
Tondo basanzi bamozi babezaga kuko, bakengede mu mitima zabo buno,
kubuni muntu wono akutenda bubo? ekulinga Kalaga: nazi unavuama kusigilila misako za buagi, uteli Kalaga wenyene?
Nu kazanga kongo Yesu amenyine bubakukengela mu mitima zabo, abatendile bune, Kubuni mukukengela bubuno mu mitima zeinyu?
Buni buatinga busoga, kutenda ku wono uli na lusambo lua kugilimina bune, Misako za buagi buobe zasigililua; aba kutenda bune, Emanuka, nu utole mugu wobe, wende?
Buno mumenye buno, Muana wa muntu eli na buangato mu kisi buakusigilila misako za buagi (abuide wabezaga na lusambo lua kugilimina), bune
Nkukubula bune, Emanuka, nu weke mugu wobe, nu wende kuobe ku numba.
Nu emanukile, nu kazanga kongo ekile mugu wage, nu asigile bansania; nu bansania bangamine, nu baganuine Kalaga, batendile bune, Isue tatumonaga lingo ku bubuno.
Nu atukile lingo endile lisilia lia kiziba; nu musanganano unsania wamuendede, nu abeigisizie.
Nu gabezaga esatinga, amonine ku Lewi muana wa Alufayo abezaga ekile ku mulimo wa kuligia idigo, nu amubuide bune, Nyange. Nu azanzukile nu amuyangile.
Nu gabezaga esalia idia ku numba zage, bandelelombe nu bagi beingi beikede na Yesu nu beigisibua bage: kubuno kuabezaga beingi kuko, nu bamuyangaga.
Nu gamuene basanzi nu baFalese buno ekulia na bagi nu bandelelombe, babuzizie beigisibua bage bune, Kubuni kuakulia nu kunua na bandelelombe nu bagi?
Nu Yesu gongule ku bubo, abatendile bune, Batakusamba tabaneiyanina musakizi, tondo basambi: nsiavule kumana beisa­nana, tondo bagi.
Nu beigisibua ba Yoana nu baFalese babezaga bekugila; nu bavule nu bamutendile bune, Kubuni beigisibua ba Yoana nu beigisibua ba baFalese bakugila, tondo beigisibua bobe tabakugila?
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Bana ba musongi ndi banavuama kugila, ndi bekile na musongi? Mu nkungu zibeli na musongi, tabanavuama kugila.
Tondo bindi bikatikibua musongi, ubindi bibakagila.
Takuli muntu unalanda kibe kia nsulu za mubalabala ku nsulu za mukungio; kubuno nsulu za mubalabala nti zata zezo za mu­kungio, nu itengu nti liaba inene nunse.
Takuli muntu ukongo­laga maku meituba mu tutembe tukulu; ndi amongola mu tuto tutembe nti tuabuga, nu maku, nti makubuka, nu tutembe nti tuabiga: tondo bakongolaga maku meituba mu tutembe tuto.
Nu gatingaga Yesu mu masoa busi bua sabato, beigisibua bakalile mabela.
Nu baFalese bamutendile bune, Kubuni beigisibua bobe bekukita butakulungana ku mulembe busi bua sabato?
Yesu abatendile bune, Ndi tamusomaga bubo buakitile Davidi, gabezaga ekukua na nzala, we, nu banyage babezaga nage?

Buingide mu numba za Kalaga mu nkungu zabezaga Abiatala sankoga munene, nu alile tumpampa tuakitagua tulolesio, tuta­kulungana ku mulembe kulibua nongo gantata na basankoga bobenyene, nu akasile banyage babezaga nage?
Nu abatendile buae, Busi bua sabato buakitilue ku bantu, tondo bantu tabakitilue ku busi bua sabato:
bubo Muana wa muntu eli mukota wa busi bua sabato.
Nu eingide lingo mu numba za musanganano; nu muabezaga muntu woma kuboko.
Nu bamulolaga buno, ndi amonie busi bua sabato; buno bamusongele.
Nu amutendile wozo muntu woma kuboko bune, Zanzuka.
Nu ababuzizie bune, Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe kukita busoga busi bua sabato aba kukita bubi? kuita, aba konia? Tondo beikede kibibi.
Nu abakakile meiso, nu abeide na kabebe ku kabamba ka mitima zabo mibibu nu atendile wozo muntu bune, Lambia kuboko kuobe, nu akulambizie; nu kuboko kuage konine.
Kazanga kongo baFalese nu baHelode batukile bamukalide luango bubanamuita.
Nu Yesu endile na beigisibua bage ku kiziba: nu musanganano munene wamuyangile kutuka ku Galela; nu ku Yudaya,
nu ku Yelusalema, nu ku Edoma, nu ku lisilia lia Yadene, nu buigi na Tula nu Sidona, musanganano munene, gabongule ku misagu za buakitaga bamuendeide.
Nu asambalide beigisibua bage buno kulumiziazi buato bukeke, kubuno musanganano gukuvua kumu­limbania:
kubuno onezie bantu beingi; babo babezaga na nsambo mbibu, bamukakanine buno beitubie kueli.
Nu ba­sumbu ba nsese gabamumonineko bamuguilide, nu balalukile, batendile bune, Uwe umuana wa Kalaga.
Nu abakakizizie nunse buno tabamusaganizie buno uwamonia.
Nu abakamine ku muiduko, nu amanine babo batundaga; nu bamukundile.
Nu asombueide ikumi na babili buno babe nage, nu abasinge buno basambale,
nu babe na buangato bua kutikia basumbu:
nu akasile Simona izina buno, U Petelo;
nu Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, nu Yoana muto wa Yakobo; nu abakasile izina Bonagete, buisulilua bualio buli bana ba mukulumino:
nu Andele, nu Filipo, nu Batolomayo, nu Matayo, nu Toma, nu Yakobo muana wa Alufayo, nu Tadayo, nu Simona mu Kananayo,
nu Yudasa Isakaliote, u wozo wamugabuide. Nu eingide mu numba.
Nu musanganano wakundamene lingo, nu tabamenyine bubalia kampampa.
Nu gongule beida bage ku musagu wozo bendile kumutola, kubuno babatendile bune, Eseli muluba.
Nu basanzi batukile ku Yelusalema batendile bune, Eli na Belezebula, mukota wa basumbu, nu mu magala mage ekutikia basumbu.
Nu abamanine, nu abeisile misumo bune, Ndi Satana anavuama kutikia Satana?
Nu ndi bukota buneidekanukia bubuenyene, kasi bunakua.
Nu ndi numba zalekanukibua tazinasimba.
Nu ndi Satana ekuitikia, kasi asila kulekanuka, nu ntanavuama lingo kuemana, kasi nti asila.
Tondo muntu ntanavuama kuingila mu numba za uli na magala, nu kubigia bikulo biage, tondo alinge tanga kukanda wozo uli na magala; nu kusila nti anavuama kubigia numba zage.
Lebelebe nkumubula, misako za buagi insania za bantu zikasigililua nu bilingano bibakulingana;
tondo wozo walinga Muuza Wasililila ntakasigililua nunse, tondo eli na katati ka buagi butanakuzinda:
kubuno batendile bune, Eli na musumbu wa nsese.
Nu nina nu bato bage; bemanine kumbuga, nu basingile muntu kumumana.
Nu musanganano wamutimbikanizie; nu bamutendile bune, Nyoko nu bato bobe beli kumbuga bekukulonda.
Nu abakuide bune, Nazi mane nu banazi bato bane?
Nu alolile babo babezaga bamutimbikania, nu atendile bune, Lolazi, mane nu bato bane!
Kubuno unsania ukukita kusombola kua Kalaga, we nti muto wane, nu mubitu wane, nu mane.
Nu alingile kuigisia lingo buigi na kiziba. Nu musanganano munene wakundameine nunse buigi nage, ku bubo eingide mu buato buabezaga mu kiziba, nu musanganano unsania wabezaga wikala gansi ku mutili.
Nu abeigisizie bitondo bingi mu misumo, nu atendile mu meigisia mage bune,
Unguililazi: muyiki wa mbuto endaga ayika mbuto:
nu gaziyikaga mbuto imozi zakolo­kile mu ntungo mua nzila, nu tuzoni tuazibobueide.
Nu ingo zakolokile gantata ga luanda, takuabezaga bisogo bingi; nu kazanga kongo zasile, kubuno bisogo tabiabezaga bingi:
nu gasanukile musi, zagulumine; kubuno tazabezaga na mizi, zomine.
Nu ingo zakolokile mu mikele, nu mikele zasile, nu zazilimbanizie nu tazako­lamine biguma.
Nu ingo zakolokile ga bisogo bisoga, nu zako­lamine biguma bingi, zakulile nu zanagile; nu zakolamine makumi masatu, ingo makumi mutuba, ingo lukama,
Nu atendile bune, Wozo uli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Nu gabezaga wenyene, bantu bamutimbikanizie nu babo ikumi nu babili bamubuzizie buisulilua bua musumo.
Nu ababuide bune, Kumuli ukuakasilue kakungu ka bukota bua Kalaga: tondo ku babano batakatizia bunatendua ku misumo:
buno banamona, tondo tabanatitika; nu banongua tondo tabanamenyi­nina, buno banakivua kugaluka nu kusigililua.
Nu abatendile bune, Ndi tamuizi musumo wono? nti mukamenya misumo insania buni?
Muyiki ekuyika idagi.
Nu babano ubabo beli muntungo mua nzila, gakusambalua idagi; nu ndi basila kungua, kazanga kongo Satana nti avua kutikia lilio idagi libasambalilagua.
Nu babo ubayikilue ga luanda, nu ndi bongua kuidagi lilio, nti balisekela kazanga kongo na mbogimbogi;
nu tabeli na mizi munda muabo, bakusigala bindi bimozi; nu gavue kabebe aba lubabazio ku kabamba keidagi, kazanga kongo ekuikuka.
Nu babo ubabo bayikilue mu mikele; ubabo bakungua lilio idagi,
nu milondo za kisi, nu buengelezi bua bikulo, nu ntundo za bingo bitondo bingila; nu nti bialimbania idagi, nu nti taliakolama lingo biguma.
Nu babo bayikilue mu bisogo bisoga; ubabano bongule kuidagi lilio, nu kulitabizia, nu kukolama biguma, umozi makumi masatu, ungo makumi mutuba, nu ungo lukama.
Nu abatendile bune, Ndi muntu anavua na kasuku nu kukabika kunsi kua luzi, aba kunsi kua mugu, ndi takukabika ga kibikilo kiako?
Kubuno takuli kiabisilue, kitakabisulua; aba takuli kiatendagua mu kakungu kitakongubuako.
Ndi muntu eli na matuzi makuinguilila, nti unguilila.
Nu abatendile bune, Idangazi na kikio kimukungua kukio: kubuno, kulindika kukuno kumukulindika, ukuko kumukalindikua, lingo ukimukatalikilua.
Kubuno wozo uli na kena, akakasua; nu uteli nako, nti akatikibua kako keli nako.
Nu abatendile bune, Bukota bua Kalaga bualingimana na muntu wasandide mbuto zage gansi;
nu geiyombekile, nu gayukile, mu musi nu mu kindi, mbuto zabalukile nu zasile, nu zakulile lukita lutamenyaga nyenezo.
Kubuno bisogo bia kisi bikukolama biguma bibienyene; kulinga nsamba, kusila mombo, nu mu mombo migili.
Tondo geidile biguma, kazanga kongo abisesile na bupanga, kubuno busi bua kukola buakuka.
Nu atendile bune, Bukota bua Kalaga tubulingimanie na kikizi? aba tubulingimanie na musumo mukizi?
Bualingimana na kambuto ka bunyonyo, kayikilue mu bisogo, keli kakeke ku mbuto insania zili mu kisi,
kungua zasila kuyikua, nu kuasa, nti zaba nnene kutinga insania; nu nti zabika ntabi nnene; nu tuzoni tua mpelela tunavuama kumunua mu kilimelime kiago.
Nu atendaga idagi liage ku misumo mingi bubanalimenyina;
nu ntanabatendile buatatendile ku musumo: tondo mu lumbisombiso eigisagia beigisibua bage bitondo binsania bobenyene.
Nu mu busi bubo muigolo, abatendile bune, Tusokazi ku lisilia.
Nu basigile musanganano, nu bendile nage anga bua­bezaga mu buato. Nu mango mato mabezaga buigi nage.
Nu kuabeide kisoa kinene, nu bimpumi bidibuide mu buato, nu buato buizede na mazi.
Nuwe abezaga ku kansinsi ka buato, eiyo­mbeka ku tulo ga muigo: nu bamuyukizie, nu bamutendile bune, Musozi, gatunakua ndi bunakubela bubi?
Nu ayukile, nu azugide kisoa, nu atendile ku kiziba bune, Bota, nu kisoa kiasilile, nu kuolile nunse.
Nu abatendile bune, Kubuni mukukua boba? Ndi tamuba na bukatizio?
Nu bakule boba nunse, nu bate­ndeine bune, Muntu mukizi wono, aba kisoa nu kiziba nti biku­muanza?
Nu babasile ku lisilia lia kiziba, ku kisi kia Gelasa.
Nu gatukile mu buato, kazanga kongo akulumeine na muntu watu­kaga ku nsinda, abezaga na musumbu wa nsese,
nuwe abezaga akuikala ku nsinda; nu takuabezaga muntu wavuamaga kumukanda na makoki;
kubuno akandagua mambizi meingi na bilunga nu makoki, nu asesaga mamo makoki, nu kukalikia bibio bilunga: nu takuabezaga muntu wavuamaga kumubotia.
Nu bindi binsania, musi nu kindi, eikalaga ku nsinda nu ku miduko, alalukaga nu eisumitaga na makozi.
Nu gamonine ku Yesu bulazi, eitumine lubilo nu amukumbamine;
nu alalukile neiyuki inene, atendile bune, Nili nobe buni, Yesu, Muana wa Kalaga uli muigulu? Nku­kulumbizia ku Kalaga buno, ntumbabazie.
Kubuno atendile musumbu wa nsese bune, Tuka mu muntu wono uwe musumbu wa nsese,
nu amubuzizie bune, Izina liobe? Nuwe amutendile bune, Izina liane. Legioni; buisulilua buno, tuli beingi.
Nu amusegile bubibu buno ntabatikie mu kisi kikino.
Nu buigi na kuko ku muiduko, kuabezaga muimba muingi wa ngulube, waliaga.
Nu bamusegile buno tusinge mu zezo ngulube, tuiyingilile muzo.

Nu abakasile buangato. Nu basumbu ba nsese batukile, nu beingide mu zezo ngulube: nu muimba wongo unsania wakumbile mu mpembue nu wizisile mu kiziba, zabezaga zakuka tununu tubili; nu zakule mu kiziba.
Nu balangi bazo batinine, nu basambeide musagu mu muino, nu mu masoa. Nu bantu bendile kulola bua­beide kuko.
Nu gababasile ku Yesu, nu bamonine ku wozo wabezaga na basumbu eikile, nu ese azuala nsulu nu eli na menge, wozo wabezaga na basumbu: nu bakule boba.
Nu babo bamonaga basambeide bubo buabeide ku wozo wabezaga na basu­mbu, nu musagu wa buabeide ngulube.
Nu balingile kumusega buno, atuke mu miaga zabo.
Nu abezaga eseingila mu buato, wozo muntu wabezaga na basumbu amusegile buno ikale nage.
Tondo ntamuzigide, umpanga amutendile tugu bune, Enda ku numba zobe ku beida bobe, nu kubasambalila bitondo bibino binene biakukitide Mukota, nu buakukuilide kiombo.
Nu endile, nu alingile kusambala ku Dekapoli bitondo bibino biamukitide Yesu: nu bantu bansania bangamine.
Nu gasokile Yesu lingo ku lisilia mu bubo buato, musanganano munene wamukundamanine; nuwe abezaga mu ntungo mua kiziba.
Nu umozi wa ku babo bakota ba mu numba za musanganano, izina liage Yailo, amuvuilide; nu gamumonineko, amukomene mazu,
nu amusegile nunse bune, Muana wane wa mukazi ese buigi na kukua: nkukusega, buno uvue kumubika maboko gantata gage buno, one, nu alame.
Nu endile nage; nu musanganano munene wamuyangile, bamulimbanizie.
Nu mukikulu umozi, wabezaga na lusambo lua mikila miaka ikumi neibili,
nu kubabazibua bubibu ku basakizi beingi, nu agabuide bikulo binsania biabezaga nabio, nu ntonine nunse, umpanga lusambo luage luitide nunse,
nu gongule ku musagu wa Yesu, abasile kumbusa kuage mu musanganano, nu eitubizie ku nsulu zage.
Kubuno atendile bune, Ndi neitubia ku nsulu zage tugu, nti nonibua.
Nu kazanga kongo kanua balongo ka mikila kakamine; nuwe amenyine mu mubili wage buno ona lusambo luluno.
Nu kazanga kongo Yesu, amenyine buno, magala makokoka kumo, nu akebetukile mu musanganano, nu atendile bune, Nazi weitubia ku nsulu zane?
Nu beigisibua bage bamutendile bune, Ntukumona ku musanganano wono waku­limbania, nu ukubuzia bune, Nazi wetubia kundi?
Nu alolile ndenge insania buno amone ku wozo wamukita bubo.
Tondo wozo mukikulu akule boba nu agilimine, nu amenyine buabeide, avule nu amukumbamine, nu amusambalide bulili bunsania.
Nu amubuide bune, Mukinga wane, bukatizio buobe buakonia; enda mu bubobelelo, nu ntube na lusambo lulo lingo.
Nu gatendaga bubuno, nu kua wozo muangati wa numba za musanganano kuatukile bantu, batendile bune, Mukinga wobe alekana kalazi; kikizi lingo kiukukutizia Musozi?
Tondo Yesu gongule kukutendua bubo, atendile muangati wa numba za musanga­nano bune, Ntunakua boba, katizia tugu.
Nu ntazigile muntu umozi kumuyanga, tugu Petelo, nu Yakobo, nu Yoana wozo muto wa Yakobo.
Nu beikile mu numba za wono muangati wa musa­nganano; ongule ku kazege keingi, nu bantu balilaga nsanda nnene.
Nu geingide, abatendile bune, Kubuni mukukita kazege, nu kulila? wozo mukinga ntalekana, tondo eiyombeka tugu.
Nu bamusekile nunse, nuwe gabasizie musanganano kumbuga, atolile isi wa muana nu nina, nu babo babezaga nage, beingide mumo mua­bezaga muana.
Nu akatile wozo mukinga geikoko, amutendile bune, Talita kumi; buisulilua bua bubo, Mukinga, nkukubula bune, Zanzuka.
Nu kazanga kongo wozo mukinga azanzukile nu endile; kubuno abezaga ese miaka ikumi nu ibili. Nu kazanga kongo bangamine nunse.
Nu abakakizizie buno muntu nta­menye wono musagu: nu ababuide bune, Mukasazi idia.
Nu atukile kuko, abasile ku kilongo kia kuabo; nu beigisibua bage bamuyangile.

Nu buabezaga busi bua sabato, alingile kuigisia mu numba za musanganano; nu gongule beingi ku bubo bangamine, batendile bune, Kuni kuasangila wono bubuno? nu menge makizi makasua wono? nu migeleko mingi zikukitua na maboko mage?
Ndi ta uwozo mukulumizi, muana wa Malia, nu iselenzi wa Yakobo, nu wa Yose, nu wa Yuda, nu wa Simona? nu ndi babitu bage tabeli neisue? Nu beinine mitima nage.
Tondo Yesu abatendile bune, Mulengania ntakubengua ku ungo, umpanga kuabo, nu mu numba zage.
Nu ntakitile mugeleko wampa kuko, tugu abikile maboko mage ku basambi bamozi nu abonezie.
Nu angamine na kutakatizia kuabo.
Nu Y esu atimbiletimbile mu mino nu eigisizie.
Nu amanine babo ikumi nu babili, nu alingile kubasinga babili babili; nu abakasile buangato ku basumbu ba nsese,
Nu abaka­kizizie bune, Tamuende na kena mu nzila, tugu na musumbo; aba kampampa, aba nsago, aba falanga mu nsago;
tondo nti muazuala bisalapata: nu tamuzuale makoti mabili.
Nu abatendile bune, Kunsania kumukeingilaga mu numba, ikalazi mumo aba nu gamua­tukemo.
Nu kunsania kubatamusekela, nu kumunguilila, kungua musatukamo, nti muatitula mukungu guli ku magulu meinyu, buabe bulongeki ku beli.
Nu bendile, nu basambeide buno bantu beiyanie.
Nu batikizie basumbu beingi, nu babongezie beingi ba nsambo makiti, nu babonezie.
Nu gongule mukota Helode ku musagu; kubuno izina liage liabezaga likusambalua: nu atendile bune, Yoana Mubatizi ayuka ku bakuzi, nu ku bubuno ekukita migeleko zeno.
Tondo bango batendile buno, Eliya. Nu bango batendile bune, Wono eli mulengania, aba umozi wa balengania.
Tondo gongule Helode ku bubo atendile bune, Wozo Yoana unasesaga itoe, ayuka.
Kubuno Helode wenyene asingile bantu bakate Yoana, nu amu­kandile ku kikando ku kabamba ka Helodia mukikulu wa Filipo muto wage; kubuno amusongile.
Kubuno Yoana atendile wozo Helode bune, Tabuakulungana ku mulembe kuikala na mukikulu wa muto wobe.
Nu wozo Helodia abezaga na musona kueli, nu atundaga kumuita; tondo ntavuamine;
kubuno Helode akuaga Yoana boba, kubuno amumenyine buno eli muntu wisanana, nu wasuagibua, nu amulangile. Nu gamunguilide atubigenue; nu amunguililaga na mbogimbogi.
Nu gabeide busi bua kubutua kua Helode buika, akitide bakulu bage kisagulo, nu bakoloboyo, nu bakulu ba Galela;
nu ugago mukinga wa Helodia aminine busoga, atananizizie Helode nu babo babezaga nage mu kisagulo; nu mukota abuide wozo mukinga, bune, Kinsania kiwansegage, nti nakukasekio.
Nu amulumbilide bune, Kio kinsania kiwansegage nti nakukasekio, aba kindi kia bukota buane.
Nu azanzukile nu abuzizie nina bune, Nisege kikizi? nu amutendile bune, Itoe lia Yoana Mubatizi.
Nu kazanga kongo avule lubilo ku mukota, amusegile bune, Nkutunda wampa kano kaluma itoe lia Yoana Mubatizi ga kianzi.
Nu mukota abeide na kabebe nunse; tondo ku kabamba ka kulumbila kuage, nu ku kabamba ka babo baliaga nabo, ntamuimine.
Nu kazanga kongo mukota asingile mukoloboyo, nu amukakizizie buno, avue neitoe liage: nu endile nu asesile itoe liage mu kikando,
nu avule neitoe liage ga kianzi, nu akasile wozo mukinga; nu wozo mukinga akasile nina.
Nu gongule beigisibua bage ku bubo, bendile kueka kitumba kiage, nu bakibikile mu nsinda.
Nu basingua bakundameine ku Yesu; bamusambalide misagu za binsania bibakitile, nu binsania bibeigisizie.
Nu abatendile bune, Vuazi, inyue benyene ku kalula, nu mumune tanga, kubuno ban­tu beingi, bavuaga nu bendaga, nubo tababezaga na nkungu zakulia.
Nu bendile ku kalula kiziki kitabezaga ku bantu mu buato bobenyene.
Nu bantu beingi bamonine kubakuenda, nu beingi bamenyine, nu beitumine kuko lubilo na magulu, kutukila ku mino insania, nu balingile kubasa.
Nu gabasile Yesu nu amonine ku musanganano munene, wamukundamanina, agukuilide kiombo, kubuno babezaga anga mikoko ziteli na mulangi: nu alingile kubeigisia bitondo bingi.
Nu gabeide busi buse muigolo, beigisibua bage bamuvuilide, batendile bune, Gano geli kalula, nu busi buseida;
balage buno, bende ku masoa nu ku mino za mu lulenge nu beikunzile idia.
Tondo abakuide bune, Bakasazi idia. Nu bamutendile buno, ndi tuende kukunza tumpampa tua falanga nkama ibili buno tubakaseto?
Nu abatendile bune, Tumpampa tunga tumuli nato? Endazi tanga mulole. Nu gabamenyine bate­ndile buno, tuli na tutano nu biena bibili.
Nu ababuide buno, Ikalazi bansania bibombo bibombo beikale gantata bisugu bibisi.
Nu beikeide gansi ku bibombo bibombo, nkama na nkama, nu makumi matano matano.

Nu atolile tuto tumpampa tutano nu biena bibili, nu agalamine kuigulu, abisegeide nu abunguide tuto tumpampa; nu atukasile ku beigisibua bage buno babakaseto; nu abeganizizie babo bansania biena bibili.
Nu bansania balile, nu bembukile.
Nu basongezie mbobu, nzi ikumi neibili zizeide, nu mbobu za biena.
Nu babo baliaga tuto tumpampa babezaga bakuka bamulume tununu tutano.
Nu kazanga kongo akakizizie beigisibua bage bengile mu buato nu balinge kuenda ku lisilia aba ku Betesaida, gabezaga esalagana na musanganano.
Nu gasilile kulangana nabo endile kusega ku muiduko.
Nu gabeide busi buse muigolo buato buabezaga buse munkatini mua kiziba, nuwe abezaga wenyene ku muse.
Nu abamueine bese bakutua na kuluga, kubuno kisoa kiabezaga kinene, nu gabasile nkungu za mulangi wa banazi mu kindi endile ku beli, endaga na magulu gantata ga kiziba; nu atundaga kubatinga:
tondo gabamonine ekutabanga gantata ga kiziba, bamenyaga buno embe kili kilimelime, nu balalukile;
kubuno bansania bamumonineko, nu bazangilezangile. Tondo kazanga kongo atendile nabo, nu abatendile bune, Kokomeziazi mitima zeinyu, nne wono tamunakua boba.
Nu gabakamine mu buato buba­bezaga mubo; kisoa kiabotile; nu bangamine nunse;
kubuno tabamenyine kitondo kia tuto tumpampa, tondo mitima zabo zabezaga mibibu.
Nu gabasokile, babasile ku kisi kia Genesaleta, bakomine musa mu luzi.
Nubo gabasilile kutuka mu buato, kazanga kongo bantu bamumenyine,
nu beitumine lubilo ku ntungo za kisi kikio, nu kueka bantu babezaga basambi ku migu, ku kiziki kikio kibonguaga buno u kueli.
Nu kunsania kuendaga, mu tuino nu mino nu ku masoa, bendaga babika basambi ku masoko, nu bamuse­gaga buno, betubie ku mupimpo wa nsulu zage; nu bansania beitubizie bonine.
Nu baFalese nu basanzi bamozi batukile ku Yelusalema, bamu­kundamanine,
nu bamueine ku beigisibua bamozi bakulia, taboga ku maboko. (
Kubuno baFalese nu bansania baYuda, tabaliaga ndi taboga ku maboko nunse, banzaga bumba bua beisingu­lubo;
nu lingo ndi batuka kuisoko, ndi taboga tabalie; nu bingo bitondo bingi bibabezaga nabio, kusugula bituma, nu nyungu, nu nyungu za nsubi.)
Nu baFalese nu basanzi bamubuzizie bune, Kubuni beigisibua bobe tabakuyanga bumba bua bakulu, tondo bakulia taboga ku maboko?
Nu abatendile bune, Yesaya amulenganizizie busoga, inyue bengelezi, anga buasanzilue bune,
Bantu babano bekunanza na milomo zabo,
Tondo mitima zabo zili bulazi nanne:
Nu bakunkumbamina buliabulia,
Nu bekuigisia meigisia ma malagi ma bantu.
Nuinyue mukusiga kukakizia kua Kalaga, nu mukuanza meigisia ma bantu.
Nu abatendile bune, Lebelebe mukusomba kukakizia kua Kalaga, buno muanze meigisia meinyu.
Kubuno Mose atendile bune, Anza so nu nyoko; nu wasuilila isi aba nina akakua:
tondo inyue mukutenda buno, na muntu watenda kuisi aba nina buno, lukaso lunabezaga nalo kukukasa nalukasile Kalaga;
aba tamukuziga wono kukitila isi aba nina;
mukubigia idagi lia Kalaga ku kabamba ka bumba bueinyu, bubo bumuasila kulusia ku bantu; nu bitondo bingi bimukukita.
Nu gamanine lingo musanganano, nu abatendile bune, Unguililazi, inyue bansania, nu menyininazi;
takuli kena keli gantata ga mubili wa muntu, nu kaningila munda nu kumubigia; tondo bukutuka mueli ubukumu­bigia.
Ndi muntu eli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Nu geingide mu numba asigile musanganano, beigisibua bage bamubuzizie buno, buisulilua bukizi bua musumo wozo?
Nu abatendile bune, Ndi inyue tamuba na bumenyinino? Ndi tamuizi buno kokansania keli gantata ga mubili wa muntu takanamubigia;
kubuno takamuingila mu mutima, tugu munda, nu ndi takana­basa ku mambue? Akubula buno engezie idia linsania.
Nu atendile bune, Kukutuka ku muntu ukukumubigagia.
Kubuno munda mua mitima za bantu umukutukaga makengelo mabi, butazi, kuiba, kuita, kuita meiga,
lutundo lubi, mibi, buengelezi, misako za butazi, liso ibi, bilingano, kuikotia, bukongolo:
bibino binsania ubikutukaga mu mutima, nu bibio ubikubigagia muntu.
Nu atukile kuko, endile ku miaga za Tula nu Sidona. Nu eingide mu numba imozi ntatundaga muntu umozi kumenya; tondo tabuakulungeine kubisua.
Tondo kazanga kongo mukikulu umozi, abezaga na muana wage wabezaga na musumbu ongule ku misagu zage, nu avule kuiyisa ku magulu mage.
Nu wozo mukikulu abezaga muGeleka, wa kilongo kia Suliafoneki. Nu amusegile buno atikie musumbu wa nsese mu mukinga wage.
Yesu amutendile bune, Siga bana beikute tanga: kubuno tabusoga kuisa idia lia bana ku mboa.
Tondo amuakuide nuwe bune, E, Mukota; tondo aba mboa zili kunsi kua meza zikuliaga mbobu za bana.
Nu amutendile bune, Ku kabamba ka kutenda kuobe enda; musumbu atuka mu muana wobe.
Nu endile kuage ku numba, nu asangile muana wage eiyombekibua ga mugu, nu musumbu amutuka.
Nu atukile lingo mu miaga za Tula, nu atingile ku Sidona, nu endile ku kiziba kia Galela, mu miaga za Dekapoli.
Nu bamuvuilide na kimbula matuzi, nu atetumaga, bamusegile buno amonie.
Nu amulombueide mu musanganano lumbisombiso, amuingizizie minue mu matuzi, asuide matazi, nu amutilile ku ntonga za Iulami;
nu agalamine kuigulu, egemukidue, nu amutendile bune, Efata, buisulilua bua bubo, Zibuka.
Nu kazanga kongo matuzi mage mazibukile, nu kutetuma kuage kuasilile, nu atuide busoga.
Nu abakakizizie buno, tabasambalile ungo muntu: tondo bubo buabananagia, ububasambeide nunse.
Nu banga­mine nunsania, batendile bune, Asila kukita binsania busoga; akungusia bimbula matuzi nu tuluma tuse tuatenda.
Mu busi bubo, musanganano wabeide munene lingo, nu tababezaga neidia, nu amanine beigisibua bage abatendile bune,
Nkukuila musanganano kiombo, kubuno nise nabo bindi bisatu, nubo tabeli neidia:
nu ndi nabasinga kuabo tabalia, nti bakutua mu nzila; kubuno bamozi batukile kulazi.
Nu beigisibua bage batendile bune, Kiziki kikino kili kalula, nazi muntu unikutia babano na tumpampa?
Nu ababuzizie bune, Tumpampa tunga tumu­nato? Nu bamutendile bune, Mutubakamo tugu.
Nu akakizizie musanganano wikale gansi: nu atolile tumpampa mutubakamo, nu asegile, nu atubunguide, nu akasile beigisibua bage, buno baba­kaseto; nu batukasile musanganano.
Nu babezaga na tuabiena tukeke tugu: abisegeide, nu abakakizizie buno babakasebio.
Nu balile, nu bembukile: nu basongezie mbobu za tumpampa zabeide nzi mutubakamo.
Nu babo baliaga babezaga bakuka bantu tununu tunazi, nu alagane nabo.
Nu kazanga kongo eingide mu buato na beigisibua bage, nu babasile mu ndenge za Delamanuta.
Nu baFalese babasile, nu balingile kumubuzia, balondaga kalolesio kueli kakutuka kuigulu, bamulindikaga.
Nu egemu­kidue bubibu mu mutima, nu atendile bune, Kubuni kibuti kikino kikulonda kalolesio? Lebelebe nkumutenda buno, kibuti kikino takikalolesibua kalolesio.
Nu abasigile, nu eingide lingo mu buato, nu endile ku lisilia.
Nu beibilide kueka tumpampa; tondo bendile na kamozi tugu mu buato.
Nu abakakizizie bune, Idangazi na mugago wa baFalese nu wa Helode,
Nu bakanizanizie buabo buabo, batendile bune, Tatuli na tumpampa.
Nu Yesu amenyine, nu abatendile bune, kimukuakanizania kubuno tamuli na tumpampa? Ndi tamumenya, aba tamumenyinina? Ndi mitima zeinyu zikili mibibu?
Muli na meiso tamukumona? Nu muli na matuzi, tamukungua? aba tamukukengela?
Ganabunguide tumpampa tutano ku bantu bakuka tununu tutano, nzi inga zizeide na mbobu zimuasongezie? Nu bamutendile bune, Ikumi neibili.
Nu nkungu za tumpampa mutubakamo kukasa bantu bakuka tununu tunazi, nzi inga zizeide na mbobu zimuasongezie? Nu bamutendile bune, Mutubakamo.
Nu abatendile bune, Ndi tamumenyinina aba nu kano kaluma?
Nu babasile ku Betesaida nu bamuvuilide na kiuku, nu bamusegile buno itubie kukio.
Nu akatile kiuku geikoko, nu endile nage kuisula lia muino; nu gamusuilide matazi ku meiso, nu abikile maboko gantata geitoe liage, amubuzizie bune, Ndi use wamona busoga?
Nu alolile kuigulu, atendile bune, Nise namona bantu anga miti zikuenda.
Kububo abikile lingo ma­boko mage ku meiso mage; nu alolile kizungululu, nu onizibue, nu amonine binsania busoga.
Nu amusingile ku numba zage, amutendile bune, Ntubase mu muino.
Nu Yesu endile na beigisibua bage mu mino za Kaisalia Filipo: abuzizie beigisibua bage mu nzila, bune, Bantu bekutenda buno, nili nazi?
Nu bamutendile bune, Yoana Mubatizi; nu bango buno, Eliya; bango buno, umozi wa balengania.
Nuwe ababuzizie buno, Tondo inyue mukutenda nili nazi? Petelo amuakuide bune, Uwe u Klisto.
Nu abakakizizie buno, taba­sambalile muntu umozi musagu wage.
Nu alingile kubeigisia buno, buatunganana Muana wa muntu kubabazibua bubibu, nu kusombua na bakulu, na basankoga nu na basanzi, nu kuitua, nu kusila kua bindi bisatu nti ayuke.
Nu ntana kiampa kiabisile. Nu Petelo amulutile, nu alingile kumuzugila.
Tondo agalukile, nu alolile beigisibua bage, azugide Petelo, nu amutendile bune, Enda kumbusa kuane, Satana; kubuno ntukukengela bitondo bia Kalaga, tondo bia bantu.
Nu amanine musanganano, nu beigisibua bage, nu abatendile bune, Ndi muntu ekutunda kunyanga, eitune wenyene, eke muti wa magu, nu anyange.
Kubuno muntu unsania ukutunda konia kalamo kage akakazimizia; nu muntu unsania ukukazimizia ku kabamba kane, nu ku musagu musoga wono nti akakonia.
Kubuno mutali mukizi wa muntu, ndi angata kisi kinsania, nu kumbusa kuzimizia kalamo kage?
Aba muntu anagulania kikizi na kalamo kage?

Kubuno muntu unsania ukankuaga nsoni nu ukakuaga nsoni kuidagi liane mu kibuti kikino kia butazi nu bubi, buno nuwe Muana wa muntu nti akamukua nsoni, gakavua mu lutanuno lueIsi na migenzi zage zasililila.
Nu abatendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula buno, bamozi bemana gano, tabakakua aba nu gabakamona ku bukota bua Kalaga busavua na magala.
Nu kusila kua bindi mutuba Yesu atolile Petelo, nu Yakobo, nu Yoana, nu endile nabo gantata ga muiduko munene nabo bebenyene: nu kilungi kiage kiabagalukide;
nu nsulu zage zakelimine, zabe­zaga zenga nunse, butanamenya mukulumizi wa ga kisi kuzengia.
Nu babasidue na Eliya nu Mose: nu besatenda na Yesu.
Nu Petelo akuide Yesu bune, Labi, buli busoga ndi tuikala gano: nu tobakazi nusu isatu; lumozi luobe, nu lumozi lua Mose, nu lumozi lua Eliya.
Kubuno ntamenyaga buakuakula; kubuno bakule boba nunse.
Nu kimpa kiabakukide; nu iyuki liatukile mu kimpa bune, Wono eli Muana wane, u Ngoli zane: munguililazi.
Nu kazanga kongo gabagebilegebile, tabamonine ku muntu, umpanga Yesu nabo.
Nu gababezaga bese bakumba muiduko, abakakizizie bune, Tamusambalile muntu ku bumuamonakubo, aba Muana wa muntu gakayuka ku bakuzi.
Nu bakokomezizie idagi lilio, babuzanizie buabo buabo, buno kuyuka ku bakuzi kuli buni?
Nu bamu­buzizie bune, Kubuni basanzi bekutenda buno Eliya atunganana kulinga kuvua?
Nu abatendile bune, Lebelebe Eliya akalinga kuvua, nu kukunga binsania: nu buni buasanzidue Muana wa muntu, buno ababazibue nunse nu kusombua?
Tondo nkumutenda buno, Eliya avule kalazi, nu bamukitile anga bubatundaga anga buasanzilue.
Nu gabasile beigisibua bage, bamonine ku musanganano munene wabatimbikania, nu basanzi babuzanizie nabo.
Nu kazanga kongo musanganano wamumonineko nu bangamine nunsa­nia, nu beitumine lubilo kuko nu bamusekeide.
Nu ababuzizie bune, Buni bumukubuzania nabo?
Nu muntu umozi mu wozo musanganano amutendile bune, Musozi, nakuvuilide na muana wane wamulume, nu abezaga na musumbu wa kaluma;
nu gakumu­buila, nu nti amugusia; nu nti esabasa iyulo, nu kukeketa meinyo, nu ese onda: nu natendile ku beigisibua bobe buno bamutikie; nu tabavuamine.
Nu Yesu abakuide bune, Inyue kibuti kikio kiteli na bukatizio ndi nkeikalaga neinyu kankanka? Gani ganka­kutilua? Vuazi nage kundi.
Nu bavule nage kueli: nu gamu­monineko, kazanga kongo musumbu amugusizie nunse, nu aguide gansi, nu ebulubutizie, nu abasile iyulo.
Nu abuzizie isi nkungu nkizi zamulingile wono musumbu? Nu amutendile bune, Kutukila ku buana buage.
Nu mambizi meingi ekumutumbaga ga keiya nu mu mazi, buno amubigie: tondo ndi unavuama kukita, tukuile kiombo, nu tukasie.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Ndi una­vuama! Bunsania bunakulungana ku wozo wakatizia.
Kazanga kongo isi wa wozo muana alalukile, nu atendile bune, Nakatizia, nkasie ku kutakatizia kuane.
Nu gamonine Yesu ku musanga­nano use wakundamana azanzuide wozo musumbu, amutendile bune, Uwe musumbu wa kaluma, nu kimbula matuzi, nakukakizia buno, tuka mu wono nu ntuingile mueli lingo.
Nu alalukile, nu amugusizie nunse, nu atukile; nu abeide anga mukuzi; nu beingi batendile bune, Akua.
Tondo Yesu amukatile geikoko, nu amu­zanzuide, nu emene.
Nu geingide mu numba beigisibua bage ba­muvuilide ku lumbisombiso, Kubuni tatuavuamine kumutikia?
Nu abatendile bune, Bubuno tabunamoneka tugu kute ku kusega.
Nu batukile kuko, batingile mu Galela; nuwe ntatundaga muntu kumenya bubo.
Kubuno eigisagia beigisibua bage buno, Muana wa muntu asila kugabulua ku maboko ma bantu, nubo bamuite; nu gasile kuitua, kusila kua bindi bisatu nti ayuke.
Tondo tabamenyinine bubo, nu bakule boba kumubuzia.
Nu babasile ku Kapenuma; nu gababeide bese mu numba, ababuzizie bune, Kikizi kimuakananizanagia mu nzila?
Tondo beikeide kibibi: kubuno babezaga bakuakanania mu nzila buno, nazi uli munene.
Nu ekede gansi, nu amanine babo ikumi na babili, nu abatendile bune, Ndi muntu ekutunda kuba mutangi, abe muzinda ku bansania, nu mukambi wa bansania.
Nu atolile muana muto, nu amubikile munkatini muabo: nu amukatile geikoko, nu abatendile bune,
Na muntu na muntu wasekela muana muto anga wono muizina liane, nti ansekela: nu wozo wansekela nti ntansekela, tondo nti asekela wozo wansingile.
Yoana amutendile bune, Musozi, tuamonine ku muntu umozi watikagia basumbu kuizina liobe; tondo tuamuzugide, kubuno ntakutuyanga.
Tondo Yesu abatendile bune, Tamumuzugile: kubuno takuli muntu unakita mugeleko kuizina liane, nu kuntenda bubi.
Kubuno wozo utakututuna, nti tuli nabo bumozi.
Kubuno unsania ukamunusagia kituma kia mazi ma kunua, kubuno muli bantu ba Klisto, lebelebe nkumutenda buno, ntakaziminua na lukalilo luage lusoga.
Nu unsania ukeinagia umozi wa ku babano bana bato bakunkatizia mutima, buatunganana akandue ikozi lia kugoga muikosi liage, nu kuisoa mu kitatenge.
Nu ndi kuboko kuobe kuakuinia mutima, nti wakusesa; gunulumba wingila kitunga mu kalamo, kutinga kuba na maboko mabili nu kutumbua mu kiziba kia keiya katakuzimaga.
Mukuso wabo tagukue, nu keiya takazime.
Ndi kugulu kuobe kuakuinia mutima, nti wakusesa; gunulumba wingila kitunga mu kalamo, kutinga kuba na magulu mabili nu kutumbua mu kiziba kia keiya.
Nu mukuso wabo tagukue nu keiya takazime.
Nu ndi liso liobe liakuinia mutima, nti walitikia, gunulumba wingila mu bukota bua Kalaga na liso limozi kutinga kuba na meiso mabili nu kutumbua mu kiziba kia keiya;
nu mukuso wabo tagukue nu keiya takazime.
Kubuno na muntu na muntu nokalungua na keiya.
Munkange uli musoga; tondo ndi munkange taguli na nse lingo, gunasuagibua na kikizi? mube na munkange mu muli, nu mube na bubobelelo bueinyu bueinyu.
Nu atukile kuko, nu abasile ku miaga za Yudaya nu ku lisilia lia Yadene: nu musanganano munene wamuendeide lingo, nu abeigisizie lingo anga buagomezie.
Nu baFalese bamuvuilide kumubuzia bune, Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe muntu kutikia mukikulu wage? bamulindikile.
Nuwe abakuide bune, Buni buamukakizizie Mose?
Nu bamutendile bune, Mose atusengezizie kusanza mukanda wa kuita isonga, nu nti wamutikia.
Tondo Yesu abatendile bune, Ku bubibu bua mitima zeinyu amusanzide kuko kukakizia.
Tondo kutukila kulinga kua kubumbua kua kisi, mubumbi abumbile wamulume nu mukikulu.
Kubuno muntu akasiga isi nu nina, nu akalandana na mukikulu wage;
nubo babili bakaba mubili umozi; aba tabeli babili lingo, tondo beseli mubili umozi.
Umpanga kikio kiakulumanizie Kalaga, muntu ntanakilekanukia.
Nu mu numba beigisibua bage bamubuzizie lingo kitondo kikio.
Abatendile bune, Unsania ukatikagia mukikulu wage, nu kusonga ungo, nti amuitila meiga:
nu ndi mukikulu wenyene atuka kuiba wage, nu kusongua nongo, nti eita meiga.
Nu bamuvuilide na bana bato, buno eitubie kubeli: nu beigisibua babazugide.
Tondo gamonine Yesu ku bubo, ongilue, nu abatendile bune, Sigazi bana bato bavue kundi; tamunabazugila: kubuno beli anga babano bukota bua Kalaga buli buabo.
Lebe­lebe nkumubula bune, Unsania uteitabizia bukota bua Kalaga anga muana muto, ntakeingila nunse mubo.
Nu abalelile, nu abikile maboko gantata gabo, nu abakitile mponga.
Nu gendaga mu nzila, muntu umozi eitumine lubilo kueli, nu amukomine mazu, amubuzizie bune, Musozi Musoga, buni bunikita nipiene kalamo katanakuzinda?
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Buni bukumana musoga? Takuli umozi musoga tugu Kalaga wewenyene.
Wizi makakizio buno, Ntuite, Ntuite meiga, Ntuibe, Ntueke munyobe buza, Ntuengelele, Anza so nu nyoko.
Nu amutendile bune, Musozi nanzile mamano mansania kutu­kila ku kubutua kuane.
Nu Yesu gamulolile amutundile, nu amutendile bune, Wagelelua ku bumozi tugu: enda, ukunzie binsania biguli nabio, ubikase bazambi, bubo ukaba neisuku mui­gulu: nu uvue unyange.
Tondo abeide na kabebe ku bubo, nu endile: kubuno abezaga na bikulo bingi.
Nu Yesu alolile ku ntungo insania nu atendile beigisibua bage bune, Kuingila kua bagumi mu bukota bua Kalaga kuli kubibu!
Nu beigisibua bangamine na bubo buatendile. Tondo Yesu abakuide lingo bune, Bana, kuingila kua babo bakulemanina bikulo mu bukota bua Kalaga kuli kubibu!
Buli neibineibi ngamia kuingila muitengu lia nsinge, ku mugumi kuingila mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu babo bangamine nunse, nu bamutendile bune, Umpanga nazi unavuama konibua?
Yesu abalolile, nu atendile bubo, Bubuno tabunakulungana ku bantu, tondo bunakulungana ku Kalaga; kubuno bunsania bunakulungana ku Kalaga.
Petelo alingile kumutenda bune, U nguilila, isue tuasigile binsania, nu tuakuyangile.
Yesu atendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Takuli muntu wasigile numba zage, aba bato bage, aba babitu bage, aba nina, aba isi, aba bana, aba masoa, ku kabamba kane, nu ku kabamba ka musagu musoga,
tondo atalikilue mambizi lukama ku nkungu zeno, numba, nu bato bage, nu ba nina, nu bana, nu masoa, na mbabazio; nu mu nkiko zikavua kalamo katanakuzinda.
Tondo beingi balingaga bakaba bazinda; nu beingi bazindaga bakaba batangi.
Nu babezaga mu nzila, bendile ku Yelusalema; nu Yesu abatangile: nu bangamine; nu babo bamuyangaga bakule boba.
Nu atolile lingo babo ikumi na babili, nu alingile kubasambalila bibio biamubasile,
atendile bune, Unguililazi, tuabakama ku Yelusalema; nu Muana wa muntu agabulue ku basankoga banene nu ku basanzi; nu bamusungie buno akue, nu bamugabule ku baBilongo:
nu bamuililike, nu kumusuila matazi, nu kumusu­sula, nu bamuite; nu kusila kua bindi bisatu nti ayuke.
Nu Yakobo nu Yoana, bana ba Zebedayo, bamuvuilide, nu bamutendile bune, Musozi, tukutunda utukitile butukukusega.
Nu abatendile bune, Mukutunda nimukitile buni?
Nu bamu­tendile bune, Utuitabizie umozi kuikala ku kuboko kuobe kua seidume, nu ungo ku kuboko kuobe kua seikazi, mu lutanuno luobe.
Tondo atendile bune, Tamuizi kimukusega. Ndi munavuama kunua ku kituma kikio kinkunua kukio? aba bubatizio bunkuba­tizibua?
Nu bamutendile bune, Tunavuama. Nu Yesu aba­tendile bune, Muanue ku kituma kinanue kukio; nu bubatizio bunkubatizibua muabatizibue mubo;
tondo kuikala ku kuboko kuane kua seidume aba ku kuboko kuane kua seikazi nsinavuama kumukasa; tondo kuikala kuko kuli bantu balongekeidue.
Nu gongule babo ikumi ku bubo, bongedue Yakobo nu Yoana.
Nu Yesu abamanine, nu abatendile bune, Muizi buno bakota ba ba­Bilongo bekubangata; nu bakota babo bakubakitia.
Tondo tabubo gamusamba: tondo unsania ukutunda kuba munene, abe mukambi wa banyage;
nu unsania ukutunda kuba mutangi gamusamba, abe mukambi wa bansania.
Kubuno Muana wa muntu ntavule kukambilua, tondo kukamba, nu kukasana kalamo kage kuba bukuluzi bua beingi.
Nu babasile ku Yeliko: aba gabezaga esatuka ku Yeliko, gamozi na beigisibua bage nu musanganano munene, muana wa Timayo, izina liage Batimayo, wozo musegi kiuku, abezaga muntungo mua nzila.
Nuwe gongule buno Yesu wa Nazaleta alingile, kulaluka neiyuki inene, nu atendile bune, Yesu, muana wa Davidi, nkue kiombo.
Nu beingi bamuzugide buno, eikale kibibi: tondo eitide kulaluka neiyuki inene bune, Uwe Muana wa Davidi, nkue kiombo.
Nu Yesu emanukile, nu amutendile bune, Mumanazi. Nu bamanine wozo kiuku, nu bamutendile bune, Kokomezia mutima: emanuka, ekukumana.
Nu we ateide nsulu zage, emanukile, nu avule ku Yesu.
Nu Yesu amuakuide bune, Kikizi kiukutunda nikukitile? Nu wozo kiuku amutendile bune, Laboni, nkutunda namona.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Enda tugu; bukatizio buobe buakonia. Nu kazanga kongo amo­nine, nu amuyangile mu nzila.
Nu gababasile buigi na Yelusalema, nu kubasa Betepage nu Betania, ku muiduko wa Oleve, asingile beigisibua bage babili,
nu abatendile bune, Endazi ku muino uli luabusio lueinyu: nu kazanga kongo gamuabase mugo, muamone ku muana wa mpunda asuikua, utetetelagua geli, nti muazisula, nu nti muavua nazo.
Nu ndi muntu amubuzia bune, Kimukukitila bubo? mua­mutenda buno, Mukota akuiyaninazo; nu kazanga kongo azisinge kuno.
Nu bendile, nu bamonine ku wozo muana wa mpunda asuikua ga muingilo kumbuga kua numba; bazisulile.
Tondo kuabezaga kuemana bantu bamozi babatendile bune, Kikizi kimu­kusulila zezo mpunda?
nu babatendile anga buabalagile Yesu: nu babasigile.
Nu bavule na wozo muana wa mpunda ku Yesu, nu babikile nsulu zabo gantata gazo; nu eikede gantata gazo.
Nu beingi banzile nsulu zabo mu nzila; nu bango banzile ntabi za miti zibasesaga mu masoa.
Nu babo bendaga luabusio, nu babo bamuyangaga, balalukile neiyuki bune, Hosana; mbogimbogi ku wozo ukuvua muizina lia Mukota;
