mbogimbogi ku bukota bukuvua ku buangato bua tateisue Davidi, Hosana mu meigulu.
Nu abasile ku Yelusalema, mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga; nu gasilile kulola binsania kundenge insania, kubuno zabezaga nkungu zeigolo endile ku Betania neikumi na babili.
Nu gabeide nindunindu, gabatukile mu Betania, akule na nzala,
Nu amonine ku muti wa figi bulazi uli na nsamba, endile buno, embe anamona biguma kugo: nu gabasile gago, ntamonine kampa tugu nsamba; kubuno tazabezaga nkungu za kukolama biguma.
Nu akuide bune, Kutukila lelo aba nu ku nkiko zitana­kuzinda, muntu ntakalia ku biguma biobe, nu beigisibua bage bongule ku bubo.

Nu babasile ku Yelusalema; nu eingide mu numba za kuku­mbamina Kalaga, nu alingile kuimbia babo bakunzagia nu bakunzaga mu numba zezo, nu eidukizie meza ma bagulania ba falanga, nu bisumbi bia bakunzia ba nkulimba;
nu ntazigile muntu kuvua na kena mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga.
Nu abeigisizie bune, Ndi tabuasanzilue bune, Numba zane zikamanua numba za masego ku babilongo bansania? Tondo inyue muazigalukia anga numba za banyagi.
Nu basankoga banene nu basanzi gabongule ku bubo, balondile bubamuita: kubuno bamukule boba, kubuno musanganano unsania wangamine na meigisia mage.
Nu busi na busi muigolo endaga kuisula lia muino.
Nu gababezaga bese batinga nindunindu, bamueine ku wozo muti wa figi woma kutukila ku mizi aba nu ku ntabi.
Nu Petelo akengeide bubo buatendile, nu atendile bune, Labi; lola, wozo muti wa figi uwasuililagile woma.
Nu Yesu abakuide bune, Mube na bukatizio ku Kalaga.

Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Unsania ukatendaga buno muiduko wono bune, Tutumuka nu wiyise mu kitatenge; ntabe na kangonongono mu mutima wage, tondo akatizie buno, bubo buatendaga buakitue, nu amone ku bubo buatendaga.
Tondo ububo bunkumubula bune, Binsania bimukutunda bise­gazi, mukatizie buno muabimone, nu biabe bienyu.
Nu gamu­kuemana ku masego, sigilinanazi, ndi uli na kitondo ku munyobe; bubo Soinyue uli muigulu amusigilile misako za buagi bueinyu.
Tondo ndi inyue tamukusigilila, Soinyue uli muigulu ntamusigilile misako za buagi bueinyu.
Nu babasile ku Yelusalema lingo: nu gatabangaga mu numba za kukumbamina, basankoga banene, nu basanzi, nu bakulu bamu­vuilide;
nu bamutendile bune, Ku buangato bukizi bukukitila ku bubuno?
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Nne nkumubuzia bumozi, nu muanakulebo, nti namubula nunne buangato bunku­kitila ku bubo.
Bubatizio bua Y oana buatukile muigulu, aba ku bantu? Nakulazi.
Nu babuzanizie buabo buabo, batendile bune, Ndi tuatenda buno buatukile kuigulu; nti atenda buno, Kubuni tamuamukatizizie?
Tondo ndi tuatenda buno, Buatu­kile ku bantu-bakule bantu boba: kubuno bansania bakukatizia buno Yoana eli mulengania.
Nu bakuide Yesu bune, Tatuizi. Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Nunne lingo nsikumubula ku buangato bukizi bunkukitila ku bubuno.

Nu alingile kubeisa misumo. Muntu umozi ayikile isoa lia mizigi za biguma, nu atimbizie mukolo, nu ombile itengu lia kuyika biguma bia mizigi, nu akitile numba kuigulu za mulangi, nu endile mu kingo kisi.
Nu mu nkungu za kukola asingile mukobe ku bakambi buno, embe anamona ku biguma ku bakambi beisoa.
Nu bamukatile, nu bamususuide, nu bamusubizie nteli na kampa.
Nu asingile lingo ungo mukobe; nu bamusumitile kuitoe nu bamubabazizie nunse.
Nu asingile ungo; nu bamuitile: nu bango beingi babalibuide nu bango babeitile.
Tondo abezaga na ungo, umozi tugu, muana wage watunda: nu amusingile kubeli, nu atendile bune, Embe bananza muana wane.
Tondo babo bakambi batendile bune, Wozo umupieni wage, vuazi, tumuitazi, nu tupiene bupieni buage.
Nu bamukatile, nu bamuitile, nu bamuisile ku lutikilo luisoa.
Nu buni bukakita wozo mukota weisoa lia biguma? akavua nu akabigia bakambi, nu akakasa bango lilio isoa.
Ndi tamuasomine ku masanzo mamo:
Ikozi liasombagua na bobaki,
Uliabede ikozi inene lia kapindapinda;
Bubo buatukile ku Mukota,
Nubo bukutuganiagania?
Nu balondile bubamukata; tondo bakule musanganano boba; kubuno bamenyine wozo musumo wabeisaga: bamusigile, nu bendile.
Nu bamusingide baFalese bamozi nu baHelode, bavule bubanamukandika bitondo.

Nu gabasilile, bamutendile bune, Musozi, tuizi buno uli bulili, nu ntukuikutia ku kitondo kia muntu umozi; kubuno ntukulola ku kilungi kia bantu, tondo ukuigisia meigisia ma Kalaga mu bulili: Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe kuliga idigo ku Kaisa, aba kutaliga?
Tumukase, aba tatumu­kase? Tondo amenyine kuengelela kuabo, abatendile bune, kubuni kumukundindikila? Vuazi na falanga zeidigo, buno nizimoneko.
Nu bamuvuilide nazo, nu ababuide bune, Kikino kisusania nu mamano masanzo bili bia nazi? Nu bamutendile bune, Bili bia Kaisa.
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Kasazi Kaisa bia Kaisa, nu ku Kalaga bia Kalaga. Nu bangamine nage nunse.
Nu Basodoke bamuvuilide, babo bakutendaga buno, takuli iyukilo; bamubuzizie bune,
Musozi, Mose atusanzide buno, Ndi iselenzi wa muntu akua, nu kusiga mukikulu, nu ndi ntasiga muana, nti muto wage ayana wozo mukikulu, nu abutile iselenzi bana.
Mutuli muabezaga mutuba kamo bandemozi: nu mutangi asongile mukikulu nu akule ntasigile bana;
nu wababili amuyanine, nu akule, nuwe ntasigile bana; nu wozo wa basatu bubo nuwe:
nu babo bansania mutuba kamo, tabasigile bana. Nu bubo, nuwe mukikulu akule.
Muiyukilo wozo mukikulu akaba wa nazi? kubuno babo mutuba kamo bamusongile.
Yesu abatendile bune, Ndi tamukuibaga bubuno, kubuno tamuizi ma­sanzo, aba magala ma Kalaga.
Kubuno gabakayuka ku bakuzi, tabakasonga, aba tabakasongua; tondo babe anga migenzi za mui­gulu.

Tondo ku kitondo kia bakuzi buno bakayuka; ndi tamu­somaga mu mukanda wa Mose ku kitondo kia kiziki kia guluminaga keiya mu muti, buamutendile Kalaga bune, Nne nili Kalaga wa Abalahama, nu Kalaga wa Isaka, nu Kalaga wa Yakobo?
We nteli Kalaga wa bakuzi, tondo wa balami: bubo mukuibaga nunse.
Nu umozi wa ku basanzi abasile, nu ongule kubakutenda, nu amenyine buno abakula busoga, amubuzizie bune, Kukakizia kukizi kutangi?
Yesu atendile bune, Kutangi ukukuno, Unguilila Isalele, wozo Mukota, Kalaga weitu, eli Mukota umozi tugu:
nu tunda Mukota, Kalaga wobe na mutima wobe unsania, nu mu kalamo kobe kansania, nu mu menge mobe mansania, nu na magala mobe mansania.
Nu kuibili kuli bubo, Tunda munyobe anga buwi­tunda uwenyene.
Nu musanzi amutendile bune, Bulili, Musozi, watenda buligo, buno Kalaga eli umozi tugu aba takuli ungo, tugu we:
nu nti wamu­tunda mu mutima wobe unsania, nu mu menge mobe mansania, nu na magala mobe mansania, nu kutunda munyobe anga buwitunda uwenyene buatinga kayulo kakugisibua nu bisansa binsania.
Nu gamonine Yesu buno atendile na menge, amutendile, Uwe ntuli bulazi na bukota bua Kalaga. Nu takuli muntu wagelekile kumu­buzia lingo.
Nu Yesu akuide geigisagia mu numba za kukumbamina bune, Kubuni basanzi bekutenda buno Klisto eli muana wa Davidi?
Kubuno Davidi wenyene atendile mu magala ma Muuza Wasililila bune,
Mukota atendile ku Mukota wane,
Ikala ku kuboko kuane kua seidume,
Aba nu ganangate beiti bobe.
Davidi wenyene amumanine Mukota; nu buni bueseli muana wage? Nu bantu beingi ba wozo musanganano munene bamungui­lide na mbogimbogi.
Nu mu meigisia mage atendile bune, Idangazi na basanzi, nu babo bekuelama kuvuala nsulu ndazi, nu kusambizibua muisoko,
nu kuikala ga bisumbi bitangi mu numba za musanganano, mu biziki bitangi mu bisagulo,
babo bakunyaga numba za misigala, nu ku buengelezi bakusega isego nkungu ndazi; babo bakasungibua lusungio lunene nunse.
Nu eikeide buigi na sanduku za mitebe, nu alolile musanga­nano bugukuisa falanga muzo; nu bagumi beingi beisile ningi.
Nu kuavule musigala muzambi, nuisile sengi ibili, anga likuta limozi.
Nu amanine beigisibua bage, nu abatendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula buno wono musigala abika ningi kutinga bansa­nia babika bikulo mu sanduku zeno:
kubuno babikile bia mutali wabo; tondo we ku buzambi buage bunsania esile binsania biabezaga nabio, aba bikulo biage binsania.
Nu gatukile mu numba za kukumbamina, umozi wa beigisi­bua bage amutendile bune, Musozi, lola, makozi nu kubaka kukuno!
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Ndi mukumona ku kobaka kukuno buno, kuli kunene? tagakasigala ikozi gantata geikozi, litaka­bungulua.
Nu geikalile ga muiduko wa Oleve, buigi na numba za kukumba­mina, Petelo, nu Yakobo, nu Yoana, nu Andele bamubuzizie ku lumbisombiso bune,
Tubule buni bukaba bitondo bibino? Nu ku kalolesio kakizi kabakamenyinine buno bitondo bibino bise biazindi­lila?
Nu Yesu alingile kubatenda bune, Idangazi, buno muntu ntamuengelele.
Kubuno beingi bakavua muizina liane, nu baka­tenda bune, Nnowe; nu bakengelela beingi.
Nu gamukongua ku bita nu misagu za bita, tamuzangezange: bitondo bibino biatunga­nana kuvua; tondo kuzinda takuika.
Kubuno kilongo kikaluana na kingo kilongo, nu bukota bukaluana na bukota; nu kukaba tulingini ku kisi ku lulenge na lulenge; nu kukaba munganda: bubo ukulinga kua lubabazio.
Tondo idangazi; kubuno bakamubasia ku nusu za milondo, nu ku numba za musanganano mukalibulua; nu mukabasibua ku bangati nu ku bakota ku kabamba kane, bukaba bulongeki ku beli.
Kubuno musagu musoga watunganana tanga kulinga kusambalua ku babilongo bansania.
Nu gabakamusondelezia ku lusungio, nu kumugabula, tamulemanine bumuatende; tondo kinsania kimuakasague nkungu zezo ukimukatenda; kubuno teinyue nti ubakutenda, tondo Muuza Wasililila.
Nu mubuto wa muntu akagabula mubuto wage buno akue, nu isi wa muana akagabula muana wage buno akue; nu bana bakabinga bababuta, nu baka­bagabula buno bakue.
Nu mukasombua na bantu bansania ku kabamba keizina liane; tondo wozo weidindika aba nu kuzinda, nti akonibua.
Tondo gamukamona ku lusombo lua kubiga Iuemane mu kiziki kilutakulungana (wozo ukusomaga bubuno amenyininebo), babo beli mu Yudaya batine ku miduko:
nu wozo uli gantata numba ntagele kutikia bili mu numba zage;
nu wozo ukasangua kuisoa ntasubanie kutola nsulu zage.
Tondo kabebe kanene ku beimisu nu bakumomia mu busi bubo!
Nu musege buno bito­ndo bibino tabibase mu nkungu za mpego.
Kubuno mu bindi bibio kukaba lubabazio Iunene: lutebezaga lingo kutukila ku kulinga kua kisi kiabumbilue na Kalaga, nu talukaba lingo.
Nu songo Mukota ntakegezie bindi bibio, takunonine muntu wampa: tondo ku kabamba ka basombolua, basombueidue, ukiansile bindi bibio biakegibuako.
Ndi muntu amubula buno, Lolazi! Klisto eli gano; aba Lolazi, kuko; tamumukatizie:
kubuno kukavua boza beingi bakeimana Klisto nu balengania beingi ba buza, bakakita migeleko minene nu maganogano nu buno bageleka kuengelela basombolua tondo tabukakulungana.
Tondo inyue idangazi: kubuno nasila kumutonda.
Tondo kusila kua bindi bibio bia lubabazio, kisongo kia busi kikaba kapilo nu muezi tagukasana lingo,
nu nkeninkeni za muigulu zikakoloka, nu magala ma muigulu makatengatenga.
Nu ububo Muana wa muntu bakamumonako mu bimpa bigulu na magala nu lutanuno luage lunene.
Nu akasinga migenzi kuku­ndamania basombolua bage ku ndenge inazi, kutukila kuzinda kua kisi aba nu ku kuzinda kuigulu.
Nu muiyigisie musumo wa muti wa figi: gakutitulaga ntabi, nu nti zise zalinga kuasa ingo nsamba, nti muamenya buno nkungu za nzogo zise buigi;
bubo nuinyue gamukamona ku bubuno, mumenye buno wozo eseli buigi nu nti eseimine ku nibi.
Lebe­lebe, nkumubula buno, kibuti kikino takikatinga aba nu kusila bubo bunsania.
Igulu nu kisi bikatinga: tondo malagi mane tamaka­tinga nunse.
Tondo ku busi bubo aba nkungu zezo takuli muntu umozi wizi, aba migenzi muigulu, aba Muana tondo ndi nteli gamozi neIsi.
Idangazi, kesiazi ntende nu segazi: kubuno tamuizi gakabela nkungu zezo.
Buli anga muntu, wendile ku kingo kisi, asigile numba zage, nu akasile bakobe bage buangato buno, muntu na muntu akite mulimo wage, nu akakizizie mulangi wa luibi buno akesie ntende.
Kesiazi ntende: kubuno tamuizi busi buavue mukota wa numba, ndi muigolo, aba ndi mu kindi, aba ndi ku mukelo, aba mu nindunindu;
anavua kumubasila kita­ngala besi nu kusanga muiyombeka.
Nu bubuno ubunkumu­bula, nkubula bansania buno Kesiazi ntende.
Kusila kua bindi bibili kuabezaga kisagulo kiesuluko, nu tumpampa tutagaga; nu basankoga banene nu basanzi balondile bubamukata mu lumbisombiso, nu bamuite:
kubuno batendile bune, Ta mu kisagulo, mu musanganano munakivua kuba kazege.

Nu gabezaga ku Betania mu numba za Simona muiya bibali, abezaga asalia, kuavule mukikulu umozi wabezaga na kabongelo ka alabasata, muko muabezaga bulago bua bukunza bubibu; abugizie kako kabongelo, nu amukubulide gantata geitoe.
Tondo bantu bamozi bongilue, nu batendile bune, Buni bukuzimizia bulago bu­buno?
Kubuno bunakunzilue ku falanga nkama isatu
Tondo Yesu atendile bune, Musigazi; buni bumukumuzangiazangia? ankitila busoga.
Kubuno bindi binsania mukubezaga na bazambi, nu nkungu insania zimunatunda kubakitila busoga, munavuama: tondo tamuli nanne bindi binsania.
Akita buavuama kubuno abongia mubili wane bulago ku kabamba ka kuyikua kuane.
Nu lebelebe nkumubula bune, Kunsania kukasambalua musagu musoga mu kisi kinsania, bakasambala lingo buakitile mukikulu wono, bukaba kabali kage.
Nu Yuda Isikaliote, umozi weikumi nu babili, endile ku basankoga banene, buno amugabule kubeli.
Nu babo, gabo­ngule kubo, babogilebogile, nu bamulagile buno bamukase falanga. Nu alondile nkungu nsoga buanamugabula.
Nu gabeide busi butangi bua tumpampa tutagaga, nu bazindi­lizizie kisagulo kiesuluko, beigisibua bage bamutendile bune, Kuni kukutunda tulongeke kiziki kia kulia kisagulo kiesuluko?
Nu asingile beigisibua bage babili, nu abatendile bune, Endazi ku muino, nu muakulumane na wamulume eite idega lia mazi: muyangazi;
nu kunsania kuingilage, nti muabuzia nyene numba buno, Musozi atenda bune, Kuni kuli busio bua bageni, nilie kisagulo kiesuluko na beigisibua bane?
Nuwe amulolesie busio bunene buli kuigulu buse kayikayika, nu bualongekua bunsania kalazi: mumo umumutulongekela.
Nu beigisibua bage batukile nu bendile, nu bamonine ku binsania anga buabulaga; nu balongekile kisagulo kiesuluko.
Nu gabuabeide buse muigolo abasile neikumi nu babili.
Nu gababezaga ku meza bakulia, Yesu abatendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Umozi wa kumuli nkulia nage gamozi, uwangabule.
Nu babeide na kabebe, nu nawe nawe nawamubuzizie bune, Ndi nne?
Nu abatendile bune, Umozi wa kumuli inyue ikumi na babili wozo unakatile nage kiandindi mu lupepe.
Kubuno Muana wa muntu ende, anga buasanzilue: tondo kabebe ku wozo muntu ukugabula Muana wa muntu! bunabeide busoga songo muntu wono ntabutilue.
Nu gababeide bese balia, atolile kampampa, nu asegile, nu akabunguide, nu abakasile, nu atendile bune, Tolazi, kakano keli mubili wane.
Nu atolile kituma, nu gasilile kusega abakasilekio; nu bansania banune kukio.
Nu abatendile bune, Kikino kili mikila zane zeidagano, zakubuka ku kabamba ka beingi.
Lebe­lebe, nkumubula buno, nsikanua lingo biguma bia mizigi aba nu busi bubo bunkanua lingo mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu gabasilile kuimba luimbo, bendile ku muiduko wa Oleve.
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Inyue bansania muine nanne mitima: kubuno buasanzilue bune, Nkalibula mulangi, nu kibombo kia mikoko kikabalangana.
Tondo ganabe nayuka, nalinge kumutanga kuenda ku Galela.
Tondo Petelo amutendile bune, Ndi bango beina mitima nobe, tondo tanne.
Nu Yesu amu­tendile bune, Lebelebe nkukubula buno lelo, mu kindi kikino, gabe mulume wa nkoko ntebika mambizi mabili, nti wantune mambizi masatu.
Nuwe atendile lingo bubibu, Busoga kukua nobe, ndi nsiakutuna. Nu bansania batendile bubo.
Nu bavule muisoa liamanagua buno, Getesemane; nu atendile beigisibua bage bune, Ikalazi gagano niki nasega.
Nu endile na Petelo, nu Yakobo, nu Yoana, nu alingile kukonkomana nu akonkei­due.
Nu abatendile bune, Nnenyene nili na kabebe kanene aba nu ku lukuo; sigalazi gano, nu kesiazi ntende.
Nu gabeide esalombozia, aguide gansi, nu asegile buno, ndi bunakulungana, zeno nkungu zintingile.
Nu atendile bune, Aba, Tatane, binsania binakulungana kuguli; ntikizie kituma kikino, tondo ta anga bunku sombola, tondo anga bukutunda.
Nu gasubizie, asangile beigisibua bage beiyombeka ku tulo, nu atendile ku Petelo bune, Simona ndi wiyombeka ku tulo? Ndi ntunavuama kukesia ntende nkungu imozi?
Kesiazi ntende nu segazi, buno munavua kuingila mu malindiko, mutima ukutunda, tondo mubili watamba.
Nu endile Iingo, nu asegile, atendile bubo lingo.
Nu asubizie lingo, nu abasangile beiyombeka ku tulo, kubuno bazenzelaga; nu tabamenyine bubamuakula.
Nu avule lingo kubeli limbizi lia masatu, nu ababuide bune, Iyombekazi lino nu umunuazi: umpa­nga; nkungu zise buigi, nu Muana wa muntu agabulue mu maboko ma bagi.
Zanzukazi, tuendazi; kubuno wozo ukungabula ese buigi.
Nu kazanga kongo anga buatendaga, Yudasa abasile, umozi wa babo ikumi nu babili, na musanganano babezaga na mapanga nu nkoma, basingilue na basankoga banene nu basanzi nu bakulu.
Nu wozo wamugabulaga abanine kakengelezio bune, Wozo unamumage uwozo umuakate, nu muende nage bulonge bukata.
Nu gabasile, kazanga kongo endile kueli nu atendile bune, Labi; nu amumumine.
Nu babo bantu balambizie maboko kueli, nu bamukatile.
Nu umozi wa babo babezaga gago, abasizie bupanga buage mu musagi, nu abangile mukobe wa sankoga munene, nu amusesile kutuzi.
Nu Yesu abakuide bune, Kubuni muavua, anga baku­vua ku muibi, na mapanga nu nkoma, kuvua kunkata?
Busi na busi nabezaga neinyue neigisagia mu numba za kukumbamina, nu tamuankatile: tondo kubuno bunsania buabeide buno masanzo mazindilizibue.
Nu bansania bamusigile, nu batinine.
Nu musikila umozi amuyangile, abezaga eibiga tugu keindi ka nsulu; nu bamukatile;
tondo asigile kako keindi ka nsulu, nu eitumine lubilo mundulu.
Nu bendile na Yesu ku sankoga munene: nu basankoga banene bansania bakundameine nu bakulu nu basanzi.
Nu Petelo amuyangile bulazi, aba nu ku lusu lua sankoga munene; nu geikeide na bakambi, nu onguaga keiya.
Nu basankoga banene nu bakazi ba luango bansania balondile bulongeki bua kuita Yesu; tondo tababumonine.
Kubuno beingi bamukandikile, nu tabua­beide bumozi.
Nu bamozi bemanine, nu bamukandikile batendile bune,
Tungule kuatendaga bune, Nasambule numba zezo za kukumbamina zakitilue na maboko, nu mu bindi bisatu nobake zitobakue na maboko.
Tondo bulongeki buabo tabua­beide bumozi.
Nu sankoga munene emanukile munkatini muabo, nu abuzizie Yesu bune, Ndi ntuakule bubakukulongekela?
Tondo eikede kibibi, nu ntakuide wampa. Nu sankoga munene, amubuzizie lingo, nu amutendile bune, Ndi uwe U Klisto Muana wa wozo mukiti wa mponga?
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Nnowe: nu mukamumona Muana wa muntu eikala ku kuboko kua seidume kua Magala, nu akavua mu bimpa bigulu.
Nu sankoga munene eyatide nsulu zage, nu atendile bune, Kubuni lingo kutu­kulindila bango balongeki?
Mungua bualinga Kalaga: muku­kengela buni? Nu bansania bamusungizie bune, Atunganana kukua.
Nu bamozi balingile kumusuila matazi, nu kumuziba ku meiso, nu bamutendile bune, Lengania: nu bakambi bamuli­buide ngizi.
Nu Petelo abezaga ekile ga lusu, nu mukikulu mukambi wa sankoga munene avule:
nu amonine ku Petelo ekungua keiya, amulolile kisozi, nu atendile bune, Uwe wabezagile na wozo Yesu muNazaleta.
Tondo atunine, nu atendile bune, nsikungua bukutenda: nu abasile ku kabelabela, nu mulume wa nkoko abikile.
Nu wozo mukikulu mukambi, amumueineko lingo, nu atendile lingo ku babo babezaga gago bune, Wono eli umozi wa ku babo.
Nu atunine lingo. Nu gatingile nkungu nkeke babo babezaga bemana gago, babuide Petelo bune, Lebelebe uwe uli umozi wa ku babo; kubuno uli muntu wa Galela.
Tondo alingile kuisuilila, nu kulumbila bune, Nsizi wozo muntu umukubula.

Nu kazanga kongo mulume wa nkoko abikile limbizi lia mabili. Nu Petelo akengeide lilio idagi liamutendaga Yesu buno, gabe mulume wa nkoko ntebika mambizi mabili, wantune mambizi masatu. Nu gabukengeide, alilile.
Nu kazanga kongo mu nindunindu nunse basankoga banene nu bakulu nu basanzi, nu bakazi ba luango bakitile luango, nu bakandile Yesu nu bendile nage ku Pilato.
Nu Pilato amu­buzizie bune, Ndi uwe U Mukota wa baYuda? Nu amuakuide bune, Bubo buwatenda.
Nu basankoga banene bamubingile mu bitondo bingi.
Nu Pilato amubuzizie lingo bune, Ntuakule? unguilila, bitondo bingi bibakukubinga.
Tondo Yesu ntakuide lingo; nu bubo Pilato angamine.
Na busi na busi buakitaga kisagulo abakandulilaga mukandua umozi, ubatunda.
Nu kuabezaga mukandua umozi wamanagua buno, Balaba, akandilue na bantu babezaga na misona, nu beitanaga mu misona.
Nu musanganano, balingile kumusega buno abaki­tile anga buabakitilaga.
Nu Pilato abakuide bune, Buni bumuku­tunda, Ndi nimukandulile Mukota wa baYuda?
Kubuno amenyinine buno basankoga banene bamugabuide ku lugi.
Tondo basankoga banene balubikanizie musanganano, balumbe bakandula Balaba.
Pilato akuide lingo bune, Mukutunda nikite wono buni umukumana Mukota wa baYuda?
Nu balalukile lingo bune, Atakue.
Nu Pilato abatendile bune, Bubi bukizi buakitile? Nu balalukile lingo bubibu bune, Atakue.
Nu Pilato, atundile kubogiabogia musanganano, abakandulile Balaba; nu gasilile kususula Yesu, amugabuide buno atakue.
Nu bakoloboyo bendile nage ga mulungu ku Palatoria;
Nu bamuvualikizie nsulu zakisimana, nu balukile nkumbu za bukota za mikele, bamuvua­Iikiziezo;
nu balingile kumusambizia, Samba, Mukota wa baYuda!
Nu bamususuide kuitoe na tususula, nu bamusuilide matazi, nu bamukomene mazu, nu bamukumbamine.
Nu gabasilile kumuililika, bamutikizie nsulu zakisimana, nu bamuvua­likizie nsulu zage. Nu bendile nage buno bamutake.
Nu bekizie muntu umozi watingaga, atukaga ku masoa, izina iiage, Simona wa mu Kulene, isi wa Alesandelo nu Lufu, buno eke muti wage wa magu.
Nu bendile nage ku kiziki kiamanagua Gologota, buisulilua buakio buno, Kiziki kia lukungu.
Nu bamunusizie maku masambikua na kansembia buno anue: tondo ntamanune.
Nu bamutakile ku muti wa magu, nu babeganizie nsulu zage, bazesile mbale, buno na muntu na muntu notola kikizi,
Nu gabeide buse nkungu isatu, nu bamutakile ku muti wa magu.
Nu kuabezaga masanzo masanzilue buno, MUKOTA WA BAYUDA.
Nu bamutakile na beibi babili; umozi ku kuboko kuage kua seidume, nu ungo ku kuboko kuage kua seikazi.
Buno masanzo mazindilile buno, aganzilue na bagi.
Nu bansania batingaga bamulingaga, batengezietengezie matoe mabo, nu batendile bune, E! wasambulaga numba za kukumbamina, nu ku bindi bisatu nti wazo­baka,
iyonie lino, nu igezie ku muti wa magu.
Nu bubo basankoga banene bamuililikile buabo buabo nu basanzi, nu bate­ndile bune, Onezie bango; tondo ntanavuama kuiyonia wenyene.
Klisto, Mukota wa baIsalele; kasi eigezie ku muti wa magu, buno tumone nu tukatizie. Nu babo batakilue nage nubo bamu­lingile.
Nu gabeide nkungu mutuba zakuka kuabezaga kapilo ku kisi kinsania aba nu ku nkungu mubula.
Nu ku nkungu mubula Yesu alalukile neiyuki inene, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? buisulilua bua bubo, Kalaga wane, Kalaga wane, kubuni kuwande­kelela?
Nu bango babezaga bemana buigi, gabongule ku bubo, batendile bune, Akumana Eliya.
Nu umozi eitumine lubilo, akatile luata, aluiyazizie na maku mabezaga makali, nu abiki­lemo ku musumbo, nu amunusiziemo, nu atendile bune, Musi­gazi tanga; tulole ndi Eliya avue kumukumbia.
Nu Yesu alilile neiyuki inene, nu eidekanizie.
Nu nsulu za numba za kukumbamina zatikile bibe bibili, kutukila kuigulu nu gansi.
Nu wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo, wabezaga wemana buigi nage, gamonine eidekania, atendile bune, Lebelebe muntu wono abezaga Muana wa Kalaga.
Nu kuabezaga bakikulu balolaga bulazi; kubeli kuabezaga Malia Magadala, nu Malia, nina wa Yakobo muto wa Yose, nu Salome;
ubabo, bamuyangile nu kumukambila ku Galela, nu bango beingi bendile gamozi nabo ku Yelusalema.
Nu gabuabeide buse muigolo, bubuno buabezaga busi bua kulongeka, kuabezaga kuse kuasigala kindi kimozi na ku busi bua sabato.
Yosefu wa Alimataya muntu munene wa lusu lua nango, wono walindilaga bukota bua Kalaga avule; nu endile na ngini ku Pilato; nu asegile kitumba kia Yesu.
Nu Pilato anga­mine kubuno esakua; amanine wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo nu amubuzizie bune, Ndi akua kalazi.
Nu gasambalidue na wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo, akasile Yosefu kikio kitumba.
Nu akunzile nsulu zezo zabota, akibikile mu nsinda zabezaga muikozi; nu akukide ikozi inene ku muingilo wa nsinda.
Nu Malia Magadala, nu Malia, nina wa Yose balolile kuko kubamubika.
Nu gatingile busi bua sabato, Malia Magadala, nu Malia, nina wa Yakobo, nu Salome, bakunzile bulago, buno bende kumubongiabo,
Nu kumukelo nunse mu busi butangi buizinga, bavule ku nsinda gasanukile kisongo kia busi.
Nu batendeine buabo buabo bune, Nazi watutikizie ikozi ku muingilo wa nsinda?
Nu gabalolile, bamonine ikozi liasila kutukibua: nulio liabezaga inene nunse.
Nu beingide mu nsinda, bamonine ku musikila abezaga ikala ku lulenge lua kuidume, abezaga avuala nsulu zenga; nu bangamine.
Nuwe abatendile bune, Tamunangama; muku­londa Yesu muNazaleta, watakilue, ayuka: nteli gano: lolazi, kiziki kibamubikagile.
Tondo endazi, tendazi beigisibua bage nu Petelo buno, alinga kubatanga ku Galela; kuko ukubamumoneko, anga buabatendile.
Babasile kumbuga beitumine lubilo kutuka ku nsinda; kubuno bagilimine nu bangamine: nu tabatendile muntu wampa; kubuno bakuaga boba.
Gayukile Yesu mu nindunindu busi butangi buizinga, alingile kumonekako na Malia Magadala, wozo watikagia basumbu mutuba kamo.
Nu wozo endile nu asambalide babo babezaga nage; gababezaga bekulila bubibu.
Nu gongule babano buno, eli na kalamo, nu amumonako, tabakatizizie.
Nu kusila kua bubo amonekileko na bango bantu babili na kingo kilungi, nu babezaga bakuenda kuisoa.
Nu babo bendile, nu basambalide bango; tondo tabakatizizie.
Nu kusila kua bubo amonekileko na babo ikumi nomozi gabaliaga; nu abazugide kubuno ku kutakatizia kuabo nu ku bubibu bua mitima zabo, kubuno tababakatizizie babo bamumonineko gayukaga.
Nu abatendile bune, Endazi mu kisi kinsania, musambale musagu musoga ku kibumbua na kibumbua.
Wozo wakatizia nu kubatizibua nti onibua; tondo utakatizia nti asungibua.
Nu tulolesio tutuno tuayangane na bakukatizia; kuizina liane batikie basumbu; batende kuingo mitendezi;
nu bakakata ku nzoka, nu ndi bakanua buga­nga, tabukabeita nunse; nu bakabika maboko gantata ga basambi, nu bakona.
Umpanga, Mukota Yesu, kusila kua kutenda nabo, asekeidue muigulu, ekeide ku kuboko kua seidume kua Kalaga.
Nu babo bendile, nu basambede kunsania, nu Mukota akitile nabo, nu kuliko­komezia idagi lilio na tulolesio tuayangeine nalio. Amena.
Kubuno bantu beingi babikile maboko mabo kukulumizia bitondo bia wozo musagu biazindilila munkatini mueitu
anga bubatuekeidego babo bamonaga nu bakiti beidagi,
nunne namonine buno buli busoga, kubuno nayangile wozo musagu nunse kutukila ku kulinga kuago, kukusanzila mukota Teofilo;
buno umenyinine nunsania malagi mawigisizibue.
Wakalazi mu indi bia Helode, mukota wa Yudaya; kuabezaga sankoga umozi, izina liage Zakalia, mu kibombo kia Abiya; nu mukazi wage abezaga umozi wa ku bana bamukazi ba Alona, izina liage. Elizabeta.
Nubo babili babezaga beisanana ku Kalaga, banzile makakizio mansania ma Mukota kuteli neitondoki.
Nu tababezaga na muana, kubuno Elizabeta abezaga mugumba, nubo babili babezaga bese bakungu.
Nu gakitaga mulimo wa busankoga ku Kalaga, mu kikanga kiage,
anga buabezaga lukita lua busankoga, abasile buno eingile mu numba za kukumbamina za Mukota nu agulumizie aliga.
Nu musanganano unsania wasegaga kumbuga ku nkungu zakugulumizia aliga.
Nu mugenzi wa Mukota wamubaside, nu emanine kibe kia kuidume kia kayulo ka kugulumizia aliga.
Nu Zakalia gamumueineko azangilezangile, nu akule boba.
Tondo wozo mugenzi wamubuide bune, Zakalia, ntunakua boba: kubuno masego mobe mongubua, nu mukikulu wobe Elizabeta abute muana wamulume, nu wamuinike izina buno, Yoana.
Nu wabe na mbogimbogi nu klelele; nu beingi bakabogaboga mu kubutua kuage.
Kubuno akaba munene kua Mukota, nu ntakanua maku aba bingo bilubaba; nuwe elyale na Muuza Wasililila, kutukila munda za nina.
Nu akagalukia bengi mu baIsalele ku Mukota Kalaga wabo.
Nuwe akalinga kuenda luabusio luage mu muuza nu mu magala ma Eliya, kugalukia mitima za beisibo ku bana babo, nu kugalukia banani ku menge ma beisanana; nu kubika bantu kayi­kayika ku Mukota.
Nu Zakalia abuide mugenzi bune, Buni bunamenye bubuno? kubuno nise mukungu, nu mukikulu wane nuwe ese mukungu nunse.
Nu mugenzi amutendile bune, Nne u Gabulie ukuemanaga ku Kalaga; nunne nasingilue buno nitende nobe, nu kukusambalila misagu zeno misoga.
Unguilila, ukuba kaluma, ntuavuame kutenda aba nu busi bukaba bubuno, kubuno ntuakatizia malagi mane, nu makazindilila ku nkungu zamo.
Nu bantu balindilaga Zakalia, nu bangamine na buizizizie mu numba za kukumbamina.
Nu gatukile, ntavuamine kutenda nabo: nu bamenyine buno amona ku kalolesio mu numba za kukumbamina; atendaga nabo na maboko tugu, bubo bamenyine buno eseli kaluma.
Nu gasilile bindi bia kukita kuage, endile ku numba zage.
Nu kusila kua bibio bindi mukikulu wage, Elizabeta, eikile iyimi; eibisile miezi itano, nu atendile bune,
Bubuno buankitila Mukota andola, buno antikie nsoni zane ku bantu.
Nu ku muezi wa mutuba mugenzi Gabulie asingilue na Kalaga kuenda ku muino ku Galela, izina liago Nazaleta,
ku mukinga umozi wabezaga ntemenya wamulume, wandagua na Yosefu wa numba za Davidi, nu izina lia wozo mukinga liabezaga Malia.
Nu mugenzi wamuvuilide, wamutendile bune, Samba uwe wakitua mponga, Mukota eli nobe, wakitua mponga kutinga bango bakikulu banyobe.
Tondo angamine kuidagi lilio, nu akengeide buno kusambizia kukizi kukuno?
Nu mugenzi wamutendile bune, Ntunakua boba Malia; kubuno wakitua mponga na Kalaga.
Unguilila, uwe weke iyimi, nu wabute muana wamulume, wamuinike izina buno YESU.
Nu wono akaba munene, nu akamanua Muana wa wozo Uli Kuigulu nunse: nu Mukota Kalaga akamukasa kisumbi kia buangato, kiesi Davidi:
nu akangata numba za Yakobo nkiko zitanakuzinda; nu bukota buage tabunakuzinda.
Nu Malia abuide mugenzi bune, Buni buabe bubuno, kubuno nsimenya wamulume?
Nu mugenzi wamutendile bune, Muuza Wasililila akuvuile, nu magala ma Wozo Uli kuigulu nunse: maku­kukile anga kilimelime: kubuno wozo wasililila wabutue kuobe amanue Muana wa Kalaga.
Unguilila, Elizabeta mubuto wobe, ekile iyimi lia muana wa mulume mu bukungu buage; ese miezi mutuba, wozo wamanagua mugumba.
Kubuno takuli butana­kulungana ku Kalaga.
Malia atendile bune, Nili mukiti wa Mukota; nu bubo buwantendile bumbele. Nu mugenzi amusi­gile.
Mu nkungu zezo, Malia azanzukile nu asasizie kuenda ku kisi kia miduko, mu muino wa Yuda;
nu eingide mu numba za Zakalia nu asekeide Elizabeta.
Nu gongule Elizabeta ku muse­kelo wa Malia, muana eikulunguide munda; nu Elizabeta eiyazizi­bue na Muuza Wasililila;
nu alalukile neiyuki inene, nu atendile bune, Wakitua mponga kutinga bango bakikulu banyobe, nu muana wobe wakitua mponga.
Buni buambela bubuno, buno nina wa Mukota wane anvuile?
Kubuno ganungua ku muse­kelo wobe, nu muana eikulungula munda zane na mbogimbogi;
nu mbogimbogi ku wozo wakatizizie; kubuno bubo buabuidue na Mukota buzindilile.
Nu Malia atendile bune,
Mutima wane ukuganuna Mukota,
Nu muuza wane wasila kubogaboga ku Kalaga Monia wane.
Kubuno alolile lukita lua mukiti wage:
Kutukila lelo bibuti binsania bikamana buno, wakitua mponga.
Kubuno wozo uli na magala ankitila bunene;
Nu izina liage lili liasililila.
Nu kiombo kiage kili ku bibuti na bibuti kubabo Bakumukua boba.
Akitile magala na kuboko kuage;
Akegezie bekuikotia mu makengelo ma mitima zabo.
Atikizie bangati ga bisumbi biabo bia buangato,
Nu kusakika basigulila.
Embukia babo bakuaga na nzala busoga;
Nu enzia bagumi tabeli na kampa.
Akasizie mukiti wage, Isalele,
Buno akuile Abalahama kiombo nu kikanga kiage ku nkiko zitanakuzinda.
(Anga buatendile ku batateisue).
Nu Malia eikeide nage miezi isatu, nu asubizie ku numba zage.
Gakukile nkungu za kubuta kua Elizabeta abutile muana wamulume.
Gongule beida bage nu kikanga kiage buno Mukota amukuila kiombo nunse, babogilebogile nage.
Gakukile bindi kinana, bavule kumonesia wozo muana; nu batundaga kumuinika izina lieisi, Zakalia.
Nu nina atendile bune, Tabubo; tondo akuinikua Yoana.
Bamutendile bune, Takuli muntu umozi mu kikanga kienyu ukumanagua izina lilino.
Nu batendile isi na maboko buno, bamenye buamumane.
Nu atundile lubabu lua kusanza nu asanzile buno, izina liage lili Yoana. Nu bansania bangamine.
Nu kazanga kongo kanua kage kakandukile nu lulami luage luakandukile, nu alingile kutenda, aganuine Kalaga.
Nu bansania babezaga beikala buigi nabo bakule boba: nu misagu zezo zakukile ku kisi kinsania kia miduko za Yudaya.
Nu bansania babunguleko babubikile mu mitima zabo, batendile bune, Wozo Muana abe buni? Kubuno kuboko kua Mukota kuabezaga nage.
Nu isi, Zakalia iyeide na Muuza Wasililila, nu alenganizie bune,
Aganunue Mukota Kalaga wa Isalele;
Kubuno avuila bantu bage;
Nu kubakulula,
Nu atuzanzulila iyega lia lonio.
Mu numba za Davidi mukambi wage.
(Anga buatendile ku tunua tua balengania babezaga waka­lazi),
Lonio luatutikia mu maboko ma beiti beitu nu ku maboko
ma bansania batusomba;
Buno akuile batateisue kiombo.
Nu kukengela idagano liage liasililila.
Nu kilumbilo kialumbide tateisue Abalahama,
Akatukasa ndi tona mu maboko ma beiti beitu nti tuamu­kitila kuteli boba.
Mu kusililila nu mukuisanana kueli bindi binsania mu kalamo keitu.
Nu uwe muana, wamanue mulengania wa Wozo Uli Mui­gulu nunse:
Kubuno walinge kuenda luabusio lua Mukota kukunga nzila zage;
Kukasa bumenyinino bua lonio ku bantu bage.
Mu kusigililua kua misako za buagi buabo.
Ku kiombo kia Kalaga weitu,
Mu kiengi kiatukile kuigulu nu kutusanina.
Kusanina bansania beli mu kapilo nu mukilimelime kia lukuo;
Nu kusondelezia magulu meitu mu nzila za bubobelelo.
Nu wozo muana akulile, eitide na magala mu muuza, nu abezaga mu kalula aba mu busi bualolesizibue ku balsalele.
Ku bindi bibio mulembe watukile ku Kaisa Augusto, buno kisi kinsania kisanzue meina.
Lilio liabezaga isanzo lia kulinga ulilio isanzo liabezaga mu nkungu za Kuilino, mukota wa Sulia.
Nu bantu bansania bendile kusanzua, na muntu na muntu mu muino wage.
Nu Yosefu bubo nuwe atukile ku Galela, kutuka ku muino wa Nazaleta, nu endile ku Yudaya, mu muino wa Davidi wamanagua Betelehema, kubuno abezaga muntu wa numba nu kikanga kia Davidi;
buno asanzue na Malia, kubuno amuandile, nuwe abezaga neiyimi.
Nu gabeikede kuko, kindi kiage kia kubuta kiakukile.
Nu abutile muana mutangi wamulume; nu amugondile neisusi, nu amuyombekizie mu sanduku zalilaga mu nyama, kubuno takuamonekile kiziki mu numba za bageni.
Nu mu kisi kikio muabezaga balangi ba mikoko bazilangaga mu kindi.
Nu mugenzi wa Mukota wababaside kitangala besi, nu malebo ma Mukota mabasanine kunsania: nu bakule boba nunse.
Nu mugenzi wabuide bune, Tamunakua boba; kubuno namuvuila na musagu musoga wa mbogimbogi nene zikaba ku bantu bansania:
kubuno abutua lelo mu muino wa Davidi, U Monia, Klisto Mukota.
Nu kakano keli kalolesio kumuli: buno mua­mone muana agondua neisusi, ayombekibua mu sanduku zaliaga mu nyama.
Nu kazanga kongo gababezaga na wozo mugenzi, iyombo lia muigulu liavule, nu liaganuine Kalaga, nu batendaga bune,
Lutanuno ku Kalaga wa muigulu nunse,
Nu bubobelelo ku kisi nu ku bantu bamutananizia.
Nu gabeide migenzi zasubia kuigulu, babo balangi batendeine, bune, Tuendazi ku Betelehema, nu kumona ku bubo buabako, buatumenesia Mukota.
Nu basasizie kuvua, nu bamonine ku Malia nu Yosefu nu muana mu sanduku zalilaga mu nyama.
Nu gabamumonineko, nu basambeide misagu zibatendagua za wozo muana.
Nu bansania gabongule ku bubo bangamine ku bubo bubabulagua na balangi.
Tondo Malia akengede bitondo bibino binsania nu abibisile mu mutima wage.
Nu balangi basubizie nu batanuine Kalaga ku bitondo binsania bibonguleko nu bibamonineko.
Nu gakukile bindi kinana bia kumumonesia, einikilue izina buno, YESU, anga buatendagua na mugenzi nti nteba muiyimi.
Nu gakukile bindi bia kuengibua ku mulembe wa Mose bendile nage ku Yelusalema, kumukasana ku Mukota
(anga buasanzilue ku mulembe wa Mukota buno, Na muana na muana mutangi wamu­lume wabutua amanue buno, wasililila ku Mukota),
nu kukasana kisansa anga buatendilue mu mulembe wa Mukota buno, Nkulimba ibili aba bilinga bibili.
Nu kuabezaga muntu umozi mu Yelusalema, izina liage Simeona; nu wozo abezaga wisanana nu mukatizia, nu alindilaga mbogimbogi za balsalele: nu Muuza Wasililila abezaga gantata gage.
Nu akengelesizibue na Muuza Wasililila buno, ntakue ndi nte­mona ku Klisto wa Mukota.
Nuwe avule ku numba za kukumba­mina asondelezizibua na Muuza: nu babo bamubuta bavule na Muana Yesu mu numba, buno bamukite anga buabezaga lukita lua mulembe,
nu wenyene amulelile mu maboko mage, nu aganuine Kalaga, nu atendile bune,
Mukota, kano kaluma itabizia mukiti wobe ende,
Anga buwatendile, mu bubobelelo;
Kubuno meiso mane mamona ku lonio lobe,
Lulo luwalongekile ku bansania;
Luli Kiengi kikasana ku baBilongo, nu malebo ku bantu bobe, baIsalele.
Nu isi nu nina bangamine na bitondo biatendagua;
nu Simeona abakitile mponga, nu atendile nina Malia bune, Unguilila, wono muana abikua buno asigulizie nu kusakika beingi beli mu baIsalele; nu kuba kakengelezio kakatendua.
Nu uwenyene bupanga buakusumite ku mutima wobe; buno makengelo ma mitima za beingi malolesibue.
Nu kuabezaga mulengania umozi wa mukikulu Ana, muana wa Fanuele, muntu wa kilongo kia Ase (abezaga mukungu nunse, abezaga na wamulume miaka mutabalamo kutukila bukinga buage,
nu abezaga musigala miaka zakuka makumi kinana nuinazi), nu ntatukaga mu numba za kukumbamina, aganunaga mu kindi nu mu musi, ntaliaga tondo asegaga.
Mu nkungu zezo aganuine Kalaga asambalilaga bansania balindilaga bukuluzi bua Yelusalema musagu wage.
Nubo gabasilile kuzindilizia ikakizio lia mulembe wa Mukota, basubizie ku Galela, kuabo ku muino wa Nazaleta.
Nu muana akulile, nu abeide na magala, eizeide na menge: nu mponga za Kalaga zabezaga gantata gage.
Nu bamubuta bendaga muaka na muaka ku Yelusalema, ku kisagulo kiesuluko.
Nu gabezaga ese miaka ikumi nu ibili, bendile anga buabezaga lukita lua kisagulo;
nu gasilile bibio bindi, basubizie, nu wozo muana Yesu asigeide ku Yelusalema; nu bamubuta tabamenyine buno asigala;
tondo bakengeide buno abezaga na banyage mu lugendo, nu batingizie busi bumozi mu nzila; nu bamulondile mu mibuto zage nu mu banyage:
nu gabatamumonineko, basubizie ku Yelusalema, kumulonda.
Nu kusila kua bindi bisatu bamumonine mu numba za kukumbamina, abezaga eikile gansi gasamba basozi, abonguililaga nu kubabuzia mbuzio:
nu babo bansania bamunguililaga bangamine na bumenyinino buage, nu ku kuakula kuage.
Nu bamubuta, gabamonine ku bubo bangamine; nu nina amubuide bune, Muana wane, kubuni kuwatukitila bubuno? nne nu so tuakulondaga na kabebe.
Nu abatendile bune, Kikizi kimuandondelaga? Ndi tamuizi buno buantananina kuikala mu numba za Tatane?
Tondo tabamenyinine buabatendaga.
Nuwe endile nabo ku Nazaleta, nu abanzile; nu nina abikile bitondo binsania mu mutima wage.
Nu Yesu abeide na menge nu akulile, nu atananizizie Kalaga nu bantu.

Mu muaka wa ikumi neitano wa kuangata kua Tibelio Kaisa; nu Pontio Pilato abezaga muangati wa Yudaya, nu Helode muangati wa Galela, nu Filipo muto wage muangati wa Itulaya, nu Takoniti, nu Lusania muangati wa Alibene,
nu Anasa nu Kayafa babezaga basankoga banene, idagi lia Kalaga Iiabaside Yoana muana wa Zakalia mu kalula,
Nu abasile ku kisi kinsania kili buigi na Yadene, asambalaga kubatizibua kua kuiyania kuisigililo lia misako za buagi;
anga buasanzilue mu mukanda wa malagi ma mulenga­nia Yesaya bune,
Iyuki lia muntu likulaluka mu kalula,
Kungazi nzila za Mukota,
Isiazi matingilo mage,
Mpinga na mpinga zizazibue,
Nu muiduko na muiduko ukagezibua.
Nu gatimba gakeisibua.
Nu nzila zitutulututulu nti zikeisanana;
Nubo bansania bamone ku lonio lua Kalaga.
Nuwe abuide musanganano babatizibue nage bune, Inyue kikanga kia mpoma nazi wamutendile buno, mutine bongoa buka­vua?
Kolamazi biguma bia kuiyania nu tamukengele kutenda mubenyene buno, tuli na Tateisue Abalahama kubuno Kalaga anavuama kubasizia Abalahama bana mu makozi mamano.
Kano kaluma isaga liabikua gansi na miti: nu muti unsania utakolama biguma bisoga nti wasesua nu nti weisua mu keiya.
Nu musa­nganano wamubuzizie bune, Tukite buni?
Nu abakuide bune, Muntu uli na nsulu ibili, akase wozo uteli na kampa; nu wono uli neidia akite bubo lingo.
Nu lingo bandelelombe bavule kuba­tizibua, nu bamubuide bune, Musozi tukite buni?
Nu ababuide bune, Tamutikie kampa kutinga bumuakakizizibue.
Nu bakoloboyo bamubuzizie bune, Tukite buni, nuisue? Nu aba­buide bune, Tamubenge muntu umozi nu tamumukandike bitondo; lingo mube na mbogimbogi na lukalilo lueinyu lumukuligua.
Nu galindilaga bantu bubo buabe, nu bantu bansania bake­ngeide mu mitima zabo misagu za Yoana, buno embe we U Klisto;
Yoana akuide bansania bune, Lebelebe nkumubatizia na mazi; tondo wozo wavue antinge, nsiatananina kukandula mizigi za bisala­pata biage: nu akamubatizia na Muuza Wasililila nu keiya:
nu lueli luage luli mu kuboko kuage, nuwe akengia mulungu wage nunse, nu akakundamania mumpunge wage mu kigenge kiage, tondo akagisia mpepa mu keiya katakuzimaga.
Nu wono abanine mano meingi, nu kubasambalila musagu musoga;
tondo mukota Helode, azugidue nage ku kabamba ka Helodia mukazi wa muto wage, nu ku bubi bunsania buakitaga Helode,
atalikide bubuno lingo gantata ga bunsania, akandile Yoana mu kikando.
Gabeide bantu bansania basila kubatizibua, Yesu nuwe abatizizibue, nu asegaga, nu igulu liakanduidue,
nu Muuza Wasililila agelile gantata gage mu mubili wa kisusania kia nkulimba, nu iyuki liatukile muigulu bune, Uwe uli Muana wane, Ngoli zane, nakomana nobe.
Nu gabeide Yesu akuka miaka makumi masatu, alingile kui­gisia, bamukengeide buno eli muana wa Yosefu, muana wa Eli,
muana wa Matata, muana wa Lewi, muana wa Meleke, muana wa Yana, muana wa Yosefu,
muana wa Matatia, muana wa Amasa, muana wa Nahuma, muana wa Eseli, muana wa Nagei,
muana wa Mata, muana wa Matatia, muana wa Simi, muana wa Yoseke, muana wa Yoda,
muana wa Yoana, muana wa Lesa, muana wa Zelubabela, muana wa Salatiele, muana wa Neli,
muana wa Meleke, muana wa Adi, muana wa Kasama, muana wa Elemadama, muana wa Eli,
muana wa Yose, muana wa Elieze, muana wa Yolima, muana wa Matata, muana wa Lewi,
muana wa Simona, muana wa Yuda, muana wa Yosefu, muana wa Yona, muana wa Eleyakima,
muana wa Melea, muana wa Mena, muana wa Matata, muana wa Natana, muana wa Davidi,
muana wa Yese, muana wa Obede, muana wa Boaza, muana wa Salamona, muana wa Nasona,
muana wa Aminadaba, muana wa Ani, muana wa Heselona, muana wa Pelese, muana wa Yuda,
muana wa Yakobo, muana wa Isaka, muana wa Abalahama, muana wa Tela, muana wa Nako,
muana wa Seluga, muana wa Leu, muana wa Pelege, muana wa Ebe, muana wa Sela,
muana wa Kanana, muana wa Apakasade, muana wa Seme, muana wa Noa, muana wa Lemeke,
muana wa Metusela, muana wa Enoke, muana wa Yelede, muana wa Mahalalele, muana wa Kanana,
muana wa Enosa, muana wa Sete, muana wa Adama, muana wa Kalaga.
Nu Yesu ezazizibue na Muuza Wasililila, asubizie kutuka Yadene, nu asondelezizibue na Muuza mu kalula,
alindikilue na Liabo, u Satana. Nu atingizie bindi makumi manazi ntalile, nu gasilile bindi bibio akule na nzala.
Nu Liabo, u Satana, amu­buide bune, Ndi uwe u Muana wa Kalaga, kakizia ikozi lilino libe kampampa.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Buasanzilue buno, muntu ntanalama na kampampa tugu.
Nu amubakamizie kuigulu, nu amulolesizie makota mansania ma kisi mu nkungu imozi,
Nu Liabo, u Satana, amubuide bune, Nakukase buangato bunsania nu lutanuno luamo: kubuno nageiduebo, nu ninakasa gunkutundabo.
Umpanga ndi wankumbamina binsania nti biabe biobe.
Nu Yesu amuakuide bune, Buasanzilue buno, Kumbamina Mukota Kalaga wobe, nu nti wamukitila wenyene.
Nu amusondelezizie ku Yelusalema, nu amubikile gantata ga mutondo wa numba za kuku­mbamina, nu amubuide bune, Ndi uwe u Muana wa Kalaga, iyise gansi tanga;
kubuno buasanzilue buno,
Akakizie migenzi zage zikulange;
nu,
Bakueke mu maboko mage,
Unavua kuikuka kugulu kuobe kuikozi.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Buasanzilue buno, Ntulindike Mukota Kalaga wobe.
Nu gasilile kumulindika, Liabo, u Satana, alekanukile nage mu nkungu zezo.
Nu Yesu asubizie mu magala ma Muuza Wasililila ku Galela; nu musagu wage wasambeidue ku ndenge insania za kuko.
Nu eigisizie mu numba ningi zabo za musanganano, nu aganuinue na bansania.
Nu abasile ku Nazaleta, kuko kuakuzizibue; nu anga bua­bezaga lukita luage, eingide mu numba za musanganano mu busi bua sabato, nu emanine nu asomine.
Nu bamukasile mukanda wa mulengania Yesaya nu gakanduide mukanda, amonine kiziki kiasanzilue bune,
Muuza Wasililila wa Mukota uli gantata gane,
Kubuno ambongezie muambo buno nisambale musagu musoga ku bazambi:
Nu Ansingile buno, nisambalile bakandua musagu wa bukandulua.
Nu biuku bimone,
Nu kukandula bakandua,
Nu kusambala muaka wa mponga za Mukota.
Nu alimbile mukanda, nu agusubanizizie ku mukambi, nu eikeide: nu bansania babezaga mu musanganano bamulolile.
Nu alingile kubabula bune, Lelo isanzo lilino liazindilila mu matuzi meinyu.
Bansania bamulongekeide nu bangamine ku malagi ma mponga matukile mu kanua kage: nu batendile bune, Ndi wono ta muana wa Yosefu?
Nu wono abatendile bune, Lebelebe muambule musumo wono, Munganga eiyonie: tungule buwakitaga mu Kapenuma bukite lingo gano mu kueinyu.
Nu atendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula buno, Takuli mulengania ukuanzua kuabo.
Tondo lebelebe nkumubula buno, Kuabezaga misigala mingi mu baIsalele mu bindi bia Eliya, mu nkungu zakandilue igulu miaka isatu nu miezi mutuba, nu kuabezaga munganda mu kisi kinsania;
nu Eliya ntasingilue ku umozi wa kubeli, tugu ku Selefata mu Sidona, ku wozo mukikulu wabezaga musigala.
Lingo kuabezaga beiya bibali beingi mu Isalele bindi bia mulengania Elisa; aba takuli umozi wa kubeli wengezibue, tugu Namana muntu wa Sulia.
Nu bansania mu numba za musanganano gabongule ku bubo bongilue;
nu bazanzukile, nu bamuimbizie mu muino, nu babakamine nage gantata ga muiduko wozo wabezaga wobakua ga muino, buno bamusindike mu mpembue.
Tondo Yesu atingile gabasamba nu endile.
Nu abasile ku Kapenuma; muino wa Galela. Nu abeigisizie busi bua sabato:
nu bangamine na megisia mage; kubuno idagi liage liabezaga na buangato.
Nu mu numba za musanganano muabezaga muntu umozi wabezaga na musumbu wa nsese, nu alalukile mueli neiyuki inene bune,
Kia! buni butuli nobe, Yesu muNazaleta? ndi wavule buno utubigie? nakumenya buno, uwe uli Wasililila wa Kalaga.
Nu Yesu amuzugide, nu atendile bune, Ikala kibibi, nu umutuke. Nu wozo musumbu gamugusizie munkatini muabo, amutukile, nu ntamukitile buampa.
Nu bansania bangamine nunse, nu batendeine bune, Idagi ikizi lilino? kubuno ekubakakizia na buangato nu magala, buno basumbu ba nsese babatuke.
Nu misagu zage zakukile ku ndenge insania za kuko.
Nu atukile mu numba za musanganano, nu eingide ku numba za Simona. Nu ninabiala wa Simona abezaga neisusila inene; nu bamusegile buno amonie.
Nu emanine buigi nage, nu azugide isusila; nu liamulekeide: nu kazanga kongo azanzukile nu abakitide.
Nu geidile busi, bamuvuilide na bansania babezaga na nsambo za nkita ningi; nu abikile maboko mage gantata ga muntu na muntu nu abonezie.
Nu basumbu beingi babatukile, balalukile nu batendile bune, Uwe uli Muana wa Kalaga. Nu abazugide buno tabatende, kubuno bamumenyine buno eli Klisto.
Nu gakeide busi, atukile nu endile ku kiziki kia kalula: nu musanganano wamulondile, nu babasile kuko kuabezaga, bamusu­bizie buno ntanenda.
Tondo ababuide bune, Buatunganana nisambale musagu musoga wa bukota bua Kalaga muingo mino: kubuno nasingilue.
Nu asambeide mu numba ningi za musanganano za mu Galela.
Gabeide musanganano wamutimbikania nu bonguililaga idagi lia Kalaga, nuwe abezaga emana buigi na kiziba kia Genesaleta,
nu amonine ku mato mabili, mabezaga ku mutili wa kiziba: tondo bazubi bakimine, nu basugulaga tukila tuabo.
Nu eingide mu buato bumozi buabezaga bua Simona, nu amutendile buno, ende buigi na ku mutili. Nu eikeide mu buato nu eigisizie misanga­nano.
Nu gasilile kutenda, atendile Simona bune, Enda geiziba nu muise tukila tueinyu nu muzube biena.
Nu Simona amua­kuide bune, Mukota tuakitile mulimo munene mu kindi kinsania, tondo tatuitile kena: tondo kuiyuki liobe nkuenda kuzuba lingo.
Nu gabakitile bubo, beitile biena bingi, nu tukila tuabo tuatikile;
nu balambizizie banyabo maboko babezaga mu bungo buato, buno bavue kubakasia. Nu bavule nu beizazizie mato mabili, nu mabe­zaga buigi na kukoka.
Nu gamonine Simona Petelo ku bubo, akomeine Yesu mazu, nu amubuide bune, Mukota, tuka kundi; nne nili muagi.
Kubuno bangamine nage, nu babo babezaga gamozi nage, ku kitondo kia biena bingi bibeitile;
nu Yakobo nu Yoana bana ba Zebedayo babezaga banyage na Simona, Nu Yesu atendile Simona bune, Ntunakua boba; kutukila kano kaluma wazube bantu.
Nu gababulutile mato mabo ku mutili, basigile binsania nu bamuyangile.
Nu beikeide mu muino umozi, bamueine ku muntu umozi muiya bibali: nu gamueine ku Yesu, aguide bukukumania, nu amusegile, nu atendile bune, Mukota, ndi watunda, unavuama kunengia,
Nu Yesu alambizie kuboko kuage, nu itubizie kueli, nu amubuide bune, Natunda; wenge. Nu kazanga kongo bibali biage biatukile.
Nu amukakizizie buno ntasambalile ungo muntu: tondo enda, nu widolesie ku sankoga, nu ukasane ku kuengibua kuobe, anga buakakizizie Mose, kuba bulongeki kubeli.
Tondo musagu wage wakukile ku biziki binsania; nu misanganano mingi zavule kumunguilila, nu konibua nsambo zabo.
Tondo endile kusega mu kalula.
Nu busi bumozi Yesu eigisizie baFalese nu ngatu za mulembe nu babo batukile ku mino za Galela, nu za Yudaya, nu wa Yelu­salema; nu magala ma Mukota mabezaga nage buno, onie.
Nu bavule beka muntu umozi ga mugu wabezaga na lusambo lua kugilimina: nu balondile gabamuingizizia buno bamubike lisa nage.
Nu tabamenyine gabamubika, kubuno bantu babezaga beingi, babakamine gantata ga mutondo, nu bamubasizie geitengu na mugu wage munkatini muabo lisa na Yesu.
Nu gamenyine bukatizio buabo, amubuide bune, Wamulume, misako za buagi buobe zasi­gililua.
Nu basanzi nu baFalese bakengede buno, Nazi wozo ukulinga Kalaga? Nazi unavuama kusigilila misako za buagi uteli Kalaga wenyene?
Tondo Yesu amenyine makengelo mabo, atendile bune, Kubuni mukukengela bubo mu mitima zeinyu?
Buni buatinga busoga, kutenda buno, Misako za buagi buobe zasigililua, aba kutenda buno, Zanzuka nu wende?
Tondo inyue mumenye buno, Muana wa muntu eli na buangato mu kisi kusigilila misako za buagi (abuide musambi wagiliminaga), nkuku­bula bune, Emanuka, nu weke mugu wobe, nu wende kuobe ku numba.
Nu kazanga kongo emanukile gabasamba, nu azanzuide wozo mugu wiyombekaga gago, nu endile kuage ku numba, aganuine Kalaga.
Nu bansania bangamine, nu baganuine Kalaga; nu bakule boba, nu batendile bune, Tuamona lelo ku butemonekaga kubo lingo.
Nu kusila kua bubo endile, nu amonine ku mundelelombe wamanagua Lewi, abezaga eikile ku mulimo wa kuligia idigo, nu amubuide bune, Nyange.
Nu asigile binsania, nu azanzukile nu amuyangile.
Nu Lewi akitile kisagulo kinene muage mu numba: nu bande­lelombe beingi nu bango bantu balile nabo.
Nu baFalese nu basanzi babo babezaga na miango na beigisibua bage, batendile bune, Kubuni mukulia nu kunua na bandelelombe nu bagi?
N u Yesu abatendile bune, Utakusamba ntaneiyanina musakizi; tondo babo bakusamba.
Nsiavule kumana beisanana tondo bagi buno beiyanie.
Nu bamubuide bune, Kubuni beigisibua ba Yoana nu beigisi­bua ba baFalese bakugila nu kusega; tondo bobe bekulia nu beku­nua.
Nu Yesu ababuide bune, Ndi munavuama kugizia beida ba musongi, nkungu zibeli na musongi?
Tondo bindi biavue gatikibue musongi ku babo, nu bagile mu bindi bibio.

Nu abeisile ungo musumo: Takuli muntu umozi unalanda kibe kia nsulu za mubalabala ku nsulu za mukungio; nu ndi kikio kibe kia nsulu za mubalabala kiatika, nu kibe kia mubalabala takina­lingimana na zezo za mukungio.
Nu takuli muntu ukongolaga maku meituba mu tutembe tukulu; bubo maku meituba nti mabu­gia tuto tutembe, nu mamo maku nti makubuka, nu tutembe tuto nti tuabiga.
Tondo buatunganana kubika maku meituba mu tutembe tuto.
Nu takuli muntu unanua maku ma masongo nu kutunda lingo maku meituba; kubuno anatenda buno, ma masongo meli masoga.
Mu busi bua sabato, atingile mu masoa ma mabela; nu beigisi­bua bage bakalile mabela, nu kumalia, kumapikisa mu maboko.
Tondo baFalese bamozi bababuide bune, Kubuni kumukukita butakulungana ku mulembe busi bua sabato?
Nu Yesu abakuide bune, Ndi tamuasomine buakitile Davidi, gabezaga akukua na nzala, we, nu bango babezaga nage;
eingide mu numba za Kalaga, nu atolile kampampa kako ka kalolesio, akatolile nu akakasile banyage, kako katakulungana ku mulembe kulibua na beteli basankoga.
Nu abatendile bune, Muana wa muntu eli mukota wa busi bua sabato.
Nu gabeide bungo busi bua sabato, eingide mu numba za musanganano nu eigisizie: nu kuabezaga muntu umozi woma kuboko kua seidume.
Nu basanzi nu baFalese bamulolile buno, ndi onie bubo busi bua sabato; buno embe banamusongela.
Tondo amenyine makengelo mabo; nu abuide wozo muntu wabezaga woma kuboko bune, Zanzuka, nu wemane munkatini muabo. Nu azanzukile nu emanine kima.
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Nkumubuzia buno ndi buakulungana ku mulembe kukita busoga, aba kukita bubi mu busi bua sabato? konia muntu, aba kumubigia?
Nu akakile bansania meiso, nu abuide wozo muntu bune, Lambia kuboko kuobe, nu akulambizie, nu kuabeide kugimagima anga kokungo.
Nubo bongilue nunse; batendeine buabo buabo buno, buni butukita Yesu.
Nu mu bindi bibio, endile kusega ku muiduko; akesizie ntende kindi kinsania ekusega Kalaga.
Nu gakeide busi, amanine beigisibua bage; nu asombueide ikumi nu babili gaba­samba, abenikile buno basingua:
Simona, einikilue izina buno, Petelo, nu muto wage Andele, nu Yakobo, nu Yoana, nu Filipo, nu Batolomayo,
nu Matayo, nu Toma, nu Yakobo muana wa Ala­fayo, nu Simona wamanagua Zelote,
nu Yudasa muana wa Yakobo, nu Yudasa Isakaliote, uwamugabuide;

nu gendile nabo, nu emanine nabo ga kiziki kia kibitabita, nu musanganano munene wa bantu bansania batukile ku Yudaya, nu ba ku Yelusa­lema, nu kuntungo za Tula nu Sidona, nu bavule kumunguilila, nu kuonibua ku nsambo zabo;
nu babo bakuaga na basumbu ba nsese bonezibue.
Nu musanganano unsania batundile kuitubia kueli; kubuno magala mabezaga meki mabasa mueli nu mabonezie bansania.
Nu alambulide beigisibua bage meiso, nu atendile bune, Mbogimbogi kumuli inyue bazambi; kubuno bukota bua Kalaga buli bueinyu.
Mbogimbogi kumuli inyue bakukuana nzala kano kaluma: kubuno muaseke.
Mbogimbogi kumuli inyue bakalingua nu kusombua na bantu, nu mukalekanuka na mikunda­mano zabo, nu bakamuzugila, nu tabakamumona neipiko, ku ka­bamba ka Muana wa muntu.
Bogazibogazi busi bubo, nu kutumatuma na mbogimbogi, kubuno lukalilo lueinyu lusoga luli lunene muigulu: kubuno beisibo basungizie lingo balengania.
Tondo kabebe kumuli inyue bagumi! kubuno muasila kumona mutali weinyu.
Kabebe kumuli, inyue bakuseka kano kaluma kubuno mukasulunana nu mukalila.
Kabebe kumuli inyue, kungua mukuganunua na bantu bansania! kubuno bubo ubuakitile beisibo ku balengania ba buza.
Tondo nkumubula inyue bekungua; Tundazi babo bamu­somba, nu kitazi busoga ku babo bekumusomba.
Kitazi babo bekumusuilila mponga, nu segelazi babo bekumulinga.
Nu wozo wakulibula lugizi kuitama mugalukizie lio lingo; nu wozo wakutikia ikoti lia gantata, nti wamukasa lia munda.
Kasa na muntu na muntu ukukusega; nu wozo ukukunyaga biobe ntumu­buziebio lingo.
Nu anga bubo bumukutunda bantu kumukitila, ububo nuinyue bumubakitila.
Nu ndi mukubatunda baku­mutunda mutali mukizi umunamona? Kubuno bagi bekutunda babo bekubatunda.
Nu ndi mukukita busoga ku babo baku­mukita busoga, mutali mukizi umunamona? Kubuno bagi beku­kita bubo nubo.
Nu ndi inyue muambia bango nu kulemanina kumona kena kubeli mutali mukizi umukumona? Kubuno bagi bakuambania buabo buabo, buno basubizibue lingo.

Tondo tundazi bamusomba, nu bakitilazi busoga nu kubambia, tamule­manine buno bamulige; nu mutali weinyu wabe munene, nu muabe bana ba Wozo Uli Muigulu; kubuno eli na kiombo ku bantu bata­kumusima nu babi.
Mube na kiombo, anga buli Soinyue na kiombo.
Tamusungie; buno munavua kusungibua; tamu­kande, buno munavua kukandua: sigililazi, nuinyue muasigililue:
kasanazi, nuinyue muakasue; kilindiko kiyala, kiatutubizibua, kiatengezibue, kiakubukile, bantu bamukase ga bibelo bienyu. Kuko kumukulindika ukuko kumukalindikua.
Nu abeisile musumo: Ndi kiuku kinavuama kusondelezia kingo kiuku? ndi bubeli babili tabanakoloka mu muzinga?
Muigisibua ntatinga musozi wage: tondo na muigisibua na muigisi­bua wazindilizia nti akaba anga musozi wage.
Buni bukulola kikolokolo kili mu liso lia munyobe, nu ntukumona ku lubabu luli mu liso liobe?

Buni bunavuama kutenda ku munyobe bune, Munane vua tanga nkutikie kikolokolo kili mu liso liobe, nu uwenyene ndi ntukumona ku lubabu luli mu liso liobe? Uwe muengelezi, tikia tanga lubabu luli mu liso liobe, nu nti ubunavuama kutikia kikolokolo kili mu liso lia munyobe.
Kubuno takuli muti muso­ga unakolama biguma bibi: aba muti mubi kukolama biguma bisoga.
Kubuno muti na muti ukumenyua ku biguma biago. Kubuno bantu tabanakola biguma bia figi ku muti wa mikele, aba kukola biguma bia mizigi ku mikele.
Muntu musoga muisuku lia mutima wage mukutuka bitondo bisoga; nu muntu mubi muisuku lia mutima wage mubi mukutuka bitondo bibi: kubuno buku­kengela mutima nti ubukutenda kanua.
Kubuni mukumana buno, Mukota, Mukota, nu tamukukita bunkutenda?
Na muntu na muntu ukuvua kundi, nu kungua ku malagi mane, nu kumanza, nkamulolesia bualingimana nabo:
alingimana na muntu ukubaka numba, ombile gansi nunse, nu abikile kibanza gantata ga luanda: nu muiyalo wavule, nu wazigubile na magala, tazatengiletengile; kubuno zobakilue busoga.

Tondo wozo ukungua, nu ntakita, nkamulingimania na muntu wobakile numba zage gantata ga bilongo geteli kibanza; nu muiyalo wazigubile na magala, nu kazanga kongo zaguide; nu kubiga kua numba zezo kuabeide kunene.
Nu gasilile kutenda bitondo binsania ku bantu, endile ku Kapenuma.
Nu mukambi umozi wa mukota wa bakoloboyo, abezaga musambi buigi na kukua, nu abezaga amutunda nunse.
Nu gongule ku musagu wa Yesu, asingile bakulu ba baYuda, kumumana buno avue konia wozo mukambi wage.
Nubo gababasile ku Yesu, bamubuzizie nunse, batendile bune, Buatananina kukitila wono bubo;
kubuno ekutunda kilongo kietu, nu atubakide numba za musanganano.
Nu Yesu endile nabo. Nu gabeide ese buigi na numba zage, wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo asingile beida bage kuage, amubuide bune, Mukota ntuneikutia; kubuno tabunatananina uwe kuingila mu numba zane;
bubo neimuene buno nsiatananina kukuvuila, tondo tenda tugu bukutunda, mu mukambi wane nti onibue.
Kubuno aba nunne nangatua, nu nangata bakoloboyo, nu ndi nabula umozi buno, Enda, nti enda; nu kungo buno, Vua nti avua; nu ku mukambi wane buno, Kita bubo, nti abukita.
Nu gongule Yesu ku bubo, angamine nage, nu atimbukide ku musanganano wamuyangaga, nu atendile bune, Aba ku balsalele nsimonaga lingo ku ungo uli na magala mu bukatizio anga wono.
Nu babo basingagua, basubizie ku numba, nu basangile wozo mukambi ona.
Nu endile ku muino umozi wamanagua Naina; nu beigisibua bage nu musanganano unsania bendile nage.
Nu gabeide ese buigi na kuisula lia muino, nu kuko kuabezaga kitumba, abezaga ngomo umozi za nina, nuwe abezaga musigala: nu bantu beingi mu wozo muino babezaga nage.
Nu gamumonine Mukota ko, amukuilide kiombo, nu etubizie kueli, nu amutendile bune, Ntuna­lila.
Nu asigeleide nu eitubizie ku sanduku: nu bamuekaga bemanine. Nu amutendile bune, Musikila nkukubula buno, Zanzuka.
Nu wozo wabezaga kitumba, azanzukile, nu alingile kutenda. Nu amusubizie ku nina.
Nu bansania bakule boba: nu baganuine Kalaga, batendile bune, Mulengania munene atu­basila: nu Kalaga alolile bantu bage.
Nu musagu wage wakukeine mu kisi kinsania kia Yudaya, nu ku ndenge insania.
Nu beigisibua ba Yoana bamusambalide bubo bunsania.
Nu Yoana amanine babili ku beigisibua bage nu abasingile ku Mukota Yesu, kumutenda buno, Ndi uwe u wozo wavue, aba ndi tukike ungo?
Nu gababasile kueli, batendile bune, Yoana Mubatizi atusinga kuguli kutenda buno, Ndi uwe u wozo ukuvua, aba ndi tukike ungo?
Mu nkungu zezo onezie nsambo za nkita na nkita nu atikizie basumbu babi; nu biuku bingi biamonine.

Nu abatendile bune, Endazi musambalile Yoana bumuamona kubo nu bumungua kubo; buno biuku bise biamona, nu bitunga bise biatabanga, beiya bibali bengibua, bimbula matuzi bise bi­ungua, bakuzi bayukibua, nu bazambi basambalilua musagu musoga.
Nu mbogimbogi ku wozo utakuina mutima nanne.
Nu babo basingagua na Yoana bendile, alingile kubula musanganano musagu wa Yoana, ababuide bune, Kikizi kimuendaga kulola ku kalula? lusolu lukutengatenga na lumpumpu?
Muendile kulola kikizi? muntu wavuala nsulu zabota? Unguili­lazi, bantu bavuala nsulu zabota, nu bakulamaga na mbogimbogi, beli bakota.
Tondo muendile kulola kikizi? Ndi mulengania? E, nkumubula buno, wozo watinga mulengania.
Wono uwa­sanzilue bune,
Unguililazi, nalinga kusinga mugenzi wane,
Ukalinga kukunga nzila zobe.
Nkumubula buno, Mu babo babutilue na bakikulu takuli umozi watinga Yoana: tondo wozo uli mukeke mu bukota bua Kalaga amutinga.
Nu bansania bongule ku bubo nu bandelelombe batendile bune, Kalaga eli eisanana, kubuno babatizizibue ku bubatizio bua Yoana.
Tondo baFalese nu ngatu za mulembe basombile luango lua Kalaga, nu tababatizizibue nage.
Tondo nkalingimania bantu ba kibuti kikino na kikizi?
Balingimana bana beikile kuisoko, nu bekubula; nu kutenda bune, Tuamu­idide mpengu nu tamuaminine; nu tuamulilide na kasina nu tamuigombile ga makuba.
Kubuno Yoana Mubatizi avule ntaliaga kampampa nu ntanuaga maku: nu mukutenda buno, eli na musumbu.
Muana wa muntu ekulia nu ekunua; nuinyue mukutenda buno, eli kiliagundu, nu munuzi, nu muida wa bande­lelombe nu bagi.
Nu menge makubingibua ku bana bage bansania.
Umozi ku baFalese amutundile buno, alie nage, nu eingide mu numba za wozo muFalese, nu alile nage.
Nu mukikulu umozi wa mu wozo muino, abezaga muagi; nu gamenyine buno esalia ku numba za muFalese, amuvuilide na kabongelo ka alaba­sata muko muabezaga bulago.
Nu emanine kumbusa kuage buigi na magulu mage, alilile, nu alingile kumogia ku magulu na bisozi biage, nu kumunyonyona na nzuili zage, nu kumuma ku magulu mage nu amubongezie bulago.

Gamonine wozo muFalese wamumanine kulia nage, atendile mu mutima wage buno, Songo muntu wono abezaga mulengania, songo anamenyine nazi mukikulu weitubia kueli nu eli na lukita lukizi, kubuno eli muagi.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Simona, nili na bumozi buakuku­bula. Nu atendile bune, Musozi tenda tugu.
Kuabezaga muntu umozi mukasani wa nsombi abezaga na nsombi na bantu babili: umozi abezaga na nsombi za falanga nkama itano nu ungo makumi matano.
Kubuno tababezaga na kena ka kuliga, abasigilide bubeli babili: nazi kubeli wamutundile bubi­bu?
Simona amuakuide bune, Nkukengela wozo wasigililua nunse. Yesu amubuide bune, Watenda buligo.

Nu agalukile kuabezaga mukikulu, nu atendile Simona bune, Ndi wamona ku mukikulu wono? Neingide mu numba zobe, nu ntuankasile mazi ma koga ku magulu: tondo wono anunizie ku magulu na bisozi, nu kumanyonyona na nzuili zage.
Ntuamumine: tondo wono naganeingilila lelo mu numba ntendekela kumuma ku ma­gulu.
Ntuambongezie muambo kuitoe: tondo wono ambonge­zie ku magulu na bulago.
Kubuno nkukubula buno, misako za buagi buage zasigililua kilo zinaba mingi; kubuno ekutunda nunse: tondo we wasigililua ku bukeke ekutunda bukeke.
Nu abuide mukikulu bune, Misako za buagi buobe zasigililua.
Nu babo baliaga nage batendeine bobenyene bune, Nazi wono ukusigilila misako za buagi?
Nu atendile wozo mukikulu bune, Buka­tizio buobe buakonia: enda na bubobelelo.
Nu kusila kua bubo, wono endile mu mino minene nu mikeke, kusambala nu kukukia musagu musoga wa bukota bua Kalaga, nu babo ikumi na babili babezaga nage,
nu bakikulu bamozi bonezibue basumbu babi nu nsambo: Malia wamanagua Magadala, watikizibue basumbu mutuba kamo,
nu Yoali muki­kulu wa Kuza, mulangi wa bikulo bia Helode, nu Susana, nu bango beingi bamukitilaga na bikulo biabo.
Nu musanganano munene wamukundamanine, nu bantu ba muino na muino bamuvuilide, nu abeisile musumo buno:
Mu­yiki wa mbuto endile kuyika mbuto zage: nu gaziyikile; imozi zakolokile mu ntungo mua nzila; nu zanyantilue na magulu, nu tuzoni tua kuigulu tuazilile.
Ingo zakolokile gantata ga luanda; nu zalingile kuasa, nu zomine, kubuno tagabezaga gatontelua.
Nuingo zakolokile mu mikele; nu mikele zasile nazo kiandindi, nu zazilimbanizie.
Nuingo zakolokile ga bisogo bisoga, nu gaza­kulile, nu zakolamine biguma mambizi lukama. Nu gasilile ku­tenda bubuno, alalukile neiyuki inene buno, Wozo uli na matuzi makunguilila nti unguilila.
Nu beigisibua bage bamubuzizie buisulilua bua wozo musumo.
Nu abakuide bune, Inyue umuakasilue menge makumenya tukungu tua bukota bua Kalaga: tondo ku bango mu misumo; buno bakumona tabamone, nu bakungua tabamenyinine.
Bubuno ubuisulilua bua wono musumo: Mbuto zili idagi lia Kalaga.
Nu babo beli mu ntungo mua nzila ubabo bekungua; nu Liabo, u Satana, nti avua kutikia lilio idagi mu mitima zabo buno banavua kukatizia nu konibua.
Nu babo beli gantata ga luanda, ubabo bekungua, bekusekela lilio idagi na mbogimbogi; nu tabeli na mizi, bakukatizia ku nkungu nkeke, nu bekukindua ku nkungu za malindiko.
Nuzo zakolokile mu mikele, ubabo bongule ku lilio idagi, nu bekuenda nu bababazibua na tubebe nu bugumi nu mbogimbogi za kalamo kakano, nu tabakukolama biguma biazindi­lila.
Tondo zezo zakolokile mu bisogo bisoga, zili anga bantu beli na mitima za bulili nu misoga, nu gabekungua kuidagi lilino, nti balikokomezia, nu bekukolama na komanizia.
Nu takuli muntu, gunagulumizia kasuku, nu kukakukila na kiuki, aba kukabisa kunsi kua mugu; tondo akukabika gantata ga meza, bubo bansania bekuingila nti bamone ku kiengi kiako.
Kubuno takuli kena kabisilue, katakabisulua; nu takuli katendagua ku kakungu, katakongubuako.
Idangazi na bumukunguako: kubuno uli na kena, akakasua; nu uteli na kena, akatikibua kako kakukengela buno eli nako.
Nina nu bato bage bamuvuilide, tababasile buigi na kueli kubuno kuabezaga musanganano munene.
Nu asambalidue na bantu buno, Nyoko nu bato bobe bemana kumbuga, bekutunda kukumonako.
Tondo abatendile bune, Mane nu bato bane ubabano bekungua kuidagi lia Kalaga, nu kulikita.
Nu eingide mu buato na beigisibua bage: nu abatendile bune, Tusokazi ku lisilia lia kiziba; nu bendile,
tondo gabendaga eiyombekile ku tulo: nu kisoa kinene kiavule mu kiziba; nu buato buiyeide na mazi, nu babezaga na kabebe.
Nu bamuendeide, nu bamuyukizie, batendile bune, Mukota, Mukota, tuakua. Nu ayukile, nu azugide kisoa nu bimpumi bia mazi; nu biasilile, nu kuolile nunse.
Nu ababuzizie buno, Bukatizio bueinyu buli kuni? Nu bakule boba, nu bangamine, batendeine buabo buabo bune, Wono eli nazi, aba kisoa nu mazi nti bikumuanza?
Nu babasile ku kisi kia baGelasa, kiabezaga buigi na Galela.
Nu gatukile mu buato, akulumeine na muntu umozi wa wozo muino nu abezaga na basumbu; nu bindi bingi ntavualaga nsulu, aba ntikalaga lingo mu numba, umpanga ku nsinda.
Nu gamonine ku Yesu, alalukile bubibu, nu aguide ku magulu mage, nu atendile neiyuki inene bune, Nili buni nobe, Yesu, Muana wa Kalaga Uli Muigulu? Nkukulumbizia buno, ntumbabazie.
Kubuno akakizizie wozo musumbu atuke mu wozo muntu. Kubuno amu­babazagia mambizi meingi; nu akandagua na mizigi za biuma nu azisesaga nu atinaga mu kalula mu magala ma wozo musumbu.
Nu Yesu amubuzizie bune, Izina liobe? nu amutendile bune, Legioni; kubuno ingidue na basumbu beingi.
Nu bamusegile buno ntabakakizie buno bende mu muzinga.
Nu kuko kua­bezaga muimba muingi wa ngulube waliaga ku muiduko: nu bamusegile buno abakakizie beingile mu wozo muimba. Nu abakasile buangato.
Nu babo basumbu batukile mu muntu wozo, nu beingide mu muimba wa ngulube: nu wozo muimba wa ngulube wakumbile mu mpembue, nu wizisile mu kiziba, nu zakule.
Nu gamueine balangi bazo ku bubo, batinine, nu basambeide musagu wozo ku muino nu mu masoa.
Nu bendile kumona ku buabeide: nu bendeide Yesu, nu bamonine ku wozo muntu, wa­tukaga basumbu, eikala ku magulu ma Yesu, avuala nsulu nu eli na menge; nu bakule boba.
Nu babo bamonaga konibagua ba­basambalide lukita lonizibue wozo wabezaga na basumbu.
Nu bantu bansania ba kisi kia Gelasa nu ba buigi nakio bamubuide bune, Tuka ku kisi kietu; kubuno bakule boba nunse; nu eingide mu buato, nu asubizie.
Tondo wozo muntu watukaga basumbu amusegile buno ende nage: tondo amulagile bune,
Subia kuobe ku numba, nu usambale bubo buakukitila Kalaga. Nu endile, kusambala bubo bunsania mu muino unsania buamukitide Yesu.
Nu gasubizie Yesu, musanganano wamusekeide na mbo­gimbogi; kubuno bansania bamulindilaga.
Nu muntu umozi izina liage Yailo, amuvuilide, nu we abezaga muangati wa numba za musanganano: aguide ku magulu ma Yesu, nu amusegile buno, ingile muage mu numba;
kubuno muana wage wa mukazi wangomo, abezaga musambi, abezaga ese muana wa miaka ikumi nu ibili, nu abezaga ese buigi na kukua. Tondo gabezaga asenda musanganano wamutimbikanizie.
Nu mukikulu umozi, abezaga na lusambo lua mikila miaka ikumi nu ibili, nu agabuide bikulo biage binsania ku basakizi, nu takuli umozi wamonezie,
avule kumbusa kuage, nu eitubizie ku mupimbo wa nsulu zage: nu kazanga kongo zezo mikila zasilile.
Nu Yesu atendile bune, Nazi witubia kundi? Nu bansania batunine, tondo Petelo nu babo babezaga gamozi nage batendile bune, Mukota, musanganano ugukukusindikasindika.
Tondo Yesu atendile bune, Kuli umozi witubia kundi; kubuno nungua magala mankoka kumo.
Nu gamenyine wozo mukikulu buno ntabisama, avule ekuvua agilimina, nu aguide lisa nage nu amusa­mbalide bubo bunsania buitubizagia kueli nu ku bantu bansania nu lukita lonibua kano kazanga.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Mukinga wane, bukatizio buobe buakuonia; enda na bubobelelo.
Gabezaga eki atenda, muntu umozi avule atukaga ku numba za muangati wa numba za musanganano, atendile bune, Mukinga wobe alekana; ntunakutia lingo Musozi.
Tondo gongule Yesu ku bubuno, amuakuide bune, Ntunakua boba: katizia tugu, nu onibue.
Nu geingide mu numba, ntazigile ungo muntu eingila nage, tugu Petelo, nu Yoana, nu Yakobo, nuisi wa wozo muana nu nina.
Nu bantu bansania balilaga nsanda nene: tondo Yesu atendile bune, Tamunalila; wono muana ntalekana, tondo eiyo­mbeka tugu.
Nu bamusekile nunse, kubuno bamenyine buno alekana.
Tondo we, amukatile geikoko, nu alalukile neiyuki inene bune, Mukinga, zanzuka.
Nu apasizie lingo, nu kazanga kongo azanzukile, nu akakizizie buno, bamukase idia.
Nu isi nu nina bangamine nunse; tondo abakakizizie buno tabasambalile muntu wampa bubo buakitua.
Nu amanine babo ikumi na babili, nu abakasile magala nu buangato ku basumbu bansania, nu konia nsambo.
Nu abasingile buno basambale musagu wa bukota bua Kalaga, nu konia basambi.
Nu abatendile bune, Tamuende na kena mu nzila, musumbo, aba nsago, aba tumpampa, aba falanga; nu ta­mueke makoti mabili.
Nu numba insania zimuingilemo, ikalazi muzo nu mumo nti umumuatukile.
Nu ndi bantu tabamusekela nkungu zimuatuke mu wozo muino, nti muatitula mukungu wa ku magulu meinyu kuba bulongeki kubeli.
Nu bendile, nu bati­mbile mu mino mikeke, kusambala musagu musoga, nu konia basambi kunsania.
Nu gongule mukota Helode ku zezo misagu za bubo bunsania buakitagua angamine; kubuno bamozi batendile buno, Yoana ayuka ku bakuzi;
nu bango bamozi buno, Eliya uwabasa; nu bamozi buno, umozi tugu ku babo balengania ba wakalazi uwa­yuka.
Nu Helode atendile bune, Nasesile Yoana itoe; tondo nazi wono, unkungua ku misagu zage? alondile buno amumoneko.
Nu gasubizie basingua, bamutendile bunsania bubakitaga. Nu endile nabo bobenyene ku muino wa Betesaida.
Nu ga­menyinine bubo, musanganano wamuyangile: nu abasekeide, nu abasambalide musagu wa bukota bua Kalaga, onezie babo beyaninaga konibua.

Nu galingile kuida busi; beigisibua bage ikumi na babili bamuvulide, nu bamutendile bune, Lagana na musangana­no buno bende mu mino mikeke nu mu biziki bili buigi, buno embe banamona gabeiyombeka nu kubalia; kubuno tuli mu kalula.
Tondo abatendile bune, Bakasazi kuidia. Nu batendile bune, Tuli tugu na tumpampa tutano nu biena bibili; kasi tuende kuba­kunzila idia.
Kuabezaga bamulume bakuka tununu tutano. Nu atendile beigisibua bage bune, Beikaziazi bibombo bibombo na kibombo makumi matano matano.
Nu bakitile bubo, nu babeikazizie bansania.
Nu atolile tuto tumpampa tutano nu bibio biena bibili, nu agalamine kuigulu, nu abisegeide, nu abi­bunguide; nu akasile beigisibua buno bakase musanganano.
Nu bansania balile, nu bembukile: nu basongezie nzi zasigeide ikumi nu ibili za zezo mbobu.
Nu gasegaga wenyene, nu beigisibua bage babezaga nage, ababuzizie bune, Musanganano ukumana buno nili nazi?
Nu batendile bune, Yoana Mubatizi: tondo bango buno Eliya; nu bango buno, umozi wa ku balengania ba wakalazi u wayuka.
Nu ababuzizie bune, Tondo mukutenda buno nili nazi? Nu Petelo amutendile bune, Uwe u Klisto wa Kalaga.
Tondo we abakizizie buno, tabasambalile muntu wampa bubuno;
atendile bune, Buatunganana Muana wa muntu ababazibue bubibu, nu kusombua na bakulu nu basankoga banene, nu basanzi, nu kuitua, nu kusila kua bindi bisatu ayukibue.
Nu atendile bansania bune, Ndi muntu ekutunda kunyanga, eitune wenyene, nu eke muti wage wa magu busi na busi, nu anyange.
Kubuno ndi muntu ekutunda konia kalamo kage nti akakazimizia, tondo unsania wazimizia kalamo kage ku kabamba kane, nti akakonia.
Kubu­no muntu eli na mutali mukizi, ndi angata kisi kinsania, nu kuizi­mizia wenyene aba kuibigia?
Kubuno unsania ukankuaga nsoni nu ukakuaga nsoni ku malagi mane, Muana wa muntu nti akamukua nsoni gakavua mu lutanuno luage, nu luelsi, nu lua migenzi zasililila.
Tondo namubula lebelebe bune, Bamozi bemana gano tabakakua; aba nu gabakamona ku bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu gatingile buigi na bindi kinana kusila kua bubo, endile na Petelo, nu Yoana, nu Yakobo, nu abakamine ku muiduko ku­sega.
Nu gabeide esasega kilungi kiage kiagalukizibue, nu nsulu zage zabeide zenga nunse, nu zakelimine.
Nu bamueine ku bantu babili basambalaga nage, babezaga Mose nu Eliya;
bamonekile mu lutanuno, nu batendile misagu za kukua kuage bulukazindilila mu Yelusalema.
Nu Petelo nu banyage baze­nzeide na tulo: tondo gabayukile, bamonine ku lutanuno luage, nu babo bantu babili bemana nage.
Nu gabalekanukile nage, Petelo atendile ku Yesu bune, Mukota, buli busoga tuikale gano; nu tobakazi nusu isatu; lumozi luobe, nu lumozi lua Mose, nu lumozi lua Eliya, nuwe ntamenyinine buatendaga.
Nu gate­ndile bubuno, kuabeide kimpa, nu kiabakukide: nu bakule boba gabeingide mu kimpa.
Nu iyuki liatukile mu kimpa, liatendile bune, Wono eli Muana wane, Musombolua wane: munguililazi.
Nu iyuki lilino galiasilile, Yesu amonekileko wenyene. Nubo bekeide kibibi, nu tabasambalide muntu wampa mu bitondo bibio bubamonine kubio.
Nu gakeide busi bagelile ku muiduko, nu musanganano munene wamukundamanine.
Nu muntu umozi mu musanga­nano alalukile neiyuki inene bune, Musozi, nkukusega buno ulole muana wane wamulume; kubuno eli ngomo zane:
kubuno, akatua na musumbu, nuwe mambizi meingi ekulilaga; nu ekumu­gusagia, nu ekubasaga iyulo, nu ntekumumenkelaga, nu ekumu­babazia bubibu.
Nu nasegile beigisibua bobe buno bamutikie: nu tabavuamine.
Nu Yesu atendile bune, Inyue kibuti kikio kia busombi, nu kiteli na bukatizio, ndi nkeikalaga neinyu kankanka? Gani gankakutilua? Vua na muana wobe wamulume.
Nu gavule, musumbu amugusizie, nu amubulubutizie. Tondo Yesu azugide musumbu wa nsese, nu onezie wozo muana wamulume nu amusubizie kuisi.
Nu bansania bangamine na magala ma Kalaga. Tondo bansania gabangamine ku bunsania buakitile, atendile beigisibua bage bune,
Bikazi malagi mamo mu matuzi meinyu: kubuno Muana wa muntu agabulue ku maboko ma bantu.
Tondo tabamenyinine buatendaga nu buabisilue kubeli, buno tababume­nyinine; nu bakule boba kumubuzia buisulilua bua bubo buate­ndaga.
Nu balingile kuakanania buabo buabo buno, nazi ukaba munene kubeli.
Tondo Yesu gamenyinine makengelo mabo, atolile muana muto, nu amubikile buigi nage,
nu abatendile bune, Unsania ukasekela muana wono muizina liane, nti ansekela: nu unsania wansekela, nti asekela wozo wansingile: kubuno wozo uli mukeke kumuli, akaba munene.
Nu Yoana atendile bune, Mukota, tuamonine muntu akutikia basumbu kuizina liobe; nu tuamunanizie, kubuno ntakutuyanga.
Tondo Yesu abatendile bune, Tamumunanie; kubuno wozo utakumutuna nti eli bumozi neinyu.
Nu gabeide bindi biage biakusekelua muigulu bise buigi na kukuka, alimbanizie mutima kuenda ku Yelusalema,
nu alingile kusinga migenzi luabusio luage: nu bendile, nu beingide mu muino wa baSamalia, kumulongekela kiziki.
Nubo tabamusekeide, kubuno alimbanizie mutima kuenda ku Yelusalema.
Nu gamueine beigisibua bage Yakobo nu Yoana ku bubo, batendile bune, Mukota, ndi ukutunda tukakizie keiya katuke kuigulu nu kugisia bansania anga buakitile Eliya?
Tondo agalukile, aba­zugide; atendile bune, Buni buli lukita lua mitima zimuli nazo?
Kubuno Muana wa muntu ntavule kuzimizia tulamo tua bantu tondo kutonia. Nu bendile ku ungo muino.
Nu gabendaga mu nzila, muntu umozi amutendile bune, Nakuyange kunsania kuwendage.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Mikala zili na matengu, nu tuzoni tua mumpelela tuli na bizumba; tondo Muana wa muntu nteli na kiziki kiakukukika itoe.
Nu atendile ungo bune, Nyange. Tondo atendile bune, Mukota, nkase buangato nende kuisa tatane.
Nu amutendile bune, Siga bakuzi beisane buabo buabo; tondo uwe enda usambale musagu wa bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu ungo amutendile bune, Mukota, nakuyange; tondo mpe tanga buangato nende kulaga bantu beli ku numba zane.
Tondo Yesu amutendile bune, Takuli muntu ukubika maboko mage kukulima, nu kulola lumbusa­mbusa, watananina na bukota bua Kalaga.
Kusila kua bubo, Mukota abikile makumi mutuba kamo, nu alingile kusinga babili babili luabusio luage ku muino na muino nu ku kiziki na kiziki, kuakengelaga kuenda wenyene.
Nu abatendile bune, Matubulo meli meingi, tondo bakambi tabeli beingi; segazi Mukota wa matubulo, buno asinge bakambi mu matubulo mage.
Endazi; namusinga anga mikoko munkatini mua mboa za mu lubanda.
Tamueke nsago, aba falanga, aba bisalapata; aba tamusekele muntu mu nzila.
Nu numba insania zimuingilage muzo, tendazi tanga bune, Bubobelelo bube mu numba zeno.
Nu ndi muli muana wa bubobelelo, nti bubo­belelo bueinyu bube kueli; tondo ndi tamuli, nti buasubie kumuli lingo.
Nu ikalazi mu numba zili bubo, liazi nu nuazi bibamu­kasa: kubuno mukambi atananina kuligua lukalilo luage. Tamu­tuke mu zezo numba nu kuenda kuingo.
Nu muino na muino gumuabasage mugo, ndi bamusekela, liazi kuidia libamukase:
nu oniazi basambi beli mumo, nu batendazi bune, Bukota bua Kalaga buse buigi.
Tondo muino na muino umuingilage mugo, nubo tabamusekela mumo, nuinyue gamuatinge mu nzila zago tendazi bune,
Mukungu wa wozo muino weinyu, wabezaga ku magulu meitu, tuagutitula gantata geinyu: tondo menyazi buno bukota bua Kalaga buse buigi.
Nkumubula bune, Lusungio lua wozo muino lukatinga lua Sodomo mu busi bubo.
Kabebe ku Kolazina! kabebe ku Betesaida! songo makitilo manene makitilue kumuli, songo umakitilue ku Tula nu Sidona, songo beyanizie kalazi, banekeide mu nsulu za nsago nu mu luito.
Tondo lusungio lua Tula nu Sidona lukaba neibineibi, ku busi bua lusungio kutinga lusungio lueinyu.
Nu uwe Kapenuma, ndi ukabakamibua aba kuigulu? ukakegibua ku Kiziki kia Bakuzi.
Wamungua nti anungua, nu wamusomba nti ansomba; nuwe wansomba nti asomba wozo wansingile.
Nu babo makumi mutuba kamo basubizie na mbogimbogi nunse, nu batendile bune, Mukota, basumbu batuanzile kuizina liobe.
Nu abatendile bune, Namonine ku Satana anga nkuba akoloka kutuka kuigulu.
Unguililazi, namukasa buangato bua kunyanta nzoka nu nkutu, nu kuangata muiti: nu takuli kampa kakamuita nunse.
Tondo tamubogeboge kubuno basumbu bakumuanza; tondo bogazibogazi buno, meina meinyu masanzua muigulu.

Mu nkungu zezo abogilebogile mu Muuza Wasililila, nu ate­ndile bune, Nkukusima, Tatane, Mukota wa muigulu nu wa kisi, kubuno wabisile bubuno ku beli na menge nu beli na bumenyinino, nu wabulolesizie ku bana; Tatane; kubuno bubo ubuakutanani­zizie.
Nakasilue binsania na Tatane; nu takuli muntu wizi Muana, tugu Isi; nu takuli muntu wizi Isi, tugu Muana, nu unsania Muana ekutunda kumulolesia,
Nu agalukile ku beigisibua bage nu abatendile ku lumbisombiso bune, Mbogimbogi ku meiso mamo mamona ku bumukumona kubo:
Kubuno nkumubula bune, Balengania beingi nu bakota batundaga kumona ku bumu­kumona kubo, nu tababumueineko; nu kunguilila ku bumuku­nguilila kubo, nu tababunguleko.
Nu ngatu za mulembe azanzukile buno, amulindike, atendile bune, Musozi, buni bunikita nipiene kalamo katanakuzinda?
