Nu amubuide bune, Mu mulembe muasanzilue buni? ukusoma kikizi?
Nu amutendile bune, Tunda Mukota Kalaga wobe na mutima wobe unsania, nu mu kalamo kobe kansania, nu na magala mobe mansania, nu mu menge mobe mansania; nu tunda munyobe anga buwitunda uwenyene.
Nu amutendile bune, Wakula busoga; kita bubuno nu walame.
Tondo we atundaga kuibingia nu atendile Yesu bune, Banazi banane?
Yesu akuide bune, Muntu umozi atukaga ku Yelusalema endaga ku Yeliko; akatilue na banyagi, nu bamutikizie nsulu, nu bamususuide, nu bamusigile ku kalengue.
Nu gabasile sankoga umozi agelaga mu zezo nzila, nu gamumueineko atingilide.
Nu muLewi, nuwe gabasilego amumueineko nu atingilide lingo.
Tondo, mu Samalia umozi endaga, abasile gago gabezaga wozo; nu gamumueineko amukuilide kiombo,
nu asigeleide buigi nage, nu akandile biulu biage, abisikile na makiti nu maku; nu amubaka­mizie ga nyama zage, nu amuekile ku numba za bageni, nu amu­kungile.
Nu gakeide busi endile nu asigide wozo nyene numba falanga ikumi neitano,
Ukukengela buno, nazi gasamba babano basatu, wabezaga muida wa wono wakatilue na banyagi?
Nu atendile bune, Wono wamukuilide kiombo. Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Enda, nu ukite bubo.
Nu gabezaga esenda, abasile mu muino umozi: nu mukikulu umozi izina liage Malata amusekeide mu numba zage.
Nu abezaga na muto wage wamanagua Malia, ikeide buigi na magulu ma Yesu, nu onguiliaga buatendaga.
Tondo Malata azanga­gazangaga na mulimo muingi; nu amuvuilide nu atendile bune, Mukota, ndi ntukumona tugu buno muto wane ansiga nkukita mulimo nnenyene? Mubule buno ankasie.
Tondo amutendile bune, Malata, Malata, ukulemanina nu ukuzangazanga na bitondo bingi;
tondo kimozi tugu kikutundua: nu Malia asombola kikio kisoga, nu kiatakatikibua.
Nu gabeide enda kusega ku kingo kiziki, nu gasilile, umozi wa ku beigisibua bage, amutendile bune, Mukota, tuigisie kusega, anga buigisizie Yoana eigisia beigisibua bage.
Nu ababuide bune, Kungua muse muasega, tendazi buno, Tateisue, izina liobe liganunue. Bukota buobe buvue.
Tukase idia lietu busi na busi.
Tusigilile misako za buagi bueitu; kubuno isue tuku­sigilila muntu unsania misako za buagi buage. Nu ntutuenzie ku malindiko, tondo tonie ku wozo mubi.
Nu abatendile bune, Nazi gamusamba uli na muida, nu kumu­endela mu kindi, nu kumubula bune, Muida, nkase nsombi za tumpampa tusatu;
kubuno muida wane amvuila ekutuka ku lugendo, nu nsili na kena kalie;
nu wozo wabezaga mu numba anatenda bune, Ntunankutia: nigala luibi kalazi; nu neiyombeka na bana bane; nsikuvuama kuyuka nu kukukasa?
Nkumubula buno, ntayukile buno akase muida wage, tondo kubuno ntalekeide kumusega ayukile nu amukasile anga buiyaninaga.
Nu nkumu­bula buno, Segazi, nu nti muakasue; londazi, nu nti muamone; kokomonazi, nu nti muigulilue.
Kubuno unsania ukusega, nti akasue; nuwe ukulonda nti amone; nuwe ukukokomona, nti igulilue.
Kubuno nazi gamusamba uli neisi nu gakumusega muana wage kampampa, ndi anamukasa ikozi? aba ndi amusega biena, ndi nti anamukasa nzoka?
Aba ndi akumusega iyungu, ndi anamukasa nkutu?
Kubuno ndi inyue bantu babi muizi kukasa bana beinyu nkaso nsoga, embe nu Soinyue lino uli muigulu ndi ntanakasa Muuza Wasililila ku babo bakumusega?
Nu abezaga akutikia musumbu wa kaluma. Nu gatukile wozo musumbu, wakaluma atendile; nu musanganano wangamine.
Tondo bamozi ku beli batendile bune, Akutikia basumbu ku magala ma Balezebula mukota wa basumbu.
Nu bango bamulindikile buno, balondaga kalolesio kakutuka kuigulu.
Nuwe, amenyine makengelo mabo, abatendile bune, Na bukota na bukota buidekanukia bubuenyene nti buabigibua; nu numba zide­kanukia nti zagoe.
Nu ndi Satana eidekanukia wewenyene, buni bunemana bukota buage? kubuno mukutenda buno, nkutikia basumbu mu magala ma Belezebula.
Nu ndi nkutikia basumbu ku magala ma Belezebula, bana beinyu batikie babo ku magala ma nazi? kubuno bobenyene babe ngatu zeinyu.
Tondo ndi nkutikia basumbu na munue wa Kalaga, kasi bukota bua Kalaga buamuvuila.
Tondo mubibu ndi ekulanga numba zage, biage binsania nti bili busoga;
tondo ndi ungo wamutinga avua, nu ndi amukinda, nti amunyaga ngabo insania zakulemanina nuzo, nu bikulo biage nti abibegania.
Ndi muntu nteli nanne bumozi, nti ekuntuna; nu wozo utakukundamania nanne, nti ekubalangania.
Gatukile musumbu wa nsese mu muntu, endile ku kiziki kitabezaga mazi, nu alondaga gomunua; ntagamonine lingo we atendile bune, Nasubie mu numba zane zinatukaga muzo.
Nu gavule, amonine numba zayagilua nu zakungua.
Lingo akavua na bango basumbu mutuba kamo bamutinga bubi; nu bengide mu zezo numba nu beikeide: nu muntu wozo lukita luage luzinda nti luaba lubi kutinga lutangi.
Nuwe gasilile kutenda bubo, mukikulu umozi alalukile mu musanganano neiyuki inene, atendile bune, Mbogimbogi ku nda zakubutile, nu mabele makumomezie.
Tondo we atendile bune, Mbogimbogi nunse ku babo bekungua kuidagi lia Kalaga nu kulikokomezia.
Nu gabede musanganano wakundamana alingile kutenda nabo bune, Kibuti kikino kili kibuti kibi: kikulonda kalolesio; nu takikaka­sua kalolesio, tugu kalolesio ka Yona.
Kubuno anga buabezaga kalolesio ka Yona ku baNinewe, ububo bukaba Muana wa muntu ku kibuti kikino.
Mukikulu mukota wa kunsi akemanuka mu busi bua lusungio na bantu ba kikino kibuti, nu akabasungia: kubuno avule kutuka kunsi kua kisi kungua ku menge ma Solomo; nu gane geli munene watinga Solomo.
Nu bantu baNinewe bakeima­nuka mu busi bua lusungio na kikino kibuti, nu bakakisungia: kubuno beiyanizie mu kusambala kua Yona, nu gano geli munene watinga Yona.
Takuli muntu, gunagulumizia kasuku, nu kukabisa ku kiziki kunsi kua numba aba kunsi kua luzi, tondo busoga kukabika gantata ga meza, buno bansania bakuingilamo bamone ku kiengi kiako.
Kasuku ka mubili keli liso; tondo ndi liso liobe lili isoga nti mubili unsania uli na kiengi; tondo ndi lili ibi, mubili wobe unsania nti uli na kapilo,
Idange buno kiengi kili muguli kinavua kuba kapilo.
Umpanga ndi kiengi kiakuka mu mubili wobe unsania, nu ndi ntuli na gango geli kapilo, mubili wobe unsania nti wabe na kiengi, anga bubo bukusanaga kasuku na kiengi kiako.
Nu gatendaga muFalese umozi amumanine buno alie nage: nu eingide, nu eikeide ga meza;
Nu wozo muFalese gamuene ku bubo, angamine kubuno ntalingile koga gabezaga ntelia.
Nu Mukota amutendile bune, Inyue baFalese mukusuga gantata kituma nu lupepe, tondo munda mueinyu muli nsese nu mibi.
Inyue bikongolo, ndi ta wozo wakitile bia gantata uwozo wakitile bia munda lingo?
Tondo kasazi nkaso ku bibio bia munda; nu bubo binsania biamusuagile.
Tondo kabebe kumuli, inuye baFalese; mukukasana kindi kieikumi kia nsiogo nu kinzani, nu binsania, nu mukusiga buisanana nu lutundo lua Kalaga; tondo zezo uzatananina kukitua nu zezo ingo tamuzisige.
Kabebe kumuli baFalese! kubuno mukue­lama kuikala ga bisumbi bitangi mu numba za musanganano, nu kusekelua ku masoko.
Kabebe kumuli baFalese! kubuno mualingimana na nsinda zitakumonekako, nu bantu bakutinga gantata gazo nu tabakuzimenya.
Nu ngatu imozi za mulembe amutendile bune, Musozi, kutenda bubo kuli kutulinga.
Nu atendile bune, Kabebe kumuli inyue ngatu za mulembe! kubuno mukuekia bantu mizigo mizitu zibatanavuama kueka, tondo tamu­kuzisigelezia na minue zeinyu.
Kabebe kumuli, kubuno mukobaka nsinda za balengania, nu basoinyue ubabeitile.
Nu mukulongeka nu mukuitabizia mulimo wa basoinyue: kubuno beitile balengania, nuinyue mukubobakila nsinda.
Nu bubuno ubuatendile menge ma Kalaga buno, Nkabasingila balengania nu basingua; nu bamozi bakabeita nu kubababazia;
buno ku kibuti kikino nkasuba mikila za balengania, zabasile kutukila ku kuli­nga kua kisi;
kutukila ku mikila za Abele aba ku Zakalia wozo weitilue gasamba kayulo nu numba zasuagibua: nkumubula bune, Zikasubua mu kibuti kikino.
Kabebe kumuli, ngatu za mulembe! kubuno mukutikia mutandulua wa bumenyinio: inyue tamuingide, nu muazugide babo batundaga kuingila.
Nu gatukile gago, basanzi nu baFalese balingile kumutekula bubibu, nu kumusuna buno atende bitondo bingi;
bamulindi­laga buno, embe banamukandika bitondo.
Nkungu zezo gakundamene musanganano tununu na tununu nu alingile kutenda na beigisibua bage bune, Idangazi na mugago wa baFalese, ubuengelezi.
Tondo takuli kimozi kiakukidue, kitakukulua; nu takuli kimozi kiabisilue, kita­kabisulua.
Umpanga kio kinsania kimuatendaga mu kapilo kikatendua mu kiengi, nu binsania biatendagua mu kutuzi mu numba bikasambalua gantata ga mutondo wa numba.
Nu nkumutenda inyue beida bane, Tamukue babo bakuita mubili boba, nu kusila kua bubo tabanavuama kukita bungo.
Tondo nku­mubula wozo umunakua boba: Kuazi wozo boba, ukuita muntu nu kumuisa mu kiziba kia keiya; wozo nti umuakua boba.
Tuzoni tutano tatunakunzua ku sengi ibili? nu aba kamozi takakubililua na Kalaga.
Tondo aba nzuili za matoe meinyu zaganzilue. Ta­munakua boba: muli na bukunza bubibu kutinga tuzoni tuingi.
Nkumubula bune, Muntu unsania ukanitabizagia ku bantu, Muana wa muntu nuwe akumuitabizia ku migenzi za Kalaga:
tondo wozo ukantunaga ku bantu nunne nti nkamutuna ku migenzi za Kalaga.
Nu muntu unsania ukatendaga bubi ku Muana wa muntu, akasigililua, tondo ukalinga Muuza Wasililila ntakasigililua.
Nu gabakenda neinyu ku numba za musanganano nu ku bangati, nu ku bakota, tamulemanine bumuakule, aba bumuatende:
kubuno Muuza Wasililila amuigisie mu zezo nkungu bumuna­tenda.
Nu umozi mu musanganano amutendile bune, Musozi, mbu­lile zezine buno abeganie ntiko zeitu.
Tondo amutendile bune, Ugue muntu, nazi wambikile buno nibe ngatu aba mulongania weinyu?
Nu abatendile bune, Idangazi na kutonia: kubuno kalamo ka muntu takeli mu bikulo bieli nabio.
Nu abeisile musumo bune, Isoa lia muntu umozi mugumi liakolamine biguma bingi:
nu alingile kukengela buno, buni bunikita? Kubuno nsili na gakubikila biguma biane?
Nu atendile bune, Nkukita bubuno: nkusambula bino bigenge, nu nobake bingo binene; nu mumo nabike biguma biane binsania nu bikulo biane.
Neite­nde nnenyene muntu wane buno, Use na bingi biwibikila mbiki ku miaka mingi; umunua, nu lia, nu nua, nu bogaboga.
Tondo Kalaga amubuide bune, U gue kikongolo, mu kindi kikino kia lelo kalamo kobe kakutolua; nu bibino biwibikilaga mbiki biabe bia nazi?
Ububo buli muntu ukuibikila bikulo biage wenyene, nu ntabe mugumi kua Kalaga.
Nu atendile beigisibua bage, Nkumubula bune, Tamule­manine mu kalamo keinyu buno, tualie kikizi? aba tuavuale kikizi?
Kubuno kalamo katinga idia, nu mubili watinga nsulu.
Kengelazi buno nkulongo, tazikuyika, aba tazikukola; aba tazina busio aba bigenge; nu Kalaga ekuzilisagia: nuinyue muatinga bukunza bua tuzoni!
Nazi wa kumuli unalemanina kuitalikila ingo nkiko mu kalamo kage?
Umpanga ndi tamunavuama kitondo kikio kikeke, buni bumukulemanina bingo?
Kengelazi bukuasa maluba, nu tamakukita mulimo, aba tamakulukaga; tondo nkumutenda bune, Aba Solomo mu lutanuno luage lunsania nta­vualikizibue anga busoga bua limozi lia mamo.
Ndi Kalaga ekuvualikia bisugu bia masoa, biligo lelo, nu lubi bikutebua mu ngulumina za keiya, ndi ntanamuvualikia inyue beli basosu mu bukatizio bueinyu?
Tamulonde bumualie, aba bumuanue, aba tamulemanine bibio.
Kubuno ubukulonda babilongo bansania ba kisi kinsania: tondo Soinyue eizi bibio bimukuiyanina.
Londazi tanga bukota bua Kalaga, nu muatalikilue binsania.
Tamunakua boba, inyue kibombo kikeke; kubuno Soinyue amo­nine buno, buli busoga kumukasa bubo bukota.
Kunziazi bimuli nabio, nu mubikasane; ikitilazi nsago zitakubiga, isuku lita­kutengatenga mu meigulu, kiziki kitanavuama kuika muibi aba gabitanatetua na kagembe.
Kubuno kiziki kili isuku lieinyu, ugago gakaba mitima zeinyu.
Bibunda bienyu bilinde, nu tusuku tusane;
nuinyue lingi­manazi na bantu bekulindila mukota wabo, buno gakavua esatuka kuisonga; gakazumia ku luibi, nu nti bamuigulile kazanga kongo.
Mbogimbogi ku bakambi, bakusangua bekukika mukota wabo! Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Akeiyigala nu kubasekela kuidia, nu akavua kubakambila.
Ndi abase ku nkungu za mulangi wa babili, aba wa basatu, nu basanga bubo, mbogimbogi ku bakambi babano.
Tondo menyazi buno, songo nyene numba anume­nyaga nkungu zavue muibi, anakesezie ntende, nu ntanalekelede numba zage kusambulua.
Bubo nuinyue mube kayikayika; kubuno Muana wa muntu akavua mu nkungu zimutakukengela.
Petelo atendile bune, Mukota, ndi ukuisa musumo wono kutuli, aba ku bansania?
Nu Mukota amubuide bune, Nazi mukambi mukatizia nu uli na menge, ndi mukota wage akamubika muangati wa numba zage buno abeganie idia nu nkungu zasuaga?
Mbogimbogi ku mukambi wozo, mu kusubania kua mukota wage ekumusanga ekukita bubo.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Akamubika muangati wa biage binsania.
Tondo ndi wozo mukambi akengede mu mutima wage bune, Mukota wane eizizia; nu alingile kulibula banyage ba bamulume nu ba bakikulu, nu kulia nu kunua nu kukatua na maku;
nu mukota wa wono mukambi akavua mu busi buatakukengela, nu mu nkungu zatakumenya, nu akamusesa bindi bibili, nu kumubika ku kibombo na batakatizia.
Nu wozo mukambi, wizi lutundo lua mukota wage, nu nteibika kayikayika, aba kukita lutundo luage, akalibulua nunse;
tondo wozo utalumenyine, akita buatunganana na kulibulua, ntakalibulua bubibu nu ku unsania wakasilue bingi, amusege bingi nunse.
Navule kuisa keiya ga kisi; nu natunda bubo kasila kubangi­bua?
Tondo nili na bubatizio bunatunganana kubatizibua mubo; nu nkusungibua nunse aba gabukazindilila!
Ndi mukukengela buno navule kulusia bubobelelo mu kisi? Nu nkumubula bune, Tabubo; tondo kulekanukia:
kubuno kukaba bantu batano mu numba imozi nu bakalekanuka, bano basatu kuno nu bano babili kuno.

Ba muana wamulume neisi bakaleka­nuka, nu beisi na muana wage wamukazi bakalekanuka, nu muana wamukazi na nina bakalekanuka; ninabiala na mukamuana wage bakalekanuka, nu mukamuana na ninabiala bakalekanuka.
Nu atendile lingo ku musanganano bune, Gamukumonaga lutundutundu luakumpamia igulu, nti muatenda kazanga kongo buno mbula zavua, nu nti zavua.
Nu gakupupa lumpumpu lua makuluka, nti muamenya buno buange buliko, nu nti buliko.
Inyue bengelezi, buni bumukumenyaga buisulilua bua kisi nu bueigulu; tondo tamukumenya buisulilua bua zeno nkungu?
Nu kubuni inyue benyene tamukukakizia buligo?
Nu gokuenda na musongezi wobe ku mukota, gomania nage nunse gamukili mu nzila; aba anavua kukubasia ku ngatu, nu ngatu nti zakubasia ku mukoloboyo, nu nti mukoloboyo akubika mu kikando.
Nku­kubula buno, ntunatuka gano, ndi ntuasila nsombi zobe insania.
Nu nkungu zezo kuabezaga bantu bamusambalilaga mu­sagu wa baGalela, babo basambikagia Pilato asambikia mikila zabo na za kisansa kiabo.
Nu abatendile bune, Ndi mukukengela buno baGalela babo babezaga bagi kutinga baGalela bansania, kubuno bababazizibue ku bitondo bibino?
Nkumubula bune, Tabubo: tondo ndi tamuiyania inyue bansania, nti mukazika anga bubazikile.
Aba babo ikumi na kinana balimbilue na kindo kia Siloama nu kiabeitile, mukukengela buno babezaga bagi kutinga bantu bansania babezaga mu Yelusalema?
Nkumubula bune, Tabubo: tondo, ndi tamuiyania inyue bansania nti mukazika anga bubazikile.
Nu abeisile musumo wono; Muisoa lia muntu umozi muabe­zaga muti wa figi; endaga kulonda biguma kugo, nu ntabimonine­ko.
Nu atendile ku wozo mulangi weisoa liage bune, Kuse kuatinga miaka isatu nkuvuaga kulonda biguma ku wono muti wa figi, nsikubimonagako: sesago, kubuni ukubigia bisogo?
Nu wozo amutendile bune, Mukota siga lingo tanga mu wono muaka, nasibule ntungo insania zago, nu nawisile bisogo bisoga;
nu ndi wakolama biguma nti buli busoga, nu ndi tawakolama lingo nti wagusesa.
Yesu abezaga ekuigisia mu numba imozi za musanganano busi bua sabato;
nu kuabezaga mukikulu umozi abezaga na lusambo lua musumbu miaka ikumi nu kinana; abezaga akumbama; nta­vuamaga kuisanana nunse.
Nu Yesu gamumueneko, amu­manine, nu amutendile bune, Mukikulu, wakandulua ku bugongole buobe.
Nu amubikile maboko: nu kazanga kongo isanene, nu aganuine Kalaga.

Nu muangati wa numba za musanganano ongilue, kubuno Yesu onezie muntu busi bua sabato, ubuatendile ku musanganano bune, Kuli bindi mutuba biatunganana kukita mulimo: umpanga mu bibio umumuvua konibua, tondo ta ku busi bua sabato.
Tondo Mukota abakuide bune, Inyue bengelezi, tondo ndi bamozi kumuli, tabakukandula ngombe aba mpunda zeinyu kuenda kuzinusia mazi busi bua sabato?
Nu wono mukikulu eli wa kikanga kia Abalahama, nu Satana amukandile miaka ikumi nu kinana, ndi tabuamutananina buno akandulue mu kikando kikino busi bua sabato?
Nu gatendile bubo, bansania bamusombaga bakule na nsoni: nu musanganano unsania, wabogi­lebogile ku bitondo bia lutanuno biatendaga.
Nu atendile bune, Bukota bua Kalaga bualingimana na ki­kizi? nu nibulingamanie na kikizi?
Bualingimana na kambuto ka bunyonyo, muntu akatolile nu akeisile muisoa liage; nu kanagile, nu kabede muti munene; nu tuzoni tua mu mpelela tuakataga ku ntabi zako.
Atendile lingo bune, Buni bunilingimania bukota bua Kalaga?
Bualingimana na mugago, wisile mukikulu mu bianzi bisatu bia bugali nu bunsania buagagile nunse.
Nu atingaga mu mino nu tuino, endaga igisia, nu endaga ku Yelusalema.
Muntu umozi amubuzizie bune, Mukota babo bonibua, ndi bakeke? ta beingi? nu ababuide bune,
Idindi­kazi muingile mu luibi luabumbutana: kubuno nkumubula buno, beingi bakalonda kuingila, tondo tabakavuama.
Gakasila nyene numba kuzanzuka, nu kuigala luibi, nuinyue mukemana kumbuga, nu kukokomona ku luibi, nu kutenda bune, Mukota, tuigulile; nuwe akatenda bune, Nsizi kumukutukila;
nu mukalinga ku­tenda buno, Tualile nu tuanune nobe, nu uwe wigisizie mu nzila zeitu;
nu akatenda bune, Nkumubula nsizi kumukutukila; ntukilazi inyue bansania bekukitaga bubi.
Nu kukaba kulila nu kubuga meinyo, gamukamona ku Abalahama nu Isaka, nu Yakobo, nu balengania bansania, mu bukota bua Kalaga nuinyue mukabasi­bua kumbuga.
Nu bakatuka ku ndenge inazi za kisi, nu ba­keikala mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu unguililazi, bazinda ba­kaba batangi, nu batangi bakaba bazinda.
Mu nkungu zezo baFalese bamozi bamuendeide, bamubuide bune, Tuka gano, wende ku kingo kiziki, kubuno Helode ekulonda kukuita.
Nu abakuide bune, Endazi mubule wozo mukala bune, Lelo nu lubi nkutikia basumbu nu konia basambi nu kindi kia bisatu ukinasilile mu mulimo wane.
Tondo buantunganana nende lelo, nu lubi, nu ndele; kubuno tabuatunganana mulengania kukuila mu Yelusalema.

Yelusalema, Yelusalema, ukuitaga balengania, nu kubalibula makozi babo bakusingua kuguli! ma­mbizi manga natundile kukundamania bana bobe, anga bukugu­batilaga nkoko zagubatila bana bazo mu biupi, nu ntuabuzigile!
Unguililazi, numba zeinyu zikasigua buasi; nkumubula bune, Tamukamonako lingo nunse, aba nu gamukatenda buno, mbogi­mbogi ku wozo ukuvua kuizina lia Mukota!
Nu geingide wozo mu numba za muangati umozi munene wa baFalese ku busi bua sabato kulia idia; bamulolile.
Nu lisa nage kuabezaga muntu umozi abezaga na lusambo lua yimanda.
Nu Yesu atendile ngatu za milembe nu baFalese bune, Ndi buakulungana ku mulembe konia muntu busi bua sabato, aba kutonia?
Tondo nubo beikeide kibibi. Nu Yesu amukatile, nu onine, nu amuzigile buno ende.
Nu abatendile bune, Nazi wa kumuli ndi mpunda aba ngombe zage zakoloka muitengu, ndi ntanenda kazanga kongo kuzitikia busi bua sabato?
Nu tabavu­amine kumuakula.
Nu eisile musumo ku babo bamanagua, gamonine bubakuso­mbola bisumbi bitangi; nu abatendile bune,
Ndi wamanua na muntu ku musanganano weisonga, ntuikale ga kisumbi kitangi; embe kuavue ungo wakutinga,
nu wozo wamumanaga ndi aku­tenda bune, Tukila gono; nuwe nti wakue na nsoni kuenda ku kisumbi kizinda.
Tondo ndi wamanua, enda wikale ku kisu­mbi kizinda; nu gavue wozo wakumanaga, akubule bune, Muida wane sakamina kuno; nu bubo wabe na lutanuno na bansania bawalie nabo.
Kubuno weisakika nti akasigulizibua; nu weisi­gulizia nti akasakikua.

Nu abuide wozo wamumanaga bune, Ndi wakita idia lia ni­ndunindu aba lia muigolo, ntumane beida bobe, aba mibuto zobe aba kikanga kiobe, aba bagumi banyobe; nu banavua nubo kuku­mana lingo, nu kukukasa.
Tondo ndi wamana bantu kuidia, mana bazambi, nu bitunga, nu biuku:
nu wabogeboge; kubuno tabeli na kampa kabakulige; kubuno ukaligua muiyukilo lia beisa­nana.
Nu gungule umozi wa ku babo baliaga nabo, abuide Yesu bune, Mbogimbogi ku wozo ukalia idia mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu amutendile bune, Muntu umozi akitile kisagulo kinene; nu amanine bantu beingi;
nu asingile mukambi wage mu nkungu zeidia amane bansania balagene nabo buno bavue, kubuno binsania bise kayikayika.
Nu bansania babeide na luango lumozi. Mutangi amutendile bune, Nakunzile isoa, nu nkutunda kuenda kulitambula nsigilile.
Nu ungo amutendile bune, Nakunzile ngombe ikumi, nkuenda kuzigeleka; nsigilile.
Ungo amutendile bune, Nasongile mukikulu, nu kububuno nsikutunda kuvua.
Nu gavule mukambi asambalide mukota wage bunsania. Nu mukota wa numba ongilue abuide mukambi wage bune, Enda lubilo mu nzila za ku muino, nu nti wavua na basambi, nu bitunga, nu biuku, nu bekukilila.
Nu mukambi amutendile bune, Mukota buwakakizagia buakitua, nu kukili kingo kiziki.
Nu mukota atendile ku wozo mukambi bune, Enda mu nzila nu mu miaga, nu­bo bansania bawamonageko, babule buno beingile mu numba zane nu ziyale.
Kubuno nkumubula bune, Umozi wa kubabo bana­lagene nabo takuli wasonde kuidia liane.
Umpanga musanganano munene wamuyangile: nu abagalu­kide, nu abatendile bune,
Ndi muntu avua kundi nu ntasomba isi, nu nina, nu mukikulu wage, nu bana bage, nu bato bage, nu babitu bage, nu kusomba kalamo kage wenyene, ntanaba muigisibua wane.
Nu muntu unsania uteka muti wage wa magu, nu kunya­nga, ntanavuama kuba muigisibua wane.
Kubuno nazi wa kumuli, ndi ekutunda kobaka kindo, nu ntikala tanga gansi nu kuganza bukunza ndi buasuaga bua kuzindilizia?
Anavua kusekua buno asiga musande nu ntagusililizia, nu nti bantu bamuse­ka,
nu kutenda buno, W ono muntu alingile ko baka nu ntasililizia.
Nu ndi mukota, anenda kuluana na ungo mukota, nu ntalinga tanga kukengela buno, ndi anavuama kukinda na tununu ikumi tua bantu, ku wozo ukuvua kumuluania na bantu tununu makumi ma­bili?
Nu ndi, ntanavuama nti asinga ungo muntu, kungua ekili bulazi, nu anamubuzia buno banuane.
Bubo unsania wa kumuli ntasiga binsania bieli nabio, ntanavuama kuba muigisibua wane.
Munkange uli musoga, tondo ndi taguli nse lingo; nti gunasuagibua na kikizi?
Tagunasuaga lingo na bisogo aba kuiyala: nu bantu nti bawisa kumbuga. W ozo uli na matuzi makunguilila, nti unguilila.
Nu bandelelombe bansania nu bagi bavule buigi nage buno bamunguilile.
Nu baFalese nu basanzi beizuzumine, nu batendile bune, Wono muntu ekusekela bagi, nu kulia nabo.
Tondo abeisile musumo bune,
Nazi kumuli, ndi eli na mi­koko lukama, nu ndi umozi wamuzimina, ndi ntanasiga zezo ma­kumi mubula nu mubula mu kalula, nu kulonda wozo wazimine, aba nu gagumone?
Nu gagumone, nti aweka ga matuli mage na mbogimbogi.
Nu gasubie kuage ku numba, nti amane beida bage nu banyage, nu nti ababule bune, Bogazibogazi nanne, kubu­no namona mukoko wane wazimine.
Ububo, bunkumubula, kukaba mbogimbogi nene muigulu ndi muagi umozi eiyania, kutinga beisanana makumi mubula nu mubula, beteli na mpipi ku kuiyania.
Nazi mukikulu, ndi eli na falanga zage ikumi, nu ndi aziminua na lumozi, ndi ntanagulumizia kasuku, nu kuyagila mu numba, nu kulonda na komanizia, aba nu galumone?
Nu galumone amane beida bage nu banyage, nu nti ababula bune, Bogazibogazi nanne, kubuno namona lufalanga luane luazimine.
Ububo, bunkumu­bula, kuli mbogimbogi kuko kuikile migenzi za Kalaga ndi muagi umozi eiyania.
Nu abatendile lingo bune, Muntu umozi abezaga na bana babili bamulume:
nu muana muto abuide isi bune, Tatane, mpe kiane kindi kia bikulo, nu isibo ababeganizizie bikulo biage.
Gatingile bindi bimozi, muana muto, akungikile biage, nu endile mu kingo kilongo kia bulazi; nu akasene bibio bikulo kuko ku ka­bamba ka misako mibi.
Nu gabede bikulo biage binsania biasila, munganda munene wabede mu kikio kisi; nu alingile kui­yania.
Nu endile kukita mulimo wa muntu umozi wa kikio kisi; nu amusingile ku masoa mage buno alisie ngulube.
Nu atu­ndile kuembuka na bisugu bialiaga ngulube: nu takuli muntu umozi wamukasile kena.
Nu geiyanizie, atendile buno bakambi banga beli na tatane beli neidia lingi, nu nne nili gano nkukua na nzala!
Nkuzanzuka, nu nende ku tatane, nu namubule bune, Tatane, nagile kuigulu nu kuguli:
nsiatananina lingo kumanua muana wobe; mbike anga umozi wa bakambi bobe.
Nu azanzukile, nu avule kuisi. Tondo gabezaga ekili bulazi, isi amumueineko, nu amukuilide kiombo, nu eitumine lubilo nu amukatile geikosi nu amusekeide.
Nu muana wage amutendile bune, Tatane, nagile kuigulu nu nakuagide: nsiatananina lingo kumanua muana wobe.
Tondo isi abuide bakambi bage bune, Vuazi yiliyili na nkanzu nsoga nunse, nu mumuvualikiezo; nu muambali­kiazi kakomu ku munue, nu bisalapata ku magulu;
nu vuazi na kiana kia ngombe kianona, nu mukite, nu tuliazi nu tubogazibogazi:
kubuno wono muana akule, nu alama lingo, azimine, nu amoneka lingo. Nu balingile kubogaboga.
Nu wozo muana wage wa nkula abezaga ku masoa: gavule nu gakundile buigi na numba, ungule ku nimbo nu ku mamina.
Nu amanine umozi wa ku bakambi bage, nu amubuzizie buabeide.
Nu wozo amubuide bune, Muto wobe asubia; nu so eitile kiana kia ngombe kianona, kubuno amumonako lingo bulonge bukata.
Tondo ongilue, nu ntazigile kuingila: nu isi abasile kumbuga, nu amusegile.
Tondo akuide isi bune, Unguilila, miaka mingi zinakukambila, nu nsiagide kukakizia kumozi kuobe, nu ntunkasa muana wa mpene buno nibogeboge na beida bane:
tondo gabasa wono muana wobe, wozo wazikizie bikulo biobe ku lukita lua butazi, uguwitila kiana kia ngombe kianona.
Nu amuakuide bune, Muana wane, uli nanne bindi binsania, nu binsania biane bili biobe.
Tondo buli busoga ndi tuabogaboga nu kuba na mbogimbogi; kubuno wono muto wobe akule, nu alama lingo, azimine, nu amoneka lingo.
Nu atendile lingo beigisibua bage bune, Kuabezaga muntu umozi mugumi, abezaga na mulangi: nu bamubingile kueli buno, agabula bikulo biage.
Nu amumanine nu amubuide bune, Musagu mukizi wono? tuganze maganzo ma bikulo biguli nabio; kubuno ntualange lingo bikulo biane.
Nu wozo mulangi eitendile bune, Buni bunikita kubuno mukota wane antikia ku bu­langi? Nsinavuama kulima; nu nkukua nsoni kusega.
Nizi bunakite, buno, gantikie ku bulangi, bansekele ku numba zabo.
Nu amanine babezaga na nsombi za mukota wage, umozi umozi, atendile wozo mutangi bune, Uli na nsombi inga ku mukota wane?
Nu atendile bune, Bilingiko lukama bia makiti, nu amutendile bune, Tola mukanda wobe nu usasie kuikala gansi, nu nti wasanza makumi matano.
Nu atendile na wongo bune, Nuwe, uli na nsombi inga? Nu amutendile bune, Bilingiko lukama bia mu­mpunge. Nu amutendile bune, Tola mukanda nu usanze makumi kinana.
Nu wozo mukota aganuine mulangi uteisanana, kubuno akitile na menge: kubuno bana ba kisi kikino nu ba kibuti kiabo beli na menge kutinga bana ba kiengi.
Nu nne nkumubula bune, Katazi buida na bikulo biteisanana; kubuno, gabikeida, bakamuse­kela mu biziki bitanakuzinda.
Nu wono uli mukatizia mu bi­keke nunse, nti anaba mukatizia nunse mu bingi; nu wono uteisa­nana mu bikeke nti ntaneisanana mu bingi nunse.
Ndi tamuli bakatizia ku bikulo biteisanana, nazi unalemanina kumukasa bikulo biasuaga?
Nu ndi tamuabezaga bakatizia mu bikulo bia ungo muntu, nazi ukamukasa bienyu mubenyene?
Takuli muka­mbi unakitila bakota babili: kubuno asombe umozi, nu kutunda ungo; aba nti anza umozi, nu kubenga ungo. Tamunavuama kukitila Kalaga nu bikulo.
Umpanga baFalese, babo babezaga belami ba bikulo, gabo­ngule kububo bamuzuguide.
Nu abatendile bune, Inyue mu­kuibingia ku bantu; tondo Kalaga eizi mitima zeinyu; kubuno kinsania kikutanunua na bantu kili lusombo ku Kalaga.
Mulembe nu balengania biabezaga aba nu ku Yoana: kutukila nkungu zezo, musagu wa bukota bua Kalaga wasambedue, nu na muntu na mu­ntu nokuiyingizia na magala.
Tondo buli neibineibi igulu nu kisi bitinge, kuisanzo limozi ikeke lili mu mulembe kutinga.
Na muntu na muntu ukatikagia mukazi, nu kusonga ungo, nti eita meiga: nu unsania wasonga wozo watukibua kuiba, nti eita nuwe meiga.
Kuabezaga muntu umozi mugumi, wabezaga wavuala nsulu nsoga zakisimana, nu na busi na busi aliaga busoga;
nu muzambi umozi izina liage Lazalo abezaga ikala ga kitiko, abezaga na biulu bingi,
nu atundaga kuembuka na mbobu zakolokaga ku meza za wozo mugumi; nu mboa zavuaga kumulamba ku biulu biage.
Nu gabede wozo muzambi alekana, migenzi zamuekile ku bukuba bua Abalahama: nu wozo mugumi nuwe alekene nu ayikilue.
Nu mu Kiziki kia Bakuzi alambuide meiso, ababalagua nu amonine ku Abalahama bulazi, nu Lazalo ku bukuba buage.
Nu alilile liu atendile bune, Tatane Abalahama, nkue kiombo, nu singa Lazalo, atobe munue wage mu mazi, nu ozie lulami luane; kubuno nkubabalua mu keiya kakano.
Tondo Abalahama atendile bune, Muana wane, kengela tanga buno wabezaga na bisoga bingi mu kalamo kobe, nu Lazalo nuwe abezaga na bibi: tondo kano kaluma esabogaboga, nu uwe usababala.
Nu lingo, gatusamba neinyu geli mpembue nnene zabikilue, nu babo bekutunda kutuka kuno nu kuvua kuko kumuli tabanavuama, aba ba kuko kumili tabanabasa kuno.
Atendile bune, Tatane, nkukusega tanga buno, buli busoga ndi wasinga Lazalo ku numba za tatane;
kubuno nili na bato bane batano; ende kubasambalila buno, bana­vua kubabalua kuno.
Tondo Abalahama amutendile bune, Beli na Mose nu bango balengania; bonguilile tanga babo.
Nu atendile bune, Tabubo tatane Abalahama; tondo ganenda umozi wa bakuzi, baneiyania.
Nu amutendile bune, Ndi tabongua ku Mose nu ku bango balengania, aba tondo ganayuka umozi ku bakuzi tabanakatizia.
Nu abuide beigisibua bage bune, Kuinania mitima kuatu­nganana kuba; tondo kabebe ku wozo muntu ukubukita.
Bunabeide busoga ndi muntu wono akandua ikozi lia kugoga muikosi, kuisoa mu kitatenge, ndi nteinia umozi wa ku babano bana bato mitima.
Idangazi ndi mubuto wobe aga, nti wamuana, nu ndi iyania, nti wamusigilila.
Nu ndi akuagide mambizi mutuba kamo mu busi bumozi, nu ndi asubia kuguli mambizi mutuba kamo, nu kutenda bune, Neiyania; nti wamusigilila.
Nu basingua batendile ku Mukota bune, Tutalikile bukatizio bueitu.
Nu Mukota atendile bune, Ndi muli na bukatizio anga kambuto ka bunyonyo, munabula wono muti wa kinsembe bune, Yuka, nu kuyikua mu kitatenge; nu unamuanza.
Tondo nazi wa kumuli, ndi eli na mukambi ukulima aba ndi akulanga mikoko, nu kumubula mu nkungu zakutuka kuisoa bune, Vua yiliyili ikala gulie idia;
nu ndi ntanamutenda bune, Yula idia nilie; nu ikande, nu unkitile, aba nu ganasile kulia nu kunua; nu kusila nti walie nu wanue?
Ndi anasima wozo mukambi kubuno akitile bubo buakakizizibue?
Bubo ububo nuinyue, ndi muasila kukita binsania bimuakakizizibue, tendazi bune, Isue u bakambi beli bulia; tuakitile tugu butuatunganana kukita.
Nu gababede besenda ku Yelusalema gabatingile gasamba Samalia nu Galela.
Nu gabasile mu muino umozi akulumeine na bantu ikumi babezaga na bibali; bemeine bulazi.
Nu bala­lukile na moki manene, batendile bune, Yesu, Mukota munene, tukue kiombo.
Nu gabamueneko, ababuide bune, Endazi muidolesie ku basankoga. Nu gabendile, bengezibue.
Nu umozi wa kubeli gamonine buno ona, asubizie lubilo, kuganuna Kalaga nei­yuki inene;
nu akukumeine ku magulu mage, nu amuganuine; nu abezaga muntu wa Samalia.
Nu Yesu atendile bune, Ndi teikumi ubengezibue? tondo kuni kuli mubula?
Takuli bango bavua kuganuna Kalaga, tugu umpanga wono mugeni?
Nu amubuide bune, Zanzuka, wende; bukatizio buobe buakonia.
Nu baFalese bamubuzizie bune, Nkungu nkizi zikavua bu­kota bua Kalaga, nu abatendile bune, Bukota bua Kalaga tabukavua ku lukita lua kulolua:
tabakatenda buno, buli gano, aba buli kuko, kubuno bukota bua Kalaga buli gamusamba.
Nu atendile beigisibua bage bune, Bindi biavue mukatunda kumona ku busi bumozi ku mamo mosi ma Muana wa muntu, nu tamukabumonako.
Nu bakamubula bune, Lola kuko! Lola kuno! tamutuke, aba tamubayange.
Tondo anga bukukeli­maga mukenzi, kutukila lulenge luigulu, aba nu ku lungo lulenge luigulu; ububo bukavua Muana wa muntu mu busi buage.
Tondo buatunganana asungibue tanga nu kusombua na kibuti kikino.
Tondo anga buabede bindi bia Noa, ububo bukaba lingo mu bindi bia Muana wa muntu.
Baliaga, nu banuaga, nu basongaga, nu basongagua, aba nu busi buingide Noa mu buato, nu muiyalo wavule, nu wazikizie bansania.
Lingo anga buabede mu bindi bia Lote; baliaga, nu banuaga nu bakunzaga, nu baku­nzagia, nu bayikaga, nu bobakaga;
tondo busi bubo buatukile Loto ku Sodomo keiya nu kibiliti tuatukile kuigulu, nu tuazikizie bansania:
nu ububo bukaba kumoneka kua Muana wa muntu.
Mu busi bubo, wozo ukasangua gantata ga numba, ntakakumba buno atole bili mu numba zage, nu wozo ukasangua muisoa ntaka­subia.
Kengelazi mukikulu wa Loto.
Muntu unsania uka­tundaga konia kalamo kage akakazimizia: nu wozo wakazimizia akakonia.
Nkumubula bune, Mu kindi kikio bamulume babili bakasangua ga mugu umozi; umozi akatolua nu ungo nti akasigua.
Bakikulu babili bakasangua muisabuka; umozi akatolua, nu ungo nti akasigua.
Bamulume babili bakasangua muisoa, umozi aka­tolua nu ungo nti akasigua.
Nu bamuakuide bune, Kuni, Mukota? Nu abatendile bune, Kuko kuli kitumba, nti ukuaku­ndamane ndiu.
Yesu abeisile musumo buno, buatunganana kusega busi na busi, nu kutakutua;
atendile bune, Kuabezaga ngatu mu muino umozi utakuanzaga Kalaga, nu ntanzaga muntu:
nu mu muino wozo muabezaga musigala umozi; wamuvuilaga nu wate­ndaga bune, Nsesele mulondo wane na wono muiti wane.
Nu eizizizie nu asombile: tondo eibuzizie, Nsikukuaga Kalaga boba nu nsikukutagia muntu;
tondo wono musigala ekunkutia, nkumuse­sela mulondo wage busoga buno anavua kunvuila lingo bindi binsania, nu kunkutia.
Nu mukota atendile bune, Unguililazi bukutenda ngatu uteisanana.
Nu ndi Kalaga ntanabingia basombolua bage, babo bekumusegaga musi nu kindi, nu ndi aneizizia na kubabingia?
Nkumubula bune, Asasie kubabingia. Tondo gavue Muana wa muntu ndi akamona bukatizio ku kisi?
Nu eisile wono musumo ku bantu bekuikengela buno beli beisanana, nu kubenga bango:
Bantu babili bendile kusega mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga; umozi abezaga muFalese, nu ungo abezaga mundelelombe.
Wozo muFalese azanzukile nu eisegeide wenyene bune, Kalaga, nakusima, kubuno nsili anga bango bantu, banyagi, bateisanana, beiti ba meiga, nu nsiasusania na wono mundelelombe.
Nkugilaga idia mambizi mabili izinga neizinga, nkutikagia kindi kikumi ku bikulo biane.
Tondo wozo mundelelombe, emanine bulazi, nu ntatundile kulola kuigulu, tondo aguide bukukumania, atendile bune, Kalaga, nkuile kiombo nili muagi.
Nkumubula buno, Muntu wozo endile abingibua ku numba zage kutinga munyage: kubuno unsania ukuisakika agezi­bue; nu wozo ukuigezie, asakikue.
Nu bamuvuilide na bana bato babo buno eitubie kubeli: tondo gamonine beigisibua bage ku bubo, babazugide.
Tondo Yesu abamanine buno bavue kueli, atendile bune, Sigazi bana bato bavue kundi nu tamubazugile; kubuno beli anga babano bukota bua Kalaga buli buabo.
Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Unsania uteitabizia bukota bua Kalaga anga muana muto ntakeingila nunse mubo.
Nu muangati umozi amubuzizie bune, Musozi Musoga buni bunikita nipiene kalamo katanakuzinda?
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Kubuni ukumana musoga? takuli umozi musoga, tugu Kalaga wenyene.
Wizi makakizio buno, Ntuite meiga, Ntuite muntu, Ntuibe, Ntueke munyobe buza, anza so nu nyoko.
Nu atendile bune, Nasilile kuanza mamano mansania kutukila ku ku­butua kuane.
Nu gongule Yesu ku bubo, amubuide bune, Wagelelua ku bumozi tugu; ukunzie bikulo biobe binsania, nu begania ku bazambi, nuwe ukaba neisuku muigulu: nu uvue unyange.
Nu gongule ku bubo, abeide na kabebe nunse; kubuno abezaga na bikulo bingi.
Nu gamonine Yesu ku bubo, atendile bune, Kuingila kua bagumi mu bukota bua Kalaga kuli kubibu.
Buli neibineibi ngamia kuingila muitengu lia nsinge, ku mugumi kuingila mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu babo bongule kubo batendile bune, Nazi ukuvuama konibua?
Tondo atendile bune, Butakulungana ku bantu bunakulungana ku Kalaga.
Nu Petelo atendile bune, Lebelebe; tuasigile binsania bietu, nu tuaku­yangile.
Nu abatendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula bune, Takuli muntu wasigile numba zage, aba mukikulu wage aba bato bage, aba beisi, aba bana bage, ku kabamba ka bukota bua Kalaga,
utakatalikilua bingi mu nkiko zeno, nu mu nkiko zikavua kalamo katanakuzinda.
Nu endile na babo ikumi nu babili, nu abatendile bune, Unguililazi, tuenda ku Yelusalema, nu bunsania buzindilile bua­sanzilue na balengania ku kabamba ka Muana wa muntu.
Ku­buno agabulue ku baBilongo, nu eililikue, abengue, nu kusuilua matazi:
nu bamususule nu kumuita: nu kusila kua bindi bisatu nti ayuke.
Nubo tabamenyinine bubo, nu buabezaga buabisua kubeli, nu tabamenyinine buatendaga.
Nu gabezaga ese buigi na Yeliko, muntu umozi abezaga kiuku eikalaga buigi na nzila asegaga:
nu gongule musanganano wa­tingaga, ababuzizie bune, Kikizi?
Nu bamubuide bune, Yesu wa Nazaleta ukutinga.
Nu alalukile, atendile bune, Yesu, muana wa Davidi, nkue kiombo.
Nu babo babezaga luabusio bamuzugide, bamuikazizie kibibi, tondo eitide kulaluka bubibu bune, Muana wa Davidi nkue kiombo.
Nu Yesu emanine, nu akakizizie buno bamulusie: nu gabeide ese buigi, amubuzizie bune,
Ukutunda nakukitila kikizi? Nu atendile bune, Mukota, nkutunda namona.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Mona; bukatizio buobe buakonia.
Nu kazanga kongo amonine, nu amuyangile, nu aganuine Kalaga: nu gamueine bantu bansania ku bubo, baganuine Kalaga.
Nu gabasile Yesu mu Yeliko, atingile mu muino.
Nu kuabezaga muntu umozi mugumi, wamanagua Zakayo; mukota wa bandelelombe,
nu alondaga kumona ku Yesu buno eli muntu wa lukita lukizi; nu ntamumonineko kubuno kuabezaga musanganano munene wa bantu, nu wozo abezaga muntu muigi.
Nu eitumine lubilo luabusio, nu abakamine ku muti wa kinsembe, buno embe anamumonako; kubuno atingaga gago.
Nu ga­basile Yesu gago, agalamine kuigulu nu amutendile bune, Zakayo, sasia kugela, kubuno nkuikala mu numba zobe lelo,
Nu Zakayo asasizie kugela, nu amusekeide na mbogimbogi.
Nu gaba­monine ku bubo, bakitile manungunungu, nu batendile bune, Enda kuikala kua muntu wa buagi.
Nu Zakayo emeine, atendile ku Mukota bune, Unguilila, Mukota, kindi kia bikulo biane nakasa bazambi; nu ndi neibile kia muntu umozi, nti namusubizie kio mambizi manazi.
Nu Yesu amutendile bune, Lelo lonio lua­basa mu numba zeno, kubuno wono nuwe eli muana wa Abala­hama.
Kubuno Muana wa muntu avule kulonda nu konia wozo wazimina.
Nu gabongule ku bubo, abeisile ungo musumo, kubuno abezaga ese buigi na Yelusalema, nu bo bakengeide buno bukota bua Kalaga buasasia kumoneka.
Nu atendile bune, Muntu munene umozi endile ku kingo kisi kia bulazi, kukasua bukota buage nu kusubia lingo.
Nu amanine bakambi bage ikumi, nu abakasile bibombo ikumi, nu abatendile bune, Kunziazi aba nu ganavua.
Nu banyage bamusombile, nu basingile mugenzi kumbusa kuage, kumutenda buno, tatukuziga muntu wono kutu­angata.
Nu gasubizie lingo eseli na bukota buage, nu akakizizie babo bantu bamanue kueli, babo bakambi bakasaga bikulo, nu amenye mutali wamonine mukambi na mukambi.
Nu mutangi atendile bune, Mukota, bikulo biobe biamona mutali lingo ikumi.
Nu amutendile bune, Wakita busoga, mukambi musoga: ku­buno wabeide mukatizia ku bitebingi, ukuba muangati wa mino ikumi.
Nu wa babili avule, atendile bune, Mukota, bikulo biobe biamona mutali wa bingo bitano.
Nu amutendile bune, Angata nu uwe mino itano.
Nu ungo avule, nu atendile bune, Mukota, bikulo biobe bibino, nabilangile mu nsulu:
kubuno nakukuaga boba, kubuno uli muntu mukali: ukutolaga bitabikile, nu ukutubulaga biutayikile.
Nu amutendile bune, Nkukusungia ku kako kanua kobe, uwe mukambi mubi. Uwe wamenyaga buno nili mukali, nkutolaga bintabika, nu nkutubulaga bintayikile;
kubuni kutabikile bikulo biane ku babo beli neisuku lia kulanga bikulo nu gakusubia kuane nabisangile na mutali?
Nu atendile babo babezaga beimine buigi bune, Munyagazi kikio kibombo, nu mukase wozo uli na bibombo ikumi.
Nu bamutendile bune, Mukota, eli na bibombo ikumi.
Nkumubula bune, Wozo uli na kena akakasua; tondo uteli na kena, akanyagua aba kako keli nako.
Tondo babo beiti bane, batakutunda nibangate, vuazi nabo gano, beitazi nti nkumona.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubuno, abakamine kuenda ku Yelusalema.
Nu gabeide ese buigi na Betapage nu Betania, ku muiduko wamanagua Oleve, asingile babili ku babo beigisibua,
atendile bune, Endazi aba nu ku muino uli luabusio lueinyu; nu gamuabase mumo muamone ku muana wa mpunda asuikua, utetetelagua geli: nti muazisula, nu kuvua nazo.
Nu ndi muntu amubuzia bune, Kubuni muazisula? tendazi bune, Mukota akuiyaninazo.
Nu babo basingilue bendile, nu bamonine ku bubo buababuide.
Nu gababezaga besasula muana wa mpunda batendile bune, Kubuni mukusula muana wa mpunda?
Nu babatendile bune, Mukota akuiyaninazo.
Nu bavule nazo ku Yesu: nu babikile nsulu zabo gantata ga muana wa mpunda, nu Yesu eikede gantata gazo.
Nu gabezaga esenda, banzile nsulu zabo mu nzila.
Nu gabeide ese buigi na kugela muiduko wa Oleve, musanganano wa beigisibua bage babogilebogile nu kuganuna Kalaga neiyuki inene ku kabamba ka migeleko mingi zibamonine kuzo;
nu batendile bune, Mbogimbogi ku Mukota munene ukuvua muizina lia Mukota; bubobelelo muigulu, nu lutanuno kuigulu.
Nu baFalese ba­mozi babezaga mu musanganano bamubuide bune, Musozi, zugila beigisibua bobe.
Nu abatendile bune, Nkumubula buno, ndi beikala kibibi makozi nti malaluka.
Nu gabezaga buigi amonine ku muino, nu agulilide,
atendile bune, Songo wamenyaga buno busi buenyu, nu bitondo biabezaga bia bubobelelo buenyu! tondo kano kaluma biabisua kumuli.
Kukavua bindi bia beiti beinyu bakamobakila bitutu, bakutimba nabio, nu bakukulumania nabio ku ndenge insania;
nu bakamu­gusia gansi, uwe nu bana beli munda mueinyu; nu tabakasiga ikozi gantata geikozi; kubuno tamuizi nkungu zimualolilue.
Nu eingide mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga,
nu abatendile bune, Buasanzilue bune, Numba zane zabe numba za masego: tondo inyue muaziga­lukia anga numba za banyagi.
Nu eigisizie busi na busi mu numba za kukumbamina Kalaga. Tondo basankoga banene nu basanzi nu bakulu ba bantu balondile bubemuita;
nu tabamonine bubekita; kubuno bantu bansania bamuyangaga nu bamunguililaga.
Nu kuabezaga busi bumozi eigisizie bantu mu numba za kukumbamina, nu kusambala musagu musoga, nu basankoga banene nu basanzi gamozi na bakulu bamuvuilide:
nu bamubuide bune, Tubule buangato bukizi bukukitila ku bubuno? aba nazi wakukasile bubuno buangato?
Nu abatendile bune, Nkumu­buzia bumozi nu nakulazi:
Bubatizio bua Y oana, buatukile muigulu, aba ku bantu?
Nu babuzanizie buabo buabo, nu batendile bune, Ndi tuatenda buno, buatukile muigulu; nti atende buno, Kubuni tamuamukatizizie?
Tondo ndi tuatenda buno, Buatukile ku bantu; nti bantu bansania batulibule makozi; ku­buno bakatizizie buno Yoana abezaga mulengania.
Nu bamu­tendile bune, Tatuizi.
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Nunne nsi­kumubula buangato bunkukitila ku bubuno.
Nu eisile bantu musumo buno; Muntu ayikile isoa lia mizigi za biguma, nu alikasile balimi bage, nu endile mu kingo kisi eikalile nkungu ndazi.
Nu nkungu za kukola asingile mukambi umozi ku babo bakambi buno, bamukase nkindi za biguma; tondo bakambi bamulibuide, nu bamubasizie nteli na kampa.
Nu asingile ungo mukambi: nu bamulibuide, nu bamubabazizie nunse, nu bamubasizie nteli na kampa.
Nu asingile ungo wa basatu; nu bamubabazizie; nu bamuimbizie.
Nu mukota weisoa atendile bune, Buni bunikita? nkusinga muana wane, mutundua; embe bana­muanza.
Tondo babo bakambi gabamumueneko, babuzanizie buabo buabo, batendile bune, Wozo eli mupieni; tumuitazi, nu tupiene bupieni buage.
Nu bamubasizie muisoa lia biguma, nu bamuitile. Nu wozo mukota weisoa buni buakakita babano?
Gakavua akeita babo bakambi, nu nti akasane lilio isoa ku bango. Nu gabongule batendile bune, Kilo aba nunse.
Tondo abakakile meiso nu atendile bune, Buisulilua bukizi bua bubuno buasanzilue:
Ikozi liasombilue na bobaki,
Uliabede ikozi inene lia kapindapinda?
Na muntu unsania wagoa geikozi lilino abeleke; tondo unsania wakolokelua nalio, nti liamubungula.
Nu basanzi nu basankoga banene balondile kumukata mu nkungu zezo; tondo bakule bantu boba: kubuno bamenyine buno abeisaga musumo wono.
Nu bamulolile nu bamusingide bantu kukokosia, nubo beibikile anga beisanana, buno bamukandike bitondo, bubanamulusia ku buangato bua muangati.
Nu bamubuzizie bune, Musozi, tuizi buno ukutenda nu ukuigisia bulili, kubuno ntukulola kilungi kia muntu, tondo mu bulili ukuigisia meigisia ma Kalaga:
ndi buakulungana ku mulembe kuliga Kaisa idigo aba kutaliga?
Tondo amenyinine menge mabo, nu abatendile bune,
Ndolesiazi falanga zeidigo.
Nu abatendile bune, Kasazi Kaisa bia Kaisa, nu Kalaga bia Kalaga.
Nu tabavuamine kumukandika bitondo ku bantu; nu banga­mine na kuakula kuage, nu beikeide kibibi.
Nu baSodoke bamozi babo bakutendaga buno takuli iyukilo, nu bamubuzizie bune,
Musozi, Mose atusanzide buno, ndi iselenzi wa muntu akua, nu asiga mukikulu, nu ntasiga bana, muto wage nti amuyana, nu kumubutila bana.
Mutuli muabezaga mibuto mutubakamo bandemozi: nu mutangi asongile mukikulu, nu akule ntasiga bana;
nu wababili;
nu wa basatu amuso­ngile; nubo bansania mutubakamo bakule tabasigile bana.
Nu mukikulu nuwe akule.
Muiyukilo wozo mukikulu akaba wa nazi? Kubuno asongilue na babo mutubakamo.
Nu Yesu abatendile bune, Bana ba kisi kikino bekusonga, nu kusongua;
tondo babo bakaganzua buno batananina kuingila mu kisi kikavua, nu lilio iyukilo lia bakuzi, tabakasonga aba kusongua;
kubuno tabakavauma kukua lingo; kubuno balingimana na migenzi; nubo beli bana ba Kalaga, kubuno beli bana beiyukilo.
Tondo ku kuyuka kua bakuzi, Mose alolesizibue, ku Kilindi kiaguluminaga keiya, gamanaga Mukota, U Kalaga wa Abalahama, nu Kalaga wa Isaka, nu Kalaga wa Yakobo.
We nteli Kalaga wa bakuzi, tondo wa balami: kubuno kueli bansania bakulama.
Nu bango basanzi bamozi bamutendile bune, Musozi, watenda buligo.
Nu tabagelekile lingo kumubuzia mbuzio.
Nu ababuide bune, Buni bukutenda bantu buno, Klisto eli muana wa Davidi?
Kubuno Davidi wenyene atendile mu mu­kanda wa Nimbo,
Mukota atendile ku Mukota wane,
Ikala ku kuboko kuane kua seidume,
Aba nu ganangate beiti bobe.
Ndi Davidi amumanine Mukota, kubuni eli muana wage?
Nu gamunguililaga bantu bansania atendile beigisibua bune,
Idangazi na basanzi babo bekuelama kutabanga mu nsulu ndazi, nu kusekelua ku masoko, nu kuikala ga bisumbi bitangi mu numba za musanganano, nu mu biziki bitangi mu bisagulo,
bakunyaga numba za misigala, nu kusega masego malazi ku buengelezi: ba­bano bakasungibua nunsania.
Nu alambuide meiso, nu amonine ku kuisa bagumi nkaso zabo muisuku.
Nu amonine ku musigala umozi muzambi isaga sengi ibili.
Nu atendile bune, Lebelebe nkumubula buno, Wono musigala muzambi eisa kutinga bango bansania:
kubuno babano bansania batikia nkaso ku bikulo biabo bingi; tondo wono isa binsania biage.
Nu bamozi batendaga musagu wa numba za kukumbamina, buzabezaga zalebibua na makozi masoga nu nkaso, nu atendile bune,
Bibio bimukumonako, mu bindi bikavua, takukasigala ikozi gantata geikozi, litakabungulua.
Nu bamubuzizie bune, Musozi, buni bukaba bitondo bibino? nu ku kalolesio kakizi kabakamenyinina buno, bitondo bibino bise buigi?
Nu atendile bune, Idangazi, buno muntu ntamuenge­lele: kubuno beingi bakavua muizina liane, nu kutenda buno, Nnowe, nu nkungu zise buigi; tamubayange.
Nu mukongua ku misagu za bita, nu misona, tamukue boba: kubuno buatu­ngana na tanga bitondo bibino bilinge kuvua: tondo kuzinda takuika.
Nu abatendile bune, Kilongo kikaluana na kingo kilongo, nu bukota bukaluana na bungo bukota;
nu kukaba tulingini tunene tua kisi, nu kukaba munganda nu maganogano mu lulenge na lu­lenge; nu tulolesio tua boba nu tulolesio tunene tukatuka kuigulu.
Tondo gakaba bunsania tabuba, bakalinga kumukata, nu ku­musungia, nu bakamugabula ku numba za musanganano nu ku­mubika mu bikando, nu bakamubasia ku bakota banene nu bangati ku kabamba keizina liane.
Nu bubo bukamugalukila bulongeki.
Kengelazi tanga buno tamulemanine bumuakule:
kubuno nkamukasa buakuakula nu menge, butanavuama kuakania babo bansania bamusomba.
Tondo mukagabulua na bamubuta, nu mibuto zeinyu, nu baneinyu, nu beida beinyu; nu bamozi kumuli bakagabulua buno bakue.
Nu mukasombua na bantu bansania ku kabamba keizina liane.
Nu luzuili lumozi lueitoe lienyu talukazimina.
Ku komanizia keinyu mukonia tulamo tueinyu.
Tondo gamukamona Yelusalema unsania atimbua na mazo­mbo, bubo mumenyinine buno kubiga kuage kuse buigi.
Nu babo beli mu Yudaya batine ku miduko; nu babo beli mu Yelusa­lema batukemo; nu babo beli mu masoa tababase mu muino lingo.
Kubuno, bindi bibio bili bia musubo, ku bubo ukuzindilila kua binsania biasanzilue.
Kabebe ku beimisu nu bakumomia mu bindi bibino! kubuno kukaba kabebe kanene mu kisi, nu bongoa ku bantu babano.
Nu baketua na bupanga, nu bakekua nu kukandua ku bilongo binsania; nu Yelusalema akangatua na ba­Bilongo, aba nu nkungu za kuzindilila kua baBilongo.
Kukaba tukengelezio ku kisongo kia busi nu ku muezi nu nkeninkeni; nu ku kisi kukaba kabebe ka bilongo, ku kabamba ka kubila kua kitatenge nu bimpumi biakio:
bantu bakatika mitima na boba. Nu kulemanina kua bitondo biabase ku kisi; kubuno magala ma meigulu makatengatenga.
Nu bakamona Muana wa muntu ekuvua mu kimpa na magala nu lutanuno luage lunene.
Nu gakalinga kuba bunsania, langamanazi nu sakikazi matoe meinyu; kubuno bukuluzi bueinyu buse buigi.
Nu abeisile musumo bune, Lolazi muti wa figi, nu miti insa­nia:
kungua zise zatempula nti muamenye buno nkungu za nzogo zise buigi.
Nu gamukamona ku bubuno, menyazi buno bukota bua Kalaga buse buigi.
Lebelebe nkumbula bune, Kibuti kikino takikatinga, aba nu gakazindilila binsania.
Igulu nu kisi bikatinga: tondo malagi mane tamakatinga nunse.
Idangazi, tamutambie mitima zeinyu ku buliagundu nu kuka­tua na maku, nu kuikutia ku kalamo keinyu, nu kindi kikio kinamu­vuila kitangala besi anga bukonagia itega:
kubuno bubo ubukabasila bansania beli ga kisi.
Tondo kesiazi ntende nu segazi nkungu insania buno monibue mu binsania biavue, nu kuemana ku Muana wa muntu.
Na busi na busi eigisagia mu numba za kukumbamina, nu mu kindi na kindi endaga kuiyombeka ku muiduko wamanagua Oleve.
Nu mu nindunindu bantu bansania bendaga ku numba za kuku­mbamina kunguilila buatendaga.
Gabeide busi bua kisagulo kia tumpampa tutagaga buse buigi, buamanagua buno Isuluko.
Nu basankoga banene nu basanzi balondile bubamuita; kubuno bakule bantu boba.
Nu Satana eingide mu Yudasa wamanagua Isakaliote, nuwe aga­nzagua mu babo ikumi na babili.
Nu endile kugomia na basa­nkoga banene nu bakota ba bakoloboyo, buno abagabulilewe.
Nu babeide na mbogimbogi, nu bamulagile kumukasa falanga.
Nu eitabizizie, nu alondile buanabagabulilawe kuteli musanga­nano.
Nu busi bua tumpampa tutagaga buakukile, nu buatunganeine kukita kisagulo kiesuluko.
Nu asingile Petelo nu Yoana, nu abatendile bune, Endazi mutukitile isuluko, tuliazi.
Nu bamu­buide bune, Kuni kukutunda tualikulumizia?
Nu abatendile bune, Unguililazi gamuabase mu muino, muakulumane na wamu­lume eka idega lia mazi; muyangazi mu numba zingilage muzo.
Nu muabule nyene numba buno, Musozi akutenda bune, Kuni kuli busio bua bageni nilie na beigisibua bane kisagulo kiesuluko?
Nu amulolesie busio buli kuigulu bualongekilue: umumutulo­ngekela isuluko.
Nu bendile, nu bamonine ku bubo buabate­ndaga; nu balongekile isuluko.
Nu gakukile nkungu, eikeide ga meza na basingua.
Nu abatendile bune, Nkutunda nunse kulia kisagulo kiesuluko kikino neinyu, nti nsisungibua:
kubuno nkumubula bune, Nsikakilia lingo, aba galikazindilila mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu gatolile kituma asegile, atendile bune, Tolazi kituma kikino nu nusianiazi bueinyu bueinyu;
kubuno, nkumubula bune, Nsikanua lingo mazi ma biguma bia mizigi, aba nu gakavua bukota bua Kalaga.
Nu atolile kampampa, nu gasilile kusega, akabunguide, nu abakasile nu atendile bune, Kano keli mubili wane, wakasanua ku kabamba keinyu; kitazi bubuno bumukankengelaga.
Nu kituma nukio kusila kua kulia, nu atendile bune, Kituma kikino kili idagano ito mu mikila zane, zakubulua ku kabamba keinyu.
Tondo unguililazi, kuboko kua wozo ukungabula kuli nanne ga mamano meza.
Kubuno Muana wa muntu ende anga buazindi­lizibua: tondo kabebe ku wozo muntu wamugabula!
Balingile kubuzania buabo buabo, nazi wakite bubuno?
Nu beigisibua babeide na miango buabo buabo buno, nazi munene gabasamba.
Nu abuide bune, Bakota baBilongo be­kuangata, nu bangati bakumanua buno, Bakiti ba busoga.
To­ndo inyue tamube bubo; tondo we ukutunda kuba munene kumuli, abe anga mukeke; nuwe mukota, abe anga mukambi.
Kubuno nazi uli munene, wozo wikile ga meza, aba wozo ukukamba? tondo nili kumuli anga mukambi.
Tondo inuye, muabezaga nanne mu malindiko mane mansania;
nunne namubikila bukota, anga bubo buambikile Tatane,
buno mulie nu kunua ku meza mane mu bukota buane; nu mukeikala ga bisumbi bia bukota nu kusungia bilongo ikumi nu bibili bia balsalele.
Simona, Simona, Satana atundaga kukupepa anga mumpunge:
tondo nakusegeide, buno bukatizio buobe tabukokoke; nuwe ndi wasila kugaluka, lindia mibuto zobe.
Nu amutendile bune, Mukota nili nobe, nili kayikayika kuenda nobe ku kikando aba nu kukua.
Nu amutendile bune, Petelo, gabe nkoko tazibika lelo, wantune mambizi masatu buno ntunizi.
Nu ababuide lingo bune, Ganamusingaga tamuabezaga neisuku, nu nsago, nu bisalapata, muidile kikizi? Nu bamute­ndile bune, Tatuidile kampa.
Nu abatendile bune, Tondo kano kaluma, nyene isuku, alitole, nu nsago lingo; nu uteli na bupanga, akunzie nsulu zage, nu akunze bupanga.
Kubuno nkumubula bubo buasanzilue buatunganana buzindilile kundi, Nu aganzilue na bagi:
Nu batendile bune, Mukota, gano geli mapanga mabili, nu abatendile bune, Umpanga.
Nu atukile, nu endile ku muiduko wa Oleve, anga buabezaga lukita luage; nu beigisibua bage bamuyangile.
Nu gabasile ga kikio kiziki, abatendile bune, Segazi buno tamuingile mu malindiko.
Idekanukizie nabo anga bulazi buaganisua ikozi; nu akomine mazu nu asegile,
atendile bune, Tatane, ndi watunda, ntikizie kituma kikino: tondo ta kusombola kuane, tondo kuobe kukitue.
Nu mugenzi wa kuigulu amubaside kumulindia.
Nuwe ababazizibue nu asegile nunse bubibu; nu kilungu kiage kiabezaga kise kiasusanania anga matogi ma mikila makolokaga gansi.
Nu gasilile kusega, azanzukile nu endile kuabezaga beigisibua bage, nu abasangile beiyombeka ku tulo na kabebe,
nu atendile bune, Kubuni kumuiyombeka? Yukazi nu musege, buno tamuingile mu malindiko.
Kazanga kongo gatendaga, musanganano munene wabasile, nu wozo wamanagua Yudasa, umozi wa babo ikumi nu babili, avuaga luabusio luabo, akundile Yesu nu amumumine.
Tondo Yesu atendile Yudasa bune, Ndi ukugabula Muana wa muntu?
Nu babo babezaga nage, gabamonine ku bubo, batendile bune, Mukota, ndi tubabange na bupanga?
Nu umozi wa kubeli abangile mukobe wa sankoga munene, nu amusesile kutuzi kua seidume.
Tondo Yesu, atendile bune, Sigazi bubo. Nu eitubizie ku kutuzi kuage, nu onine.
Nu Yesu abuide basankoga banene, nu bakota ba numba za kukumbamina, nu bakulu bavuaga kueli bune, Buni bumuavua anga bekuvua ku muibi na mapanga nu nkoma?
Ganabezaga neinyu busi na busi mu numba za kukumbamina nu tamuandambizizie maboko; kano kaluma zili nkungu zeinyu, nu magala ma kapilo.
Nu bamukatile, nu bendile nage, nu kumusondelezia ku numba za sankoga munene. Nu Petelo amuyangile bulazi.
Nu gabakongezie keiya ga lusu nu bakungikene, Petelo abezaga nabo.
Nu mukikulu umozi mukambi, amumonine kuikala buigi na keiya, nu amulolile kisozi, atendile bune, Wono muntu abezaga nage.
Tondo atunine, atendile bune, Uwe mukikulu, nsizi wozo.
Nu gatingile nkungu nkeke, ungo amumonineko, amu­buide bune, Uwe uli umozi wa ku babo. Tondo Petelo atendile bune, Uwe wamulume, tanne.
Nu gatingile nkungu emozi ungo alingizie kutenda bune, Lebelebe wono muntu abezagile na wozo, kubuno eli muGalela.
Tondo Petelo atendile bune, Uwe, muntu, nsikumenya bukutenda. Nu kazanga kongo mukuba esate­nda mulume wa nkoko abikile.
Nu Mukota akebetukile, nu alolile Petelo. Nu Petelo akengeide buamubulaga Mukota buno, gabe nkoko tazibika, wantune lelo mambizi masatu.
Nu endile kumbuga, nu alilile bubibu.
Nu babo bantu gabakatile Yesu bamuililikile, nu bamulibuide.
Nu bamuzibile ku meiso, nu bamubuzizie bune, Lengania: Nazi wakulibula?
Nu bamutendile bingo bitondo bingi bia kumulinga.
Nu gakeide busi, musanganano wa bakulu nu basankoga banene nu basanzi; bakundamene; nu bamulusizie ku lusu luabo, batendile bune,
Ndi uwe u Klisto, tubule. Tondo Yesu aba­kuide bune, Ganamubulabo, tamunakatizia;
nu ganamubuzia, tamunanakula.
Tondo kutukila kano kaluma Muana wa muntu eikale kuseidume kua magala ma Kalaga.
Nu bansania batendile bune, Ndi uli Muana wa Kalaga? Nu abakuide bune, Inyue mukutenda buno nnowe.
Nu batendile bune, Bulongeki bukizi lingo butukutunda? Kubuno tungua kuatenda wenyene na kanua kage.
Nu musanganano unsania wazanzukile, nu bendile nage ku Pilato,
nu balingile kumukandika bitondo, batendile bune, Tuamonine wono muntu akuzimizia kilongo kietu, nu akubazugila buno tabalige idigo ku Kaisa, nu akuitenda buno eli Klisto Mukota.
Nu Pilato amubuzizie bune, Ndi uwe U Mukota wa baYuda? Nu amutendile bune, Bubo buwatenda.
Nu Pilato atendile basankoga banene nu musanganano bune, N sikumona ku bumozi ku muntu wono.
Tondo bamuakanizie, batendile bune, Eku­engelela bantu, nu kuigisia mu Yudaya unsania, kutuka ku Galela, ukualingide aba nu kuno.
Tondo Pilato gongule, abuzizie buno, ndi wono eli muntu wa Galela.
Nu gamenyine buno, abezaga ku buangato bua Helode, amusingile ku Helode abezaga ku Yelusalema mu bindi bibio.
Gamonine Helode ku Yesu abogilebogile nunse: kubuno kutukila wakalazi atundaga kumumonako, kubuno ongule ku bito­ndo biakitaga; nu atundaga kumona ku mugeleko wakukita.
Nu amubuzizie bitondo bingi; tondo ntamuakuide buampa.
Nu basankoga banene nu basanzi babezaga gago, nu bamukandikile bitondo bubibu.
Nu Helode nu bakoloboyo bage, bamukitile nguza, nu kumuililika, nu kusila kua bubo bamuvualikizie nsulu nsoga, nu amusubizie kua Pilato.
Helode nu Pilato bagomezie kutukila busi bubo: kubuno babezaga basombana.
Pilato akundamanizie basankoga banene nu bangati nu bantu,
nu abatendile bune, Muanvuilide na wono muntu, buno ekuengelela bantu: nu namubuzizie ku bitondo bibino bimuamuka­ndikile kubio, nu nsiamonine ku bubi bumozi bumuamukandikaga;
aba Helode nuwe ukiamusubizizie kutuli ntamuene ku kitondo kiatunganana kukuila muntu.
Umpanga nkumususula nu nti namukandula.
Kubuno ku busi bua kisagulo buatunganana mukandua umozi kukandulua.
Tondo balalukile bubibu ba­nsania gamozi, bune, Tikia wozo, nu utukandulile Balaba:
wono muntu akandilue mu kikando ku musona wabezaga mu muino nu ku buiti.
Nu Pilato abatendile lingo, kubuno atundaga kuka­ndula Yesu;
tondo balalukile bune, Mutakazi, mutakazi.
Nu ababuide limbizi lia masatu bune, Kubuni, bubi bukizi buaki­tile; nsikumenya bumozi buanakuila. Nkumulibula nu nti na­mukandula.
Tondo balalukile bubibu, basegile buno atakue. Nu moki mabo makindile.
Nu Pilato asengezezie buno buba­kutunda bukitue.
Nu akanduide wozo wakandagua ku kabamba ka musona nu buiti wozo ubatundaga, tondo agabuide Yesu anga bubatundaga.
Nu gabamukatile, batolile muntu umozi wamanagua Simona wa Kulene, atukaga muisoa, bamuekezie muti wa magu, kumbusa kua Yesu.
Nu musanganano munene wa bantu wamuyangile, nu bakikulu beidibulaga ku makuba nu bamulililaga.
Tondo Yesu akebetukile nu atendile bune, Bakinga ba Yelusalema, tamu­nandilila, tondo idililazi nu kulilila bana beinyu.
Kubuno bindi biavue bakatenda buno, Mbogimbogi ku bagumba nu nda zita­buta, nu mabele matakumomia.
Nu bakalinga kubula miduko bune, Tulimbazi; nu tubisazi.
Kubuno ndi bekukita bitondo bibino ku muti mubisi, buni bukakitua ku muti woma?
Nu bendile na bango babili beiti, buno beitue nage kiandindi.
Nu gababasile ga kiziki kibamanaga buno, Nkungu, nu kuko ukubamutakile ku muti wa magu, nu babo bagi, umozi kuaseidume nu ungo kuaseikazi.
Nu Yesu atendile bune, Tatane basigilile; kubuno tabeizi bubekukita. Nu babegeine nsulu zage, nu baze­side mbale.
Nu bantu babezaga bemana nu balolaga, Nu bangati bamuililikile batendile bune, Onezie bango; eiyonie we­nyene, ndi eli Klisto wa Kalaga, musombolua wage.
Nu bakoloboyo nubo bamuililikile, nu bavule kueli nu bamukasile maku makali,
nu batendile bune, Ndi uwe u Mukota wa baYuda, iyonie uwenyene.
Nu kuabezaga isanzo gantata gage buno, WONO ELI MUKOTA WA BAYUDA.
Nu umozi wa ku babo batakilue nabo amulingile, atendile bune, Ndi uwe ntuli tugu Klisto? Iyonie uwenyene nu tonie nuisue.
Tondo ungo amuzugide, nu atendile bune, Ndi ntu­kukua tugu Kalaga boba, nu mu lusungio lumozi umutuli?
Butukusungibua buligo; kubuno tukusungibua ku buagi bueitu; tondo wono ntakitile buampa buanakuila.
Nu atendile ku Yesu bune, Kunkengelaga gokeingila mu bukota buobe.
Nu amuakuide bune, Lebelebe nkukubula bune, Lelo wabe nanne mu Paladiso.
Nu zabezaga zakuka nkungu mutuba, nu kuabeide kapilo ku kisi kinsania aba nu ku nkungu mubula.
Nu kisongo kia busi takiasanine lingo: nsulu za numba za kukumbamina zatikile munka­tini.
Nu Yesu alalukile neiyuki inene bune, Tatane nabika kalamo kane mu maboko mobe: nu asilile kutenda bubo, eidekanizie wenyene.
Nu mukota wa bakoloboyo gamonine bubo buaba, aganuine Kalaga, nu atendile bune, Lebelebe wono muntu abezaga eisanana.
Nu bansania babezaga ku musanganano bangamine gabamonine ku bubo buabeide, nu basubanizie beidibulaga ku makuba.
Nu bansania babezaga bemuizi nu bakikulu bamuya­ngaga kutuka ku Galela, babezaga beikile kulazi nu balolaga bubo.
Nu kuabezaga muntu umozi wa luango, izina liage Yosefu, muntu musoga nu weisanana
(tondo nteitabizizie luango luabo, nu kukita kuabo), abezaga muntu wa Alimataya, muino munene wa baYuda, nu alindilaga bukota bua Kalaga:
nu wono muntu endile ku Pilato, nu asegile kitumba kia Yesu.
Nu Akikumbizie, nu akikandile na nsulu zabota, nu akibikile mu nsinda zabazilue muikozi, tamubikua kingo kitumba.
Nu buabezaga busi bua Kulongeka, nu busi bua sabato buse buigi.
Nu bakikulu ba­tukaga ku Galela, bayangile, nu kulola ku nsinda, buno buni bua­bikilue kitumba kiage.
Nu basubizie nu balongekile ngenge nu bulago. Nu busi bua sabato bomuinue anga buakakizizibue.
Tondo mu busi bua kulinga bueizinga, mu nindunindu nunse, bendile ku nsinda, na bulago bubabikile kayikayika.
Nu basangile lilio ikozi liatukibua ku nsinda.
Nu gabingidemo tabamonine ku kitumba kia Mukota Yesu.
Nu bangamine na bubo, nu bantu babili babezaga bemana buigi nabo, babezaga bavuala nsulu zikukelima:
nu bakule boba, nu baguede gansi bukukumania, bamubuide bune, Buni bumukulonda wozo mulami munkantini mua bakuzi?
Nteli gano, tondo ayuka: kengelazi buamutendile nti eikikile ku Galela,
nu atendile buno, buatu­nganana Muana wa muntu agabulue ku maboko ma bagi, nu kuta­kua, nu kusila kua bindi bisatu nti ayuke.
Nu bakengede bua­batendaga.
Nu gabatukile ku nsinda, nu basubizie kusambalila babo ikumi nu umozi, nu ku bango bansania.
Nu babezaga Malia Magadala, nu Yoali nu Malia nina wa Yakobo: nu bango bakikulu babezaga nabo, basambalide basingua bubo bunsania.
Tabangile bubo bubatendagua nu tabakatizizie.
Tondo Petelo azanzukile nu eitumine lubilo ku nsinda; nu akumbamine nu amonine tugu ku zezo nsulu zabota zabezaga gansi; nu endile ku numba zage, nu angamine na bubo buabeide.
Nu kuabezaga mu bubo busi beigisibua babili bendile ku muino wamanagua Emau, wabezaga bulazi na Yelusalema anga lugendo lua nkungu ibili.
Nubo basambalilene bubo bunsania buabeide.
Nu gabasambalilanaga nu kubuzania, Yesu wenyene avule buigi nabo nu endede nabo gamozi.
Tondo meiso mabo mazibilue buno tabamumenyinine.
Nu ababuide bune, Buni bumukuenda muasambalilana nu mukuenda? Nu bemanine, nu babezaga na kabebe.
Nu umozi wa kubeli, izina liage Koleopa, amuakuide bune, Ndi Uwe uli tugu mugenzi mu Yelusalema utemenya tondo buetile kuko ku bindi bibino?
Nu abatendile bune, Buni buabeide? Nu bamutendile bune, Bua Yesu wa Naza­leta, abezaga mulegania mubibu mu kukita nu mu kutenda ku Kalaga nu ku bantu bansania;
basankoga nu bangati beitu bamugabuide buno asungibue nu buno akue, nu bamutakile.
Tondo isue tuabezagile tukumulemanina buno, we akulule Isalele. Nu lingo lelo, ukindi kia bisatu na gakitidue bubo.
Lingo bakikulu bamozi ba kueitu batuangamizie gabendagile ku nsinda lukesikesi;
nu tabamonine ku kitumba kiage, nu gabavule batutendile buno, bamonine ku migenzi, zabatendile buno, alama.
Nu bamozi ku babo batuabezaga nabo bendile ku nsinda nu bamonine ku bubo buatendaga babo bakikulu: tondo we tabamu­monineko.
Nu abatendile bune, Inyue batakumenyinina, nu beli na mitima zatamba ku kukatizia binsania biatendaga balenga­nia!
Ndi tabuatunganana Klisto kusungibua ku bitondo bibino, nu kuingila mu lutanuno luage?
Nu kutukila ku Mose nu ku balengania bansania, abasambalide buisulilua bua masanzo mansania masanzidue wenyene.
Nu babasile buigi na muino gubendaga kugo nu endile anga ukutinga.
Nu bamusubizie, nu batendile bune, Ikala neisue; kubuno busi buseli muigolo, nu buse buida. Nu eingide nu eikeide nabo.
Nu gabezaga esalia nabo, atolile kampampa; nu asegile; nu akabunguide nu abakasileko.
Nu meiso mabo malimbuidue, nu bamumenyine: nu ababombile.
Nu batendeine buabo buabo bune, Ndi tatuabezaga na mitima tugu zakukengela, gatuatendaga nage mu nzila, nu gatulolesagia masanzo?
Nu batukile mu zezo nkungu, nu basubizie ku Yelusalema, nu basangile beigisibua ikumi nu umozi bakundamana nu bango babezaga nabo, nu batendile bune,
Lebelebe Mukota ayuka, nu amonekako na Simona.
Nu babasambalide bansania buabede mu nzila, nu lukita lubamumenyine mu kubungula ka­mpampa.
Nu nkungu zibatendaga bubo, we wenyene emanine muni ati­ni muabo, nu ababuide bune, Bobelelazi.
Tondo basalimine nu bakule boba nunse, nu bakengeide buno bamona ku musumbu.
Nu ababuide bune, Kubuni kumukuzangazanga nu kubuni muli na kanongonongo mu mitima zeinyu?
Lolazi ku maboko mane nu ku magulu mane, buno unne wono; mbabatazi nu ndo­lazi; kubuno musumbu nteli na misuna nu makua, anga bumu­kumonako.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubo abalolesezie makasa mage nu magulu mage.
Nu gababezaga tabekatizia na mbogi­mbogi, nu bangamine, abatendile bune, Ndi muli neidia gano?
Nu bamukasile kindi kia kiena kiokibua.
Nu akitolile, nu akilile nti bakumona.
Nu ababuide bune, Bubuno ubunamubulile ganabezaga neinyu, buno buatunganana kuzindilila bubo bunsania bunasa­nzidue mu mulembe wa Mose, nu balengania, nu mu nimbo.
Nu abakasile makengelo buno bamenyinine masanzo.
Nu ababuide bune, Ububo buasanzilue bune, Klisto akasu­ngibua nu nti ayuke ku bakuzi kusila kua bindi bisatu;
nu ba­Bilongo bansania basambalilue kuiyania nu kusigililua misako za buagi buabo muizina liane, kulinga ku Yelusalema.
Nu inyue muli balongeki ba bitondo bibino.
Nu lebelebe namuvuila neidagano lia Tatane; tondo iziziazi mu muino, aba nu gamua­vualikibue na magala matuke kuigulu.
Nu abasondelezizie aba nu ku Betania, nu alambizie maboko, nu abakitide mponga.
Nu gabakitide mponga alekanukile nabo, nu ekilue muigulu.
Nu gabasilile kumukumbamina ba­subizie ku Yelusalema na mbogimbogi nnene:
nu beikeide mu numba za kukumbamina bindi binsania, baganuine Kalaga.
Mukulinga muabezaga Idagi, nu Idagi abezaga na Kalaga, nu Idagi abezaga Kalaga.
We mukulinga abezaga na Kalaga.
Binsania biakitilue nage; nu takuli kena kakitilue katakitile.
Mueli muabezaga kalamo; nu kalamo kako kabezaga kiengi kia bantu.
Kiengi kiasanine mu kapilo; tondo kapilo takakikindile.
Muntu avule, musingua wa Kalaga, izina liage Yoana.
Wono avule ku bulongeki, buno alongekele kikio kiengi, buno ba­nsania bakatizie mueli.
Wono ntabezaga kikio kiengi, tondo avule buno alongekele kikio kiengi.
Kiengi kia bulili kiabezaga, kiavule ku kisi, kisanie bantu bansania.
Wono abezaga mu kisi, nu kisi kiakitilue nage, tondo kisi takiamumenyinine.
Avule ku bage, tondo bage tabamusekede.
Tondo bansania bamusekeide, abakasile buangato kuba bana ba Kalaga, ubabo baka­tizizie izina liage:
babutilue ta ku mikila, aba ta ku lutundo lua mubili, aba ta ku lutundo lua wamulume, tondo lua Kalaga.
Nu Idagi akitilue mubili, nu eikalile munkatini muetu (nu tuamonine ku lutanuno luage, luabezaga anga Muana wa ngomo watukile kulsi), eiyala na mponga nu bulili.
Yoana amulonge­kede, nu alalukile neiyuki, atendile bune, Uwozo unamubulaga buno, Ekuvua kumbusa kuane eseli luabusio luane; kubuno ali­ngaga kuba luabusio luane.
Kubuno mu kuzindilizia kuage isue bansania tuakitilue mponga nunse.
Mulembe wakasilue ku Mose, tondo mponga nu bulili biavule na Yesu Klisto.
Takuli muntu wamonine ku Kalaga; tugu Muana umozi wa ngomo eli ku bukuba bulsi we uwamulolesia.
Nu bubuno ubulongeki bua Yoana, baYuda bamusingide basankoga nu baLewi kutuka ku Yelusalema buno bamubuzizie bune, Uwe unazi?
Nuwe eitabizizie, nu ntatunine, nu eita­bizizie bune, Nne nsili Klisto.
Bamubuzizie bune, Uli nazi? ndi uwe u Eliya? Nu atendile bune, Nsili wozo. Bamubuzizie lingo bune, Ndi uli wozo mulengania? Nu akuide bune, Kilo.
Bamubuzizie bune, Uli nazi? buno tuasambalile batusingile. Buni bukuibula?
Atendile bune, Nne nili iyuki lia muntu ukulalukaga mu kalula bune, Isiazi matingilo ma Mukota, anga buatendile mulengania Yesaya.
Nubo basingagua na baFalese.
Bamubuzizie bune, Ndi ntuli Klisto aba Eliya, aba mulengania wono, buni bukubatizia?
Yoana abatendile bune, Nkubatizia na mazi; munkatini muenyu muemanuka umutakumenya,
avue kumbusa kuane, nsiatananina kukandula mizigi za bisalapata biage.
Bubo buakitilue mu Betania lisilia lia Yadene, muaba­tizagia Y oana.
Gakede busi amonine ku Yesu ekuvua kueli, nu atendile bune, Lolazi Muana wa Mukoko wa Kalaga, ukueka buagi bua bantu ba kisi.
Uwono unamubulaga bune, Avue kumbusa kuane eseli luabusio luane kubuno alingaga kuba luabusio luane.
Nne nsiamumenyine; tondo navule kubatizia na mazi buno amoneke ku balsalele.
Nu Yoana alongekile bune, Namona ku Muuza Wasililila ekugela muigulu anga nkulimba; nu zemene gantata gage.
Nsiamumenyine, tondo ansingile kubatizia na mazi ambuide bune, Muntu uwamonage Muuza ekumugelela, nu kuikala gantata gage, we ukubatizia na Muuza Wasililila.
Namonine ku bubo nu nalongekede bantu bune, Wono eli Muana wa Kalaga.
Gakede busi lingo, Yoana abezaga emana na beigisibua bage babili;
nu alolile Yesu kisozi, ekuenda, nu atendile bune, Lolazi, Muana wa Mukoko wa Kalaga!
Nu beigisibua bongule kuatendaga bayangile Yesu.
Nu Yesu akebetukile, abamonine bekumuyanga, ababuzizie bune, Kikizi kimukulonda? Nu bamu buide bune, Labi (buisulilua buabo Musozi), kuni kukuikalaga?
Nu ababuide bune, Vuazi mumone. Bendile nu bamonine kuikalilaga; nubo beikeide nage kindi kikio; zabezaga zakuka nkungu ikumi.
Andele, muto wa Simona Petelo abezaga umozi wa kubabo babili bonguaga kuatendaga Yoana, nu kuyanga Yesu.
Nu alingile kubasa kuko kuabezaga iselenzi Simona, amubuide bune, Tuamona ku Masiya (buisulilua buabo Klisto).
Avule nage ku Yesu. Yesu amulolile kisozi, amubuide bune, Uli Simona, muana wa Yoana: bakakumana Kefa (buisulilua bualio Petelo, aba Ikozi).
Gakede busi, atundile kuenda mu kisi kia Galela, nu asangile Filipo, nu Yesu amubuide bune, Nyange.
Filipo abezaga wa ku Betesaida, mu muino wa Andele nu Petelo,
Filipo asangile Natanaele, amubuide bune, Tuamona ku wozo wasanzilue na Mose mu mulembe, nu balengania, Yesu wa ku Nazaleta, Muana wa Yosefu.
Nu Natanaele amubuzizie bune, Munatuka kisoga mu Nazaleta? Filipo amubuide bune, Vua umone.
Yesu alolile Na­tanaele ekuvua kueli, nu atendile bune, Lolazi mulsalele lebelebe, nteli na buengelezi mueli.
Natanaele amutendile bune, Buni buwamenya? Yesu amubuide bune, Gabezaga Filipo ntekumana, wabezaga gansi na muti wa figi nakumonineko.
Natanaele amubuide bune, Labi, uwe uli Muana wa Kalaga nunse, nu uli Mukota wa Isalele,
Yesu amutendile bune, Ndi wakatizia kubuno nakubula buno nakumonineko gansi na muti wa figi? Wamone ku bungo buatinga bubuno.
Nu amubuide bune, Lebelebe mukamona igulu liakandulua nu migenzi za Kalaga ziku­bakama nu zikugela ku Muana wa muntu.
Mu kindi kia bisatu, isonga liabezaga mu Kana wa Galela; nu nina wa Yesu abezaga kuko:
nu bamanine Yesu nu beigisibua bage ku kisagulo.
Nu gasilile maku nina wa Yesu amubuide bune, Tabeli na maku.
Nu Yesu amubuide bune, Mukikulu, nili nobe buni? Nkungu zane tazika.
Nina abuide bakambi bune, Nti muakita tugu anga buamubulage.
Kua­bezaga malega mutuba ma makozi mabikagua mu mazi ma koga anga lukita lua baYuda, nalio nalio naliakukaga mu litele makumi mubula.
Yesu ababuide bune, Iyaziazi malega na mazi. Nu beyaziziemo bundo.
Ababuide bune, Matagazi, nu muende namo ku wozo mukota wa kisagulo.
Nu gasondile mukota wa kisagulo ku mamo mazi magalukile maku, ntamenyine kuma­tukile (tondo bakambi bamatagaga ubamenyine buno mazi), wozo mukota wa kisagulo amanine musongi,
nu amubuide bune, Na muntu na muntu nokukasanaga maku masoga, nu ndi bamanua, nu kusila nti abakasa mango mabi: tondo uwe walangile maku masoga aba nu kano kaluma.
Wozo umugeleko mutangi wa­kitile Yesu mu Kana wa Galela, nu alolesezie bantu lutanuno luage; nu beigisibua bage bamukatizizie.
Nu endile na nina nu bato bage, nu beigisibua bage ku Kapenuma; nu tabezizizieko bindi bingi.
Nu kisagulo kia baYuda kiabezaga buigi, nu Yesu abakamine ku Yelusalema.
Nu asangile bakunzia ba ngombe nu mikoko nu nkulimba, nu bagalukia ba falanga beikile mu numba za kuku­mbamina:
nu agondile kasusula ka musinge, nu embizie babo bansania mu zezo numba, nu mikoko nu ngombe; nu abalangani­zie falanga za bagulania, nu edukizie meza mabo;
nu ababuide bakunzia ba bilinga bune, Tukiazi bibino; tamunakita numba za Tatane anga numba za kagulilo.
Beigisubua bage bakengede idagi liasanzilue bune, Kangonongono ka ku numba zobe kandia.
Nu baYuda bamubuzizie bune, Ukutulosia kalolesio kakizi kakukita bubuno?
Yesu atendile bune, Itazi zeno numba zakukumbamina, nu nazobake lingo ku bindi bisatu.
BaYuda batendile bune, Bobakile zeno numba nnene zakukumbamina miaka makumi manazi nu mutuba, nu uwe gunazobaka ku bindi bisatu?
Tondo atendaga ku numba nnene za kukumbamina za mubili wage.
Gayukile ku bakuzi, beigisibua bage bakengede buno abatendile bubo; nu bakatizizie lilio isanzo, nu bubo buabatendaga Yesu.
Gabezaga mu Yelusalema ku kisagulo kiesuluko, bantu beingi bakatizizie izina liage, gabamonine migeleko zakitile.
Tondo Yesu ntabetabizizie, kubuno abezaga eizi bansania,
kubuno nteiyaninaga bulongeki bua muntu; kubuno wenyene amenyaga makengelo ma muntu.
Kuabezaga muntu umozi wa baFalese, izina liage Nikodemo, abezaga muangati wa baYuda:
amuvuilide mu kindi, nu amu­buide bune, Labi, tukumenya buno uli musozi watukile kua Kala­ga; kubuno takuli muntu unavuama kukita migeleko zeno ziuku­kita, ndi Kalaga nteli nage.
Yesu amuakuide bune, Lebelebe, lebelebe, nkukubula buno ndi muntu ntabutua lingo, ntanavuama kumona ku bukota bua Kalaga.
Nikodemo amubuide bune, Buni bunabutua lingo muntu nu ese mukungu? Ndi aningila lingo mu­nda za nina nu kubutua lingo?
Yesu akuide bune, Lebelebe, lebelebe, nkukubula buno, ndi muntu ntabutua ku mazi nu ku Muuza, ntanavuama kuingila mu bukota bua Kalaga.
Kia­butua ku mubili nti mubili; nu kiabutua ku Muuza nti kia muuza.
Ntunangama kuiyuki linakubula buno, buamutunganana kubutua lingo.
Lumpumpu lukupupa kulukutunda, nu muzumio walo gukungubua, tondo ntukumenya kulukutuka, nu kulukuenda: muntu unsania wabutilue ku Muuza eli bubo.
Nikodemo atendile bune, Buni bunavuama bubuno?
Yesu atendile bune, Uli musozi wa balsalele nu ntukumenyinina bubuno?
Le­belebe, lebelebe, nkukubula buno, bubo butukumenya ubutuku­tenda, nu bubo butukumonako ubutukulongeka; tondo tamuita­bizia bulongeki bueitu.
Ndi nkumubula bua ga kisi, nu tamu­kubukatizia, nu buni bumunakatizia ndi namubula bua muigulu?
Nu takuli muntu wabakamine kuigulu, tondo wozo watukile kuigulu, u Muana wa muntu uli muigulu.
Nu anga buasakikile Mose nzoka mu kalula, bubo Muana wa muntu atunganana kusa­kikua.
Nu muntu unsania wamukatizia abe na kalamo kata­nakuzinda.
Kubuno Kalaga eitide nunse kutunda ba ga kisi, akasene Muana wage wa ngomo, buno muntu unsania wamukatizia ntazimine, tondo abe na kalamo katanakuzinda.
Kubuno Kalaga ntasingile Muana wage ku kisi kukisungia, tondo kisi kionibue mueli.
Wamukatizia ntasungibue; gutamukatizia asila kusungibua; kubuno ntakatizizie izina lia Muana wa ngomo wa Kalaga.
Nu luluno luli lusungio buno, kiengi kiavule ku kisi, tondo bantu belamine kapilo kutinga kiengi; kubuno misako zabo zabezaga mibi.
Kubuno muntu unsania ukukita mibi ekusomba kiengi, nu ntekuvua ku kiengi buno misako zage zinazu­gilua.
Tondo muntu unsania ukukita misako za bulili ekuvua ku kiengi, buno misako zage zimonekeko kubuno zikukitua mu Kalaga.
Kusila kua bubo, Yesu nu beigisibua bage bavule mu lulenge lua Yudaya; ezizizie kuko nu abatizizieko.
Nu Yoana nuwe abatizagia ku Ainona buigi na Salima, kubuno kuko kuabezaga mazi meingi: nu bantu bavule, nu babatizizibue.
Kubuno Yoana abezaga ntekandua.
Beigisibua ba Yoana babezaga na miango na muYuda umozi ku kitondo kia kuengibua.
Nu bavule ku Yoana, nu bamubuide bune, Labi, guwabezaga nage lisilia lia Yadene, uguwalongekelaga, we ekubatizia, nu bantu bansania bekuenda kueli.
Yoana abakuide bune, Muntu ntanamona buampa, ndi ntakasuabo muigulu.
Inyue benyene mukundo­ngekela buno natendile bune, Nsili Klisto, tondo nalinge kusingua luabusio luage.
Uli na mukikulu nti u musongi: tondo muida wa musongi ekuimana nage, ekunguilila iyuki liage, ekuba na mbogimbogi kuiyuki lia musongi: mbogimbogi zane zasililila.
Atunganana kukutibua, nunne nisigulizibue.
Watuka muigulu nti atinga bansania: wa ga kisi eli wa kisi, nu nti ekutenda bia ga kisi: nu watuka muigulu nti atinga bansania.
Bubo buamonineko nu bunguleko, ububo buekulongeka; nu takuli ukuitabizia bulongeki buage.
Wetabizia bulongeki buage nti abikua kamenyikilo buno, Kalaga eli bulili.
Kubuno wasingilue na Kalaga ekutendaga moki ma Kalaga: kubuno Kalaga ekukasanaga Muuza ntagulindika.
Isi atunda Muana, nuwe amukasa binsania mu maboko mage.
Walatizia Muana eli na kalamo katanakuzinda; tondo utakatizia Muana ntakamona kalamo, tondo bongua bua Kalaga buamuikalila.
Gamenyine Mukota buno baFalese bongule buno, Yesu atinga Yoana ku beigisibua nu ku kubatizia
(tondo Yesu wenyene ntabatizagia, tondo beigisibua bage ubabatizagia tugu),
atukile ku Yudaya, nu asubanizie lingo ku Galela.
Nu buamutunganene buno atinge mu Samalia.
Avule ku muino wa Samalia, izina liago Sikala, buigi na lilio isoa lia Yakobo liakasaga muana wage Yosefu:
nu gago ugabezaga kanua balongo ka Yakobo, Yesu akutilue na lugendo, eikeide buigi na kanua ba­longo. Zabezaga zise nkungu mutuba.
Mukikulu wa mu Samalia avule kutaga mazi. Yesu amubuide bune, Nkase mazi ma kunua.
Kubuno beigisibua bage babezaga basila kuenda ku muino kukunza idia.
Nu wozo mukikulu wa mu Samalia amu­buide bune, Buni bunili nobe uwe muYuda ukutunda nkukase mazi, nunne nili mukikulu wa mu Samalia? (Kubuno baYuda nu ba­Samalia tabakugomanagia.)
Yesu amuakuide bune, Songo wizi lukaso lua Kalaga, nu nazi ukukubuzia, buno nkase mazi ninue, songo unamusegile, nuwe anakukasile mazi ma kalamo.
Wozo mukikulu amubuide bune, Mukota, ntuli na kituma kia kutaga, kubuno kanua balongo keli kazindu: nu kuni kuwasangile mazi ma kalamo?
Ndi uwe watinga tateisue Yakobo, watukasile kanua balongo kakano, kanuaga muko na bana bage nu bituganua biage?
Yesu amuakuide bune, Wanua ku mazi mamano anakua na mpusia lingo:
tondo wanua ku mazi manamukasa ntanakua na mpusia nunse; tondo mazi manamukasa manaba mueli anga kanua balongo ka mazi kakukulungukaga mu kalamo katanakuzinda.
Wozo mukikulu amubuide bune, Mukota, nkase mamo mazi buno nsikue na mpusia lingo, buno nsivue kutaga lingo gano.
Yesu amubuide bune, Enda umane iba wobe, uvue nage gano.
Wozo mukikulu amuakuide bune, Nsili na wamulume. Yesu amubuide bune, Watenda buligo nunse, ntuli na wamulume:
kubuno wabezaga na bamulume batano, nu wozo uli kueli kano kaluma nteli iba wobe: watenda buligo.
Wozo mukikulu amubuide bune, Mukota, namenya buno, uli mulengania.
Batateisue bakumbaminaga ku muiduko wono; tondo inyue mukutenda buno, mu Yelusalema muli kiziki kiatunganana kuku­mbaminuamo.
Yesu amubuide bune, Mukikulu, nkatizie, nkungu zikakuka tamukakumbamina Tatane ku muiduko wono, aba ku Yelusalema.
Inyue mukukumbamina kimutizi: isue tuku­kumbamina kituizi; kubuno lonio lukutuka ku baYuda.
Tondo nkungu zikakuka, nu ziseli, buno bakumbamizi ba lebelebe bakukumbamina Tatane mu muuza nu bulili: kubuno Tatane ekulonda bantu anga babano buno bamukumbamine.
