Nu ku busi bua kulinga buizinga, tuakundamene buno tubu­ngule tumpampa, nu Paolo abasambalide nu atundaga kuenda busi buibili mu nindunindu; tondo atendile bitondo biage bingi aba nu munkatini mua kindi.
Nu bubo busio bua kuigulu kutuabezaga tuakundamana muabezaga tusuku tuingi tuagulumina.

Mua­bezaga musikila umozi eikalide geitengu lia numba izina liage Eutuko, nu azenzede na tulo, nu gabeide Paolo alengelelua na kuigisia, nuwe alengeledue na tulo akolokile gansi kutukila ku nkiko zisatu kuigulu, nu bamuzanzuide akua.
Nu Paolo agelile, aguide gantatawe, amukatile na maboko mage ababuide bune, Tamunakita kazege; kubuno ekikili na kalamo.
Nu abakamine lingo kuigulu, nu abunguide tumpampa, nu alile, nu asambeide lingo nabo nkungu ndazi aba nu gakeide busi, nu endile.
Nu bavule na musikila eli na kalamo, nu babibile nunse.
Tondo isue, tualingile kuenda na buato aba ku Aso, tuatu­ndaga kusekela Paolo: kubuno ubuatulagile, atundaga kuenda na magulu.
Nu atusangile ku Aso, tuamusekede, nu tuavule ku Mitulene.
Nu gatuatukile gago na buato, tuabasile buigi na Kio; nu ku kindi kia bibili tuabasile ku Samo; tuikede ku Tuligulio, nu ku kindi kia bisatu tuabasile ku Mileto.
Kubuno Paolo akengelaga kutinga ku Efeso na buato, kubuno anavua kuizizia mu Asia; kubuno alemaninaga kusasia, buno abase ku Yelusalema ku busi bua Pentekoste ndi buakulungana.
Kutukila ku Mileto asingile muntu ku Efeso, buno amane bakulu ba ekelezia.
Nu gababasile kueli ababuide bune, Inyue benyene muizi, kutukila busi butangi bunabasile muno ku Asia, lukita lukizi lunabezaga nalo kueinyu bindi binsania,
na­kitilaga Mukota mu kuibotia kunsania, nu nakulila, nu malindiko manalindikilue ku kabamba ka misona za baYuda;
nu nsiakule boba bua kumusambalila bunsania bunamukasia, tondo namuigisizie kuabezaga bantu bansania, nu ku numba na numba,
nalo­ngekelaga baYuda nu baGeleka kuiyania ku Kalaga, nu kuba na bukatizio ku Mukota weitu Yesu Klisto.
Unguililazi, kano kaluma nkuenda ku Yelusalema kunasindikua na mutima, nsizi bunamoneko kuko:
tondo nizi buno Muuza Wasililila eku­ndongekela ku muino na muino, nu ekumbula buno bikando nu mbabazio zikundindila kuko.

Tondo nsikukengela buno ka­lamo kane keli kena, nu takeli na bukunza kundi kutinga kuzi­ndilizia lugendo luane, nu mulimo unakasilue na Mukota Yesu, nu takatinga kusambala musagu musoga wa mponga za Kalaga.
Kano kaluma, unguililazi, nizi buno, inyue bansania banabezaga nabo nu kusambala musagu wa bukota, tamukamonako lingo.
Kubuno nkumulongekela mu busi bua lelo buno, nenga kubuno nsili na kabamba ku mikila za bantu bansania.
Kubuno nsiakutilue na kumusambalila kusombola kunsania kua Kalaga.
Idangazi, nu langazi kikio kibombo kinsania, Muuza Wasililila amubikidekio, buno mube balangi bakio, nu kulisia ekelezia lia Mukota liakunzile na mikila zage.
Nizi buno, ganabe nenda kuane kuli ngozi nkali zikavua munkatini mueinyu zikabala­ngania kibombo;
nu kumuli kukaba bakabula bantu buteligo, kuluta beigisibua buno babayange.
Ku bubuno kesiazi ntende, nu mukengele nsiamenkile kumuana miaka esatu kukengelezia muntu na muntu mu kindi nu mu musi ku kulila.
Kano kaluma nkumusiga mu maboko ma Kalaga, nu mu idagi lia mponga zage, linavuama kumukuzia, nu kumukasa bupieni na basuagibua bansania.
Nsiatonezie muntu feza, aba olo, aba nsulu zage.
Inyue muizi buno maboko mamano makitile buneiyaninaga, nu ku bansania banabezaga nabo.
Ku bubuno bunsania namulo­lesia kisusania kia kukokomezia mulimo, buatunganana kukasia batamba, nu kukengela malagi ma Mukota Yesu atendile we wenyene bune, Kukasana kukubogiabogia ku kukasua.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubo, akomine mazu gansi nu asegile na bansania.
Nu bansania balilile bubibu, nu bakumbatide Paolo, nu bamulagile,
babede na kabebe kuiyuki liatendile bune, Tamukamonako lingo. Nu bamuelekezizie ku buato.
Nu gabeide tuasila kulekanuka nabo tuendile na buato, tuendile mu nzila zemana nu tuabasile ku Kosa, nu gakeide busi tuabasile ku Loda, nu kutuka kuko tuabasile ku Patala:
nu tuamonine ku buato bukuenda ku Foiniki, tuingide mubo, nu buatuekile.
Nu gatuamonine ku Kupulio, tuakisigile ku seikazi, nu tuatingile ku Sulia, nu tuemanine ku Tula; kubuno batikizie mizigo zabezaga mu buato kuko.
Nu gatuamonine ku beigisibua kuko, tuikeide nabo bindi mutuba kamo: nubo babuide Paolo mu Muuza buno, ntende ku Yelusalema.

Nu gatuazindilizizie bindi bietu tuatukile nu tuendile; nu bantu bansania nu bakikulu babo nu bana babo, bendile batuelekezia kuisula lia muino: gatuabasile geisokelo, tuakomine mazu nu tuasegile, nu tualagene nabo;
nu tuingide mu buato, tondo bo basubizie kuabo.
Nu gatuasilile lugendo lueitu kutukila ku Tula, tuabasile ku Tolomai; nu tuasekede mibuto zeitu, nu tuatingizie nabo kindi kimozi,
Nu munindunindu tuatukile ku Kaisalia: tuingide mu numba za Filipo, musambazi wa musagu musoga, abezaga umozi wa ku babo mutuba kamo, nu tuikede kuage.
Wozo muntu abezaga na bakinga bage banazi betemenya wamulume, babezaga bekulengania.
Nu gatuizizizie kuko kuabasile mulengania umozi izina liage Agabo atukaga ku Yudaya,

nu atuvuilide, nu asongezie mukoma wa Paolo, eikandile wenyene ku magulu nu ku maboko, atendile bune, Muuza Wasililila abula bune, Ububo buakite baYuda mu Yelusalema nyene wono mukoma nubo ba­mugabule ku maboko ma bantu baBilongo.
Nu gatuongule kububo, isue nu bantu beiya gago tuamusegile buno ntanenda ku Yelusalema.
Nu Paolo abuide bune, Buni bumukulila nu kuntambia mutima? Kubuno nili kayikayika ta ku kukandua tugu kankanka, tondo kukua ku Yelusalema ku kabamba keizina lia Mukota Yesu.
Nu gatazigile kungua butuatendaga, tuikeide kibibi, tuatendile bune, Kusombola kua Mukota kukitue.
Nu gatingile bindi bibio tuakanine mizigo zeitu nu tuabaka­mine ku Yelusalema.
Nu beigisibua bamozi batukaga ku Kaisalia, tuendile nabo bavule na Munasona, muntu wa ku Kupulio, abezaga muigisibua mutangi, buno tuikale kuage.
Nu gatuabasile ku Yelusalema, babo mibuto zeitu batusekeide na mbogimbogi.
Nu gakeide busi Paolo eingide neisue kua Yakobo; nu bakulu bansania babezaga kuko.
Nu gasilile kubasekela, abasambalide bunsania buakitile Kalaga ku baBilongo mu kusambala kuage.
Nubo, gabongule ku bubo, baganuine Kalaga; nu batendile bune, Mubuto weitu, ukumona ku baYuda tununu tuingi bakatizia; nubo bansania beli na kitule ku mulembe;
nubo bongule ku musagu wobe buno, ukuigisia baYuda bansania babalangeine mu baBilongo buno, babenge Mose, wababulile buno tabamonesie lingo bana babo, aba tabayange lingo nkita zabo.
Su, buno buli buni? lebelebe bongule buno wabasa.
Kano kaluma kita bubuno butukukubula: Tuli na bantu banazi balumbide buno babegue mumpugu;
tola babano, wiyengie nabo, balige buno babegue mumpugu; nu bantu bansania bamenye buno zezo misagu zibonguagile kuzo kuguli buno zili za buza; tondo uwenyene ukukita busoga, nu ukuanza mulembe,
Tondo ku bantu baBilongo bakatizizie, tuabasanzide nu tuabakakizizie buno ba­bembuke binsania biabikua ku nkisi, nu mikila, nu nyama zakamua, nu butazi.
Nu gakeide busi Paolo atolile babo bamulume, eiyengezie nabo, nu eingide mu numba za kukumbamina kuzi­ndilizia bindi bia kuengibua, aba nu kisansa kikasue ku kabamba ka muntu na muntu wa ku babo.
Gabede bibio bindi mutuba kamo bise buigi na kusila, baYuda ba mu Asia, gabamumonineko mu numba za kukumbamina, balubi­kanizie musanganano unsania wa bantu, nu bamukatile,

balalu­kile bubibu bune, Balsalele tukasiazi: Wono muntu ukuigisagia bantu bansania kunsania, buno basombe kikanga kietu, nu mulembe wa Mose, nu kiziki kikino; nu lingo avule na baGeleka mu numba za kukumbamina, nu babigia kiziki kikino kiasuagibua.
Kubuno bamumonineko mu muino na Tulopimo muEfeso, bakengelaga buno, Paolo, amuingizie mu numba za kukumbamina.
Nu muino unsania wangamine, nu bantu bansania bakundamene lubilo; nu babo bakatile Paolo, nu bamubulutile nu kumutikia mu numba za kukumbamina; nu mu zezo nkungu nibi insania zigedue.
Nu gabalondaga kumuita, musagu wabasile kuabezaga mukota wa bita, buno Yelusalema unsania alubikana.
Nu atolile bakoloboyo nu bakota ba bakoloboyo, nu abasile kubabezaga lubilo: nubo gabamonine ku wozo mukota wa bita nu bakoloboyo, balekede kulibula Paolo.
Gabasile mukota wa bita, amukatile, nu aka­kizizie buno, akandue na makoki mabili ma biuma; nu abuzizie bune, Nazi wono, nu kikizi kiakita?
Nu bamozi mu musa­nganano balalukile buno, nu bango bobungo; nu gatamenyinine kibakita kibakitilaga kazege, akakizizie buno bende nage ku numba nnene za mukota.
Nu gabasile ga kindo, ekilue na bakoloboyo ku kabamba ka magala ma musanganano;
kubuno musanganano wamuyangile kumbusa nu bavuaga batenda bune, Endazi na wozo muntu.
Nu gabeide Paolo nteingizibua mu numba nnene za mukota, abuzizie wozo mukota bune, Ndi ninatenda kuguli? Amubuide bune, Ndi wizi kiGeleka?
buno ndi ta uwe uwozo muEzipeto wakitaga miango mu bindi bibino? nu wendile na bantu bakuka tununu tunazi mu kalula nubo bamanagua Beiti?
Tondo Paolo atendile bune, Nne nili muYuda, muntu wa Taliso wa Kilikia, wozo muino tamukeke: nkukusega buangato buno, nitende na babano bantu.
Nu gamukasile buangato bua kutenda, Paolo, emene ga kindo, nu abatengezezie kuboko nu gabeikeide kibibi, abatendede mu mutendezi wa kiEbelo.
Bamulume, mibuto zane, nu batata, nunguililazi nimusa­mbalile.
Nu gabongule ekutenda mutendezi wa kilibelo, beikeide kibibi: abatendile bune,

Nne nili muYuda, nabutilue mu Taliso Kilikia, nunne nakulile mu muino wozo, na Gamaliele, nu neigisizibue mulembe wa bata­teisue mu lukita lubibu, nu nabeide na kitule kinene ku Kalaga, anga bumuli inyue bansania lelo:
nu nababazizie bantu ba zeno Nzila nu kubeita, nabakandile, nababikile mu bikando, bamulume nu bakikulu.

Anga buandongekelaga sankoga munene nu bakulu bansania: nubo bankasaga mikanda ku mibuto zeitu, nu nendile ku Dameseke kutola babo babezaga kuko nu kuvua na bakandua nu kubeikia ku Yelusalema buno bakandue nu kubasungia.
Nu ganabezaga mu lugendo, ganabede nise buigi na Dameseke, mu nkungu za makuluka, kitangala besi kiengi kinene kiatukile kuigulu, kiansanine.
Nu naguide gansi, nu nongule kuiyuki liambuide bune, Saolo, Saolo, kubuni kukumbabazia?
Nu nakuide bune, uwe unazi, Mukota? Nu ambuide bune, Nne u Yesu wa Nazaleta, ukubabazia.
Nu babo banabezaga nabo bamonine ku kikio kiengi, tondo tabongule ku lilio iyuki linatendaga nalio.
Nu nabuzizie buno, Mukota, nkite buni? nu Mukota ambuide buno, Emanuka, nu wende ku Dameseke; nu kuko wasambalilue bunsania buwakakizibue buno ukite.
Nu nabezaga nsikumona ku kaba­mba ka kikio kiengi kiankelimine, nasondelezizibue na babo banabezaga nabo, nu navule ku Dameseke.
Nu muntu umozi abezaga kuko izina liage Anania, mukatizia nu mukiti wa mulembe wa Mose, alumbibagua busoga na baYuda bansania babezaga mumo;
anvuilide, nu emene buigi nanne, abuide bune, Mubuto wane, Saolo, mona. Nu nkungu zezo namulolile.
Nu ambuide bune, Kalaga wa batateisue akusombola buno umenye kusombola kuage, nu kumona ku Wozo Weisanana, nu kungua kuiyuki likutuka mu kanua kage.
Kubuno wabe mulongeki wage ku bantu bansania ku bubuno buwamona kubo, nu buwongua kubo.
Nu kano kaluma kubuni ukulindila? zanzuka, nu ubatizibue, nu usugue misako za buagi buobe, nu sega muizina liage.
Nu ganasubizie ku Yelusalema, nabezaga nkusega mu numba za kuku­mbamina, nendile kalengoe,
nu namumonineko nu antendile bune, Sasia, tuka ku Yelusalema; kubuno tabakatizie bulongeki buobe bua musagu wane.
Nunne natendile bune, Mukota, babo bebenyene beizi buno, nne nabezaga nkubakanda mu kikando, nabalibulaga mu numba na numba za musanganano babo bekuka­tizia:
nu mikila za Setefano mulongeki wobe zabasile, nunne nabezaga nimine gago, nu neitabizizie, nu nalangaga nsulu za babo bamuitaga.
Nu ubuambuide lino bune, Enda: kubuno nkakusinga bulazi ku baBilongo.
Nu bamunguilide ku bubo bunsania; nu balalukile nunse, nu batendile bune, Tikiazi wono ga kisi, ta busoga ndi alama.
Nu balalukile nu kuta nsulu zabo, nu kuisa mukungu mu mpelela,
wozo mukota munene akakizizie buno, bende nabo ku numba nnene za mukota, atendile buno bamugeleke kumulibula, buno amenye kabamba kakizi kabamukitilaga kazege.
Nu gabasilile kumukanda na mizigi, Paolo abuide mukota wa bakoloboyo wa­bezaga buigi bune, Ndi muli na buangato bua kulibula muntu wa Loma, nuwe ntesungibua?
Nu wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo gongule ku bubo, endile kua mukota munene wa bita amutendile bune, Ukukita kikizi? kubuno wono muntu eli muLoma.
Nu wozo mukota munene wa bita amuvuilide, nu amubuzizie bune, Mbule ndi uli muLoma? Nu amutendile bune, E.
Nu wozo mukota munene wa bita amubuide bune, Ku bikulo bingi nakunzile buangato bubuno. Nu Paolo amubuide bune, Tondo nne nili muLoma kukubutua.
Kubuno babo batundaga kumubuzia bamusigile: nu wozo mukota munene wa bita akule boba, gamenyine buno, eli muLoma nu buamukandide.
Tondo gakeide busi atundile kumenya nunse buni buamuso­ngede baYuda, amukanduide, nu akakizizie basankoga banene nu bakazi ba luango bakundamane, nu agezezie Paolo gansi nu amubikile lisa nabo.
Nu Paolo, galolile babo bakazi ba luango, atendile bune, Mibuto zane, nne nili na kalenganio kasoga ku Kalaga aba nu ku busi bubuno.
Nu wozo sankoga munene izina liage Anania akakizizie babo babezaga bemine buigi nage buno, bamuli­bule ku busundo.
Tondo Paolo amubuide bune, Kalaga akuli­bule nu uwe kitutu kia bongibua na makese, uwe wikala kunsungia ku mulembe, nu uwe wagila mulembe ukukakizia nilibulue?
Nubo bansania bemanaga buigi nage bamutendile bune, Kubuni walinga sankoga munene wa Kalaga?
Nu Paolo atendile bune, Mibuto zane, nsiamenyaga buno eli sankoga munene: kubuno buasanzilue bune, Ntutende muangati wa bantu bobe bubi.

Tondo Paolo gamenyine buno, bamozi babezaga Basadoke, nu bango baFalese, alalukile neiyuki inene ku babo bakazi ba luango bune, Mibuto zane, nunne nili muFalese, muana wa baFalese, ku musagu wa kilemanizio nu iyukilo lia bakuzi unkusungizibua.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubo, baFalese nu Basadoke, basakile; musanganano unsania walekanukile ku bubo.
Kubuno Basadoke bakutendaga buno, takuli iyukilo, aba mugenzi, aba muuza; tondo baFalese betabiziziebio binsania.
Kuabeide kazege kanene; nu bamozi ba basanzi ba baFalese bazanzukile, nu batendile bune, Tatukumona ku katati ku wono muntu: tondo embe muuza uwamutenda, aba mugenzi uwatenda nage.
N u gabeide lubanza lunene, nu wozo mukota munene wa bita, akule boba, akengede buno bakuata Paolo, akakizizie bakoloboyo bagele nu babagulusulewe, nu nti benda nage mu numba nnene za mukota.
Mu kindi kikio Mukota avule buigi nage, amubuide bune, Paolo, kokomezia mutima, kubuno anga bubo, buwalongekile musagu wane ku Yelusalema, ubugulongeka lingo muno mu Lomo.
Gabede mu nindunindu, baYuda bakalile luango, nu balu­mbide bune, Tatualie aba tatuanue ndi tatuita Paolo,
Nu babo balumbinanizie bubo babezaga bantu batinga makumi manazi.
Nu bendile ku basankoga banene nu ku bakulu, nu batendile bune, Tuasila kulumbila bubibu, buno tatuasonde ku kenandi tatuita Paolo.
Umpanga inyue nu bakazi ba luango bulazi wozo mukota munene wa bita buno amukase tanga we buno mu­kutunda kumenya milondo zage busoga: nuisue, tuasasie kumuita, gabe kumuli.
Tondo muigoa wa Paolo ongule ku luango luabo, engide ku numba nnene za mukota kuabezaga Paolo nu amusambalide.
Nu Paolo amanine mukota umozi amubuide bune, Ikia wono musikila kua mukota munene wa bita; kubuno eli neiyuki limozi liakutunda kumutenda.
Endile nage kuabezaga mukota munene wa bita nu amutendile bune, Paolo wozo mukandua, amanine nu ambuide buno, nivue na wono musikila kuno kuguli kubuno eli neiyuki limozi liakutunda kukutenda.
Nuwe mukota munene wa bita amukatile geikoko, nu eibisile nage, amu­buzizie bune, Musagu mukizi ukutunda kuntenda?
Nu amu­buide bune, BaYuda bakala luango lua ku kusega Paolo lubi ninduni­ndu, buno umugezie bekutunda kumubuzia nu kumenyinina milondo zage busoga.
Uwe ntuitabizie; kubuno beli bantu batinga makumi manazi bekulindila nu bakala luango buno, tabalie aba tabanue ndi tabeita Paolo, nubo bese kayikayika, bekulindila idagano liobe.
Nu wozo mukota munene wa bita atendile wozo musikila bune, Enda, nu amukakizizie bune, Ntubule ungo muntu buno watenda bubo.

Nu amanine bakota babili ba bakoloboyo, ababuide bune, Kano kaluma bikazi bakoloboyo nkama ibili kayikayika mu nkungu isatu za kindi, bende ku Kaisalia, nu bekuenda gantata ga mpunda makumi mutuba kamo, nu bango nkama ibili beli na masumo:
nu ababuide babike nyama kayikayika nu kubakamia Paolo gazo kumueka kua muangati Feliki:
Nu asanzile mukanda lukita luluno:
Kolodia Lusia ku Feliki muangati musoga nunse, samba.
Wono muntu akatilue na baYuda nu batundagile kumuita, nu navule na kibombo kia bakoloboyo buno nimonie, ganungule buno eli muLoma.
Nu natundile kumenya bubekumusongela, na­mubikile ku bakazi ba luango:
namenyine buno, bamusongede ku mbuzio za mulembe wabo, tondo takuli buanakuila aba buanaka­ndilua.
Nu ganamenyine buno bakalila wono muntu luango, ubunasasia kumusinga kuguli, nu nakakizizie babo bamusongelaga buno, batende bunsania kuguli.
Umpanga bakoloboyo, batolile Paolo, nu bendile nage anga buakakizizie, bamuekile mu kindi nu bendile nage ku Antipati.
Tondo mu nindunindu basigile babo, babakamaga gantata ga mpunda, buno bende nage, nu basubizie ku numba nnene za mukota:
nu babo gababasile ku Kaisalia, bakasile wozo mua­ngati mukanda, nu bamulolesezie Paolo.
Nuwe gasilile kusoma wozo mukanda, ababuzizie bune, Muntu wono eli wa kuni? nu gamenyine buno eli muntu wa ku Kilikia,
atendile bune, Nonguilile buwatende, gabe babo bakusongede bavua: nu aka­kizizie buno abikue mu numba za lusungio za mukota Helode.
Nu gatingile bindi bitano Anania sankoga munene agelile na bakulu bamozi, nu mutendi umozi, izina liage Tetula; nu basambalide muangati musagu wa Paolo.

Nu gabamanine Paolo, Tetula alingile kumusongela nu atendile bune, Feliki, wanzua nu wasimua, isue tuli na mbogimbogi, nu bubobelelo butuli nabo buli kuguli, nu ku menge mobe bekulo­ngeka milondo mibi zili mu kilongo kikino,
tukubogaboga ku bubo bindi binsania nu ku biziki binsania.
Nu nsikukukutia nunse, tondo nkukusega utunguilile ku milondo mikeke mu kubota kuobe.
Kubuno tuamona buno wono muntu eli mukiti wa milondo, nu ekubika misona munkatini mua baYuda bansania beli mu kisi kinsania, nuwe u mukota wa meigisia ma baNazaleta:
we alondile kubigia numba za kukumbamina; bubo tuamukatile, nu tuatundile kumusungia ku mulembe weitu.
Tondo Lusia mukota munene wa bita abasile, nu atugulusuidewe nunse,
aka­kizizie babo bamusongelagile buno bavue kuguli, uwe nti wamubuzia buno umenye bunsania butuamusongede.
Nubo baYuda beita­bizizie nu batendile buno, bubo buligo.
Nu muangati amutengezezie kuboko buno atende, nu Paolo akuide bune, Kubuno nizi uli ngatu mu kilongo kikino miaka mingi, ukinsa nkukusambalila milondo zane na mbogimbogi:
wizi nu uwe buno tagetinga bindi ikumi na bibili naganibakamina kukumbamina ku Yelusalema:
nu babano tabamonine ku­nkuenda na muntu miango aba kukita mulubu mu numba za kukumbamina, aba mu numba za misanganano, aba mu muino.
Aba tabanavuama kulolesia bumozi buligo bubansongelede kano kaluma.
Tondo kitondo kikino nkukitabizia ku Nzila zezo zibakumana buno, kingo kikanga, nkukumbamina Kalaga wa batate­isue, nu nkukatizia bunsania buasanzilue mu mulembe, nu bua balengania;
nkubezaga na kilemanizio ku Kalaga anga nubo bubakuitabizia, buno kuli iyukilo lia beisanana, nu lia bateisanana.
Mu bubuno nagomia, kuba na kalenganio kuteli bubi ku Kalaga nu ku bantu bindi binsania.
Nu gese gatinga miaka mingi naganivuila na mitebe nu nkaso ku kilongo kia kueitu:
baYuda bamozi batukaga ku Asia bansangile nise nengibua mu numba za kukumbamina, nu takuabezaga musanganano, aba kazege—
ubu­bavua kuguli buno bansongele, ndi beli na bubembelede nabo.
Aba ndi bantu babano bebenyene bantende mibi mikizi ziba­monine kuzo ganemanine ku bakazi ba luango,
tugu kuiyuki limozi linasambede ganemene munkatini, muabo, ku kabamba keiyukilo lia bakuzi nasungibua kumuli lelo.
Tondo Feliki, kukumenya bua Nzila zeno, abatendile bune, Gavue Lusia mukota munene wa bita, uganatule mulondo weinyu.
Nu akakizizie mulangi bune, Langa Paolo tondo ntumukande aba ntuzugile beida bage kumukitila.
Tondo gatingile bindi bimozi, Feliki gavule na Dusila muki­kulu wage, wabezaga muYuda, amanine Paolo, amunguilile ku bukatizio mu Klisto Yesu.
Nu Paolo gatendaga musagu wa kuisanana nu wa kuisungula, nu wa lusungio lukavua, Feliki akule boba, nu amuakuide bune, Enda kano kaluma; kuingo nkungu nakumane kuane.
Tondo akengede buno Paolo amukase bikulo buno amukandule: kubuno eitide kumumana nu kusambala nage.
Tondo gatingile miaka ibili, Pokio Festo uwasigede na mulimo wa Feliki; nu Feliki ku kutunda kubogiabogia baYuda, asigile Paolo ku kikando.
Nu Festo, gabasile mu kisi kiage, kusila kua bindi bisatu abakamine kuenda ku Yelusalema kutuka ku Kaisalia.
Basankoga banene, nu bantu banene baYuda bamubuide misagu za Paolo;
nu bamusegile buno, amusinge ku Yelusalema, buno bamulindile ku nzila kumuita.
Tondo Festo akuide buno Paolo alangue ku Kaisalia, nuwe wenyene abezaga buigi na kuenda kuko.
Umpanga atendile bune, Babo beli na buangato bagele nanne nu nti bamusongele, ndi muntu wono eli na katati.
Nu geizizizie kubeli bindi kinana aba ikumi, agelile kuenda ku Kaisalia, nu gakeide busi ekeide ga kisumbi kia lusungio, akakizizie buno balusie Paolo.
Nu gavule, baYuda bagelile kutuka ku Yelusalema bemene buigi nage, nu bamukandile bitondo bingi bia kuangamia biteligo;
nu Paolo akuide wenyene bune, Nsiagide mulembe umozi wa baYuda, aba ku numba za kukumbamina, aba ku Kaisa.
Tondo Festo, ku kutunda kubogiabogia baYuda, akuide Paolo bune, Ndi unatunda kuenda ku Yelusalema kusungibua kuko ku bitondo bibino nunne nti niligo?
Tondo Paolo atendile bune, Nne nemane gago ga kisumbi kia lusungio kia Kaisa, buno ukiziki kinatunganana kusungibua gakio: nsiagide baYuda buampa, anga buwizi nunse.
Ndi nagile, aba nakitile bunakuilua, nsi­kusomba kukua; tondo ndi bubansongede tabuligo, takuli una­ngabula kubeli. Nkutunda kuenda ku Kaisa.
Nu Festo gasilile kutenda na bakazi ba luango, akuide bune, Ndi ukutunda kuenda ku Kaisa: kasi ukuenda ku Kaisa.
Nu gatingile bindi bimozi, mukota Agipa nu Benike babasile ku Kaisalia, nu basekede Festo.
Nubo bekalaga gago bindi bingi, Festo asambalide mukota misagu za Paolo atendile bune, Muntu umozi wasingilue na Feliki mu kikando;
nunne gana­bezaga ku Yelusalema, basankoga banene nu bakulu ba baYuda bambuide misagu zage, bansegile buno asungibue.
Nabakuide buno, luluno ta lukita lua baLoma kuitabizia muntu umozi kukua ndi nteli na babo bamusongelaga gamozi, buno akule ku milondo zakusongelua kuzo.
Umpanga gabakundamene gano, nsizizizie, tondo gakeide busi nikeide ga kisumbi kia lusungio, nakakizizie buno muntu wozo alusibue.
Nu babo bamusongede gabemene, tabamusongede anga bunakengelaga;
tondo nubo bamubuzagia mbuzio za mpala zabo, nu musagu wa muntu umozi u Yesu, wakule, nuwe Paolo, atendile buno eli na kalamo.
Nunne mu kuba nkakania ku lukita lua kulonda buisanana ku milondo zeno, namu­buzizie ndi anatunda kuenda ku Yelusalema kusungibua kuko ku milondo zeno.
Tondo Paolo gatundile kusungibua na Kaisa, nakakizizie buno alangue aba nu gankamusinga ku Kaisa.
Nu Agipa abuide Festo bune, Nunne nkutunda kungua ku bukutenda muntu wono. Atendile bune, Wongue kuekutenda lubi.
Umpanga nindunindu gavule Agipa, nu Benike na malebo meingi, nu beingide mu kiziki kia kunguilila ku milondo na bakota banene ba bita nu bantu banene ba muino, Festo akakizizie buno balusie Paolo,

Nu Festo atendile bune, Mukota Agipa, nu inyue bantu bansania batuli nabo, mukumona ku muntu wono, wasongedue na musanganano unsania wa baYuda kundi ku Yelusa­lema nu gano bekutenda buno, ntatunganana lingo kulama.
Tondo ganamenyine buno ntakitile buampa bua kukuila: aba nuwe wenyene atundile kuenda ku Kaisa, nakengelaga kumusinga kueli.
Nunne nsili na bumozi bunasanza ku mukota wane. Ku bubo namulusia kumuli, nu lebelebe kuguli tanga, Mukota Agipa, buno gabuzibue uganamenye bunasanze.
Kubuno tabuli busoga kusinga mukandua, nu ntuamenya bumozi buasongelua.
Nu Agipa abuide Paolo bune, Uli na buangato bua kulo­ndola mulondo wobe. Ububo Paolo alambizie kuboko kuage nu eitendede:
Mukota Agipa, nabogaboga kubuno nkuitendela kuguli lelo ku bubuno buansongede baYuda:
kubuno wizi lukita nu mbuzio za baYuda: ku bubuno nkukusega buno nunguilile na nkiki.
Kubuno ba Yuda bansania beizi bunabezaga kutukila ku busikila buane, bubo buabezaga wakalazi mu kilongo kia kueitu kuko ku Yelusalema;
beizi, ndi bekutunda kulongeka buno nabezaga mu­Falese nayangile kikanga kia bulili nunse.
Nu kano kaluma ku kilemanizio kia malagano malagile Kalaga ku batateisue nemana buno nisungibue;
kuidagano lilino bilongo bietu ikumi na bibili biakumbaminaga Kalaga kindi nu musi, ku kilemanizio kikino ukunasongedue na baYuda, E, Mukota!
Kubuni kumuabuke­ngede anga butekumenyua, buno Kalaga ekuyukagia bakuzi?
Lebelebe nnenyene nakengede mu mutima wane buno bua­ntananina kukita makitilo meingi kusungia izina lia Yesu mu Naza­leta.
Nu nakitile bubo kuko ku Yelusalema: nu nakandile basuagibua beingi mu bikando, ganakasagua buangato na basankoga banene, nu gabeitagua neitabizagia bubo.
Nu lingo mu numba ningi za musanganano, nabababazizie mambizi meingi, nu nabasindikile buno balinge Kalaga; nu nabongedue nunse, nu nabababa­zizie ku mino ziteli za kueitu.
Umpanga mu mulimo wono nabezaga nkuenda ku Dameseke na buangato nu mulembe wa basankoga banene,
ku makuluka, E, Mukota, namonine ku kiengi kiatuka kuigulu mu nzila, kiatinga kiengi kia musi, kiansanine nne nu banendaga nabo.
Gatuaguide gansi, isue bansania, nungule kuiyuki liatendile ku mutendezi wa kiEbelo, Saolo, Saolo, kubuni kukumbabazia? buli bubibu kuisumita kuisumo.
Na­tendile bune, Uwe nazi, Mukota? Nu Mukota antendile bune, Nne u Yesu ukubabazagia.
Tondo zanzuka, nu wimane: ku bubuno namoneka kuguli, buno nikubike mukiti, nu mulongeki wa bubo buwamona kubo, nu bunakulolesie;
nakonie ku bantu nu ku baBilongo ukunakusinga,

kukandula meiso mabo, nu kuba­galukia buno batuke ku kapilo nu kuvua ku kiengi, nu kutuka ku magala ma Satana buno bavue ku Kalaga, nu basigililue ku misako za buagi nu kukasua bupieni na babo basuagibua ku bukatizio buli mundi.
Ku bubo, E Mukota Agipa, nsiananine kalolesio ka kuigulu:
tondo nasambalide babo ba Dameseke, nu ba ku Yelu­salema, nu ba mu mino insania za Yudaya, nu ku baBilongo buno, beiyanie nu bagalukile ku Kalaga, nu bakite makitilo matananina kuiyania.
Ku bubo, baYuda bankatile mu numba za kuku­mbamina, nu batundile kunita.
Umpanga nakasizibue na Kalaga, ukinsa nikili mu buno busi nu kulongekela bakeke nu banene, nsikutenda bungo umpanga bubuno buatendaga balengania nu Mose buno bukaba;
buatunganana buno Klisto asungibue, nu alingile kuyuka ku bakuzi buno asambale musagu wa kiengi ku bantu bage, nu ku baBilongo.
Nu gabezaga ekutenda bubuno, Festo atendile neiyuki inene, Paolo, uli musile tugu; meigisia meingi makukugalukia musile.
Tondo Paolo atendile bune, Nsili musile, Festo wanzua nunse; tondo nkutenda buligo nu ta bua busile.
Kubuno mukota eizi bubuno, bunkumutenda na luatu: kubuno nizi buno takuli bumozi bua ku bubuno buateizi; kubuno bubuno tabuakitilue ku lumbiso­mbiso.
Mukota Agipa; ndi ukukatizia balengania? Namenya buno ukubakatizia.
Nu Agipa abuide Paolo bune, Ku bitondo bibino bikeke ukutunda kungalukia buno nibe muKlisto.
Nu Paolo atendile bune, Nkusega Kalaga buno, ndi mu bikeke aba mu binene, ta uwe tugu, tondo nu babano bansania bakungua ku bunkutenda lelo, babe anga bundi, tondo tababe na makoki mamano.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubuno, mukota, nu muangati, nu Benike, nu babo beikalaga nabo, bemene;
nu gabatukile basambalilene, batendile bune, Muntu wono ntakitile buanakuila aba buanaka­ndilua.
Nu Agipa abuide Festo bune, Muntu wono anaka­nduidue, songo nteisegelaga kuenda ku Kaisa.
Umpanga gamenyinue buno, tukuenda ku Itali, babikile Paolo nu bango bakandua ku mukota wa bakoloboyo, izina liage Yulio wa kibombo kia Augusto.
Nu tuingide mu buato bua Adulamutiona, buabezaga bukuenda kuemana ku mino za Asia, tuendile mu kitatenge; nu Alisitako mu Makedonia wa ku Tesa­lonike abezaga neisue.
Nu ku kindi kia bibili tuabasile ku Sidona: nu Yulio akitide Paolo mponga, nu amukasile buangato bua kuenda ku beida bage nu kulangua nabo.
Nu gatuasilile kutuka gago tuatingile kunsi kua Kupulio, kubuno lumpumpu luatubigene.
Nu gatuasilile kutinga ku kitatenge ku ntungo za Kilikia nu Pampulia, tuabasile ku Mula, muino wa Lukia.
Nu gago wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo asangile buato bua Alesandelo, kayikayika kuenda ku Itali, nu atuingizizie.
Nu gatuendile bindi bingi bukebuke mu buato, nu kubasa buigi ku Kinido na bubibu, kubuno lumpumpu luatubigene, tuatingile kunsi kua Kulete, buigi na Salamone;
nu gakutinga kuko kuabezaga bubibu tuabasile ku kiziki kiamanagua Ibungu Isoga, kili buigi na muino wa Lasaya.
Nu gatingile bindi bingi, zatingile, nu lugendo luabede lubibu kubuno bindi bite bia kulia biasilile kutinga, Paolo abanine,
nu abatendile bune, Bamulume, namona buno lugendo luluno lukuba na kabebe nu kubigia bituli nabio, ta mizigo nu buato tugu kanka­nka, tondo nu tulamo tueitu lingo.
Tondo wozo mukota wa bakoloboyo onguilide musondelezia nu nyene buato tondo ntangile bubo buatendaga Paolo.

Nu kubuno ibungu lilio taliabezaga isoga kuikalako mu miezi za mpego, beingi kubeli bakalile luango buno, batuke kuko buno babase ku Foiniki, ndi buakulungana nu kuikala kuko nkungu za mpego, kuko kuli ibungu lia Kulete, lialolela kunsi nu kuntata.
Nu kukuba lumpumpu lua kunsi, luapupile kakeke, nu bakengede buno bamona ku bubakengelaga, bazanzuide nanga, nu batingile buigi nunse ku Kulete.
Tondo kusila kua nkungu nkeke kisoa kinene kiamanagua Eulakulo kia­betide ga kisanga:
nu buato gabuakatilue, aba tabuavuamine kusunua na kisoa, tuabulekede buno bugingibuegingibue na kisoa.
Nu tuendile kunsi kua kisanga kiamanagua Kaluda, buabezaga bubibu kusuika buato, tondo tuabusuikile:
nu gabasilile ku­buzanzula kuigulu, batolile mizigi nu bazikandile kunsi kua buato; nu bakule boba buno banavua kulengibua gantata misege za Suti, bagezezie nanga, nu bubo beikilue.
Nu kugingibuagingibua nunse na kisoa, gakeide busi balingile kuisa mizigo mu kitatenge;
nu mu kindi kia bisatu beisile biuma bia buato na maboko mabo bebenyene.
Kisongo kia busi aba nkeninkeni, tazamonekagako bindi bingi, nu kisoa kinene kiatingizie bindi bingi, tatuabezaga lingo na kilemanizio kia kona.
Nu gabeikede bindi bingi tabalia, Paolo emene munkatini muabo, nu atendile bune, Bamulume, buatunganene kununguilila nu kutatuka ku Kulete, kuba na kabebe kakano, nu kubiga kukuno.
Nu kano kaluma nkumuana buno mulindie mitima; kubuno takuli umozi wakule kumuli, tondo buato tugu.
Kubuno mu kindi kikino mugenzi wa Kalaga undi nage, emana kundi, undi nage nu gunkukitilaga,
atendile bune, Ntunakua boba, Paolo, buatunganana wimane ku Kaisa; lingo unguilila buno, Kalaga akukasile bantu bansania bekuenda nobe.
Umpanga, bamulume, bogazibogazi: kubuno nkukatizia Kalaga, buno buabe bubo bunabuidue.
Tondo buatunganana isue kuisua gantata ga kisanga kimozi.
Tondo mu kindi kia ikumi na binazi gatuekilue kuno nu kuko mu kitatenge kia Adulia, munkantini mua kindi bakiti ba buato bakengede buno tuse buigi na ku mutili:
nu balindikile mazi, nu mabezaga makuka metele makumi mabili; nu gabeide gatinga kiluma balindikile lingo, nu mabezaga makuka metele ikumi na matano.
Nu bakule boba buno tunavua kuikuka ku makozi, beisile nanga inazi ku kioba kia buato nu batundaga buno busi bukie.
Nu bakiti ba buato batundaga kutina nu kusiga buato, bagezezie kabuato mu kitatenge anga batundaga kuisa nanga ku kansinsi ka buato,
nu Paolo abuide mukota wa bakoloboyo bune, Babano ndi tabeikala mu buato, nti tamunona.
Bakolo­boyo basesile mizigi za ku kabuato, buno kakoloke.
Nu gabede busi buakia, Paolo abuide bansania buno balie idia, atendile bune, Lelo buli busi bua bindi ikumi na binazi mukulindila nu tamualile kampa.
Umpanga nkumubula bune, Liazi idia; kubuno liamonie: kubuno takuli luzuili lumozi lua kuitoe lienyu luazimine.
Nu gasilile kutenda bubo, atolile kampampa, aganuine Kalaga nu bansania nti bekumona; nu gasilile kukabungula, alingile kulia.
Nu bansania balangamene, nu balile idia.
Nu isue babezaga mu buato bubo tuabezaga tuakuka bantu nkama ibili nu makumi mutuba kamo nu mutuba.
Nu gabasilile kuikuta, bakokuide ku mizigo za buato, nu beisile mumpunge mu kitatenge.
Nu gabede busi buakia, tabamenyine ku kisi kibabezaga kukio, tondo bamonine ku nkunda za kitatenge zili neisokelo, nubo bakengede kuluga buato gantata gago ndi bunakulungana.
Nu beisile nanga nu bazisigile mu kitatenge, babotezie mizigi za kansinsi ka buato nu bazanzuide nsulu nnene ku lumpumpu nu bagelekile kuenda kuisokelo,
Tondo babasile gakulumanina bitatenge bibili, nu benzizie buato mu bisogo; kansinsi ka buato kakatilue bubibu nu tabuatengiletengile, tondo kioba kiabo kialingile kuatika na bimpumi.
Nu bakoloboyo bakeide luango buno bakandua beitue buno umozi wa kubeli anavua koga nu nti atina.
Tondo mukota wa bakoloboyo atundaga konia Paolo, abazugide buno tabakite bubakukengela; nu akakizizie babo beizi koga buno beiyise mu kitatenge, nu kulinga kubasa ku mutili:
nu babo basigede, bamozi babezaga gantata ga mbabu, nu bango gantata ga bingo bia buato. Nu bubuno bantu bansania babasile bulonge bukata ku mutili.
Nu gatuasilile kona, tuamenyine buno, kasi kisanga kikio kiamanagua Melita.
Nu babo babezaga ga kikio kisanga, batukitide mponga nunse: nu batusekede isue bansania nu bagulu­mizizie keiya, kubuno mbula zalokaga, nu kuabezaga mpego.
Paolo akundamanizie kibombo kia misali nu gazibikaga ga keiya, nzoka zabasile na muzuzo wa keiya izina liazo mpoma, zamuba­ngile ku kuboko kuage.
Nu babo bantu gabamonine ku zezo nzoka nkali zikuzembelazembela ku kuboko kuage, batendene buabo buabo bune, embe muntu wono eli muiti, onine mu kitatenge lingo, tondo Buisanana tabunamulamia.
Tondo Paolo atituide nzoka mu keiya nu ntasambile.

Bamulolile nunse, bakengede buno anatumba, aba kugoa gansi kitangala besi nu kukua: tondo gabasilile kulindila nkungu ndazi nu bamonine buno ntaba bungo, bagalukizie makengelo mabo, batendile bune, Wono eli kalaga.
Buigi na kiziki kikio kuabezaga masoa ma mukota wa kisanga, izina liage Popolio; atusekede, nu atukungile anga bageni bage bindi bisatu.
Nu gabezaga isi wa Popolio ekusamba neisusila nu kuansa mikila: Paolo eingide kuabezaga, nu asegile, nu amubikile maboko mage kueli, amonezie.
Nu gabede bubuno buasila kuba, bango babezaga na nsambo mu kisanga bavule, nu bonezibue:
nubo batuanzile nunse; nu gatuatukile, babakamizizie bingi ku buato bituiyaninaga.
Nu gatingile miezi isatu, tuendile na buato bua Alesandelo, buabezaga mu kikio kisanga mu nkungu za mpego, kakengelezio kage kabeide Masa Ma Bamulume.
Nu gatuabasile ku Sala­kusa, tuikeide gago bindi bisatu.
Nu kutuka gago tuatimbile, tuabasile ku Legio; nu gatingile kindi kimozi lumpumpu luapupile luatukaga kunsi, nu ku kindi kia bibili, tuabasile ku Potiolo;
tua­monine ku mibuto zeitu kuko, batubuide buno tuikaleko bindi mutuba kamo; nu bubo tuabasile ku Lomo.
Nu mibuto zeitu batukile ku Lomo gabongule ku misagu zeitu, nu bavule kutukulu­mania ku Isoko lia Apio nu Numba isatu za Bageni; nu Paolo gabamonineko aganuine Kalaga, nu alangamene.
Nu gatuabasile ku Lomo, Paolo abuidue buno nti eikala wenyene na mukoloboyo wamulangaga.

N u gatingile bindi bisatu Paolo akungikile bakulu ba baYuda: nu gabavule ababuide bune, Mibuto zane, nsiakitile buampa ku muntu aba ku misako za batateisue, tondo nakandilue ku Yelu­salema na baLomo:
nu babano gabasilile kumbuzia, batundile kunkandula, kubuno nsiakitile bunakuila.
Tondo baYuda gabasombile luango lulo, neidangizie buno nende kua Kaisa; ta kubuno natundaga kusongela kilongo kia kueitu.
Ku kabamba kakano namumanine buno nimumoneko nu nitende neinyu: kubuno ku kabamba ka kilemanizio kia baIsalele nakandua na makoki mamano.
Nu bamubuide bune, Tatuamonine ku mukanda kutuka ku Yudaya wa mulondo wobe, aba takuli mubuto weitu umozi wavule kutusambalila misagu zobe, aba kututenda misako zobe mibi.
Tondo tukukengela buno buli busoga ndi watusa­mbalila bukukengela: kubuno ku bua kikanga kikino, tuizi buno kikubengua kunsania.

Nu bamubikide busi, nu bantu beingi bamuvuilide mu numba zage; abasambalide nu alongekede bukota bua Kalaga, nu ku­balolesia musagu wa Yesu mu mulembe wa Mose, nu mu mikanda za balengania, kutukila nindunindu aba nu muigolo.
Bamozi bakatizizie bubo buatendagua, nu bango tabakatizizie.
Nu gabateitabizanizie, batukile gasilile kutenda Paolo bumozi, Muuza Wasililila atendile busoga ku mulengania Yesaya ku basoinyue,
atendile bune,
Endazi ku bantu babano, nu mutende,
Kungua mungue nu tamuamenyinine;
Nu kumona muamone, nu tamuatitike:
Kubuno mitima za bantu babano zili mibibu,
Nu matuzi mabo tamakunguaga,
Nu basila kuziba meiso;
Buno banavua kutitika,
Nu kungua na matuzi,
Nu kumenyinina mu mitima zabo,
Nu kugaluka lingo,
Nu ninabonia.
Menyazi umpanga buno, lonio luluno lua Kalaga luekua ku baBilongo: nu bongue.
Gasilile kutenda bubuno, baYuda batukile nu bakanizanizie.
Nu Paolo eikeide miaka ibili mu numba zage zaligile we wenyene, nu asekelaga bansania bamuvuilaga,
kusambala musagu wa bukota bua Kalaga, nu kuigisia misagu za Mukota Yesu Klisto na luatu, nu ntazugidue na muntu wampa.
Paolo, mukobe wa Yesu Klisto, wamaninue buno abe musingua, wasombuedue kusambala musagu musoga wa Kalaga,
wali­ngile kulaga ku tunua tua balengania bage mu masanzo masililila,
ku musagu wa Muana wage, wabutilue mu kikanga kia Davidi ku lukita lua mubili,
wamaninue Muana wa Kalaga mu magala, ku muuza wa bulili, nu kuiyukilo ku bakuzi, Yesu Klisto Monia weitu,
kubuno mueli tuakitilue mponga nu busingua, buno baBilongo bansania babe na luanzo ku bukatizio, ku kabamba keizina liage;
mu babo nuinyue muse muamanua na Yesu Klisto:
ku bansania beli mu Lomo, batundua ba Kalaga, bamaninue buno babe basuagibua: Mponga zibe kumuli nu bubobelelo bukutukaga ku Kalaga Tateisue nu Mukota Yesu Klisto.
Kulinga, nkusimaga Kalaga wane mu Yesu Klisto ku kabamba keinyu bansania, kubuno bukatizio bueinyu bukulumbibua, na bantu bansania ba kisi.
Kubuno mulongeki wane eli Kalaga, unkukitila mu mutima wane mu musagu musoga wa Muana wage, buno nkumukengelaga mu masego mane
buno, nivue kumuli ndi Kalaga esanania lugendo luane.
Kubuno nili na malima nunse kumumonako, nivuame kumukasa lukaso lua muuza, buno mukokomene;
buno, tulindaniazi muntu na muntu ku buka­tizio bua munyage, bueinyu nu buane.
Tondo mibuto zane, nsikutunda muibilile buno, mambizi meingi natundaga kuvua kumuli (tondo nabigenue aba nu kano kaluma) buno nibe na biguma munkatini mueinyu, anga bundi nabio mu bango baBilongo.
Nili na nsombi ku baGeleka, nu lingo ku baBilongo bansania, ku beli na menge nu lingo ku beteli na menge.
Ku bubuno, kundi nili kayikayika kusambala musagu musoga aba kumuli inyue beli ku Lomo.
Kubuno nsili na nsoni ku musagu musoga: kubuno uli magala ma Kalaga aba ku lonio ku unsania wakatizia; kulinga ku ba Yuda, nu lingo ku baGeleka.
Kubuno kuisanana kua Kalaga kuku­bisulua mugo kutukila bukatizio aba ku bukatizio: anga buasa­nzilue bune, Wisanana akalama ku bukatizio.
Kubuno Kalaga wa muigulu akongelua babo bansania be­kumusomba nu babo tabakukita buisanana, babo bekubigia bulili na bubi buabo;
kubuno misako za Kalaga zikumenyininua mubeli nunse; kubuno Kalaga abalolesiziezo.
Kubuno misako zage zitamonekagako kutukila kuba kua kisi kano kaluma zisa­monekako, nu kumenyininua ku bibumbua bingi buno, magala mage tamanakuzinda nu buKalaga buage; kububo tabanavuama kuibingia:
kubuno, gabamenyinine Kalaga, tabamuganuine anga eli Kalaga, nu tabamusimine; tondo beikotezie mu makengelo mabo, nu mitima zabo za bukongolo zenizibue.
Beitendaga buno beli na menge, babede bikongolo,
nu bagalukizie lutanuno lua Kalaga utanakubiga ku lukita lua kisusania kia bantu bakubiga, nu kia tuzoni, nu nyama za magulu manazi, nu bikugelegeta.
Ku kabamba kako Kalaga abasigile mu ntundo za mitima zabo buno bayange nsese aba kubigania mibili zabo:
kubuno bagalukizie bulili bua Kalaga ku buza, nu bakumbamine nu kukitila kibumbua ku kiziki kia Mubumbi, ukuganunagua ku nkiko zitana­kuzinda. Amena.
Ku kabamba kako Kalaga abasigile bayange ntundo zabo za nsoni: nu bakikulu babo bagalukizie lukita lua bumba ku lulo luteli lua bumba:
nu bamulume basigile bumba bua bakikulu, nu batundene buabo buabo, bamulume na bamulume bakitile butatunganana, nu bakataga bebenyene lukalilo luatananina na makitilo mabo.
Nu anga bubasombile kuba na Kalaga mu bumenyinino buabo, Kalaga abasigile bayange bumenyinino buabiga, bakite buteli busoga;
beiyeide na kutimba kua lukita na lukita, mibi, kutonia, bubi, lugi, buiti, nsake, buengelezi, misona, bagambi,
bakandisia, basombi ba Kalaga, beli na kabenga, beli na luikotio, beiganuzi, balongeki ba bitondo bibi, batanza bababuta,
beteli na bumenyinino, beiti beidagano, batakutunda ba kuabo, beteli na kiombo,
babo beizi lusungio lua bulili lua Kalaga, buno bakukita bubo batananina kukua, bekukita bubo, aba ta bubo tugu, tondo lingo bekuitabizia babo bekukita bubo.
Ububo ntukuvuama kuibingia, uwe muntu, aba ndi uli nazi ukusungia: kubuno mu kusungia ungo, ukuisungia uwenyene; kubuno uwe ukukita nage bumozi.
Tondo tuizi buno lusungio lua Kalaga luli bulili ku babo bekukitaga bubo.
Nu mukuke­ngela buno, uwe muntu, ukusungia babo bekukita misako zezo, ziukukita nuwe, ndi ukeibembukia na lusungio lua Kalaga?
Aba ukubenga buingi bua mponga zage nu nkiki zage nu kuikalila kuage, nu ntukumenya buno mponga za Kalaga zikukusondelezia kuku­iyania?
tondo ku bubibu buobe nu ku mutima wobe uteli na kuiyania ukuitalikila bongua ku busi bua bongua nu kulolesibua kua lusungio luisanana lua Kalaga:
ukaliga muntu na muntu anga buli makitilo mage:
ku babo beli na komanizia ku kukita busoga, bekulonda lutanuno nu luanzo nu kutabiga, bakakasua kalamo katanakuzinda:
tondo babo beli na misona nu batakuanza bulili, tondo bakuanza bubi, bakamona ku bongua nu kasungu ka Kalaga,
mbabazio nu lubaba, ku muntu na muntu ukukitaga mibi, ku baYuda kulinga, nu lingo ku baGeleka;
tondo lutanuno nu luanzo nu bubobelelo ku muntu na muntu ukukitaga busoga, ku baYuda kulinga, nu lingo ku baGeleka:
kubuno ku Kalaga takuli kukutibua kua bantu.
Kubuno bansania bagile kuteli mulembe bakazimina kuteli mulembe; nu bansania bagile mu mulembe bakasungibua ku mulembe;
kubuno tabonguilizi ba mulembe ubeisanana ku Kalaga, tondo bakiti ba mulembe bakabi­ngibua
(kubuno baBilongo bateli na mulembe gabakukita ku bumba buabo buli mu mulembe, babano, tabeli na mulembe, beli na mulembe bebenyene;
kubuno bakulolesia makitilo ma mulembe wasanzilue mu mitima zabo, kalenganio kabo kakubalo­ngekela, nu makengelo mabo buabo buabo makubabinga aba kubabingia);
mu busi bubo Kalaga gakasungia misako za bantu zibakubisaga, anga ku musagu musoga wane, mu Yesu Klisto.
Tondo ndi uwe ukumanua muYuda, nu ukulemanina mule­mbe, nu kuikaka mu Kalaga,
nu kumenya kusombola kuage, nu kumenya kulindika bitondo bisoga, nu kuigisibua mu mulembe,
nu kukengela lebelebe buno uwe wenyene uli musondelezia wa biuku, kiengi ku babo beikile mu kapilo,
musunguzi wa biko­ngolo, musozi wa bana, uli na lukita lua bumenyinino nu bulili mu mulembe;
uwe umpanga ukuigisia ungo, ndi ntukuiyigisia uwenyene? Uwe ukusambala buno muntu ntibe, ndi ukuibaga?
uwe ukutenda buno muntu nteite meiga, ndi ukuita meiga? uwe ukusomba nkisi, ndi ukuliaga bili mu numba za nkisi?
uwe ukuikaka mu mulembe, mu kukagula mulembe ndi ukuitia Kalaga na nsoni?
Kubuno izina lia Kalaga likulingua ku baBilongo ku kabamba keinyu, anga buasanzilue.
Kubuno kumonesibua kuatananina ndi uli mukiti wa mulembe: tondo ndi uli mukaguzi wa mulembe, kumonesibua kuobe nti kuli anga utamonesibua.
Umpanga, babo batamonesibua ndi bakokomezia kukakizia kua mulembe, ndi kutamonesibua kuabo ndi takukatekulua kuba ku­monesibua?
nu babo batamonesibua ku bumba, ndi bakoko­mezia mulembe, ndi ntakakusungia uwe, uli na masanzo nu wa­monesibua, tondo ukukagula mulembe?
Kubuno wozo uteli muYuda eli muYuda ku mubili tugu; nu kuko takuli kumonesibua kuli kumonesibua ku mubili tugu:
tondo wozo uli muYuda eli muYuda munda; nu kuko kuli kumonesibua kuli mu mutima wa muntu, ta muisanzo; nu luganuno luage talukutuka ku bantu, tondo ku Kalaga.
Umpanga kikizi bunene bua muYuda? nu kumonesibua kuli na mutali mukizi?
Buatananina nunse mu bunsania: kulinga bakasilue bulangi bua bitondo bia Kalaga.
Nu ndi bamozi tabakatizizie? ndi kutakatizia kuabo kunagalukia bukatizio bua Kalaga?
Kilo aba nunse, tondo Kalaga amoneke buno eli bulili, nu muntu na muntu muza; anga buasanzilue bune,
Buno ubinge mu bukutenda,
Nu ukinde gokusungibua.
Tondo ndi bubi bueitu bukulolesia kuisanana kua Kalaga, nti tutende buni? Ndi Kalaga eli mubi ganatusungia? (Natenda ku lukita lua bantu.)
Kilo aba nunse: buni bunavuama Kalaga kusungia kisi?
Tondo ndi buza buane bukuganuna bulili bua Kalaga, kubuni nunne nenyene nikili nasungibua anga muagi?
nu kubuni tatukukita bubi, buno busoga buvue? (anga butuakandisizibue nu bango bantu bakuidindika buno tukutenda bubo.) Lusungio luabo luli luisanana.
Kikizi lingo? Ndi tuli basoga kutinga bango? Kilo, aba nunse: kubuno tuasilile kusongela baYuda nu baGeleka, buno bansania beli mu buagi.
Anga buasanzilue bune,
Takuli wisanana, aba umozi;
Takuli ukumenyinina,
Takuli ukulonda Kalaga;
Bansania bazimine, babigile bansania;
Takuli muntu ukukitaga busoga, aba umozi;
Miego zabo zili nsinda zili buasi;
Ndami zabo zili na buengelezi:
Lulalo lua nzoka luli kunsi kua milomo zabo:
Tunua tuabo tuizile na bisuililo nu lubaba:
Magulu mabo makusasia kukubula mikila;
Kubiga nu tubebe bili mu nzila zabo;
Nu nzila za bubobelelo tabazimenyine:
Tabekukua Kalaga boba.
Tuizi buno, binsania bikutendua na mulembe, bikutendua ku babo beli mu mulembe; buno kanua na kanua kalimbue, nu kisi kinsania kibe mu lusungio lua Kalaga:
kubuno takuli muntu ukubingibua ku makitilo ma mulembe kueli, kubuno ku mulembe misako za buagi zikumenyua.
Tondo kano kaluma kuisanana kua Kalaga kuamenyininua kuteli mulembe, kualongekilue na mulembe nu balengania;
u kuisanana kua Kalaga kuli mu bukatizio mu Yesu Klisto ku bansania bakatizia; kubuno takuli kukutia;
kubuno bansania bagile, nu bekuidaga lutanuno lua Kalaga;
bekubingibua bulia ku mponga zage ku bukuluzi buli mu Klisto Yesu:
kubuno Kalaga asilile kumubika abe mukulumania, ku bukatizio, mu mikila zage. Buno alolesia kuisanana kuage, ku kabamba ka kusigilila mu kuikalila kua Kalaga buagi bunsania buakitagua wakalazi;
kulolesia kuisanana kuage mu nkungu zeno; buno abe wisanana, nu mubingia wa wozo ukukatizia Yesu.
Kuikaka kuli kuni lingo? Kuatukizibue. Ku mulembe mukizi? ku mulembe wa misako? Kilo: tondo ku mulembe wa bukatizio.
Tuizi buno muntu ekubingibua ku bukatizio kuteli ku misako za mulembe.
Ndi Kalaga eli wa baYuda tugu? Ndi nteli Kalaga wa baBilongo nubo? E, wa baBilongo nubo:
ndi lebelebe Kalaga eli umozi, ukabingia babo bamonesizibue mu bukatizio, nu babo batamonesibua akababingia mu bukatizio.
Umpanga ndi tukubigia mulembe ku bukatizio? Kilo, aba nunse. Tondo tukulindia mulembe.
Umpanga tutende buni ku musagu wa Abalahama, tateisue ku lukita lua mubili?
Kubuno ndi Abalahama abingizibue ku misako zage, nti aneikaka, tondo ta ku Kalaga.
Kubuno masanzo makutenda buni? Abalahama akatizizie Kalaga, nu ku bubo atekuidue buno eisanana.
Tondo ku muntu ukukita mulimo, lukalilo luage talukuganzua buno, luli mponga, tondo luli nsombi.
Tondo ku muntu utakita mulimo, nu tondo ekukatizia we ukubingagia muagi, bukatizio buage buaganzilue buno buisanana.
Anga buatendile Davidi buno, mbogimbogi za muntu wozo, Kalaga amutekuide buno eisanana kute ku misako,
atendile bune,
Mbogimbogi ku babo basigililua mibi zabo,
Nu buagi buabo buakukilua.
Mbogimbogi ku muntu wozo buno Mukota ntamuganzide buagi.
Ndi mbogimbogi zeno zili ku babo bamonesibua tugu, aba ku babo batamonesibua nubo? kubuno tuatenda bune, Ku Abalahama bukatizio buatekuidue buno eisanana.
Buni buatekuidue? ndi gabezaga ese amonesibua, aba gabezaga ntemonesibua? Ta ku nkungu zakumonesibua, tondo gabezaga ntemonesibua:

we akatile kakengelezio kako ka kumonesibua, kakengelezio ka kuisanana kua bukatizio buabezaga nabo gabezaga ntemonesibua: buno abe isi wa babo bansania bekukatizia, aba ndi tabamonesibua, buno nubo batekulue buno beisanana;
nu abe isi wa kumonesibua ku babo aba tabamonesibua tugu, tondo nubo bakutabanga mu matingilo ma bukatizio bua tateisue Abalahama, buakasilue gabezaga ntemonesibua.
Kubuno idagano lilino lia buno akaba mupieni wa kisi liakasilue Abalahama nu kikanga kiage, ta ku mulembe, tondo ku kuisanana kuatekuidue ku bukatizio.
Kubuno ndi babo beli ba mulembe u bapieni, kasi bukatizio nti buli buliabulia, nu idagano nti liagaluka:
kubuno mulembe u gukukita bongua; kubuno ndi takuli mulembe, nti takuli kukagulua kua mulembe.
Ku lilio liatukile mu bukatizio, libe ku mponga; buno lilio idagano likoko­mene kikanga kinsania; ta kubabo ba mulembe tugu, tondo nu ku­babo ba bukatizio bua Abalahama; uli tateisue isue bansania
(anga buasanzilue bune, Nakubikile ube isi wa bilongo bingi); ku wozo wakatizizie u Kalaga, ukulamia bakuzi, nu ukutekula binsania bitabeide anga buno biabeide.
Nuwe akatizizie kulemanina gata­bezaga kilemanizio, buno abe isi wa babilongo beingi anga bubo bua­tendilue bune, Ububo bukaba kikanga kiobe.
We ntabezaga ata­mba mu bukatizio, akengede lukita lua mubili wage wabezaga use anga wakua (abezaga eseli na miaka lukama), nu Sela abezaga ese muku­ngu nunse;
tondo ntabezaga na mitima ibili kuidagano lia Kalaga ku kutakatizia, tondo alindile ku bukatizio nu aganuine Kalaga,
nu amenyine lebelebe buno Kalaga anavuama kukita bubo buasilile kulaga.
Ku bubo buatekuidue buno eisanana.
Tondo tabuasanzilue ku kabamba kage tugu, buno buatekuidue;
tondo ku kabamba keitu, isue bakatekulua bubo, isue bekukatizia wozo wayukizie Yesu Mukota weitu ku bakuzi,
kubuno akasenue ku kabamba ka misako za buagi bueitu nu kuyukibua buno tubingi­bue.
Umpanga ndi tuasila kubingibua ku bukatizio, tuli na bubo­belelo na Kalaga, mu Mukota weitu Yesu Klisto;
kubuno mueli tuakasilue bukatizio kubasa ku mponga zeno zituimine muzo; nu kubogaboga mu kilemanizio kia lutanuno lua Kalaga.
Aba ta bubo tugu, tondo tubogeboge mu nsungio insania; nu ku kumenya buno nsungio zikulusia nkiki;
nu nkiki zikulusia kukokomena nu kukokomena kukulusia kilemanizio:
nukio kilemanizio kiteli na nsoni; kubuno lutundo lua Kalaga luabalanganizibue mu miti­ma zeitu na Muzau Wasililila utuakasilue.
Kubuno gatuabe­zaga tatuli na magala, nu gakukile nkungu Klisto akuilide babi.
Kubuno buli bubibu muntu kukuila muntu wisanana; tondo buna­kulungana muntu kulindika kukuila wozo uli musoga.
Tondo Kalaga ekulolesia lutundo luage kutuli, kubuno Klisto atukuilide gatuabezaga tukili bagi.
Umpanga kuitila nunse kano kaluma ndi tuasila kubingibua mu mikila zage, tukonibua ku bongua mueli.
Kubuno, ndi gatuabezaga beiti, tuakulumanizibue na Kalaga ku lukuo lua Muana wage, kuitila nunse, gatuakulumanizibue, tukoni­bua mu kalamo kage;
aba ta bubo tugu, tondo tukubogaboga mu Kalaga ku Mukota weitu Yesu Klisto, kubuno mueli tuakulu­manizibue.
Ku bubuno, anga bubo ku muntu umozi buagi buabeide mu kisi, nu lukuo ku kabamba ka buagi; bubo lukuo luabaside bantu bansania, kubuno bansania bagile;
kubuno buagi buabezaga mu kisi nti mulembe taguba: tondo buagi tabunatekuidue songo mule­mbe tagubezageko.
Tondo lukuo luangatile kutukila ku Adama aba nu ku Mose, nu luangatile babo batakitile buagi bua lukita lua kukagula kua Adama, uli kisusania kia wozo ukavua.

Tondo lukaso lulo lua mponga taluabezaga anga bubo buagi, kubuno ndi ku buagi bua wozo umozi beingi bakule; kuitila nunse mponga za Kala­ga nu lukuo luli mu mponga za muntu umozi Yesu Klisto bietide ku kabamba ka babo beingi.

Nu lukita lua wozo muntu umozi wa­gile, talugezie na lulo lukaso; kubuno lusungio luavule ku muntu umozi lualusizie lubabazio; tondo lukaso lua mponga luavule ku ka­bamba ka buagi buingi lualusizie kubingibua.

Kubuno, ndi ku buagi bua muntu umozi, lukuo luangatile ku kabamba ka wozo umozi; kuitila nunse, babo bekukitilagua mponga ningi nu lulo lukaso lua kuisanana bakangata mu kalamo ku wozo umozi Yesu Klisto.
Umpanga lingo anga bubo ku buagi bumozi bantu bansania basungizibue, bubo kuikitilo limozi lisanana bantu bansania babi­ngizibue mu kalamo.
Kubuno anga ku kunana kua muntu umozi bansania babeide bagi, bubo ku kuanza kua muntu umozi babo beingi babikilue beisanana.
Tondo mulembe wabeide buno buagi bubo buitile: tondo buagi gabuitide, mponga zeitide ningi nunse;
buno, anga bubo buagi buangatile mu lukuo, bubo ku kuisanana mponga zangate aba ku kalamo katanakuzinda mu Yesu Klisto Mukota weitu.
Umpanga tutende buni? Ndi tukite buagi buno mponga zitile?
Kilo, aba nunse. Isue tualekanukile na buagi, buni butunalama lingo mu buagi?
Aba, ndi tamukumenya buno, isue bansania tuabatizizibue mu Klisto Yesu, tuabatizizibue mu lukuo luage?
Ububo tuayikilue nage mu bubatizio mu lukuo luage; buno anga bubo buayukile Klisto ku bakuzi ku lutanuno lulsi, bubo nuisue tutabangazi mu kalamo kato.
Kubuno ndi tuakulumani­zibue nage mu lukita lua lukuo luage, lebelebe lingo tuakulumanibua nage mu lukita lua kuyuka kuage;
tuizi buno bumba bueitu bua buagi, buatakilue ku muti nage, buno mubili wa bumba bua buagi gubige, bubo tatuatunganana kuba bakobe ba buagi lingo;
ku­buno wozo wakule abingizibue ku buagi.
Tondo ndi tuakule na Klisto tukukatizia buno tukalama nage;
tuizi buno Klisto ayukile ku bakuzi ntakalekana lingo; lukuo talukamuangata lingo.
Ku­buno kuko kukua kuage, akuilide buagi limbizi limozi tugu: tondo kuko kulama kuage alamine Kalaga.
Bubo nuinyue kengelazi buno mualekanukile na buagi, nu muse balami ku Kalaga mu Klisto Yesu.
Tamuzige buagi kuangata mu mibili zeinyu za lukuo, nu kuanza ntundo zabo;
aba tamukasane biganza bienyu ku buagi kukita buteisa; tondo muikasane ku Kalaga, anga bantu beli na kalamo kutuka ku bakuzi, nu biganza bienyu kuba bia kukita buisanana ku Kalaga.
Kubuno buagi tabukamuangata lingo: kubuno tamuli mu mulembe, tondo mu mponga.
Buni lingo? Ndi tukite buagi, kubuno tatuli mu mulembe, tondo mu mponga? Kilo, aba nunse.
Ndi tamuizi buno wozo umuikasene kueli kuba bakobe bage bakumuanza; museli bakobe ba wozo umukuanzaga; aba bakobe ba buagi bukulusagia lukuo, aba ndi muli bakobe bakuanza ku kuisanana?
Tondo Kalaga aganunue, kubuno muabezaga bakobe ba buagi, tondo muanzile ku mitima zeinyu lulo lukita lua meigisia mamuigisizibue;
nu muasilile kukandulua ku buagi, museli bakobe ba kuisanana.

Nkutenda ku lukita lua bantu, ku kabamba ka mutambo wa bumba bueinyu: kubuno anga bubo bumuakasene biganza bienyu kukitila nsese nu bubi ku bubi, ububo kano kaluma kasanazi biganza bienyu kukitila kuisanana aba nu ku kusuagibua.
Kubuno gamuabezaga bakobe ba buagi, muabezaga muakandua ku kuisanana.
Umpanga mutali mukizi umuamonine kugo bindi bibio ku bubuno bumukukua nsoni kano kaluma? Kubuno kuzinda kua bubuno kuli lukuo.
Tondo kano kaluma muse muakandulua ku buagi, nu muabeide bakobe ba Kalaga, museli na mutali uku­suagibua, nu kuzinda kalamo katanakuzinda,
Kubuno lukalilo lua buagi luli lukuo, tondo lukaso lua Kalaga luakutukasaga mu mponga luli kalamo katanakuzinda mu Yesu Klisto Mukota weitu.
Mibuto zane, ndi tamuizi (kubuno nkutenda na babo beizi mulembe), kubuno mulembe ukuangata muntu ku nkungu zeli na kalamo?
Kubuno mukikulu ndi eli neiba akandua na mulembe ku wozo iba ndi eli na kalamo; tondo ndi wozo iba akua, nti akandulua ku mulembe weiba wage.
Umpanga, nkungu zili iba wage na kalamo, ndi asongua nongo wamulume, nti eita meiga: tondo ndi iba wage akua, nti akandulua ku mulembe, nu nti nteita meiga, anasongua nongo wamulume.
Bubo nuinyue, mibuto zane, mualekanukile na mulembe ku mubili wa Klisto, buno mube bikulo bia gungo, u wozo wayukizibue ku bakuzi, buno tukolamine Kalaga biguma.
Kubuno gatuayangaga bumba bua buagi, nu ntundo zabo mbi, zabezaga ku kabamba ka mulembe, zakitile mulimo mu biganza bietu aba tuakolamine biguma bia lukuo.
Tondo kano kaluma tuakanduidue ku mulembe, tualekanukile na wozo watukandile; buno tukite mu lukita luto lua muuza, ta mu lukita luasanzilue wakalazi.
Umpanga tutende buni? Ndi mulembe uli buagi? Kilo, aba nunse. Tondo nsinamenyine misako za buagi, songo mulembe ta­guliko; kubuno nsinamenyine kutonia songo mulembe tawatendile bune, Ntutonie:
tondo buagi buamonine kiziki ku kuko kukakizia buakitile mundi lukita na lukita lua kutonia: kubuno kuteli mulembe buagi tabuabezaga na magala.
Nunne nabezaga na kalamo mu kulinga kuteli mulembe; tondo gabasile kukakizia, buagi buabede na kalamo nunne nakule;
nu kuko kukakizia kuandusizizie kalamo; ukuko kualusizie lukuo;
kubuno buagi buamonine kiziki ku kuko kukakizia buanengelede, nu kububo buanitile.
Kasi, mulembe uli wasilila, nu kuko kukakizia kuli kuasililila, nu kuisanana, nu kusoga.
Buni lingo, bubo buabezaga busoga, buambelede buse lukuo? Kilo, aba nunse. Tondo buagi buno bumoneke buli buagi, buakitile lukuo mundi ku bubo busoga; buno ku kuko kukakizia buagi bube bubi nunse.
Kubuno tuizi buno mulembe uli wa muuza: tondo nne nili na mubili wa lukuo, nangatilue na buagi.
Kubuno nsizi bunkukita; kubuno bunkutunda tubunkukita; tondo bubo bunkusomba, ububo bu­nkukitaga.
Tondo ndi nkukita bubo buntakutunda, nti nitabizia mulembe buno uli musoga.
Nu kano kaluma ta nnenyene ukubukita, tondo bubo buagi buikile mundi.
Kubuno nizi buno mundi nnenyene, buno mu bumba buane bua buagi tamuikile buampa busoga; kubuno kutunda nkutunda, tondo nsikuvuama kukita busoga.
Kubuno bubo busoga bunkutundaga tubunku­kitaga: tondo bubo bubi buntakutundaga, ububo bunkukitaga.
Umpanga, ndi bubo buntakutunda, ububo bunkukita, nti ta nnenyene ukubukita, tondo buagi bukuikalaga mundi.
Umpa­nga, nkumona ku mulembe wono, buno nkutunda kukita busoga, tondo bubi nti buseli.
Kubuno nabogaboga ku mulembe wa Kalaga ku muntu undi nage:
tondo nkumona ku ungo mulembe mu biganza biane, ukuitana na wozo mulembe wa bumenyinino buane, nu ukunkinda nu kuba mukobe wa mulembe wa buagi uli mu biganza biane.
Nne mukuzi! nazi ukandekanukia na mubili wono wa lukuo?
Nkusimaga Kalaga mu Yesu Klisto Mukota weitu. Ububo nne ku bumenyinino buane, nkukitilaga mulembe wa Kalaga; tondo mu bumba buane bua buagi, nkukiti­laga mulembe wa buagi.
Kano kaluma takuli lusungio lingo ku babo beli mu Klisto Yesu.
Kubuno mulembe wa Muuza wa kalamo uli mu Klisto Yesu wankanduide ku mulembe wa buagi nu lukuo.

Ku­buno bubo butakulungana ku mulembe, ku bubo wabezaga watamba ku kabamba ka bumba bua buagi, Kalaga asingile Muana wage wa ngomo mu kisusania kia mubili wa buagi, nu ku kabamba ka buagi, asungizie buagi mu mubili:
buno kuisanana kua mulembe kuzindilizibue mutuli, batakuendaga mu misako za bumba bua buagi; tondo mu misako za Muuza.
Kubuno babo bekuya­ngaga bumba bua buagi bekukengelaga misako za bumba bua buagi; tondo babo bekuyangaga Muuza bekukengelaga misako za Muuza.
Kubuno makengelo ma bumba bua buagi meli lukuo; tondo makengelo ma Muuza meli kalamo nu bubobelelo:
kubuno makengelo ma bumba bua buagi mekuluana na Kalaga; kubuno tamakuanzaga mulembe wa Kalaga, nu tamakuguvuama:
nu bekuyangaga bumba bua buagi tabanatananizia Kalaga.
Tondo ndi Muuza wa Kalaga weikala mumuli, nti tamukuyanga bumba bua buagi; tondo nti mukuyanga Muuza, tondo unsania uteli na Muuza wa Klisto, wozo nti ta muntu wage.
Nu ndi Klisto eli mumuli, mubili nti wakua ku kabamba ka buagi, tondo muntu wa munda nti eli na kalamo ku kabamba ka kuisanana.
Ndi Muuza wa wozo wayukizie Yesu ku bakuzi ekuikalaga mumuli, we wayukizie Klisto Yesu ku bakuzi alamie mibili zeinyu za lukuo ku Muuza wage ukuikalaga mumuli.
Umpanga, anga ndi bubuno mibuto zane, tuli na nsombi, ta ku bumba bua buagi, kuyanga misako za bumba bua buagi,
ku­buno ndi mualama ku kuyanga misako za bumba bua buagi, nti muakua; tondo ndi mukuita misako za bumba bua buagi mu magala ma Muuza, nti mukalama.
Kubuno bansania bakuso­ndelezibagua na Muuza wa Kalaga, u babano beli bana ba Kalaga.
Kubuno tamuakasilue muuza wa bukobe bukulusagia boba; tondo muakasilue muuza wa kukitua bana, ku wono tukulilaga, Aba, Tateisue.
Muuza wenyene ekulongekaga na muuza weitu, buno tuli bana ba Kalaga:
ndi tuli bana, kasi tuli bapieni, bapieni ba Kalaga, nu bapieni na Klisto; ndi buli bubo tuasu­ngizibue nage, buno tutanunue nage.
Kubuno nsinaganza mbabazio za kano kaluma buno tazili kampa anga lulo lutanuno lukamoneka kutuli.
Kubuno bibu­mbua binsania bikulindilaga nunse busi bubo bua kulolesibua kua bana ba Kalaga.
Kubuno bibumbua binsania biabotezibue ku lukuo nu kubiga, ta ku lutundo luabio, tondo ku kabamba ka wozo wabibotezie na kilemanizio;
buno bibumbua bibienyene bikandulue ku bukobe bua lukuo ku bukandulua bua lutanuno lua bana ba Kalaga.
Kubuno tukumenya buno bibumbua binsania bikutongaga bumozi nu bikubabalagua aba nu kano kaluma.
Aba ta bubo tugu, tondo isue benyene beli na ntiko za Muuza, nuisue tukutongaga mu mitima ku kulindila kubikua bana, u bukuluzi bua mibili zeitu.
Kubuno tonezibue ku kilemanizio: tondo ndi kilemanizio kiamonekako, nti takili kilemanizio lingo: kubuno ndi muntu ekumona ku kena anakalemanina lingo?
To­ndo ndi tukulemanina kitutakumona kukio, nti tukukilindila na komanizia.
Ububo Muuza ekukasia mutambo weitu: kubuno tatuku­menyaga kusega anga buatutunganana; tondo Muuza wenyene ekutusegelaga ku masego matutakuvuama kusega;
nuwe ukulo­ndaga mitima eizi makengelo ma Muuza, kubuno ekusegela basuagi­bua buli kusombola kua Kalaga.
Nu tuizi buno binsania bikukasania kuba busoga ku babo bakutundaga Kalaga, babo bamaninue ku kusombola kuage.
Kubuno babo balingile kumenya, ababikile wakalazi babe kisusania kia Muana wage, buno abe nkula munkatini mua mibuto zage mingi:
nu babo babikile wakalazi ubabo bamanine: nu babo bamanine, ubabo babingizie: nu babo babingizie, ubabo baganuine.
Umpanga buni bututenda ku bubuno? Ndi Kalaga eli ku lulenge lueitu, nazi unatubigana?
We utakutizie Muana wage wenyene, tondo amukaseine ku kabamba keitu, isue bansania, buni buanida kutukasa binsania bulia mueli?
Nazi ukasongela basombolua ba Kalaga? Nu Kalaga ekubabingagia;
nazi ukabasungia? Klisto Yesu, uwakule, nu ayukile mu bakuzi, nuwe eli ku kuboko kuaseidume kua Kalaga, nu ekutusegelaga.
Nazi ukatulekanukia na lutundo lua Klisto? Ndi nsungio, aba mbabazio, aba nzala, aba buela, aba kiziki kibibu, aba bupanga?
Anga buasanzilue, bune,
Ku kabamba kobe tukuitagua busi bunsania,
Tukuganzua anga mikoko za kusesua.
Tondo, mu bubuno bunsania tuitila kukinda mu we watutu­ndile.
Kubuno namenya lebelebe buno, lukuo, aba kalamo, aba mugenzi, aba buangato, aba bangati, aba bua kano kaluma, aba bukavua,
aba magala ma kuigulu, aba magala ma munsi, aba kingo kibumbua kinsania, takikatulekanukia na lutundo lua Kalaga, luli mu Klisto Yesu Mukota weitu.
Nkutenda buli bulili mu Klisto, nsikueka buza, kalenganio kane kakundongekela mu Muuza Wasililila,
buno nili na kabebe kanene nu lubaba lutakusila mu mutima wane.
Kubuno ninatunda nnenyene nisuililue nu kulekanukibua na Klisto ku kabamba ka mibuto zane, kikanga kiane ku mubili:
beli balsalele; bakubikua lingo bana, nu lutanuno, nu malagi, nu kukasua mulembe, nu ikumbamino, nu malagano mage;
nu beli na beisingulubo mubeli umuatukile Klisto ku lukita lua mubili; uli muangati wa binsania, Kalaga aganunue ku nkiko zitanakuzinda. Amena.
Tabuno idagi lia Kalaga liengukana. Kubuno ta bansania beli balsalele ubaganzilue ba balsalele;
aba tabansania ubeli kikanga kia Abalahama; tondo, mu Isaka kikanga kiobe kikamanua.
Kubuno ta bana ba mibili ubeli bana ba Kalaga, tondo bana ba lilio idagano ubeli bana ba Kalaga.
Kubuno lilino u iyuki lieidagano: ku nkungu zeno navue nu Sela abute muana wa­mulume.
Aba ta bubo tugu; tondo Lebeka eikezibue iyimi na tateisue Isaka,
kubuno gabezaga babo bana tabebutua, aba tabekita busoga aba bubi, buno makengelo ma Kalaga ma kusombola memane, ta ku makitilo, tondo ku wozo ukumanaga,
abuidue bubuno bune, Mukulu munene akakitila muana muto.
Anga buasanzilue bune, natundile Yakobo, tondo Esau namuso­mbile.
Umpanga tutende buni? Ndi kuli buteisa ku Kalaga? Kilo aba nunse.
Kubuno abuide Mose bune, Nkamukuila kiombo wozo unkakuila kiombo, nu nkamukasa mponga wozo unkakita mponga.
Ndi anga bubo kasi ta ku magala ma wozo ukutunda, aba ta ma wozo ukusasia, tondo ma wozo ukukua kiombo u Kalaga.
Kubuno masanzo matendile ku Falao bune, Ku bubuno nakusakikile, buno nilolesie magala mane muguli, nu izina liane lisambalue mu kisi kinsania.
Ububo wozo wakutunda kukuila kiombo nti amukuila kiombo, nu wozo wakutunda kukita mutima mubibu nti amukita mutima mubibu.
Umpanga wambule buno, kubuni ekiazuga? Kubuno nazi unasunua na kusombola kuage?
Ta bubo, E muntu, tondo uwe nazi ukuakula Kalaga? Kibumbua kiabumbilue ndi kinate­nda ku wozo wakibumbile buno, kubuni kuwambumbile bubuno?
Abandi mubumbi nteli na buangato kuibumba ku kibombo kimozi kubumba kibumbua kimozi kikuanzua, nu kimozi takikuanzua?
Umpanga Kalaga, atundile kulolesia bongua buage, nu kulolesia magala mage, alindide na nkiki nnene ku bibio bia bongua biakulu­mizibue ku lukuo:
nu lingo alolesie buingi bua lutanuno luage mu bibio bia kiombo, biakulumizizie kutukila wakalazi buno bibe na lutanuno,
ubeisue bamanine, ta baYuda kanka­nka, tondo nu baBilongo nubo?
Ububo buatendile mu Osea bune,
Nkabamana bantu bane, batabezaga bantu bane;
Nu we mutundua wane utabezaga mutundua wane.
Nu bukaba, ku kiziki kikio kibabuidue,
Inyue tamuli bantu bane,
Ugago bakamanua bana ba Kalaga uli Mulami.
Nu Yesaya alalukile neiyuki ku ba Isalele bune, Kilo maganzo ma bana ba Isalele manabede anga misege za kitatenge, tondo babo nkindi tugu ubakonibua:
kubuno Mukota akasililizia mulimo wage ku kisi, akagusila, nu akaguzindilizia.
Nu, anga buali­ngile kutenda Yesaya,
Songo Mukota weiyombo ntatusigide kikanga,
Songo tunabede anga Sodoma,
nu tunalingimanizibue na Gomola,
Umpanga tutende buni? Buno baBilongo, batayangile kuisanana, bamonine ku kuisanana, ukuisanana kua bukatizio;
tondo balsalele, bayangile mulembe wa kuisanana, tababasile ku wozo mulembe wa kuisanana.
Ku kabamba kakizi? Ku­buno tabagulondile mu bukatizio, tondo ku makitilo. Kubuno beikukile kuikozi lilio likukikitanagia.
Anga buasanzilue bune,
Mungue, nabika mu Siona ikozi likukikitanagia, nu luanda lukugusagia:
Nu unsania ukamukatizia ntakakua na nsoni.
Mibuto zane, lutundo luane lunene mu mutima nu masego mane ku Kalaga ku kabamba kabo meli buno, bonibue.
Kubuno nkubalongekela buno beli neiyilili ku kukitila Kalaga, tondo ta ku bumenyinino.
Kubuno ku kutamenya kuisanana kua Kalaga nu kutunda kukokomezia kuisanana kuabo benyene, tabeibotezie ku kuisanana kua Kalaga.
Kubuno Klisto u kuzinda kua mulembe buno na wamukatizia nti atekulua buno eisanana.
Kubuno Mose asanzile ku kuisanana kukutuka ku mulembe buno, muntu ukukita bubo nti alama kubo.
Tondo kuisanana kukumoneka ku bukatizio kukutenda buno, ntutende mu mutima wobe buno nazi ukabakama kuigulu? (nti ukugezia Klisto gansi),
aba, nazi ukagela mu muzinga? (nti ukusakika Klisto kuigulu kutuka ku bakuzi).
Tondo ku kutenda buni? Idagi lili buigi nobe, mu kanua kobe, nu mu mutima wobe; ulilio lia bukatizio litukusambalaga,
kubuno ndi witabizia Yesu na kanua kobe buno eli Mukota, nu kukatizia mu mutima wobe buno Kalaga amuyukizie ku bakuzi, nti ukonibua.
Kubuno ku mutima muntu eku­katizia aba nu kuisanana, nu ku kanua ekuitabizia nu konibua.
Kubuno masanzo mekutenda buno, unsania wamukatizia ntakeitibua na nsoni.
Kubuno takuli kuengukana gasamba baYuda nu baGeleka kubuno wozo u Mukota wa bansania eli mugumi ku bansania bakumusega.
Kubuno na muntu na muntu ukasegaga Mukota kuizina liage nti akonibua.
Umpanga buni bubakamana wozo ubatakatizia? Lingo, buni bubakakatizia wozo ubatonguleko? Lingo, buni bubakongua ndi tabeli na musambazi?
Nu lingo buni bubakasambala, ndi tabasingua? Anga buasanzilue bune, Magulu mabo meli masoga, babo bekusa­mbalaga misagu misoga!
Tondo tabansania ubanzile wozo musagu musoga. Kubuno Yesaya atendile bune, Mukota, nazi wakatizizie musagu weitu?
Umpanga bukatizio bukuvua ku kungua, nu kungua kukuvua kuidagi lia Klisto.
Tondo natenda, Ndi tabongule? E, bongule,
Iyuki liabo liabalangene mu kisi kinsania,
Nu moki mabo aba ku bansania ba kisi.
Tondo natenda, Ndi balsalele tabamenyinine? Mose alingile kutenda bune,
Nkababika mutima wa lugi ku babo beteli kilongo,
Ku kilongo kiteli na bumenyinino nkamongia.
Tondo Yesaya abede na ngini, nu atendile bune,
Namonekile na babo batandondaga;
Nalolesezibue ku babo batambuzagia.
Tondo ku balsalele atendile bune, Busi bunsania nalambizie maboko mane ku bantu beteli na luanzo, nu banani.
Umpanga nabuzia bune, Ndi Kalaga asindikile bantu bage bulazi? Kilo, aba nunse. Kubuno nunne nili mulsalele umozi, wa kikanga kia Abalahama, wa kilongo kia Benzamini.
Kalaga ntasindikile bantu bage bulazi bamenyinine mu kulinga. Ndi tamukumenya bukutenda masanzo ku bua Eliya? Lukita luasongede balsalele ku Kalaga, atendile bune,
Mukota, beitile balengania bobe, nu babalanganizie tuyulo tuobe; nunne nasigala nnenyene, nubo bakulonda kunita.
Tondo Kalaga amuakuide buni? Neibikide bamulume tununu mutuba kamo, batekumba­mina Bala.
Nu bubo ku nkungu za kano kaluma, kuasigala kindi kia basombolua mu mponga.
Tondo ndi ku mponga, kasi ta ku makitilo lingo; songo mponga tazili lingo mponga.
Umpa­nga buni lingo? Bubo bualondaga balsalele, tababumonine: tondo babo basombuedue ubamonine kubo, nu bango babede na mitima za kogia:
anga buasanzilue bune, Kalaga abakasile mutima utakumenyinina, nu meiso matakumona, nu matuzi matakungua aha nu lelo.
Nu Davidi atendile bune,
Meza mabo mabe anga bukila, nu itega,
Nu kia kubakikitania nu idigo kubeli:
Meiso mabo mazibue bubatanamona,
Nu ubakumbe migongo zabo bindi binsania.
Umpanga nabuzia, ndi beikukile buno bague? Kilo, aba nunse: tondo kugua kuabo lonio luabaside baBilongo, buno ba­kubue lugi.
Umpanga ndi kugua kuabo kuabezaga bugumi bua kisi, nu kukokoka kuabo bugumi bua baBilongo; kikizi kikaba mu kusila kusombolua kuabo?
Tondo nkutenda neinyue baBilongo, kubuno nili musingua wa baBilongo, naganuna mulimo wane;
buno embe nabika lugi ku babo beli mibuto zane, nonie bamozi kubeli.
Kubuno ndi kusindikua kuabo kualusia ikulumanino ku kisi, kuitabizibua kuabo nti kuabe buni, nti kalamo katuka ku bakuzi?
N di kiguma kitangi kiasuagibua, kinsania nti kiasuagibua; nu ndi isina liasuagi­bua, nu ntabi nti zasuagibua.
Tondo ndi ingo ntabi zasesua, nu uwe, uli wa muti wa Oleve wa kalula, wingizizibue munkatini muazo, nu wagomia nazo masina ma muti nu mu nago wa muti wa Oleve;
ntuikake ku ntabi: tondo ndi wikaka, towenyene ukuekaga masina, tondo masina umakukuekaga.
Umpanga ndi unatenda bune, Ntabi zasesilue, buno ningizibue.
Lebelebe; zasesilue kukutakatizia kuazo, nu uwe wimana ku bukatizio buobe. Ntuikotie, tondo kua boba:
kubuno ndi Kalaga ntasigile ntabi ntangi, kasi ntanakusiga nu uwe.
Kengelazi busoga nu bukali bua Kalaga: ku babo bakolokile, bukali; tondo kuguli, busoga bua Kalaga, ndi wikala mu busoga buage: nu ndi ntuli bubo nu uwe nti ukasesua.
Nu babo, ndi tabeikala mu kutakatizia, nti beingizibua: kubuno Kalaga anavuama kubeingizia lingo.
Ndi uwe wasesilue ku muti wa oleve wa lukita lua mu kalula, nu wingizizibue ku lungo lukita mu muti musoga wa oleve; embe zizo ntabi ntangi zikuingizibua mu muti wazo wa oleve?
Kubuno nsikutunda mibuto zane, muiba kakungu kakano, buno munavua kuikotia mu menge meinyu mubenyene, buno ba Isalele babede biuku mu mitima aba mu nkungu za kusililila kua kusombolua kua baBilongo;
nu bubo ba Isalele bansania bakonibua; anga buasanzilue bune,
Mukuluzi akatuka ku Siona;
Akagalukia Yakobo ku kunana kuage;
Nu lino u idagano liane nabo,
Gankabatikia misako za buagi buabo.
Umpanga ku musagu musoga, babede beiti ku kabamba keinyu: tondo ku musagu wa kusombolua, beseli batundua ku kabamba ka beisibo.
Ku bubuno nkaso nu kumana kua Kalaga tabili na kuibezia.
Kubuno anga inyue wakalazi muabengile Kalaga, tondo kano kaluma muakuilua kiombo ku kubenga kuabo,
bubo nubo bese babenga kano kaluma, buno ku kukuila kiombo kueinyu nubo bakuilue kiombo.
Kubuno Kalaga akandile bansania mu kunana, buno akue bansania kiombo.
Naganagana na bunene bua bugumi nu bumenyinino bua Kalaga! nsungio zage tazikumenyininua, nu nkita zage taziku­menyininua!
Kubuno nazi wamenyinine makengelo ma Mu­kota? aba nazi ukumukalilaga luango?
aba nazi walingile kumukasa kena, buno anasubizibuako lingo?
Kubuno binsania bikutukaga kueli, nu bikile ku magala mage, nu bili ku kabamba kage; Lutanuno lube kueli nkiko zitanakuzinda. Amena.
Umpanga, nkumusengezia, mibuto zane, ku kiombo kia Kalaga, buno mukasane mibili zeinyu zibe kisansa kikula­maga, kiasuagibua, nu kikutananizia Kalaga, ikumbamino lienyu lia bumenyinino.
Tamususananie na bantu ba nkiko zeno: tondo mugalukibue ku bumenyinino bueinyu buto, buno mumenye nunse buni buli kusombola kua Kalaga kuli kusoga, nu kuakumutananizia nu kuasililila.
Kubuno kumpongazinakitilue nkubula muntu namuntu kumuli, nteikengele wenyene kutinga buatunganana kukengela; tondo abe na makengelo mabota anga buamubeganizizie Kalaga bukatizio ku muntu na muntu.
Kubuno anga bubo mu mubili umozi tuli na biganza bingi nubio biganza binsania tabikukita mulimo umozi;
bubo nuisue, tuli beingi, tuli mubili umozi mu Klisto, nuisue bansania tuli biganza, na kiganza na kiganza ku kingo.
Umpanga, kubuno tuli na nkaso zengukana, anga mponga zituakitilue, ndi bulengania nti tualengania ku bukatizio bueitu;
ndi ku mulimo wa kukasia, nti tube mu mulimo weitu wakukasia; wozo ukuigisia, abe mu kuigisia kuage;
wozo ukuana nti ana: mukasania, akasane na mutima utenanduma; muangati, angate na komanizia; ukukua kiombo, akikue na mbogimbogi.
Lutundo talube na buengelezi. Sombazi bubi; Gomiazi na busoga.
Ku lutundo lua mibuto zeinyu, kitanazi mponga bueinyu bueinyu, ku luanzo mutundane kutinga bumuitunda mubenyene;
mube na komanizia, tamube na kogia mu kukita: mube na lutundo lunene mu mitima zeinyu, mukitile Mukota;
mubogeboge mu kilemanizio, mube na nkiki mu mbabazio, muikokomezie mu kusega;
mukasie basuagibua ku kuiyanina kuabo; musekele bageni.
Kitazi babo bakumubabazia mponga: kitazi mponga, nu tamusuilile.
Bogazibogazi na babo bekubo­gaboga; lilazi na babo bekulila.
Mube na bumenyinino bumozi bueinyu bueinyu. Tamukengele buamutinga, tondo kengelazi bumunakosia. Tamube bantu ba kuikotezia menge.
Wamukita bubi, tamumukite bubi. Kitazi misako misoga ku bantu bansania.
Ndi buakulungana kumuli, mube na bubo­belelo na bantu bansania.
Batundua bane, tamuisube mu­benyene, tondo musigile Kalaga bongua, kubuno buasanzilue bune, Kusuba kuli kundi; nokasuba, u buatendile Mukota.
Tondo ndi wakusomba ekukua na nzala, nti wamulisia; ndi ekukua na mpusia, nti wamunusia; kubuno ndi wakita bubo nti wamubike kibombo kia makangania ma keiya gantata geitoe.
Ntukindue na bubi, tondo ukinde bubi na busoga.
Muntu na muntu anze buangato bunene: kubuno takuli buangato butatukile ku Kalaga: nu bubo buliko buakakizizi­bue na Kalaga.
Ububo nu nawe ukubenga uli na buangato, nti ekusunua na kukakizia kua Kalaga; nu babo bekubenga bakasungibua.
Kubuno bangati tabakusungia bantu ku kabamba ka makitilo masoga, tondo ku kabamba ka makitilo mabi. Umpanga ndi ntukue uli na buangato boba? kita busoga, nu nti waganunue nage:
kubuno we eli mukiti wa Kalaga kuguli ku kabamba ka busoga. Tondo ndi wakita bubi, nti wakua boba; kubuno ntekueka bupanga buliabulia; kubuno eli mukiti wa Kalaga, ekusuba wozo ukukitua bubi.
Ku bubuno buatunganana kuanza, ta ku kabamba ka bongua tugu, tondo ku kabamba ka kalenganio.
Kububo mukuligaga idigo; kubuno beli bakiti ba mulimo wa Kalaga, kukitaga mulimo wa lukita luluno kankanka.
Bakasazi bansania biabo; muntu widigo, idigo; muntu wa mutali, mutali; watu­nganana kukukua boba mukuazi boba; watunganana kuanzua muanzazi.
Tamube na nsombi ku muntu, tugu kutundana: kubuno wozo watunda munyage azindilizia mulembe.
Kubuno, Ntuite meiga, Ntuite, Ntutonie, Nu ndi kuli ungo mulembe, nti unatendua muidagi lilino buno, utunde munyobe anga buwitunda uwenyene.
Lutundo talukukitila munyage bubi: umpanga lutundo luli kusililila kua mulembe.
Nu ndi, tuamenya nkungu, buno kano kaluma zili nkungu za kuyuka ku tulo: kubuno lonio lueitu luse buigi kutinga nkungu zituakatizizie.
Busi buigi na kusila, musi use buigi: umpanga tusigazi makitilo ma kapilo, nu tuzuale ngabo za kiengi.
Tuta­bange na menge, anga mu musi; ta ku buliagundu nu kukua na maku, ta ku butazi nu kabenga, ta ku nsake nu lugi.
Tondo muzuale Mukota Yesu Klisto, nu tamukengele kuiyanina kua bumba bua buagi, munavua kuba na ntundo zabo.
Tondo we watamba mu bukatizio musekelazi, tondo tamusu­ngie makengelo mage.
Muntu umozi ndi eli na bukatizio ekulia binsania; ungo watamba ekulia biguma tugu.
We ukuliaga ntabenge wozo utakuliaga, nuwe utakuliaga ntanyege wozo ukuliaga; kubuno Kalaga amuitabizizie.
Uwe unazi ukusungia mukitl wa ungo muntu? Kubuno alinda aba atamba ku mukota wage wenyene. Nu nti alindibue; kubuno Mukota anamulindia.
Muntu umozi akuanza busi bumozi kuba busoga kutinga bungo busi: ungo ekuanza mosi mansania kuba bumozi. Na muntu na muntu alinde mu bumenyinino buage wenyene.
We ukualiza busi ekuanza ku kabamba ka Mukota; nu ukulia, ekulia ku Mukota, kubuno ekuganuna Kalaga; nu utekulia, ntakulia ku Mukota, nuwe ekuganuna Kalaga.
Kubuno takuli muntu ukulamaga wenyene, nu takuli muntu ukukua wenyene.
Kubuno ndi tualama, nti tuli ba Mukota; aba ndi tuakua, nti tuli ba Mukota. Umpanga, ndi tualama, aba ndi tuakua, isue nti tuli ba Mukota.
Ku bubuno Klisto akule, nu alamine lingo, ku kabamba kako abe Mukota wa bakuzi nu balami.
Tondo buni bukusungia mubuto wobe? aba buni bukubenga mubuto wobe? Kubuno isue bansania tukemana ku kisumbi kia lusungio lua Klisto.
Kubuno buasa­nzilue bune,
Anga bunkulama, ubuatendile Mukota,
mazu mansania makakomua kuane,
Nu ndami insania zikaganuna Kalaga.
Ububo na muntu na muntu kutuli akasambala misako zage wenyene ku Kalaga.
Umpanga tatusunganie lingo; tondo mukakizie luluno lusungio, buno muntu ntabike kena ka kukukia munyage aba ku­mugusia.
Nizi, buno nkumenyininua nunse mu Mukota Yesu, buno takuli kimozi kili na nsese ku lukita luakio: tondo ku wozo ukukimonako buno kili na nsese, ku wozo kikio nti kili na nsese.
Ndi mubuto wobe ekuiyania kuidia liobe, ntunamutunda. Ku kabamba keidia ntubigie muntu wozo, kubuno Klisto amukuilide.
Umpanga busoga bueinyu tabube bubi:
kubuno bukota bua Kalaga ta buli ku kulia, aba ku kunua, tondo ku kuisanana nu ku bubobelelo nu ku mbogimbogi mu Muuza Wasililila.
Kubuno we ukukitila Klisto mu bubuno atananizia Kalaga, nu ekuita­bizibue na bantu.
Ndi bubo tuyange bubobelelo nu buatananina kulindania.
Ntuite mulimo wa Kalaga kuidia. Binsania bili bisoga; tondo bili bibi ku wozo ukulia ku kuinia mutima.
Buli busoga kutalia nyama, nu kutanua maku, aba kutakita buneinia mubuto wobe mutima.
Bubo bukatizio buli nabo, ube nabo uwenyene ku Kalaga. Mbogimbogi ku muntu wozo utakuisingia ku bubo buakuitabizia.
Tondo we uli na mitima ibili ndi adia nti asungibua, kubuno ntalia ku bukatizio; nu neikitilo litatuka ku bukatizio nti lili musako wa buagi.
Buatunganana isue beli na magala kulindia babo beteli na magala, aba tatuitananizie isue benyene.
Na muntu na muntu kutuli atananizie munyage ku busoga, ku kumulindia.
Kubuno Klisto nteitananizizie wenyene, tondo anga buasanzilue bune Kuzuga kuabo babo bakuzigide kuankiminine.
Kubuno binsania biasanzilue wakalazi biasanzilue buno bituigisie, buno nkiki nu ku kubobelezia kua masanzo tube na kilemanizio.
Nu Kalaga wa nkiki nu mubobelezia amukase makengelo mamozi inyue bansania ku lukita lua Klisto Yesu:
buno ku mutima umozi nu ku kanua kamozi muganune Kalaga Isi wa Mukota weitu Yesu Klisto.
Ku bubuno musekelane bueinyu bueinyu, anga buatuse­kede Klisto, buno Kalaga aganunue.
Umpanga natenda buno Klisto abeide mukiti weidagano lia kumonesibua ku kabamba ka bulili bua Kalaga, buno alindie malagano makasilue ku batateisue,
nu buno baBilongo baganune Kalaga ku kabamba ka kiombo kiage, anga buasanzilue bune,
Ku kabamba kakano nkakuganuna ku baBilongo,
Nkeimbila izina liobe.
Nu lingo atenda,
Bogazibogazi inyue baBilongo, gamozi na bantu bage.
Nu lingo,
